GSP33vacbhamu:8: śāśvatāya namaskurmo vedāya ca bhavāya ca //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:22_0: sa cāyam ākīṭapataṅgebhya ā ca devarṣibhyaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasyedaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo
GSP33vacbhamu:23: na hi jātu kaścidatra saṃdigdhe 'ahaṃ vā nāhaṃ vā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:28: tadālambanatve hi 'yo 'haṃ bālye pitarāvanvabhūvaṃ sa eva sthāvire praṇaptṝnanubhavāmi' iti pratisaṃdhānaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:29: na hi bālasthavirayoḥ śarīrayorasti manāgapi pratyabhijñānagandho yenaikatvaṃ adhyavasīyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:30: tasmādyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣu yadanuvartate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā kusumebhyaḥ sūtram /
GSP33vacbhamu:31: tathā ca bālādiśarīreṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi parasparamahaṅkārāspadamanuvartamānaṃ tebhyo bhidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:32_0: api ca svapnānte divyaṃ śarīrabhedamāsthāya taducitānbhogānbhuñjāna eva pratibuddho
GSP33vacbhamu:32_1: manuṣyaśarīramātmānaṃ paśyan 'nāhaṃ devo manuṣya eva' iti devaṣaśarīre bādhyamāne
GSP33vacbhamu:33: api ca yogavyāghraḥ śarīrabhede 'pyātmānamabhinnamanubhavatīti nāhaṅkārālambanaṃ dehaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:35: indriyabhede 'pi 'yo 'hamadrākṣaṃ sa evaitarhi spṛśāmi' ityahamā-lambanasya pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:38: 'kṛśo 'ham' 'andho 'ham' ityādayastu prayogā asatyapyabhede kathañcit 'mañcāḥ krośanti' ityādivadaupacārikā iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:39: tasmādidaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sphuṭatarāhamanubhavagamya ātmā saṃśayābhāvādajijñāsya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:41: tathā hi- saṃsāranivṛttirapavarga iha prayojanaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:47: na ca 'aham' iti sarvajanīnasphuṭatarānubhavasamarthita ātmā dehendriyādivyatiriktaḥ śakya upaniṣadāṃ sahasrairapyanyathayitum,
GSP33vacbhamu:50: tasmādanubhavavirodhādupacaritārthā evopaniṣada iti yuktamutpaśyāma ityāśayavānāśaṅkya pariharati- yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarayoḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:51: atra ca yuṣmadasmat ityādiḥ mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ ityantaḥ śaṅkāgranthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:63: parasparānadhyāsahetau atyantavailakṣaṇye dṛṣṭāntaḥ - tamaḥ prakāśavat iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:64: na hi jātu kaścitsamudācāradvṛttinī prakāśatamasī parasparātmatayā pratipattumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:73: yathā kusumādbhedena gṛhyamāṇe 'pi sphaṭikamaṇāvatisvacchatayā japākusumapratibimbodgrāhiṇi 'aruṇaḥ sphaṭikaḥ' ityāruṇyavibhrama ityata idamuktam - taddharmāṇāmapi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:76: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ - rūpavaddhi dravyamatisvacchatayā rūpavato dravyāntarasya tadvivekena gṛhyamāṇasyāpi cchāyāṃ gṛhṇīyāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:77: cidātmā tu nīrūpo viṣayī na viṣayacchāyāmudgrāhayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:91: mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ yadyapi tathāpīti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:92: idamatrākūcam - bhavedetadevaṃ yadi 'aham' ityanubhave ātmatatvaṃ prakāśeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:95: na caitānyupakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraiḥ kriyāsamabhihāreṇedṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni śakreṇāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:96: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati yathā 'aho darśanīyā aho darśanīyā' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:105: na hyāgamajñānaṃ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyamupahanti yena kāraṇābhāvānna bhavet ;
GSP33vacbhamu:109: tathā ca varṇe hrasvatvadīrghatvādayo 'nyadharmā api samāropitāḥ tattvapratipattihetavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:110: na hi laukikāḥ 'nāgaḥ' iti vā“nagaḥ“iti vā padātkuñcaraṃ vā taruṃ vā pratipadyamānā bhavanti bhrāntāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:111: na cānanyaparaṃ vākyaṃ svārtha upacaritārthaṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:112: uktaṃ hi - 'na vidhau paraḥ śabdārthaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:113: jyeṣṭhatvaṃ ca anapekṣitasya bādhyatve hetuḥ na tu bādhakatve,
GSP33vacbhamu:117: tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram - 'paurvāparye pūrvadaurbalyaṃ prakṛtivat' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:122: api ca ye 'pyahaṅkārāspadamātmānamāsthiṣata tairapyasya na tāttvikatvamabhyupetavyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:123: 'ahamihaivāsmi sadane jānānaḥ' iti sarvavyāpinaḥ prādeśikatvena grahaṇāt uccataragiriśikharavartiṣu mahātaruṣu bhūmiṣṭhasya dūrvāpravālanirbhāsapratyayavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:124: na cedaṃ dehasya prādeśikatvamanubhūyate na tvātmana iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:127: api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartata iti yatra prayoktṛpratipattroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:129: tadyathā, naiyamikāgnihotravacane 'gnihotraśabdaḥ prakaraṇāntarāvadhṛtabhede kuṇḍapāyināmayanagate karmaṇi 'māsamagmihotraṃ juhoti' ityatra sādhyasādṛśyena gauṇaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:131: na tvahaṅkārasya mukhyor'tho nirluṭhitagarbhatayā dehādibhyo bhinno 'nubhūyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:133: na cātyantanirūṭhatayā gauṇe 'pi na gauṇatvābhimānaḥ sārṣapādiṣu tailaśabdavaditi veditavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:134: tatrāpi snehāttilabhavādbhede siddha eva sārṣapādīnāṃ tailaśabdavācyatvābhimānaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:137: tadiha vyāpakaṃ vivekavijñānaṃ nivartamānaṃ gauṇatāmapi nivartayatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:138: na ca bālasthaviraśarīrabhede 'pi 'so 'ham' ityekasyātmanaḥ pratisaṃdhānadehādibhyo bhedenāstyātmānubhava iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:141: parīkṣakā api hi vyavahārasamaye na lokasāmāmyamativartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:143: bāhyā apyāhuḥ -'śāstracintakāḥ khalvevaṃ vivecayanti na pratipattāraḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:144_1: śarīrādyabhedagrahādātmanaḥ prādeśikatvamabhimanyate nabhasa iva ghaṭamaṇikamallikādyupādhyavacchedāditi yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:145: na cāhaṅkāraprāmāṇyāya dehādivadātmāpi prādeśika iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:152: pratyekaṃ cetanatvapakṣe bahūnāṃ cetanānāṃ svatantrāṇāmekavākyatābhāvādaparyāyaṃ viruddhadikkriyatayā śarīramunmathyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:154: samudāyasya tu caitanyayoge vṛkṇa ekasminnavayave cidātmano 'pyavayavo vṛkṇa iti na cetayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:156: ya evāvayavo yadā viśīrṇastadā tadabhāve na cetayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:159: etena 'sthūlo 'ham andho 'ham gacchāmi' ityādayo 'pi adhyāsatayā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:160: tadevamuktena krameṇa ahaṃpratyaye pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutiḥ apratyūhaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvasukhaduḥkhaśokādyātmatvamahamanubhavaprasañjitamātmano niṣeddhumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:167: iti śabdasūcitaśca śarīrādyanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ ca prameyajātaṃ pramāṇena pramāya tadupādānaparivarjanādiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:168: anyonyadharmāṃścādhyasya anyonyasmindharmiṇi dehādidharmān janmamaraṇajarāvyādhyādīnātmani dharmiṇi adhyastadehādibhāve samāropya,
GSP33vacbhamu:169: tathā caitanyādīnātmadharmān dehādāvadhyastātmabhāve samāropya 'mamedaṃ jarāmaraṇaputrapaśusvāmyādi' iti vyavahāro vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:171: atra ca adhyāsavyavahārakriyābhyāṃ yaḥ kartā unnītaḥ sa samāna iti samānakartṛkatvena 'adhyasya vyavahāraḥ' ityupapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:172: pūrvakālatvasūcitamadhyāsasya vyavahārakāraṇatvaṃ sphuṭayati - mithyājñānanimittaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:176: tadevamadhyāsasvarūpaṃ phalaṃ ca vyavahāramuktvā tasya nimittamāha - itaretarāvivekena iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:179: tathā ca nādhyāsa ityata āha - atyantaviviktayordharmadharmiṇoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:180: paramārthato dharmiṇoratādātmyaṃ vivekaḥ dharmāṇāṃ cāsaṃkīrṇatā vivekaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:183: iha tu paramārthasataḥ cidātmano 'nyanna dehādyasti vastusat,
GSP33vacbhamu:184: tatkutaḥ cidātmano bhedāgrahaḥ kutaśca tādātmyavibhramaḥ ityata āha - satyānṛte mithunīkṛtya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:189: na ca saṃvṛtiparamārthasatoḥ pāramārthakaṃ mithunamastītyabhūtatadbhāvārthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:190: etaduktaṃ bhavati - apratītasyāropāyogādāropyasya pratītirupayujyate na vastusatteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:192: āropyasya pratītau satyāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropanibandhanā ca pratītiriti durvāraṃ parasparāśrayatvamityata āha - naisargika iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:196: tataśca pūrvapūrvamithyājñānopadarśitasya buddhīndriyaśarīrādeḥ uttarottarādhyāsopayoga ityanāditvāt bījāṅkuravanna parasparāśrayatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:200: pratītireva tu atyantāsato gaganakamalinīkalpasya dehendriyādeḥ nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:201: prakāśamānatvameva hi cidātmano 'pi sattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā vā dvaitāpatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:202: sattāyāścārthakriyākāritāyāśca sattāntarārthakriyākāritāntarakalpane anavasthāpātāt prakāśamānataiva sattā abhyupetavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:208: ityāśayavān āha ākṣeptā- ko 'yamadhyāso nāma iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:210: samādhātā lokasiddhamadhyāsalakṣaṇamācakṣāṇa evākṣepaṃ pratikṣipati- ucyate- smṛtirūpaḥ paratra pūrvadṛṣṭāvabhāsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:217: tasya ca dṛṣṭatvamātramupayujyate na vastusatteti dṛṣṭagrahaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:218: tathāpi vartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ nāropopayogīti pūrva- ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:226: asti hi svastimatyāṃ gavi pūrvadṛṣṭasya gotvasya paratra kālākṣyāmavabhāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:227: asti ca pāṭaliputre pūrvadṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra māhiṣmatyāmavabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:242: asaṃbandhāgrahaṇasārūpye 'pītaṃ tapanīyapiṇḍaṃ' 'pītaṃ bilvaphalaṃ' ityādau pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pītatvaśaṅkhatvayorāropyāha 'pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:244: evaṃ vijñātṛpuruṣābhimukheṣvādarśodakādiṣu svaccheṣu cākṣuṣaṃ tejo lagnamapi balīyasā saureṇa tejasā pratisrotaḥ pravartitaṃ mukhasaṃyuktaṃ mukhaṃ grāhayet,
GSP33vacbhamu:250: na hi sarpātadabhāvena rajjvādayo vā sphaṭikādayo vā raktādiguṇayogino na pratibhāsante,
GSP33vacbhamu:252: tathā sati maruṣu marīcikānicayam 'uccāvacamuccalattuṅgataraṅgabhaṅgamāleyamabhyarṇabhavatīrṇā mandākinī' ityabhisaṃdhāya pravṛttaḥ tattoyamāpīya pipāsāmupaśamayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:254: na ca marīcirūpeṇa salilamavastusat svarūpeṇa tu paramārthasadeva dehendriyādayastu svarūpeṇāpyasanta ityanubhavāgocaratvātkathamāropyanta iti sāṃpratam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:255: yato yadyasanto nānubhavagocarāḥ kathaṃ tarhi marīcyādīnāmasatāṃ toyādyātmatayānubhavagocaratvam ?
GSP33vacbhamu:256: na ca svarūpasattvena toyādyātmanāpi santo bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:258: api tu bhāva eva bhāvāntarātmanā abhāvaḥ svena rūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:265: na ca viṣayasya samastasāmarthyavirahe 'pi vijñānameva tattādṛśaṃ svapratyayasāmarthyādadṛṣṭāntasiddhasvabhāvabhedamupajātamasataḥ prakāśanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:276: vijñānasvarūpameva asataḥ prakāśa iti cet. kaḥ punareṣa sadasatoḥ saṃbandhaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:277: asadadhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ sato jñānasya asatā saṃbandha iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:278: aho batāyamatinirvṛtaḥ pratyayatapasvī yadasya asatyapi nirūpaṇamāyatate /
GSP33vacbhamu:281: asadantareṇa pratyayo na prathata iti pratyayasyaivaiṣa svabhāvaḥ na tvasadadhīnamasya kiñciditi cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:282: aho batāsya asatpakṣapātaḥ yadayamatadutpattiḥ atadātmā ca tadavinābhāvaniyataḥ pratyaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:285: tatkimidānīṃ marīcayo 'pi toyātmanā satattvāḥ yadanubhavagocarāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:288: dvividhaṃ ca vastūnāṃ tattvam- sattvamasattvaṃ ca tatra pūrvaṃ svataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:296: tathā ca samīcīna iti na bhrānto nāpi bādhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:297: addhā / na bādhyeta yadi marīcīnayaṃ atoyātmatattvānatoyātmanā gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:326: apūrvo 'pi pūrvamithyāpratyayopadarśita iva paratra cidātmanyadhyasyata iti upapannam,
GSP33vacbhamu:332: na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyaḥ arthakriyākāritā vā iti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:333: sa cāyamevaṃlakṣaṇako 'dhyāsaḥ anirvacanīyaḥ sarveṣāmeva saṃmataḥ parīkṣakāṇām ;
GSP33vacbhamu:334: tadbhede paraṃ vipratipattirityanirvacanīyatāṃ draḍhayitumāha- taṃ kecit iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:341: yadyapi na bāhyaṃ vastusat tathāpyanādyavidyāvāsanāropitamalīkaṃ bāhyam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:345: 'nedaṃ rajatam' iti bādhakasya idantāmātrabādhenāpyupapattau na rajatagocaratocitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:346: rajatasya dharmiṇo bhādhe hi rajataṃ ca tasya dharma idantā ca bādhite bhavetām ;
GSP33vacbhamu:349: tathā ca rajataṃ bahirbādhitamarthādāntare jñāne vyavatiṣṭhata iti jñānākārasya bahiradhyāsaḥ sidhyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:350: kecittu- jñānākārakhyātāvaparituṣyanto vadanti- yatra yadadhyāsaḥ tadvivekāgrahanibandhano bhrama iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:357: sa hi idaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamāvedayati na tvāntaram /
GSP33vacbhamu:363: sa kiṃ purovarti dravyaṃ rajatādvivecayati āho jñānākāratāmapyasya darśayati ?
GSP33vacbhamu:364: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:371: na ca rajatameva śuktikāyāṃ prasañjitaṃ rajatajñānena /
GSP33vacbhamu:383: api cendriyādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajanane sāmarthyamupalabdhamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānasaṃbhavaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:393: doṣavaśāttadgataśuktitvasāmānyaviśeṣasyāgrahāt tanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛtiṃ janayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:395: tathā ca rajatasamṛteḥ purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:397: ṭarajatam', iti dve ete api grahaṇasmaraṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravartayataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:400: atra hi vinirgacchannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kācasyeva svacchasya pītatvaṃ gṛhyate pittaṃ tu na gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:404: tadupapattau ca prāktanasya pratyayasya bhrāntatvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:409: yasmin śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsa iti lokaprasiddhiḥ nāsāvanyathākhyātinibandhanā,
GSP33vacbhamu:410: kiṃ tu gṛhītasya rajatādestatsmaraṇasya ca gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa gṛhītamātrasya yaḥ 'idam' iti puro 'vasthitāddravyamātrāttatprajñānācca vivekaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:413: anye tu- atrāpyaparituṣyantaḥ- yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:414: atredamākūtam- asti tāvadrajatārthinaḥ 'rajatamidam' iti pratyayātputovartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:418: kiṃ tu grahaṇasmaraṇe eva mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataścāgṛhītabhede,
GSP33vacbhamu:422: gṛhyamāṇe 'pi 'samīcīnajñānasārūpyamanayoridamiti rajatamiti ca jñānayoḥ' iti grahaṇam,
GSP33vacbhamu:423: atha vā 'tayoreva svarūpato viṣayataśca mitho bhedāgrahaḥ' iti grahaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:424: tatra na tāvatsamīcīnajñānasadṛśī iti jñānaṃ samīcīnajñānavadvyavahārapravartakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:425: na hi 'gosadṛśo gavayaḥ' iti jñānaṃ gavārthinaṃ gavaye pravartayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:429: tasmātsattāmātreṇa bhedāgrahaḥ agṛhīta eva vyavahāraheturiti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:432: vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ- cetanavyavahārasya ajñānapūrvakatvānupapatteḥ āropajñānotpādakrameṇaiva- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:438: kathaṃ cāyamidaṅkārāspade pravarteta yadi tu na tadicchet ?
GSP33vacbhamu:440: na cedidaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamiti jānīyāt kathaṃ rajatārthī tadicchet ?
GSP33vacbhamu:444: so 'yamupādānopekṣābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇaścecanaḥ avyavasthitaḥ idaṅkārāspade rajatasamāropeṇopādāna eva vyavasthāpyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:458: yadyadarthinaṃ yatra niyamena pravartayati tajjñānaṃ tadviṣayaṃ yathobhayasiddhasamīcīnarajatajñānam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:462: tatra bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām- kiṃ śuktikātvasya 'idaṃ rajatam' iti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvam āhosvit dravyamātrasya puraḥsthitasya sitabhāsvarasya ?
GSP33vacbhamu:465: tathā hi-'rajatamidam' ityanubhavannanubhavitā purovarti vastu aṅgulyādinā nirdiśati /
GSP33vacbhamu:472: tat bodhakatvena svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti vyutpādayadbhirasmābhiḥ parihṛtaṃ nyāyakaṇikāyāmiti neha pratanyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:475: tadidamuktam- anye tu yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmakalpanāmācakṣate iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:476: yatra śuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsastasyaiva śuktikāderviparītadharmakalpanāṃ rajatatvadharmakalpanāmiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:478: prakṛte tu kimāyātamityata āha- sarvathāpi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:481: tena sarveṣāmeva parīkṣakāṇāṃ mate anyasyānyadharmakalpanānirvacanīyāvaśyaṃbhāvinītyanirvacanīyatā sarvatantrasiddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:484: api tu laukikānāmapītyāha- tathā ca loke anubavaḥ śuktikā hi rajatavadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:488: ekasya tvabhinnasya bhedabhramo na dṛṣṭa iti kutaḥ cidātmano 'bhinnānāṃ jīvānāṃ bhedavibhrama ityata āha- ekaścandraḥ sadvitīyavat iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:493: na khalvapratibhāsamāne purovartini dravye rajatasya vā taddharmāṇāṃ vā samāropaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:494: pratibhāsamāne vā na tāvadayamātmā jaḍo ghaṭādivatparādhīnaprakāśa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:495: na khalu sa eva kartā ca karma ca bhavati, virodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:497: na ca jñānakriyā parasamavāyinīti kathamasyāḥ karma ?
GSP33vacbhamu:498: na ca tadeva svaṃ ca paraṃ ca, virodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:502: ātmā jaḍo 'pi sarvārthajñāneṣu bhāsamāno 'pi kartaiva na karma,
GSP33vacbhamu:504: yathā hi caitrasamavetakriyayā caitranagaraprāptāvubayasamavetāyāmapi kriyamāṇāyāṃ nagarasyaiva karmatā,
GSP33vacbhamu:511: tathā hi- yo 'yamarthaprakāśaḥ phalaṃ yasminnarthaśca ātmā ca prathete sa kiṃ jaḍaḥ svayaṃprakāśo vā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:512: jaḍaścet viṣayātmāvapi jaḍāviti kasmin kiṃ prakāśeta aviśeṣāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:517: na ca nilīnameva vijñānamarthātmānau jñāpayati cakṣurādivaditi vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:524: tatkiṃ putraḥ paṇḍita iti pitāpi paṇḍito 'stu ?
GSP33vacbhamu:525: svabhāva eṣa saṃvidaḥ svayaṃprakāśāyā yadarthātmasaṃbandhiteti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:526: hanta putrasyāpi paṇḍitasya svabhāva eṣa yatpitṛsaṃbandhiteti samānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:527: sahārthātmaprakāśena saṃvitprakāśo na tvarthātmaprakāśaṃ vineti tasyāḥ svabhāva iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:534: ātmārthau saheti tāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvidarthātmaprakāśau saheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:549: tasmāccandre 'nubhūyamāne iva dvitīyaścandramāḥ svaprakāśādanyor'thaḥ anirvacanīya eveti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:551: na ca anirvācyārthabhedaḥ prakāśaṃ nirvācyaṃ bhettumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:553: na ca arthānāmapi parasparaṃ bhedaḥ samīcīnajñānapaddhatimadhyāste ityupariṣṭādupapādayiṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:554: tadayaṃ prakāśa eva svayaṃprakāśa ekaḥ kūṭastho nityo niraṃśaḥ pratyagātmā aśakyanirvacanīyebhyo dehendriyādibhya ātmānaṃ pratīpaṃ nirvacanīyamañcati jānātīti pratyaṅ,
GSP33vacbhamu:561: kasmādayamayukta ityata āha - sarvo hi puro 'vasthite viṣaye viṣayāntaramadhyasyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:562: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yatparādhīnaprakāśamaṃśavacca tatsāmānyāṃśagrahe karaṇadoṣavaśācca viśeṣāgrahe anyathā prakāśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:563: pratyagātmā tu aparādhīnaprakāśatayā na svajñāne kāraṇānyapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:568: na hi tadeva tadānīmeva tenaiva gṛhītamagṛhītaṃ ca saṃbhavatīti na svayaṃprakāśatāpakṣe adhyāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:570: na hi śuktau apuraḥsthitāyāṃ rajatamadhyasyati 'idaṃ rajatam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:571: tasmādatyantagrahe atyantāgrahe ca nādhyāsa iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:575: tatkathaṃ nādhyāsa ityata āha- yuṣmatpratyayāpetasya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:577: tathā ca yo viṣayī sa eva cidātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:585_1: anavacchinno 'pi vastuto 'vacchinna iva abhinno 'pi bhinna iva akartāpi karteva abhoktāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:587: na hi cidekarasasyātmanaḥ cidāṃśe gṛhīte agṛhītaṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:588: na khalu ānandanityatvavibhutvādayaḥ asya cidrūpādvastuto bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:590: gṛhītā eva tu kalpitena bhedena na vivecitā ityagṛhītā ivābhānti /
GSP33vacbhamu:591: na ca ātmano buddhyādibhyo bhedastāttvikaḥ yena cidātmani gṛhyamāṇe so 'pi gṛhīta eva bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:593: tasmāccidātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśasyaiva anavacchinnasya avacchinnebhyo buddhyādibhyo bhedāgrahāt tadadhyāsena jīvabhāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:595: tathā hi- kartā bhoktā cidātmā ahaṃpratyaye pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33vacbhamu:596: na ca udāsīnasya tasya kriyāśaktirbhogaśaktirvā saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:597: yasya ca buddhyādeḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātasya kriyābhogaśaktī na tasya caitanyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:598_2: iti ca janturiti ca kṣetrajña iti ca ākhyāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:601: tasmāccidātmano 'vyatirekāt jīvaḥ svayaṃprakāśo 'pi ahaṃpratyayena kartṛbhoktṛtayā vyavahārayogyaḥ kriyata ityahaṃpratyayālambanamucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:602: na ca adhyāse sati viṣayatvaṃ viṣayatve ca adhyāsaḥ ityanyonyāśrayatvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33vacbhamu:606: jīvo hi cidātmatayā svayaṃprakāśatayā aviṣayo 'pi aupādhikena rūpeṇa viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:609: kiṃ tu pratyagātmā na svato nāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:611: tathā ca sarvathāprathamāne pratyagātmani kuto 'dhyāsa ityata āha- aparokṣatvācca pratyagātmaprasiddheḥ iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:614: yadyapi pratyagātmani nānyā prathāsti tathāpi bhedopacāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:616: etaduktaṃ bhavati- avaśyaṃ cidātmā aparokṣo 'bhyupetavyaḥ tadaprathāyāṃ sarvasyāprathanena jagadāndhyaprasaṅgādityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:617: śrutiścātra bhavati- 'tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:618: tadevaṃ paramārthaparihāramuktvā abhyupetyāpi cidātmanaḥ parokṣatāṃ prauḍhavāditayā parihārāntaramāha- na cāyamasti iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:621: kasmādayaṃ na niyama ityata āha- apratyakṣe 'pi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:623: nabho hi dravyaṃ sat rūpasparśavirahānna bāhyendriyapratyakṣam /
GSP33vacbhamu:627: atha ca tatra bālā avivekinaḥ paradarśitadarśinaḥ kadācitpārthivacchāyāṃ śyāmatāmāropya,
GSP33vacbhamu:630: tatrāpi pūrvadṛṣṭasya taijasasya vā tāmasasya vā rūpasya paratra nabhasi smṛtirūpo 'vabhāsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:635: tatkimarthamayamevādhyāsa ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyutpāditaḥ nādhyāsamātramityata āha- tametamevaṃlakṣaṇamadhyāsaṃ paṇḍitā avidyeti manyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:637: taducchedāya ca vedāntāḥ pravṛttā iti vakṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:638: pratyagātmanyanātmādhyāsa eva sarvānarthahetuḥ na punā rajatādivibhramā iti sa evāvidyā,
GSP33vacbhamu:639: tatsvarūpaṃ cāvijñātaṃ na śakyamucchettumiti tadeva vyutpādyaṃ nādhyāsamātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:643: na caivaṃ pṛthagjanā api manyante adhyāsam,
GSP33vacbhamu:645: nanu iyamanādiratinirūḍhanibiḍavāsanānubaddhā avidyā na śakyā niroddhum,
GSP33vacbhamu:647: iti yo manyante taṃ prati tannirodhopāyamāha - tadvivekena ca vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇam,
GSP33vacbhamu:650: pratyagātmani khalu atyantavivikte buddhyādibhyaḥ buddhyādibhedāgrahanimitto buddhyādyātmatvataddharmādhyāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:652: adhyāsāpabādhātmakaṃ vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ vidyā cidātmarūpaṃ svarūpe vyavatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:654: atinirūḍhanibiḍhavāsanānuvidvā avidyā vidyayā apabādhitāpi svavāsanāvaśātpunarudbhaviṣyati pravartayiṣyati ca vāsanādikāryaṃ svocitamityaya āha - tatraivaṃ sati,
GSP33vacbhamu:657: tatkṛtena doṣeṇa guṇena vā aṇumātreṇāpi sa na saṃbadhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:659: cidātmano guṇena caitanyānandādinā antaḥkaraṇādi na saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:660: etaduktaṃ bhavati - tattvāvadhāraṇābhyāsasya hi svabhāva eva sa tādṛśaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:667: viśeṣatastu cidātmasvabhāvasya tattvajñānasya atyantāntaraṅgasya kuto 'nirvācyayā avidyayā bādha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:670: 'ahamidam' 'mamedam' iti lokavyavahāraḥ“iti tatra vyapadeśalakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ kaṇṭhoktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:678: santu vā pratyakṣādīni saṃvṛtyāpi yathā tathā ;
GSP33vacbhamu:679: śāstrāṇi tu puruṣahitānuśāsanaparāṇi avidyāpratipakṣatayā nāvidyāvadviṣayāṇi bhavitumarhantītyāha - śāstrāṇi ca iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:684: ayamarthaḥ- pramātṛtvaṃ hi pramāṃ prati kartṛtvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:689: na ca kūṭasthanityaścidātmā apariṇāmī svato vyāpāravān /
GSP33vacbhamu:692: kiṃ naśchinnamityata āha- na hīndriyāṇyanupādāya pratyakṣādivyavahāraḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:701: atha svayameva kasmānna pravartante ityata āha- na cādhiṣṭhānamantareṇendriyāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:704: na jātu karaṇānyanadhiṣṭhitāni kartrā svakārye vyāpriyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:707: kṛtamatrātmādhyāsenetyata āha- na cānadhyastātmabhāvena dehena kaścidvyāpriyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:711: evamanadhyastātmabhāvaṃ dehendriyādi vyāpārayan bhaviṣyati tadabhijñaḥ pramātā ityata āha- na caitasminsarvasmin,
GSP33vacbhamu:719: ātaścādhyāsāśrayāṇi pramāṇānītyāha- na ca pramātṛtvamantareṇa pramāṇapravṛttirasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:720: pramāyāṃ khalu phale svatantraḥ pramātā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:735: āgamopapattipratipannapratyagātmatattvānāṃ vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇyeva pramāṇānītyata āha- paśvādibhiścāviśeṣāt iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:736: vidantu nāma āgamopapattibhyāṃ dehendriyādibhyo bhinnaṃ pratyagātmānam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:738: yādṛśo hi paśuśakuntādīnāmavipratipannamugdhabhāvānāṃ vyavahārastādṛśo vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:742: etadeva vibhajate- yathā hi paśvādaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:743: atra ca śabdādibhiḥ śrotrādīnāṃ saṃbandhe sati iti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:746: tathā hi- śabdādisvarūpamupalabhya tajjātīyasya pratikūlatāmanusmṛtya tajjātīyatayopalabhyamānasya pratikūlatāmanumimata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:751: śāstraṃ tu 'jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta' ityādi na dehātmādhyāsena pravartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:753: tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram- 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāttasmātsvayaṃ prayoge syāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:754: na ca dehādi bhasmībhūtaṃ pāralaukikāya phalāya kalpata iti dehādyatiriktaṃ kañcidātmānamadhikāriṇamākṣipati śāstram ;
GSP33vacbhamu:758: adhikāraśāstraṃ hi svargakāmasya puṃsaḥ paralokasaṃbandhaṃ vinā na nirvahatīti tāvanmātramākṣipet,
GSP33vacbhamu:762: prayoktā hi karmaṇaḥ karmajanitaphalabhogabhāgī karmaṇyadhikārī svāmī bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:768: te tvavidyāvantamanuśāsato nirmṛṣṭanikhilāvidyamanuśiṣṭaṃ svarūpo vyavasthāpayantītyetāvāneṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:771: yadyapi virodhānupayogābhyāmaupaniṣadaḥ puruṣaḥ adhikāre nāpekṣyate tathāpyupaniṣadbhyo 'vagamyamānaḥ śaknotyadhikāraṃ niroddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:772: tataśca parasparaparāhatārthatvena kṛtsna eva vedaḥ prāmāṇyamapajahyādityata āha- prāk ca tathābhūtātma- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:774: tasmāttu purastātkarmavidhayaḥ svocitaṃ vyavahāramabhinirvartayanto nānupajātena brahmajñānena śakyā niroddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:777: yathā-'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti sādhyāṃśaniṣedhe 'pi 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta' iti śāstraṃ pravartamānaṃ 'na hiṃsyāt' ityanena na virudhyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:782: avidyāvatpuruṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātivartata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva sphuṭayati- tathā hi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:791: dehatādātmyamātmanyadhyasya dehamarthaṃ putrakalatrādisvābhyaṃ ca kṛśatvādivat āropyāha- ahameva vikalaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:793: svasya khalu sākalyena svābhyasākalyāt svāmīśvaraḥ sakalaḥ saṃpūrṇo bhavati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:794: tathā svasya vaikalyena svāmyavaikalyāt svāmīśvaro visalo 'saṃpūrṇo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:795: bāhyadharmā ye vaikalyādayaḥ svābhyapraṇālikayā saṃcaritāḥ śarīre tānātmanyadhyasyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:796: yadā ca paropādhyapekṣe dehadharme svāmye iyaṃ gatiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:797: tadā kaiva kathā anaupādhikeṣu dehadharmeṣu kṛśatvādiṣu ityāśayavānāha- tathā dehadharmān iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:799: tato 'pyantaraṅgasyāntaḥkaraṇasya adhyastātmabhāvasya dharmān kāmasaṃkalpādīn ātmanyadhyasyatīti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:800: tadanena prapañcena dharmādhyāsamuktvā tasya mūlaṃ dharmyadhyāsamāha- evamahaṃpratyayinam /
GSP33vacbhamu:807: caitanyamupapādayati- taṃ ca pratyagātmānaṃ sarvasākṣiṇaṃ tadviparyayeṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:812_0: tadanena antaḥkaraṇādyavacchinnaḥ pratyagātmā idamanidaṃrūpaścetanaḥ kartā bhoktā
GSP33vacbhamu:813: pramāṇaprameyavyavahāradṛḍhīkṛtameva śiṣyahitāya svarūpābhidhānapūrvakaṃ sarvalokapratyakṣatayā adhyāsaṃ sudṛḍhīkaroti- evamayamanādiranantaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:820: virodhipratyayaṃ vinā kuto 'sya prahāṇamityaya uktam- ātmaikatvavidyāpratipattaye /
GSP33vacbhamu:827: etaduktaṃ bhavati- asmatpratyayasyātmaviṣayasya samīcīnatve sati brahmaṇo jñātatvāt niṣprayojanatvācca na jijñāsā syāt ;
GSP33vacbhamu:828: tadabhāve ca na brahmajñānāya vedāntāḥ paṭhyeran ;
GSP33vacbhamu:834: na hi rajjvā rajjutvaṃ sahasramapi sarpadhārāpratyayā apavaditumutsahante /
GSP33vacbhamu:835: mithyājñānaprasañjitaṃ tu rūpaṃ śakyaṃ tattvajñānena apavaditum,
GSP33vacbhamu:839: tatkathaṃ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāmātmaikatvapratipādanamartha ityata āha- yathā cāyamarthaḥ ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:842: tasya tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyaparamātmarūpatayā yā mīmāṃsā sā tathoktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:844: yadyapi ca 'aviśiṣṭastu vākyārthaḥ' iti nyāyāt mantrāṇāmiva vedāntānāmarthaparatvamautsargikam,
GSP33vacbhamu:845: yadyapi ca vedāntebhyaḥ caitanyānandaghanaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvarahito niṣprapañca ekaḥ pratyagātmā avagamyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:847: mohamayamātmānamavagāhamānenāhaṃpratyayena sedehabādhavirahiṇā virudhyamānā vedāntāḥ svārthātpracyutā upacaritārthā vā japamātropayogino vā ityavivakṣitasvārthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:848: tathā ca tadarthavicārātmikā caturlakṣaṇī śārīrakamīmāṃsā nārabdhavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:849: na ca sarvajanīnāhamanubhavasiddha ātmā saṃdigdho vā saprayojano vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:850: yena jijñāsyaḥ san vicāraṃ prayuñjīta- iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:858: tasya ca vakṣyamāṇena krameṇa saṃdigdhatvāt prayojanatvācca yuktā jijñāsā- ityāśayavān sūtrakāraḥ tajjijñāsāmasūtrayat,
GSP33vacbhamu:864: kiṃ tu brahmamīmāṃsākhyatarketikartavyatānujñātaviṣayairvedāntairāhitaṃ nirvicikitsaṃ brahmajñānameva samastaduḥkhopaśamarūpamānandaikarasaṃ paramaṃ prayojanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:867: yathā svagrīvāgatamapi graiveyakaṃ kutaścidbhramānnāstīti manyamānaḥ pareṇa pratipāditamaprāptamiva prāpnoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:868: jijñāsā tu saṃśayasya kāryamiti svakāraṇaṃ saṃśayaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:870: tathā ca śāstre prekṣāvatpravṛttihetusaṃśayaprayojanasūcanāt yuktamasya sūtrasya śāstrāditvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:877: sā hyanena śiṣyate śiṣyebhyo yathāvatpratipādyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:883: tadevaṃ sūtratātparyaṃ vyākhyāya tasya prathamapadaṃ atha iti vyācaṣṭe- tatrāthaśabda ānantaryārthaḥ parigṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:884: teṣu sūtrapadeṣu madhye yo 'yaṃ athaśabdaḥ sa ānantaryārtha iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:889: tatkimatrādhikārārtho na gṛhyata ityata āha- nādhikārārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:891: jijñāsā tāvadiha sūtre brahmaṇaśca tajjñānācca śabdataḥ pradhānaṃ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:892: na ca yathā 'daṇḍī praiṣānanvāha' ityatra apradhānamapi daṇḍaśabdārtho vivakṣyate evamihāpi brahmatajjñāne iti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:894: tadavivakṣāyāṃ tadasūcanena kākadantaparīkṣāyāmiva na brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ prekṣāvantaḥ pravarteran /
GSP33vacbhamu:895: na hi tadānīṃ brahma tajjñānaṃ ca abhidheyaprayojane bhavitumarhataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:897: karmapravṛttyupayogitayā upacaritārthānāṃ vā japopayogināṃ vā 'hum' ityevamādīnāmivāvivakṣitārthānāmapi svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvasya saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:898: tasmātsaṃdehaprayojanasūcanī jijñāsā iha padato vākyataśca pradhānaṃ vivakṣitavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:905: na ca jijñāsā mīmāṃsā yena yogānuśāsanavadadhikriyeta ;
GSP33vacbhamu:906: nāntatvaṃ nipātya 'māṅ māne' ityasmādvā 'mānapūjāyām' ityasmādvā dhātoḥ 'mānbandha-' ityādinā anicchārthe sani vyutpāditasya mīmāṃsāpadasya pūjitavicāravacanatvāt ;
GSP33vacbhamu:911: na ca svārthaparatvasyopapattau satyāṃ anyārthaparatvakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33vacbhamu:915: tathā ca maṅgalahetutvāt pratyahaṃ brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti sūtrārthaḥ saṃpadyata ityata āha- maṅgalasya ca vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:918: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ vā lakṣyaṃ vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:920: na ca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śabdavyavahāre dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:921: tatkimidānīṃ maṅgalārtho 'śabdaḥ teṣu teṣu na prayoktavyaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:922: tathā ca oṅkāraścāthaśabdaśca dvāvetau brahmaṇaḥ purā /
GSP33vacbhamu:924: iti smṛtivyākopa ityata āha- arthāntaraprayukta eva hyathaśabdaḥ śrutyā maṅgalaprayojano bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:925: arthāntareṣvānantaryādiṣu prayuktaḥ athaśabdaḥ śrutyā śravaṇamātreṇa veṇuvīṇādhvanivanmaṅgalaṃ kurvan maṅgalaprayojano bhavati anyārthamānīyamānodakumbhadarśanavat /
GSP33vacbhamu:927: tena ca iha ānantaryārthasya sataḥ śravaṇamātreṇa maṅgalārthatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:930: tadyathā- iyamevāthaśabdaṃ prakṛtya vimṛśyate 'kimayamathaśabda ānantarye athādhikāre' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:936: na hi jātu bhavati- kiṃ nitya ātmā,
GSP33vacbhamu:938: tasmādānantaryaṃ vinā pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣa ihāthaśabdaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:942: sā ca pūrvaprakṛtārthāpekṣatve 'pyathaśabdasya sidhyatīti vyartha ānantaryārthatvāvadhāraṇāgraho 'smākamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:945: na ceha kalpāntaropanyāsa iti pāriśeṣyādānantaryārtha eveti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:947: kimevaṃ satītyata āha- sati cānantaryārthatva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:951: na cānantaryamātrasya dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:952: tasmāttasyātrānantaryaṃ vaktavyaṃ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:956: dharmajijñāsāyā iva brahmajijñāsāyā api yogyatvāt svādhyāyādhyayanānantaryam,
GSP33vacbhamu:960: tasmādvedādhyayanānantaryameva brahmajijñāsāyā apyathaśabdārtha ityata āha- svādhyāyānantaryaṃ tu samānaṃ dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:961: atra ca svādhyāyena viṣayeṇa tadviṣayamadhyayanaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:962: tathā ca 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' ityanenaiva gatamiti nedaṃ sūtramārabdhavyam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:964: codayati - nanviha karmāvabodhānantaryaṃ viśeṣaḥ dharmajijñāsāto brahmajijñāsāyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:965: asyārthaḥ- 'vividiṣanti yajñena' iti tṛtīyāśrutyā yajñādīnāmaṅgatvena brahmajñāne viniyogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:970: na ca vākyaṃ sahakāritayā karmāṇyapekṣata iti yuktam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:974: tasmin sati tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjanaṃ tataśca tadbodha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:975: na ca vedāntavākyānāmeva svārthapratyāyane karmāpekṣā na vākyāntarāṇāmiti sāṃpratam,
GSP33vacbhamu:977_0: nanu 'tattvamasi' iti vākyāt tvaṃpadārthasya kartṛbhoktṛrūpasya jīvātmano nityaśuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvena
GSP33vacbhamu:983: tasmāt 'tattvamasi' ityādeḥ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā,
GSP33vacbhamu:988: ata eva śrutiḥ- 'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:990: vijñāya tarkopakaraṇena śabdena prajñāṃ bhāvanāṃ kurvītetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:993: yajñādisaṃskṛto hi puruṣaḥ ādaranairantaryadīrghakālairāsevamāno brahmabhāvanāmanādyavidyāvāsanāṃ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:995: ata eva smṛtiḥ- 'mahāyajñaiśca yajñaiśca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:998: asti hi smṛtiḥ- 'ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet' /
GSP33vacbhamu:1000: anye tu 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena' ityādiśrutibhyaḥ tattatphalāya coditānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃyogapṛthaktvena brahmabhāvanāṃ pratyaṅgabhāvamācakṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1003: ata eva pāramarṣaṃ sūtram 'sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1006_0: tasmāt yadi śrutyādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vā pāramarṣaṃ sūtraṃ sarvathā yajñādikarmasamuccitā
GSP33vacbhamu:1010: karmāvabodhena hi karmānuṣṭhānasāhityaṃ bhavati brahmopāsanāyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1015: kiṃ kārye yathāgneyādīnāṃ paramāpūrve cirabhāviphalānukūle janayitavye samidādyapekṣā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:1020: sa cotpādyo vā syāt yathā saṃyavanasya piṇḍaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1025: na khalu ghaṭādisākṣātkāra iva jaḍasvabhāvebhyo ghaṭādibhyo bhinna indriyādyādheyo brahmasākṣātkāro bhāvanādheyaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:1027: tato bhinnasya vā bhāvanādheyasya sākṣātkārasya pratibhāpratyayavat saṃśayākrāntatayā prāmāṇyāyogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1029: na khalu anumānāvagataṃ siddhaṃ vahniṃ bhāvayataḥ śītārtasya śiśirabharamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasya sphurajjvālājaṭilānalasākṣātkāraḥ pramāṇāntareṇa saṃvādyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1032: na ca kūṭasthanityasya sarvavyāpino brahmaṇa upāsanāto vikārasaṃskāraprāptayaḥ saṃbhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1038: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- pratisīrāpanaye pāriṣadānāṃ nartakīviṣayaḥ sākṣātkāro bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1049: na hi sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:1050: ārohapariṇāhavat dravyamiti vā śataśo 'pi jñānamabhyasyamānaṃ puruṣa eveti niścayāya paryāptam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1052: nanūktaṃ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā yuktimayena ca vyavasthāpyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1061: na caiṣa sākṣātkāro mīmāṃsāsahitasyāpi śabdapramāṇasya phalam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1066: na cāyamanubhavato brahmasvabhāvo yena na janyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:1069: na hi śābdajñānaprakāśyaṃ brahma svayaṃ prakāśaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1075: anyathā caitanyacchāyāpattiṃ vināntaḥkaraṇavṛtteḥ svayamacetanāyāḥ svaprakāśatvānupapattau sākṣātkāratvāyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1078: iha tu brahmasvarūpasya upādhikaluṣitasya jīvasya prāgapyaparokṣatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1080: jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhabuddhatvādisvabhāvo brahmeti gīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1084: antaḥkaraṇavṛttau brahmasākṣātkāre janayitavye asti tadupāsanāyāḥ karmāpekṣeti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:1089: yadyucyeta niścite 'pi tattve viparyāsanibandhano vyavahāro 'nuvartamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1090: yathā guḍasya mādhuryaviniścaye api pittopahatendriyāṇāṃ tiktatāvabhāsānuvṛttiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1095: karmaṇo vā taducchedakasya kuta ucchedaḥ iti vācyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1097: yathā payaḥ payo 'ntaraṃ jarayati svayaṃ ca jīryati,
GSP33vacbhamu:1098: yathā viṣaṃ viṣāntaraṃ śamayati svayaṃ ca śāmyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:1099: yathā vā katakarajo rajo 'ntarāvile pāthasi prakṣiptaṃ rajo 'ntarāṇi bhindat svayamapi bhidyamānamanāvilaṃ pāthaḥ karoti,
GSP33vacbhamu:1103: tathāpi tānapyayaṃ vyavahārapratyayānmithyeti manyamāno vidvān ca śraddhatte,
GSP33vacbhamu:1104: pittopahatendriya iva guḍaṃ thūtkṛtya tyajannapi tasya tiktatām /
GSP33vacbhamu:1108: kriyākartrādisvarūpavibhāgaṃ ca vidvasyamāna iha vidvānabhimataḥ karmakāṇḍe /
GSP33vacbhamu:1109: ata eva bhagavān avidvadviṣayatvaṃ śāstrasya varṇayāṃbabhūva bhāṣyakāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1112: na cānadhikṛtena samarthenāpi kṛte vaidikaṃ karma phalāya kalpate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1114: tena dṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu śaktaḥ pravartamānaḥ prāpnotu phalam, dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1115: adṛṣṭārtheṣu tu śāstraikasamadhigamyaṃ phalamanadhikāriṇi na yujyata iti nopāsanākārye karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1118: evaṃ niṣedhavidhayo 'pi manuṣyādhikārā iti tadabhimānarahitasteṣvapi nādhikriyeta paśvādivat ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1119: tathā cāyaṃ niṣiddhamanutiṣṭhan na pratyaveyāt tiryagādivaditi bhinnakarmatāpātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1123: anuvartamānaṃ ca mithyeti manyamāno na śraddhatta ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1131: api tu niṣidhyamānakriyonmukho nara ityeva pravartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1132: tathā ca sāṃsārika iva śraddhāvagatabrahmatattvo 'pi niṣedhamatikramya pravartamānaḥ pratyavaitīti na bhinnakarmadarśanābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1137: 'na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvamānaśuḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:1140: tathā ca 'vividiṣanti yajñena' ityādyāḥ śrutayo virudhyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:1146: vastutaḥ pradhānasyāpi vedanasya prakṛtyarthatayā śabdato guṇatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1149: na hi 'rājapuruṣamānaya' ityukte vastutaḥ pradhāno 'pi rājā puruṣaviśeṣaṇatayā śabdata upasarjana ānīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1159: etāni ca nityāni upāttaduritanibarhaṇena puruṣaṃ saṃskurvanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1160: tathā ca śrutiḥ- 'sa ha vā ātmāyājī yo veda idaṃ me 'nenāṅgaṃ saṃskriyata idaṃ me 'nenāṅgamupadhīyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1164: nityanaimittikānuṣṭhānaprakṣīṇakalmaṣasya ca viśuddhasattvasyāviduṣa eva utpannavividiṣasya jñānottapattiṃ darśayatyātharvaṇī śrutiḥ-
GSP33vacbhamu:1165: '.................. viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1167: kḷptenaiva ca nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nityehitenopāttaduritanibarhaṇena puruṣasaṃskāreṇa jñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvopapattau na saṃyogapṛthaktvena sākṣādaṅgabhāvo yuktaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1171: sa hi anityāśuciduḥkharūpe saṃsāre nityaśucisukhakhyātilakṣaṇena viparyāsena cittasattvaṃ malinayati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1172: ataḥ pāpanivṛttau pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya anityāśuciduḥsvarūpatvamapratyūhamavabudhyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1177: tataḥ śravaṇādikrameṇa tajjānātītyārādupakārakatvaṃ tattvajñānotpādaṃ prati cittasattvaśuddhyā karmaṇāṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1182: evaṃ ca ananuṣṭhitakarmāpi prāgbhavīyakarmavaśāt yo viśuddhasattvaḥ saṃsārāsāratādarśanena niṣpannavairāgyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1185: iyameva ca puruṣadhaureyabhedamadhikṛtya pravavṛte śrutiḥ- 'yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1189: ata eva na brahmacāriṇa ṛṇāni santi yena tadapākaraṇārthaṃ karmānutiṣṭhet /
GSP33vacbhamu:1190: etadanurodhācca 'jāyamāno vai brāhmaṇastribhirṛṇavā jāyate' iti gṛhasthaḥ saṃpadyamāna iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1195: tasmāttasyānantaryamatha-śabdārthaḥ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati yasmiṃstu sati bhavantī bhavatyeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:1201: 'gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet vanī bhūtvā pravrajet' iti jābālaśrutirgārhasthyena hi yajñādyanuṣṭhānaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1204: iṣṭvā ca śaktito yajñairmano mokṣe niveśayet //
GSP33vacbhamu:1210: kutaḥ ? 'hṛdayasyāgre 'vadyati atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasaḥ' ityathāgraśabdābhyāṃ kramasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1215: ata eva 'yadahareva virajettadahareva pravrajet' iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1217: aviśuddhasattvo hi mokṣamicchannālasyāttadupāye 'pravartamāno gṛhasthadharmamapi nityanaimittikamanācaranpratikṣaṇamupacīyamānapāpmā adhogatiṃ gacchatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1220: pāṭhasthānamukhyapravṛttipramāṇakastu kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- śeṣaśeṣitve pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1221_0: śeṣāṇāṃ samidādīnāṃ śeṣiṇāṃ cāgneyādīnāṃ ekaphalavadupakāropanibaddhānāṃ ekaphalāvacchinnānām
GSP33vacbhamu:1223: yatra tu na śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ nāpyekādhikārāvacchedaḥ yathā sauryāryamṇaprājāpatyādīnām,
GSP33vacbhamu:1226: na ceha dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāve śrutyādīnāmanyatamaṃ pramāṇamasatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1227: nanu śeṣaśeṣibhāvābhāve 'pi kramaniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ yathā godohanasya puruṣārthasya dārśapaurṇamāsikairaṅgaiḥ saha,
GSP33vacbhamu:1228: yathā vā 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāmiṣṭvā somena yajeta' iti darśapūrṇamāsasomayoraśeṣaśeṣiṇorityata āha- adhikṛtādhikāre vā pramāṇābhāvāt- iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1229: svargakāmasya hi darśapūrṇamāsādhikṛtasya paśukāmasya sato darśapūrṇamāsa-
GSP33vacbhamu:1240: yadi vā jijñāsyabrahmaṇaḥ aṃśo dharmaḥ syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1241: yathā caturlakṣaṇīvyutpādyaṃ brahma kenacitkenacit aṃśenaikena lakṣaṇena vyutpādyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1242: tatra caturṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ jijñāsyābhedena parasparasaṃbandhe sati kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1246: jijñāsāyā vastuto jñānatantratvāt jñānaphalaṃ jijñāsāphalamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1255: bhavitā ca bhāvakavyāpāranirvartyatayā tattantra iti tataḥ prāgjñānakāle nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1263: pravṛttabhedaṃ vibhajate- yā hi codanā dharmasya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1266: sā ca svasādhye puruṣavyāpāre bhāvanāyāṃ tadviṣaye ca yāgādau ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1270: bhāvanāyāstaddvāreṇa ca yāgāderapekṣitopāyatāmavagamayantī tatrecchopahāramukheṇa puruṣaṃ niyuñjānaiva yāgādidharmamavabodhayati nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1271: brahmacodanā tu puruṣamavabodhayatyeva kevalaṃ na tu pravartayantyavabodhayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1273_1: puruṣo brahmāvabodhyata iti samānatvaṃ dharmacodanābhirbrahmacodanānāmityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:1282: api cātmajñānavidhipareṣu vedānteṣu nātmatattvaviniścayaḥ śābdaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1285: yatparāśca te ta eva teṣāṃ arthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1291: yasminnasati brahmajijñāsā na bhavati sati tu bhavantī bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1300: tathā sati eṣa viparyāsādanyaḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1306: etaduktaṃ bhavati- mā bhūt idaṃ ṛtaṃ nityam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1313: tadeteṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocareṣu viṣayaviṣayiṣu yadṛtaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vyavasthāsyate tadāsthāgocaro bhaviṣyati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1314: yattvanityamanṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati tāpatrayaparītaṃ tattyakṣyata iti so 'yaṃ nityānityavastuvivekaḥ prāgbhavīyādaihikādvā karmaṇo viśuddhasattvasya bhavatyanubhavopapattibhyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:1315: na khalu satyaṃ nāma na kiñcidastīti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1318_0: athāsya puruṣadhaureyasyānubhavopapattibhyāmevaṃ sunipuṇaṃ nirūpayataḥ ā ca satyalokāt
GSP33vacbhamu:1318_1: ā cāvīceḥ jāyasva mriyasva iti viparivartamānaṃ kṣaṇamuhūrtayāmāhorātrārdhamāsamāsartvayanavatsarayugacaturyugamanvantarapralayamahāpralayamahāsargāvāntarasargasaṃsārasāgarormibhiraniśamuhyamānaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:1324_0: rāgādikaṣāyamadirāmattaṃ hi manaḥ teṣu teṣu viṣayeṣūccāvacamindriyāṇi pravartayat
GSP33vacbhamu:1324_1: vividhāśca pravṛttīḥ puṇyāpuṇyaphalā bhāvayat puruṣamatighore vividhaduḥkhajvālājaṭāle
GSP33vacbhamu:1326: so 'yamasya vairāgyahetuko manovijayaḥ śama iti vaśīkarasaṃjña iti cākhyāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1329: yathā dānto 'yaṃ vṛṣabhayuvā halaśakaṭādivahanayogyaḥ kṛta iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1331: ata eva śrutiḥ- 'tasmācchānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet,
GSP33vacbhamu:1336: tato 'sya saṃsārabandhanānmumukṣā bhavatītyāha- mumukṣutvaṃ ca iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1337: tasya ca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabrahmajñānaṃ mokṣasya kāraṇamityupaśrutya tajjijñāsā bhavati dharmajijñāsāyāḥ prāgūrdhvaṃ ca ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1338: tasmātteṣāmevānantaryaṃ na dharmajijñāsāyā ityāha- teṣu hi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1344: atraivaṃ paricodyate- satyaṃ yathoktasādhanasaṃpattyanantaraṃ brahmajijñāsā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1359: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:1361: api ca dṛṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ candanavanitādisaṅgajanma kṣayitālakṣaṇena duḥkhenāghrātatvādatibhīruṇā tyajyetāpi,
GSP33vacbhamu:1365: tathā ca 'akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsyayājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1370: tasyārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ- yasmādveda eva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1371: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ- satyaṃ mṛgabhikṣukādayaḥ śakyāḥ parihartuṃ pācakakṛṣīvalādibhiḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1374: na hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamannaṃ viṣaṃ parityajya madhumiśraṃ śakyaṃ śilpivareṇāpi bhoktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1379: atra ca brahmapadena tatpramāṇaṃ veda upasthāpitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1380: sa ca yogyatvāt 'tadyatheha karmacitaḥ' ityādiḥ 'ataḥ' iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛśya hetupañcamyā nirdiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:1382: yathā svargādeḥ kṛtakasya sukhasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgaḥ tathā brahmaṇo 'pītyata āha- tathā brahmavijñānādapi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1383: tenāyamarthaḥ- ataḥ svargādīnāṃ kṣayitāpratipādakāt brahmajñānasya ca paramapuruṣārthatāpratipādakāt āgamāt yathoktasādhanasaṃpat ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1386: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapradarśanena prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ brahmaṇe jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ parāsto veditavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1387: 'tādarthyasamāse prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyam' iti kātyāyanīyavacanena yūpadārvādiṣveva prakṛtivikārabhūteṣu caturthīsamāsaniyamāt aprakṛtivikārabhūte ityevamādau tanniṣedhāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1391: brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte tatrānekārthatvādbrahmaśabdasya saṃśayaḥ- kasya brahmaṇo jijñāsā ?- iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1398: tamimaṃ saṃśayamapākaroti- brahma ca vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇam iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1399: yato brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya tajjñāpanāya paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayati tato 'vagacchāmaḥ paramātmajijñāsaiveyaṃ na vipratvajātyādijijñāsā, ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1402: saṃbandhamātraṃ ca śeṣa iti brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte brahmasaṃbandhinī jijñāsetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1403: tathā ca brahmasvarūpapramāṇayuktisādhanaprayojanajijñāsāḥ sarvā brahmajijñāsārthā brahmajijñāsayāvaruddhā bhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:1407: tathā cāpratijñātārthacintā pramāṇādiṣu bhavet- iti ye manyante tānpratyāhabrahmaṇa iti karmaṇi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1411: no khalu jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vinā nirūpyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1416: na hi candramasamādityaṃ vopalabhya kasyāyamiti saṃbandhyanveṣaṇā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1422: nanu satyaṃ na jijñāsyamantareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1424: brahma tu śeṣatayā saṃbhantsyata ityata āha- jijñāsyāntara iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1427: nigūḍhābhiprāya eva dūṣayati- evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1428: vācyasya karmatvasya jijñāsayā prathamamapekṣitasya prathamasaṃbandhārhasya cānvayaparityāgena paścātkathañcidapekṣitasya saṃbandhimātrasya saṃbandho,
GSP33vacbhamu:1432: cedakaḥ svābhiprāyamudghāṭayati- na vyarthaḥ brahmāśritāśeṣa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1439: tadevamabhimataṃ samāsaṃ vyavasthāpya jijñāsāpadārthamāha- jñātum iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1448: tasmānna sūtrakāravacanamātrādiṣikarmatā jñānasyetyata āha- avagatiparyantam iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1449: na kevalaṃ jñānamiṣyate kiṃ tvavagatiṃ sākṣātkāraṃ kurvadavagatiparyantaṃ sanvācyāyā icchāyāḥ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:1450: kasmāt ? phalaviṣayatvādicchāyāḥ tadupāyaṃ phalaparyantaṃ gocarayatīccheti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1453: na hyanapekṣaṇīyaviṣayamavagatiparyantamapi jñānamiṣyata ityata āha- jñānena hi pramāṇenāvagantumiṣṭaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:1457: na, kiṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ vigalitanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgaparamānandaghanabrahmāvagatirbrahmaṇaḥ svabhāva iti saiva niḥśreyasaṃ puruṣārtha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1466_1: na pratibhātīva parādhīnaprakāśa iva dehendriyādibhyo bhinno 'pyabhinna iva bhāsata
GSP33vacbhamu:1466_2: iti saṃsārabījāvidyādyanarthanibarhaṇātprāgaprāpta iva tasminsati prāpta iva bhavatīti
GSP33vacbhamu:1473: tacca na kevalebhyo vedāntebhyaḥ api tu brahmamīmāṃsopakaraṇebhya iti icchāmukhena brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ pravartyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1475: tatra phalavadarthāvabodhaparatāṃ svādhyāyādhyayanavidheḥ sūtrayatā 'athāto dharmajijñāsā' ityanenaiva pravartitatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:1477: yadyapi ca dharmamīmāṃsāvat vedārthamīmāṃsayā brahmamīmāṃsāpyākṣeptuṃ śakyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1479: nāpi brahmamīmāṃsāyā adhyayanamātrānantaryamiti brahmamīmāṃsārambhāya nityānityavivekādyānantaryapradarśanāya cedaṃ sūtramārambhaṇīyamityapaunaruktyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1481: etena sūtreṇa brahmajñānaṃ pratyupāyatā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyata ityuktam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1491: tarhi na tadvedāntāḥ pratipādayantīti sarvathāprasiddhaṃ naiva śakyaṃ jijñāsitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1492: anubhūte hi priye bhavatīcchā na tu sarvathānanubhūtāpūrve /
GSP33vacbhamu:1500: tasmātprasiddhasya jñātuṃ śakyasyāpyajijñāsanāt aprasiddhasyecchāyā aviṣayatvāt aśakyajñānatvācca na brahma jijñāsyamityākṣepaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1511: tatastu prāk dehādyabhedena taddharmajanmajarāmaraṇādiduḥkhayogādityata uktam- mukta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1512: sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiva kevalo 'nādyavidyāvaśāttu bhrāntyā tathāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1513: tadevamanaupādhikaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ darśayitvā avidyopādhikaṃ rūpamāha- sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisamanvitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1516: kutaḥ punarevaṃbhūtabrahmasvarūpāvagatiḥ ityata āha- brahmaśabdasya hi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1517: na kevalam 'sadeva somyedam' ityādīnāṃ vākyānāṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayā itthaṃbhūtabrahmāvagatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1522: tadevaṃ tatpadārthasya śuddhatvādeḥ prasiddhimabhidhāya tvaṃpadārthasyāpyāha- sarvasyātmatvācca brahmāstitvaprasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1526: pratītimeva apratītinirākaraṇena draḍhayati- na na iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1529: nanu 'ahamasmi' iti ca jñāsyati mā ca jñāsīdātmānamityata āha- yadi iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1531: ahaṅkārāspadaṃ hi jīvātmānaṃ cenna pratīyāt 'aham' iti na pratīyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1533: brahmaṇi tu kimāyātam ityata āha- ātmā ca brahma ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1535: tasmāttatpadārthasya śuddhabuddhatvādeḥ śabdataḥ tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmanaḥ pratyakṣataḥ prasiddheḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1537: tvaṃpadārthasya brahmabhāvāvagamaḥ 'tattvamasi' iti vākyādupapadyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1538: ākṣeptā prathamakalpāśrayaṃ doṣamāha- yadi tarhi loka iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1540: tatra 'tattvamasi' iti vākyādyadi brahma ātmatvena prasiddhamasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1541: 'ātmā brahmatvena' iti vaktavye 'brahma ātmatvena' iti abhedavivakṣayā gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1547: anyathā anāśrayā bhinnāśrayā vā vipratipattayo na syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1552: na hi 'anityā buddhiḥ' 'nitya ātmā' iti pratipattivipratipattī /
GSP33vacbhamu:1554: tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmano lokataḥ siddhiḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1556: tasmāt sāmānyataḥ prasiddhe dharmiṇi viśeṣato vipratipattau yuktastadviśeṣeṣu saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1557: tatra tvaṃpadārthe tāvadvipratipattīrdarśayati- dehamātram ityādinā bhoktaiva kevalaṃ na karttā ityantena /
GSP33vacbhamu:1564: tvaṃpadārthavipratipattyā ca tatpadārthe 'pi vipratipattirdarśitā- vedāprāmāṇyavādino hi laukāyatikādayastatpadārthapratyayaṃ mithyeti manyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:1566: tadevaṃ tvaṃpadārthavipratipattidvārā tatpadārthe vipratipattiṃ sūcayitvā sākṣāttatpadārthe 'pi vipratipattimāha- asti tadvyatirikta īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti kecit /
GSP33vacbhamu:1572: tasyāpi jīvātmabhyo 'pi vyatirekāt na tvaṃpadārthena sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti svamatamāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1581: tathāpi kimarthaṃ brahmamīmāṃsā ārabhyate ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1590: tadavirodhinaśca ye 'nye 'pi tarkā adhvaramīmāṃsāyāṃ nyāye ca vedapratyakṣādiprāmāṇyapariśodhanādiṣūktāḥ t upakaraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1602: atra yadyapi brahmasvarūpajñānasya pradhānasya pratijñayā tadaṅgānyapi pramāṇādīni pratijñātāni,
GSP33vacbhamu:1604: tatra yadyāvadanubhūyate tatsarvaṃ parimitamaviśudadhamabuddhaṃ vidhvaṃsi ca ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1605: na tenopalabdhena tadviruddhasya nityaśuddhabuddhasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1606: na hi jātu kaścitkṛtakatvena nityaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1616: mā bhūdanubhūyamānaṃ jagattaddharmatayā tādātmyena vā brahmaṇo lakṣaṇam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1617: tadutpattyā tu bhaviṣyati deśāntaraprāptiriva saviturvrajyāyā iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1627: pradhānakālagrahalokapālakriyāyadṛcchāsvabhāvābhāveṣūpaplavamāneṣu satsu sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisvabhāvaṃ brahma jagajjanmādikāraṇamiti kutaḥ saṃbhāvanetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1630: nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasya#iti cetanabhāvakartṛkatvasaṃbhāvanayā pradhānādyacetanakartṛkatvaṃ nirupākhyakartṛkatvaṃ ca vyāsedhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1631: yatkhalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate taccetanakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1633: vivādādhyāsitaṃ ca jagannāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākṛtam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1635: cetano hi buddhāvālikhya nāmarūpe ghaṭa iti nāmnā rūpeṇa ca kambugrīvādinā bāhyaṃ ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1636: ata eva ghaṭasya nirvartyasyāpyantaḥ saṃkalpātmanā siddhasya karmakārakabhāvaḥ 'ghaṭaṃ karoti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1638: tathā cācetano buddhāvanālikhitaṃ karotīti na śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1640: cetanā grahā lokapālā vā nāmarūpe buddhāvālikhya jagajjanayiṣyanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:1651: deśādīni ca tāni pratiniyatāti ceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1663: evaṃ ya eva sukhinasta eva kadācidduḥkhinaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1664: sarvametadākasmikāparanāmni yādṛcchikatve ca svābhāvikatve cāsarvajñāsarvaśaktikartṛkatve ca na ghaṭate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1669: ekasyā api hi śarīraracanāyā rūpaṃ manasā na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ kadācit,
GSP33vacbhamu:1675: kasmātpunarjanmasthitibhaṅgamātramihādigrahaṇena gṛhyate na tu vṛddhipariṇāmāpakṣayā apītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1679: tenālpāvayavādavayavino dvitantukāderanya eva mahānpaṭo jāyata iti janmaiva vṛddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1681: dharmiṇo hi hāṭakāderdharmalakṣaṇaḥ pariṇāmaḥ kaṭakamukuṭādiḥ tasyotpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1688: tathā sati hi tatpratipādake 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni' iti vedavākye buddhisthīkṛte jaganmūlakāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1689: anyathā tu jāyate asti vardhate ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe tatpratipādakaṃ nairuktavākyaṃ buddhau bhavet ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1697: tannāntarīyakatayā tu sthitibhaṅgaṃ gamyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1705: tadanena prabandhena pratijñāviṣayasya brahmasvarūpasya lakṣaṇadvāreṇa saṃbhāvanoktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1728: śabdāvirodhinyā tadupajīvinyā ca yuktyā vivecanaṃ mananam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1740: yadyapi dharmajijñāsāyāmapi sāmagryāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ vyāpāraḥ tathāpi sākṣānnāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1741: brahmajijñāsāyāṃ tu sākṣādanubhavādīnāṃ saṃbhavo 'nubhavārthā ca brahmajijñāsetyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1753: anuṣṭhānasya ca vināpyanubhavaṃ śābdajñānamātrādeva siddheḥ ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1774: evaṃ nārāsthitasparśananiṣedho brahmaghnaśca tadvāraṇavidhiḥ- ityevañjātīyakā vidhipratiṣedhā arthavantaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1778: yasmādgrahaṇāgrahaṇayoruditānuditahomayośca virodhāt samuccayāsaṃbhave tulyabalatayā ca bādhyabādhakabhāvābhāve sati agatyā vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1780: kiṃ tu sāmānyaśāstrasya sparśananiṣedhasya dhāraṇavidhiviṣayeṇa viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1781: etaduktaṃ bhavati- vidhipratiṣedhaireva sa tādṛśo viṣayo 'nāgatotpādyarūpa upanītaḥ yena puruṣasya vidhiniṣedhādhīnapravṛttinivṛttyorapi svātantryaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1782: bhūte vastuni tu neyamasti vidhā, ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1790: tatkathaṃ na vastu vikalpyate, ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1796: savāsanendriyamanoyonayo vā yathā 'sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā' iti sthāṇau saṃśayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1799: na tu puruṣatattvaṃ vā sthāṇutattvaṃ vāpekṣante,
GSP33vacbhamu:1801: tasmādayathāvastato vikalpanā na vastu vikalpayanti vā anyathayanti vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1807: evamuktena prakāreṇa bhūtavastuviṣayāṇāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyasya vastutantratāṃ prasādhya brahmajñānasya vastutantratāmāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1817: na tu vedāntavākyāni tadadhīnasatyatvānīti kathaṃ vedāntavākyagrathanārthatā sūtrāṇāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1827: yathā ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭamapyanumānaṃ brahmaṇi na pravartate tathopariṣṭānnipuṇataramupapādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1836: atra ca pradhānādiviṣayatvasaṃśaye nirṇayavākyam- ānandādhyeva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1837: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yathā rajjvajñānasahitarajjūpādānā dhārā rajjvāṃ satyāmasti rajjvāmeva ca līyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:1838: evamavidyāsahitabrahmopādānaṃ jagat brahmaṇyevāsti tatraiva ca līyata iti siddham /
