GSP33vacbhamu:1858: taiḥ tayā tayā dvārā vedān vyācakṣāṇaistadarthaṃ cādareṇānutiṣṭhadbhiḥ parigṛhīto veda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1865: sarvajñasya hi jñānaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ śāstrasyāpyabhidhānaṃ sarvaviṣayamiti sādṛśyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1877: adyatve 'pyasmadādibhiryatsamīcīnārthaviṣayaṃ śāstraṃ viracyate tatrāsmākaṃ vaktṛṇāṃ vākyājjñānamadhikaviṣayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1878: na hi te te asādhāraṇadharmā anubhūyamānā api śakyā vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:1880: vistarārthamapi vākyaṃ na vaktṛjñānena tulyaviṣayamiti kathayituṃ #
GSP33vacbhamu:1884: vedasya yasmāt mahato bhūtāt yoneḥ saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1885: tasya mahato bhūtasya brahmaṇo niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:1899: devarṣayo hi mahāpariśrameṇāpi yatrāśaktāḥ tadayamīṣatprayatnena līlayaiva karotīti niratiśayamasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ coktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:1900: aprayatnenāsya vedakartṛtve śrutiruktā 'asya mahato bhūtasya' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1901: ye 'pi tāvat varṇānāṃ nityatvamāsthiṣata tairapi padavākyādīnāmanityatvamabhyupāyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1905: varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ ca kālato deśato vā paurvāparyāyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:1906: vyaktiścānityeti kathaṃ tadupagṛhītānāṃ varṇānāṃ nityānāmapi padatā nityā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:1909: yathā hi yādṛśaṃ gātracalanādi nartakaḥ karoti tādṛśameva śikṣyamāṇānukaroti nartakī,
GSP33vacbhamu:1911: evaṃ yādṛśīmānupūrvīṃ vaidikānāṃ varṇapadādīnāṃ karotyadhyāpayitā tādṛśīmevānukaroti māṇavakaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:1916: yathāhuḥ- 'yatnataḥ pratiṣedhyā naḥ puruṣāṇāṃ svatantratā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1918_1: paramātmano nityasya vedānāṃ yonerapi na teṣu svātantryam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1920: yathā hi yāgādibrahmahatyādayor'thānarthahetavo brahmavivartā api na sargāntare vipariyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1926: evaṃ sargāntareṣvapīti tadanurodhāt sarvajño 'pi sarvaśaktirapi pūrvapūrvasargānusāreṇa vedānviracayanna svatantraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1930: na caikasya pratibhāne anāśvāsa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1931: na hi bahūnāmapyajñānāṃ vijñānāṃ vā āśayadoṣavatāṃ pratibhāne yukta āśvāsaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1934: tatpratyayena cārvācīnānāmapi tatra saṃpratyaya ityupapannaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śāstrayonitvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:1941: tasyaiva tu lakṣaṇasyānena anumānatvāśaṅkāmapākṛtya āgamopadarśanena brahmaṇi śāstraṃ pramāṇamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:1947: kim ākṣepe- śuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvatayā upekṣaṇīyaṃ brahma bhūtamabhidadhatāṃ vedāntānāmapuruṣārthopadeśināmaprayojanatvāpatteḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1949: na khalu laukikāni vākyāni pramāṇāntaraviṣayamarthamavabodhayanti svataḥ pramāṇam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:1957: evaṃ hi pratyakṣādyanadhigatagocaratvenānapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ ca prayojanavattvaṃ ca sidhyatīti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:1974: vedāntānāṃ cājñātaṃ brahma jñāpayatāṃ tathābhāvāt , ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:1984: tasmāt bhāvanāviṣayo vidhirna siddhe vastuni bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:1989: evaṃ ca sati uktarūpe brahmaṇi śabdasyātātparyāt pramāṇāntareṇa yādṛśamasya rūpaṃ vyavasthāpyate na tacchabdena virudhyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2010: 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni' iti tu vākyaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtaṃ jagadutpattisthitināśakāraṇamiti ceha smāritamiti na paṭhitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2011: yena hi vākyamupakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate sa eva vākyārtha iti śābdāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2014: iti ca jīvasya brahmātmanopasaṃhārāt tatparataiva vākyasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:2016: na ca tatparatvasya dṛṣṭasya sati saṃbhave 'nyaparatā adṛṣṭā yuktā kalpayitum,
GSP33vacbhamu:2023: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ- puṃvākyanidarśanena hi bhūtārthatayā vedāntānāṃ sāpekṣatvamāśaṅkyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2030: evaṃ tarhi atatpūrvakāṇāṃ vedāntānāṃ bhūtārthānāmapi nāprāmāṇyaṃ pratyakṣādīnāmiva niyatendriyaliṅgādijanmanām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2031: yadyucyeta- siddhe kilāpauruṣeyatve vedāntānāmanapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyet ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2033: bhūtārthasya śabdānapekṣeṇa puruṣeṇa mānāntarataḥ śakyajñānatvādbuddhipūrvaṃ viracanopapatteḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2037_0: kāryārthatve tu kāryasyāpūrvasya mānāntarāgocaratayā atyantānanubhūtapūrvasya tattvena
GSP33vacbhamu:2037_1: samāropeṇa vā puruṣabuddhāvasamārohāt tadarthānāṃ vedāntānāmaśakyaracanatayā pauruṣeyatvābhāvādanapekṣaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2038: atra brūmaḥ- kiṃ punaridaṃ kāryamabhimatamāyuṣmataḥ yadaśakyaṃ puruṣeṇa jñātum ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2042: lokānusārataḥ kriyāyā eva laukikyāḥ kāryatayā liṅāderavagamāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2045: na ca kriyā kṣaṇabhaṅgurā āmuṣmikāya svargāya kalpata iti pāriśeṣyādvedata evāpūrve kārye liṅādīnāṃ saṃbandhagraha iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:2048: spaṣṭadṛṣṭena pauruṣeyatvena vā teṣāmapūrvārthatvapratiṣedhe vākyatvādinā liṅgena vedāntānāmapi pauruṣeyatvamanumitamityapūrvārthatā na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2052: tenāpauruṣeyatve siddhe bhūtārthānāmapi vedāntānāṃ na sāpekṣatayā prāmāṇyavighātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2053: na cānadhigatagantṛtā nāsti yena prāmāṇyaṃ na syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2073: tatrāprāptaprāptau cātyaktatyāge ca bāhyopāyānuṣṭhānasādhyatvāt tadupāyatattvajñānādasti parācīnānuṣṭhānāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2075: na hi sahasramapi rajjupratyayā vastusantaṃ phaṇinamanyathayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2076: samāropite tu prepsitajihāsite tattvasākṣātkāramātreṇa bāhyānuṣṭhānānapekṣeṇaiva śakyete prāptumiva hātumiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:2079: tathehāpyavidyāsamāropitajīvabhāve brahmaṇyānande vastutaḥ śokaduḥkhādirahite samāropitanibandhanastadbhāvaḥ 'tattvamasi' iti vākyārthatattvajñānādavagatiparyantānnivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2083: brahmātmāvagamādeva#jīvasya sarvakleśasya savāsanasya viparyāsasya- sa hi kliśnāti jantūnataḥ kleśaḥ- tasya prakarṣeṇa hānāt #
GSP33vacbhamu:2094: santu tarhi vedāntā devatāpratipādanadvāreṇopāsanāvidhiparā evetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2096: upāsyopāsakopāsanādibhedasiddhyadhīnopāsanā na nirastasamastabhedaprapañce vedāntavedye brahmaṇi saṃbhavatīti nopāsanāvidhiśeṣatvaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadvirodhitvāt ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2100: na hi hānopādānabuddhī eva prāmaṇasya phale,
GSP33vacbhamu:2102: iti kṛtam 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam' ityādiniṣedhavidhiparatvenaiteṣāmityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2104: svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatayā hi sarvo vedarāśiḥ puruṣārthatantra ityavagatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2107: na ca vedāntebhya iva tadarthāvagamamātrādeva kaścitpuruṣārtha upalabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2109: 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam' ityayamapi niṣedhavidhiḥ svaniṣedhyasya nindāmapekṣate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2111: tadyadi dūrato 'pi na nindāmavāpsyattato niṣedhavidhireva rajataniṣedhe ca nindāyāṃ ca darvihenatasvasya sāmarthyadvayamakalpayiṣyat /
GSP33vacbhamu:2112: tadevamuttaptayoḥ 'so 'rodīt' iti ca 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam' iti ca padasaṃdarbhayorlakṣyamāṇanindādvāreṇa naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat parasparaṃ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2115: nanu vidhyasaṃsparśino vedasyānyasya na prāmāṇyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kathaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadaspṛśāṃ tadbhaviṣyatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2123: vedāntānāmapi brahmaṇyastīti dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṃ teṣāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2124: anyathā nendriyāntarāṇāṃ rūpaprakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cakṣurapi na rūpaṃ prakāśayediti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2134: yatra hi śabdā lokena na prayujyante na tatra teṣāṃ saṃgatigrahaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2138: tasmāt pratipitsitaṃ pratipipādayiṣannayaṃ lokaḥ pravṛttinivṛttihetubhūtamevārthaṃ pratipādayet,
GSP33vacbhamu:2144: api ca narāntarasya vyutpannasyārthapratyayamanumāya tasya ca padaśabdabhāvābhāvānuvidhānamavagamyaya śabdasya tadviṣayabodhakatvaṃ niścetavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2146: kāryapratyaye tu narāntaravartini pravṛttinivṛttī sto hetū ityajñātasaṃgatitvānna brahmarūpaparā vedāntāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2155: na ca 'rajjuriyaṃ na bhujaṅgaḥ' iti yathākathañcillakṣaṇayā vākyārthatattvaniścayādyathā bhayakampādinivṛttiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2156: evam 'tattvamasi' iti vākyārthāvagamānnivṛttirbhavati sāṃsārikāṇāṃ dharmāṇām. śrutavākyārthasyāpi puṃsasteṣāṃ tādavasthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2157: api ca yadi śrutabrahmaṇo bhavati sāṃsārikadharmanivṛttiḥ kasmāt punaḥ śravaṇasyopari mananādayaḥ śrūyante ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2160: tacca kāryaṃ svātmani niyojyaṃ niyuñjānaṃ niyoga iti ca mānāntarāpūrvatayāpūrvamiti cākhyāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2161: na ca viṣayānuṣṭhānaṃ vinā tatsiddhiriti svasiddhyarthaṃ tadeva kāryaṃ svaviṣayasya karaṇasyātmajñānasyānuṣṭhānamākṣipati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2162: yathā ca kāryaṃ svaviṣayādhīnanirūpaṇamiti jñānena viṣeyeṇa nirūpyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2163: evaṃ jñānamapi svaviṣayamātmānamantareṇāśakyanirūpaṇamiti tannirūpaṇāya tādṛśamātmānamākṣipati tadeva kāryam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2164: yathāhuḥ- 'yattu tatsiddhyarthamupādīyate ākṣipyate tadapi vidheyamiti tantre vyavahāraḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2167: āropitatadbhāvasya tvanyasya nirūpakatve tena tannirūpitaṃ na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2173: 'yūpe paśuṃ badhnāti' iti bandhanāya viniyukte yūpe,
GSP33vacbhamu:2176: 'yūpamaṣṭāśrīkaroti' ityādibhirvākyaistakṣaṇādividhipapairapi saṃskārāviṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasaṃsthānaṃ dāru yūpa iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2179: kārya eva ca saṃbandho na svarūpo,
GSP33vacbhamu:2183: na ca svatantraṃ kāryaṃ niyojyamadhikāriṇamanuṣṭhātāramantareṇeti niyojyabhedamāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2186: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' iti siddhavadarthavādādavagatasyāpi brahmabhavanasya niyojyaviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ brahma bubhūṣorniyojyaviśeṣasya rātrisatranyāyena pratilambhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2187: piṇḍaputṛyajñānyāyena tu svargakāmasya niyojyasya kalpanāyāmarthavādasyāsamavetārthatayātyantaparokṣā vṛttiḥ syāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2190: amṛtatvaṃ ca amṛtatvādeva na kṛtakatvena śakyamanityamanumātum,
GSP33vacbhamu:2197: taddhi dṛśerupalabdhivacanatvāt śrāvaṇaṃ vā syāt pratyakṣaṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2211: arthavattyā mananādipratītyā cetyasya śeṣaḥ prapañco vidajavyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2219: tacca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ ca vināśi ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:2223: etaduktaṃ bhavati- tvayāpyupāsanāvidhiparatvaṃ vedāntānāmabhyupagacchatā nityaśuddhabuddhatvādirūpabrahmātmatā jīvasya svābhāvikī vedāntagamyāsthīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2233: na ; gāndharvaśāstrārthepāsanāvāsanāyā ivāpūrvānapekṣāyāḥ ṣaṭjādisākṣātkāre vedāntārthopāsanāvāsanāyā jīvasya brahmabhāvasākṣātkāre 'napekṣāyā eva sāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2236: na ca tatkāmaḥ kriyāmeva kāryamavagamiṣyati nāpūrvamiti sāṃpratam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2242: viśvajinnyāyena tu svargakalpanāyāṃ tasya sātiśayatvaṃ kṣayiṣṇutvaṃ ceti na nityaphalatvamupāsanāyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2245: upāsanāyāḥ saṃskārahetubhāvasya saṃskārasya ca sākṣātkāropajanane manaḥsācivyasya ca mānāntarasiddhatvāt. 'ātmetyevopāsīta' iti na vidhiḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2247: yathopāṃśuyājavākye 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo vidhisarūpā na vidhayaḥ-iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2258: pare hi dvayīṃ nityatāmāhuḥ-kūṭasthanityatā pariṇāminityatāṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:2262: tathā hi-tatsarvātmanā vā pariṇamate ekadeśena vā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2264: ekadeśapariṇāme vā sa ekadeśastato bhinno vā abhinno vā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2268: abhede vā kathaṃ na sarvātmanā pariṇāmaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2273: na ca bhedābhedayorvirodhānnaikatra samavāya iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2276: yattu yathā pramāṇenāvagamyate tasya tathābhāva eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:2277: 'kuṇḍalamidaṃ suvarṇam' iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaye vyaktaṃ bhedābhedau cakāstaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2283: so 'yamabādhito 'saṃdigdhaḥ sarvajanīnaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaya eva kāryakāraṇayorbhedābhedau vyavasthāpayati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2284: tathā ca kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇātmatvāt kāraṇasya ca sadrūpasya sarvatrānugamāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2301: api ca kaṭakasya hāṭakādabhede yathā hāṭakātmanā kaṭakamukuṭakuṇḍalādayo na bhidyante evaṃ kaṭakātmanāpi na bhidyeran,
GSP33vacbhamu:2303: tathā ca hāṭakameva vastusat na kaṭakādayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2307: yadi hāṭakādabhinnaḥ kaṭakaḥ kathamayaṃ kuṇḍalādiṣu nānuvartate ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2309: ye hi yasminnanuvartamāne vyāvartante te tato bhinnā eva,
GSP33vacbhamu:2314: idamevaṃ nedam' iti vibhāgo na syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2316: api ca dūrātkanakamityavagate na tasya kuṇḍalādayo viśeṣā jijñāsyeran,
GSP33vacbhamu:2324: asti cābhede kāraṇasatteti kanake jñāte jñātā eva kuṇḍalādaya iti tajjijñāsājñānāni cānarthakāni syuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2325: tena yasmin gṛhyamāṇe yanna gṛhyate tattato bhidyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2327: gṛhyamāṇe ca dūrato hemni na gṛhyante tasya bhedāḥ kuṇḍalādayaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2329: kathaṃ tarhi hema kuṇḍalamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:2330: na hyādhārādheyabhāve samānāśrayatve vā vā sāmānādhikaraṇyamityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2331: athānuvṛttivyāvṛttivyavasthā ca hemni jñāte kuṇḍalādijijñāsā ca katham ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2343: tasmāt kūṭasthanityataiva pāramārthikī. na pariṇāminityateti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:2355: vrīhīṇāṃ khalu prokṣaṇena saṃskārākhyoṃ'śo yathā janyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2363: sukhaṃ cāpratīyamānaṃ na puruṣārtha ityata āha-
GSP33vacbhamu:2366: tadevaṃ svamatena mokṣākhyaṃ phalaṃ nityaṃ śrutyādibhirupapādya kriyāniṣpādyasya tu mokṣasyānityatvaṃ prasañjayati-
GSP33vacbhamu:2371: api ca jñānajanyāpūrvajanito mokṣo naiyogika ityasyārthasya santi bhūyasyaḥ śrutayo nivārikā ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2392: mithyājñānaṃ cāvidyā rāgādyupajananakrameṇa dṛṣṭenaiva saṃsārasya paramaṃ nidānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2395: na tu vidyākāryastajjanitāpūrvakāryo vā- iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2401: yena mithyājñānaṃ bhedāvabhāsaṃ nivartayanna vidhiviṣayo bhavet ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2403: tathā ca vidheḥ prāgaprāptaṃ puruṣecchayā kartavyaṃ sat vidhigocaro bhaviṣyati;
GSP33vacbhamu:2404: yathā vṛttyantaratvena manaso viśvedevasāmyādviśvāndevānmanasi saṃpādya mana ālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena saṃpādyānāṃ viśveṣāmeva devānāmanucintanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2406: evaṃ cidrūpasāmyājjīve brahmasvarūpaṃ saṃpādya jīvamālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena brahmānucintanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2419: yathāha draviḍācāryaḥ- 'saṃharaṇādvā saṃvaraṇādvā svātmībhāvādvāyuḥ saṃvargaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2422: prāyaṇakāle hi sa eva sarvāṇīndriyāṇi saṃgṛhyotkrāmatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2423: seyaṃ saṃvargadṛṣṭirvāyau prāṇe ca daśāśāgataṃ jagaddarśayati yathā,
GSP33vacbhamu:2424: evaṃ jīvātmani bṛṃhaṇakriyayā brahmadṛṣṭismṛtatvāya phalāya kalpata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2428: ātmā tu dravyaṃ karmaṇi guṇa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2433: evaṃ kartṛtvena kratvaṅgabhūte ātmani 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ' iti darśanaṃ guṇakarma vidhīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2434: 'yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇastatra pratīyeta' iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2439: darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe hi samāmnātamājyāvekṣaṇaṃ tadaṅgabhūtājyasaṃskāra iti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2440: na ca 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ' ityādi kasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2441: na cānārabhyādhītamapi 'yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati' ityavyabhicaritakratusaṃbandhajuhūdvāreṇa juhūpadaṃ kratuṃ smārayadvākyena yathā parṇatāyāḥ kratuśeṣabhāvamāpādayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:2443: yena taddarśanaṃ kratvaṅgaṃ sadātmānaṃ kratvarthaṃ saṃskuryāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2445: tathāpi 'suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ bhāryam' itivat viniyogabhaṅgena pradhānakarmaiva,
GSP33vacbhamu:2458: sarvameva hi vākyaṃ nedantayā vastubhedaṃ bodhayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2461: tena pramāṇāntarasiddhe laukike evārthe yadā gatiridṛśī śabdasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:2464: tvaṃpadārtho hi pramātā pramāṇādhīnayā pramityā prameyaṃ ghaṭādi vyāpnotītyavidyāvilasitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2465: tadasya aviṣayībhūtodāsīnatatpadārthapratyagātmasāmānādhikaraṇyena pramātṛtvābhāvāt tannivṛttau pramāṇādayastisro vidhā nivartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2466: na hi pakturavastutve pākyapākapacanāni vastusanti bhavitumarhantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2468: vigalitaparāgvṛttyarthatvaṃ padasya tadastadā tvamiti hi padanaikārthatve tvamityapi yatpadam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2469: tadapi ca tadā gatvaikārthyaṃ viśuddhacidātmatāṃ tyajati sakalānkartṛtvādīnpadārthamalānnijān //
GSP33vacbhamu:2484: tathā ca viśuddhavijñānotpādo mokṣa iti nirvartyo mokṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2485: anyeṣāṃ tu saṃskārarūpāvasthāmapahāya yā kaivalyāvasthāvāptirātmanaḥ sa mokṣa iti vikāryo mokṣaḥ ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2490: 'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate' iti śruterbrahmaṇo vikṛtāvikṛtadeśabhedāvagamādavikṛtadeśabrahmaprāptisvarūpāsanādividhikāryā bhaviṣyati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2491: tathā ca prāpyakarmatā brahmaṇa ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2499: atha jīvo brahmaṇo bhinnastathāpi na tena brahmāpyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2507: tena hi tatkusumaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ lākṣārasasavarṇaṃ phalaṃ prasūte ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2511: guṇo hi brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo vā bhinno vā ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2539: kriyā hi brahmasamavetā vā brahma saṃskuryāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:2546: na hi darpaṇe nighṛṣyamāṇe maṇirviśuddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2554: anādyanirvācyāvidyopadhānameva brahmaṇo jīva iti ca kṣetrajña iti cācakṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:2559: tenātrāpi yadāśritā kriyā sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇaviṣayīkṛtā tasyaiva saṃskāro nānyasyeti na vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2560: tattvatastu na kriyā na saṃskāra iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2561: sanidarśanaṃ tu śeṣamadhyāsabhāṣye eva kṛtavyākhyānamiti neha vyākhyātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2581: yayā mokṣasya karmatā ghaṭiṣyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2585: etaduktaṃ bhavati- catasṛṇāṃ vidhānāṃ madhye 'nyatamatayā kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāptam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2586: sā ca mokṣādvyāvartamānā vyāpakānupalabdhyā mokṣasya kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāvartayatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2588: tathā ca tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo 'narthakānītyata upasaṃhāravyājenāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2590: atha jñānaṃ kriyā mānasī kasmānna vidhigocaraḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2591: kasmācca tasyāḥ phalaṃ nirvartyādiṣvanyatamaṃ na mokṣaḥ ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2606: vastusvarūpanirapekṣaiva codyate#- yathā devatāsaṃpradānakahavirgrahaṇe devatāvastusvarūpānapekṣā devatādhyānakriyā ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2608: yā sā kriyā hi nāma#iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2609: na hi 'yasyai devatāyai havirgṛhītaṃ syāttāṃ dhyāyedvaṣaṭkariṣyan' ityasmādvidheḥ prāgdevatādhyānaṃ prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2610: prāptaṃ tvadhītavedāntasya viditapadatadarthasaṃbandhasyādhigataśabdanyāyatattvasya 'sadeva somyedam' ityādeḥ 'tattvamasi' ityantātsaṃdarbhāt brahmātmabhāvajñānam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2613: na hyasau svasāmagrībalalabdhajanmā manujecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā śakyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2617: tayoranvayavyatirekāvadhṛtasāmarthyayoḥ sākṣātkāre vā anādyavidyāpanaye vā vidhimantareṇa prāptatvena puruṣecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā aśakyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2635: sa eva ca heya upādeyo vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:2636: yaṃ puruṣaḥ kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2637: tatraiva ca samarthaḥ kartādhikṛto niyojyo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2638_1: iti prayuktā api liṅādayaḥ pravartanāyāmasamarthā upala iva kṣurataikṣṇyaṃ kuṇṭhamapramāṇībhavantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2652: anyataḥ prāptā eva hi śravaṇādayo vidhisarūpairvākyairanūdyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2655: tathāhi- tattadiṣṭāniṣṭaviṣayepsājihāsāpahṛtahṛdayatayā bahirmukho na pratyagātmani manaḥ samādhātumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2656_1: udghāṭyata iti pravṛttiviśeṣakaratā anuvādānāmastīti saprayojanatayā svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvamupapadyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2658: svato 'sya puruṣārthatve siddhe yadanuṣṭhānānaṅgatvaṃ tadbhūṣaṇaṃ na dūṣaṇamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2672: yadi hi padānāṃ kāryābhidhāne tadarthasvārthābhidhāne vā niyamena vṛddhavyavahāre sāmarthyamabadhṛtaṃ bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:2676: atha tu bhūte 'pyarthe padānāṃ loke śakyaḥ saṃgatigrahaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2677: tata upaniṣadāntatparatvaṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayāvagamyamānamapahnutya na kāryaparatvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum,
GSP33vacbhamu:2680: yadi tatparaḥ prayogo na loke dṛśyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:2682: na tāvattatparaḥ prayogo na dṛśyate loke,
GSP33vacbhamu:2688_0: tathā hi- aviditāryajanabhāṣārtho draviḍo nagaragamanodyato rājamārgābhyarṇaṃ devadattamandiramadhyāsīnaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:2688_2: paṭavāsopāyanārpaṇapuraḥsaraṃ 'diṣṭyā vardhase devadatta putraste jātaḥ' iti vārttāhāravyāhāraśravaṇasamanantaramupajātaromāñcakañcukaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:2690: na cāyamapratipādayan harṣahetumarthaṃ harṣāya kalpata ityanena harṣaheturartha ukta iti pratipadyate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2691: harṣahetvantarasya cāpratīteḥ putrajanmanaśca taddhetoravagamāttadeva vārttāhāreṇābhyadhāyīti niścinoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2694: evaṃ ca brahmasvarūpajñānasya paramapuruṣārthahetubhāvādanupadiśatāmapi puruṣapravṛttinivṛttī vedāntānāṃ puruṣahitānuśāsanācchāstratvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2704: upanīya advayaṃ brahma savāsanāmavidyāṃ hinastīti brahmavidyāmāha ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2713: anyaśeṣaṃ hi bhūtaṃ dravyaṃ cikīrṣitaṃ sadutpattyādyāpyaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:2721: upaniṣadāmanārabhyādhītānāṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayā puruṣapratipādanaparatvena puruṣasyaiva prādhānyenedaṃ prakaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2723: ataḥ svaprakaraṇasthaḥ so 'yaṃ tathāvidha upaniṣadbhyaḥ pratīyamāno na nāstīti śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2725: mānāntarogocaratvenāgṛhītasaṃgatitayā apadārthasya brahmaṇo vākyārthatvānupapatteḥ kathamupaniṣadarthatetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2728: tathāpi prakāśātmana eva satastattadupādhiparihāṇyā śakyaṃ vākyārthatvena nirūpaṇam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2730: na hi prakāśaḥ svasaṃvedano na bhāsate ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2732: tena 'sa ena neti netyātmā' iti tattadavacchedaparihāṇyā bṛhattvādāpanācca svayaṃprakāśaḥ śakyo vākyāt brahmeti cātmeti ca nirūpayitumityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2737: na hi jātu rajjvabhāve rajjvāṃ bhujaṅga iti vā dhāreti vā vibhramo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2738: api cātmānaḥ prakāśasya bhāsā prapañcasya prabhā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2739: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2740: na cātmanaḥ prakāśasya pratyākhyāne prapañcaprathā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2744: sarvajanīnāhaṃpratyayaviṣayo hyātmā kartā bhoktā ca saṃsārī,
GSP33vacbhamu:2748: te eva ca teṣāmarthā ityaupaniṣadamapyātmapadaṃ tatraiva pravartitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:2753: tatsākṣitvena#-ahaṃpratyayaviṣayo yaḥ kartā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātopahito jīvātmā-tat sākṣitvena,
GSP33vacbhamu:2756: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadyapi 'anena jīvenātmanā' iti jīvaparamātmanoḥ pāramārthikamaikyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:2768: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati ātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2769: api cātaḥ sarveṣāmātmatvādeva na heyo nāpyupādeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2775: tasmāddheyopādeyaviṣayau vidhiniṣedhau na tadviparītamātmatattvaṃ viṣayīkuruta iti sarvasya prapañcajātasyātmaiva tattvamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2780: yaśca paramārthāsan asau prakṛtiḥ rajjutattvamiva sarvavibhramasya vikārasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:2784: na hi sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśata ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2786: puruṣa eva hi sarvasya prapañcavikārajātasya tattvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2791: atha mā bhūtsvarūpeṇa puruṣo heya upādeyo vā ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2796: api cātmanaḥ paramārthasato dharmo 'pi paramārthasanniti na tasyātmavadanyathātvaṃ kāraṇaiḥ śakyaṃ kartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2806: na hi somaśarmaṇi prakṛte tadguṇābhidhānaṃ parisaṃcaṣṭe viṣṇuśarmaṇo guṇavattām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2811: na hi te kriyārthā ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2817: yathāhuḥ śāstravidaḥ 'codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantam' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:2821: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-na tāvatkāryārthā eva svārthe padānāṃ saṃgatigraho nānyārtha ityupapāditaṃ bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiṃ darśayadbhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2824: na hi pratyekaṃ svapradhānatayā guṇapradhānabhāvarahitānāmekavākyatā dṛṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2833: tathā cārthāntarasaṃsargaparatāmātreṇa vākyārthapratyayopapattau na kāryasaṃsargaparatvaniyamaḥ padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2850: tathā ca bhūter'the 'vadhṛtaśaktayaḥ śabdāḥ kvacitsvaniṣṭhabhūtaviṣayā dṛśyamānā mṛtvā śīrtvā vā na kathañcitkriyāniṣṭhatāṃ gamayitumucitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2851: na hyupahitaṃ śataśo dṛṣṭamapyanupahitaṃ kvaciddṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:2852: tathā ca vartamānāpadeśā astikriyopahitā akāryārthā apyaṭavīvarṇakādayo loke bahulamupalabhyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:2857: na hi pṛcchatā puruṣasya vā tarūṇāṃ vāstitvanāstitve pratipitsite ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2858: kiṃ tu puruṣasya svāmibhedastarūṇāṃ ca prakārabhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2859: praṣṭurapekṣitaṃ cācakṣāṇaḥ svāmibhedameva prakārabhedameva ca prativyakti,
GSP33vacbhamu:2862: upapāditā ca bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiḥ prayojanavati padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:2877: api ca ye 'pi kāryaparatvaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāmāsthiṣata,
GSP33vacbhamu:2879: 'na surā pātavyā' ityādīnāṃ na kāryaparatā śakyā āsthātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:2880: kṛtyupahitamaryādaṃ hi kāryaṃ kṛtyā vyāptaṃ tannivṛttau nivartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:2884: viṣayaścāsya sādhyasvabhāvatayā bhāvārtha eva pūrvāparībhūto 'nyotpādānukūlo bhavitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:2888: ata eva śāstrakṛdvacaḥ- 'bhāvārthāḥ karmaśabdāstebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyeta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:2890: bhāvasya svataḥ dravyaguṇaśabdānāṃ tu bhāvayogātkāryāvamarśa iti bhāvārthebhya evāpūrvāvagatiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:2900: bhāvārtho hi kārakavyāpāramātratayāviśiṣṭaḥ kārakaviśeṣeṇa dravyādinā viśeṣyata iti dravyādistadanubandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2901: tathā ca bhāvārthe vidhīyamāne sa eva sānubandho vidhīyata iti dravyaguṇāvaviṣayāvapi tadanubandhatayā vihitau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2902_1: cānyataḥ prāptatayā tadanuvādena tadanubandhībhūtadravyādiparo bhavatīti sarvatra
GSP33vacbhamu:2903: etena 'yadāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavati' ityatra saṃbandhaviṣayo vidhiriti parāstam /
GSP33vacbhamu:2916: nanu vyāpāraviṣayaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ kathamavyāpārarūpaṃ saṃbandhaṃ gocarayet ?
GSP33vacbhamu:2917: na hi 'ghaṭaṃ kuru' ityatrāpi sākṣānnāmārthaṃ ghaṭaṃ puruṣaprayatno gocarayati ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2921: uddeśyatayā tvasyāmasti ghaṭo na tu viṣayatayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2923: ata eva 'āgneyaḥ' ityatrāpi dravyadevatāsaṃbandhākṣipto yajireva kāryaviṣayo vidheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2926: ata eva 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsyāṃ yajate',
GSP33vacbhamu:2927: 'ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajate' ityanuvādo bhavati 'yadāgneyaḥ' ityādivihitasya yāgaṣaṭkasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:2928: ata eva ca vihitānūditasya tasyaiva 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta' ityādhikārasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2934: evaṃ ca prajāpativratanyāyena paryudāsavṛttyāhananāpānasaṃkalpalakṣaṇayā tadviṣayo vidhiḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2936: na ca sati saṃbhave lakṣaṇā nyāyyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2937: 'nekṣetodyantam' ityādau tu 'tasya vratam' ityadhikārātprasajyapratiṣedhāsaṃbhavena paryudāsavṛttyānīkṣaṇasaṃkalpalakṣaṇā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:2940: tadabhāve ca tadvyāptasya kāryasyābhāva iti na kāryaparatvaniyamaḥ sarvatra vākye ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2951: na ca rāgataḥ pravṛttasya hananapānādāvakasmādaudāsīnyamupapadyate vinā vidhārakaprayatnam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:2952: tasmātsa eva pravṛttyunmukhānāṃ manovāgdehānāṃ vidhārakaḥ prayatno niṣedhavidhigocaraḥ kriyeti nākriyāparamasti vākyaṃ kiñcidapīti āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:2953: na ca hananakriyānivṛttyaudāsīnyavyatirekeṇa nañaḥ śakyamaprāptakriyārthatvaṃ kalpayitum# /
GSP33vacbhamu:2956: ayamarthaḥ- hananapānaparo hi vidhipratyayaḥ pratīyamānaste eva vidhatte ityutsargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2959: na cātra nañaḥ prasajyapratiṣedho vidheyaḥ. tasyāpyaudāsīnyarūpasya siddhatayā prāptatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:2968: sādhye ca sādhyavadbhāsata iti sādhyaviṣayo nañarthaḥ sādhyavadbhāsata iti nañarthaḥ kārya iti bhramaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:2977_1: ca tato nivṛttimupalabhya bālo vyutpitsuḥ prayojyavṛddhasya pravṛttinivṛttihetū icchādveṣāvanumimīte /
GSP33vacbhamu:2985: api tu bhūyo bhūyaḥ svagatamālocayata uktakāraṇapūrvāveva pratyavabhāsete /
GSP33vacbhamu:2987_0: sa cāvagamaḥ prāgabhūtaḥ śabdaśravaṇānantaramupajāyamānaḥ śabdaśravaṇahetuka iti
GSP33vacbhamu:2987_1: pravartakeṣu vākyeṣu 'yajeta' ityādiṣu śabda eva kartavyamiṣṭasādhanaṃ vyāpāramavagamayaṃstasyeṣṭasādhanatāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:3001: tayā khalvayaṃ cetana āpātato ramaṇīyatāṃ paśyannapyāyatimālocya pravṛttyabhāvaṃ nivṛttimavabudhya nivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3017: na ca kavacāpagame ca asati ca śastraprahāre,
GSP33vacbhamu:3056: yatpunaraśarīratvaṃ tadasya svabhāva iti na śakyaṃ nivartayitum,
GSP33vacbhamu:3060: na mithyājñānanimittaṃ saśarīratvam api tu dharmādharmanimittam ;
GSP33vacbhamu:3062: tannivṛttau ca prāyaṇameveti na jīvato 'śarīratvamiti śaṅkate- #

GSP33vacbhamu:3672: rajataṃ hi rāmāropitaṃ na śuktito bhidyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:3684: ' tatra kiṃ pucchapadasamabhivyāhārāt annamayādiṣu cāsyāvayavaparatvena prayogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3685: ihāpyavayavaparatvātpucchapadasya tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ brahmapadamapi svārthatyāgena kathañcidavayavaparaṃ vyākhyāyātām /

GSP33vacbhamu:3696: pucchapadaṃ hi vāladhau mukhyaṃ sadānandamayāvayave gauṇameveti mukhyaśabdārthalaṅghanamavayavaparatāyāmaṅikaraṇaparatāyāṃ ca tulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3712: tathā ca māntravarṇikasya brahmaṇā eva brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti svapradhānasyābhidhānāt,

GSP33vacbhamu:3741: ityanayorapi sūtrayorbhāṣye ānandamayasthāne brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti pāṭho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3744: vikārasyānandamayasya brahma pucchamavayavaścetkathaṃ sarvasyāsya vikārajātasya sānandamayasya brahma pucchaṃ kāraṇamucyeta idaṃ sarvamasṛjata /
GSP33vacbhamu:3746: nahyānandamayavikārāvayavo brahma vikāraḥ san sarvasya kāraṇamupapadyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:3752: brahmaiva tu pradhānaṃ brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti jñeyatvenopakṣiptamiti nirṇītam /

GSP33vacbhamu:3767: anādhāratve ca nityatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ ca hetuḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:3775: na cādityasya devatāyāḥ karmānadhikāre 'pi sarvapāpmavirahaḥ prāgbhavīyadharmarūpapāpmasaṃbhave sati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3776: na caiteṣāṃ prāgbhavīyo dharma evāsti na pāpmeti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3781: tatra tatra sarvapāpmavirahasya bhūyobhūyo brahmaṇyeva śravaṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:3799: sa evāntarāditya ityantaḥ śrutisāmyena pratyabhijñāyamāno bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3819: tatra 'ākāśa iti hovāca' iti kiṃ mukhyakāśapādānurodhena 'asya lokasya kā gitaḥ' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:3820: 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni' iti 'jyāyā' itica 'parāyaṇam' iti ca kathañcidvyākhyāyatāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3824: ' 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ' iti praśnottare 'ākāśa iti hovāca' ityākāśasya gatitvena pratipādyatayā prādhānyāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3825: 'sarvāṇi ha vā' ityādīnāṃ tu tadviśeṣaṇatayā guṇatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3828: tena tadanuraktāyāṃ buddhau yadyadeva tadekavākyagatamupanipatati tattajjaghanyatayā upasaṃjātavirodhi tadānuguṇyenaiva vyavasthānamarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3829: naca kkacidākāśaśabdo bhaktyā brahmaṇi prayukta iti sarvatra tena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3830: nahi gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgapadamanupapattyā tīraparamiti yādāṃsi gaṅgāyāmityatrāpyanena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3837: tadānuguṇyena ca 'sarvāṇi ha vā' ityādīni bhāṣyakṛtā svayameva nītāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:3846: ' yadyapyākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ tathāpi yatpṛṣṭaṃ tadeva prativaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3848: tadiha, 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ' iti praśno dṛśyamānanāmarūpaprapañcamātragativiṣaya iti tadanurodhādya eva sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ sa evākāśaśabdena prativaktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3854: naca praśnena pūrvapakṣarūpeṇānavasthitārthenottaraṃ vyavasthitārthaṃ na śakyaṃ niyantumiti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3858: tathāhi-'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyakāśādeva samutpadyante' iti sarvaśabdaḥ kathañcidalpaviṣayo vyākhyeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3860: na khalvapāmākāśa eva kāraṇamapi tu tejo 'pi /
GSP33vacbhamu:3861: evamannasyāpi nākāśameva kāraṇamapi tu pāvakapāthasī api /
GSP33vacbhamu:3875: tathāca tadarthaṃ sat ākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ bhavati, nānyathā /

GSP33vacbhamu:3886: yatra tu na śakyaṃ tatrottarānuguṇyenaiva prathamaṃ nīyata ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3891: udgīthe-'yā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā' ityukramya śrūyate-'katamā sā devateti prāṇa iti hovāca' uṣastiśkrāyaṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3893: prastāva iti sāmno bhaktiviśeṣastamanvāyattā anugatā prāṇo devatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3894: atra prāṇaśabdasya brahmaṇi vāyuvikāre ca darśanātsaṃśayaḥ-kimayaṃ brahmavacana uta vāyuvikāravacana iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3895: tatra ata eva brahmaliṅgādeva prāṇo 'pi brahmaiva na vāyuvikāra iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3900: ākāśasya vā vāṭvādibhūtakāraṇatvaṃ prati nāgamādṛte mānāntaraṃ prabhavati /

GSP33vacbhamu:3903_0: iha tu saṃveśanodgamane bhūtānāṃ prāṇaṃ pratyucyamāne kiṃ brahma pratyucyate āho
GSP33vacbhamu:3903_1: vāyuvikāraṃ pratīti viśaye 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti' ityādikāyāḥ

GSP33vacbhamu:3912: ' no khalu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvamapauruṣeyaṃ vacaḥ svaviṣayajñānotpāde vā tadvyavahāre vā mānāntaramapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:3916: tasmādasaṃvādino vā cakṣuṣa iva rūpe tvagindriyasaṃvādino vā tasyaiva dravye nādārḍhyaṃ vā dārḍhyaṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:3919: pratītau vā tatrāpi prāṇo brahmaiva bhavenna vāyuvikāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3920: 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityatra vākye yathā prāṇaśabdo brahmavacanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:3921: na cāsminvāyuvikāre sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamane mānāntareṇa dṛśyete /

GSP33vacbhamu:3939: idamāmananti-'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate niśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3940: yajjyotirato divo dyulokātparaṃ dīpyate prakāśate viśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu viśveṣāmupari /
GSP33vacbhamu:3941: asaṃkucadvṛttirayaṃ viśvaśabdo 'navayavatvena saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ brūta iti darśayitumāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:3946: śrotragrāhyeṇa ca pihitakarṇena puṃsā ghoṣeṇa liṅgenānumīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3951: atra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaḥ teja uta brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:3958: kokṣeyajyotiḥsārūpyaṃ ca cakṣuṣyo rūpavān śruto viśruto bhavatītyalpaphalatvaṃ ca svavākye śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3959: na jātu jvalanāparanāmā dīptirvinā tejo brahmaṇi saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:3963: audarye tu tejasyadhyasya bāhyaṃ teja upāsanametat phalānurūpaṃ yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:3968: tasya sauryādeḥ sāvayavatvena tadekadeśamaryādāsaṃbhavāt tasya copāsyatvena vidhānāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:3971: naca 'pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti brahmapratipādakaṃ vākyāntaraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:3972: 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥśabdaṃ brahmaṇi vyavasthāpayatīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3973: nahi saṃnidhānamātradvākyāntareṇa vākyāntaragatā śrutiḥ śakyā mukhyārthāntryāvayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:3974: naca vākyāntare 'dhikaraṇatvena dyauḥ śrutā diva iti maryādāśrutau śakyā pratyabhijñātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:3975: apica vākyāntarasyāpi brahmārthatvaṃ prasādhyameva nādyāpi sidhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:3976: tatkathaṃ tena niyantuṃ brahmaparatayā 'yadataḥ paraḥ' iti vākyaṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:3978: tejaḥkathanaprastāve tamaḥkathanaṃ pratipakṣopanyāsena pratipakṣāntare dṛḍhā pratītirbhavatītyetadartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:3995: 'ekaikāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ karavāṇi' iti tejaḥprabhṛtyupāsanāmātraviṣayā śrutirna saṃkocayituṃ yuktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4000: tathāpi yathā kārye jyotiṣyatiśayenopapadyate na tathātretyata uktam- #

GSP33vacbhamu:4011: tatra vacanāni tvapūrvatvāditi sarvanāmnaḥ prasiddhārthatvaṃ balādapanīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4013: tadiha 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥ' iti yacchabdasāmarthyāt dyumaryādenāpi jyotiṣā prasiddhena bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4015: pūrvavākye ca dyusaṃbandhitayā tripādbrahma prasiddhamiti prasiddhyapekṣāyāṃ tadeva saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4016: naca pradhānasya prātipadikārthasya tattvena pratyabhijñāne tadviśeṣaṇasya vibhaktyarthasyānyatāmātreṇānyatā yuktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4017: evaṃ ca tadvākyasthāni tejoliṅgānyasamañjasānīti brahmaṇyeva gamayitavyāni,
GSP33vacbhamu:4020: athavā prakāśamātravacano jyotiḥśabdaḥ prakāśasya brahmeti brahmaṇi mukya iti jyotirbahmeti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:4037: chandobhidhānānneti cet na tathā cetorpaṇanigadāttathāhi darśanam# /
GSP33vacbhamu:4041: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca' iti gāyatrīṃ prakṛtyedaṃ śrūyate-'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4045: evaṃ 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' ityakṣarasaṃniveśamātrasya gāyatryā na sarvatvamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4048: tasmādgīyatrīdvārā brahmaṇa evopāsanā na gāyatryā iti pūrveṇaiva gatārthatvādanārambhaṇīyametat /
GSP33vacbhamu:4058: 'vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca' ityādiśritibhyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4059: tathāca 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' ityupakramya gāyatryā eva hṛdayādibhirvyākhyāya ca 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī' ityupasaṃhāro gāyatryāmeva samañjaso bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4068: gāyatryākhyacchandodvāreṇa gāyatrīrūpavikārānugate brahmaṇi cetorpaṇaṃ cittasamādhānamanena brahmaṇavākyena nigadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4073: kintu yadetadbrahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvakāraṇaṃ satsvarūpeṇāśakyopadeśamiti tadvikāragāyatrīdvāreṇopalakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4074: gāyatryāḥ sarvacchandovyāptyā ca savanatrayavyāptyā ca dvijātidvitīyajanmajananīyatayā ca śrutervikāreṣu madhye prādhānyena dvāratvopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4076: nahi kuṇḍalenopalakṣitaṃ kaṇṭharūpaṃ kuṇḍalaviyoge 'pi paścātpratīyamānamapratīyamānaṃ bhavati /

GSP33vacbhamu:4079: saṃprati ti gāyatriśabdaḥ saṃkhyāsāmānyādgauṇyā vṛttyā brahmaṇyeva vartata iti darśayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4088: tathā-'ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yamantaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ' /

GSP33vacbhamu:4105: asyārthaḥ-hṛdayasyāsya khalu pañca suṣayaḥ pañca chidrāṇi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4106: tāni ca devaiḥ prāṇādibhī rakṣyamāṇāni svargaprāptidvārāṇīti devasuṣayaḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:4112: atha yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣo vyānaḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:4146: tathā 'eṣa sādhu karma kārayati' 'eṣa lokādhipatiḥ' ityādyapi /

GSP33vacbhamu:4185: tena yathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre caikavākyatvāya 'prajāpaturupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo na pṛthagvidhayaḥ kintvarthavādā iti nirṇītaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4186_0: tathehāmāmevi vijānīhi' ityupakramya 'prāṇo 'smi prajñātmā' ityuktvānte 'sa prāṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:4190: ata evopalakṣyasya pratyagātmasvarūpasyābhedamupalakṣaṇaṃ bhedenopalakṣayati-'prāṇa eva prajñātmā' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4218: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhasya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4219: tadevaṃ svamatena vyākhyāya prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ matena vyācaṣṭe- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4221: pūrvaṃ prāṇasyaikamupāsanamaparaṃ jīvasyāparaṃ brahmaṇa ityupāsanātraividhyena vākyabhedaprasaṅgo dūṣaṇamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4222: iha tu brahmaṇa ekasyaivopāsātrayaviśiṣṭasya vidhānānna vākyabeda ityabhimānaḥ prācāṃ vṛttikṛtām /
GSP33vacbhamu:4226: iha tu siddharūpaṃ brahma na vidhiviṣayo bhavitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:4229: vākyāntarebhyaśca brahmavagateḥ prāptatvāttadanūdyāprāptopāsanā bhāvārthaḥ vidheyastasya ca bedādvidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabedo 'tisphuṭa iti bāṣyakṛtā nodghāṭitaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4231: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4237: atha dvitīyaṃ pādamāripsuḥ pūrvoktamarthaṃ smārayati vakṣyamāṇopayogitayā- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4240: na caite sākṣātpūrvamupapāditā iti kathaṃ hetubhāvena na śakyā upadeṣṭumityata uktam- #

GSP33vacbhamu:4247: tatra kaiva kathā manomayādīnāmarthāntaraṃ prasiddhānāṃ padānāṃ brahmagocaratvanirṇayaṃ pratītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4257: tasmiṃścāniti sthitikāle ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ jagat tasmātsarvaṃ khalvidaṃ jagadbrahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:4258: ataḥ kaḥ kasminrajyate kaśca kaṃ dveṣṭīti rāgadveṣarahitaḥ śāntaḥ sannupāsīta /

GSP33vacbhamu:4261: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimiha manomayatvādibhirdharmaiḥ śārīra ātmopāsyatvenopadiśyate āhosvidbrahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4265: 'kratum' ityādivākyena vihitāṃ kratubhāvanāmanūdya 'sarvam' ityādivākyaṃ śamaguṇe vidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4266: tathā ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyaṃ prathamapaṭhitamapyarthālocanayā parameva,
GSP33vacbhamu:4268: evaṃ ca saṃkalpavidhiḥ prathamo nirviṣayaḥ sannaparyavasyanviṣayāpekṣaḥ svayamanirvṛtto na vidhyantareṇopajīvituṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4271: manomayatvādi ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmano jīvātmana eva nirūḍhamiti jīvātmanopāsyenoparaktopāsanā na paścāt brahmaṇā saṃbaddhumarhati,

GSP33vacbhamu:4275: na cānyaparādapi brahmāpekṣitatayā svīkriyata iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4282: evaṃ karmakartṛvyapadeśaḥ saptamīpraṇamāntatā cābhede 'pi jīvātmani kathañcidbhedopacāreṇa rāhoḥ śira itivaddraṣṭavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4293: ' bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prāṇaśarīra ca sarvanāmārthaṃ saṃprāpya tadabhidhānaṃ paryavasyet /
GSP33vacbhamu:4295: tadeva tu manovikāro vā manaḥpracuraṃ vā kimarthamityadyāpi na vijñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4296: tadyatraiṣa śabdaḥ samavetārtho bhavati sa samāsārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4297: na caiṣa jīva eva samavetātho na brahmaṇīti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4300: vikārāṇāṃ ca svakāraṇādabhedātteṣāṃ ca manomatayā brahmaṇastatkāraṇasya manomayatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4313: vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ-'samāropyasya rūpeṇa viṣayo rūpavānbhavetṣa viṣayasya tu rūpeṇa samāropyaṃ na rūpavat //
GSP33vacbhamu:4314: ' samāropitasya hi rūpeṇa bhujaṅgasya bhīṣaṇatvādinā rajjū rūpavatī,
GSP33vacbhamu:4317: bhujaṅgadaśāyāṃ tu na nāsti vāstavī rajjuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4321: tasmādbrahmaliṅgadarśanājjīve ca tadasaṃbhavādbrahmaivopāsyaṃ na jīva iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:4322: etadupalakṣaṇaṇāya ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma' iti vākyamupanyastamiti //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4342: śārīraguṇā iva manomayatvādayo brahmaṇītyata āha sūtrakāraḥ- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4354: na tāvadbhedapratiṣedhādbhedavpadeśācca bhedābhedāvekatra tāttvikau bhavitumarhato virodhādityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4368: yo hi paratantraḥ so 'nyena bandhanāgāre praveśyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:4373: na caitāvatā īśvarasyānīśatā na hyupakaraṇādyapekṣitā kartuḥ svātantryaṃ vihanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4385: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate-yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odamaḥ# /
GSP33vacbhamu:4387: mṛtyuryasyopasetacanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra sa iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:4389: attṛtvaṃ ca bhoktṛtā vā saharntṛtā vā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4393: tadyadi bhoktṛtvamattṛtvaṃ tato muktasaṃśayaṃ jīvātmaiva pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4394: brahmakṣatrādi cāsya kāryakāraṇasaṃghāto bhogāyatanatayā vā sākṣādvā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4397: tatastrayāṇāmagnijīvaparamātmanāṃ praśnopanyāsopalabdheḥ saṃhartṛtvasyāviśeṣādbhavati saṃśayaḥ-kimattā agnirāho jīva utāho paramātmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4398: tatraudanasya bhogyatvena loke prasiddherbhoktṛtvameva prathamaṃ buddhau viparivartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:4401: 'na jāyate mriyate' iti ca tasyaiva stutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4411: tatra yadi jīvasya bhogāyatanatayā tatsādhanatayā ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātaḥ sthitaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4416: naca bhogāyatanasya bhogasādhanasya vā bhogyatvaṃ mukhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4419: kasyacitkrūrasattvasya vyāghrādeḥ kaścidbhavet na tu sarvathā sarvajīvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:4426: 'brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca' iti ca śrutī saṃkocamarhataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4434: tathāca 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit' iti prakṛtasya na hānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4435: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ' iti ca durjñānatopapatsyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4448: autsargikasya mukhyatābalātpūrvasiddhāntapakṣāsaṃbhavena pakṣāntaraṃ kalpayiṣyata iti manvānaḥ saṃśayamākṣipati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4459: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi kartā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4460: ata eva cāhuḥ-'yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeva' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4471: apica 'sukṛtasya loke' iti sukṛtalokavyavasthānena karmagocarānatikrama uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4473: jīvo hi bhoktṛtayā buddhiśca bhogasādhanatayā dharmasya gocare sthitau,
GSP33vacbhamu:4477: tatrāpi prete vicikitsāpanuttaye buddherbhedena paralokī jīvo darśanīya iti buddhirucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4479: brahmaṇaiva sarūpeṇa na tu buddhyā virūpayā //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4487: tadiha cetano jīvaḥ sarūpeṇa cetanāntareṇaiva brahmaṇā sadvitīyaḥ pratīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:4489: tadevam 'ṛtaṃ pibantau' ityatra prathamamavagate brahmaṇi tadanurodhena caramaṃ guhāśrayatvaṃ śālagrāme hariritavadvyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4490: bahulaṃ hi guhāśrayatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutaya āhuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4494: evañca prathamāvagatabrahmānurodhena sukṛtalokavartitvamapi tasya lakṣaṇayā chatrinyāyena gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4495: chāyātapatvamapi jīvasyāvidyāśrayatayā brahmaṇaśca śuddhaprakaśasvabhāvasya tadanāśrayatayā mantavyam //11 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4497: imameva nyāyaṃ 'dvā suparṇā' ityatrāpyudāharaṇe kṛtvācintayā yojayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4499: atrāpi kiṃ buddhijīvau uta jīvaparamātmānāviti saṃśaṭya karaṇarūpāyā api buddheredhāṃsi pacantītivatkartṛtvopacārābuddhijīvāviha pūrvapakṣayitvā siddhāntayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4501: taddarśanāditi ca 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagnaḥ' ityatra mantre /
GSP33vacbhamu:4502: na khalu mukhye kartṛtve saṃbhavati karaṇe kartṛtvopacāro yukta iti kṛtvācintāmudghāṭayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4520: tasya tu brahmarūpatāyāṃ paryavasyanna pūrvapakṣamapi svīkarotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4525: sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi raja ādhvaṃsata iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:4539: apitu buddhisattvaṃ mukhādirupapariṇataṃ citicchāyāpattyopapannacaitanyamiva bhuṅkte natu tattvato jīvaḥ paramātmā bhuṅkte /
GSP33vacbhamu:4549: parokṣaṃ brahma na tathā pratibimbe tu yujyate //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4553: 'ṛtaṃ pibantau ityatra hi jīvaparamātmānau prathamamanagatāviti tadanurodhena guhāpraveśādayaḥ paścādavagatā vyākhyātāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4554: tadvidihāpi 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' iti pratyakṣābhidhānātprathamamavagate chāyāpuruṣe tadanurodhenāmṛtatvābhayatvādayaḥ stutyā kathañcidvyākhyeyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4561: kaṃ ca khaṃ cetyādi tu vākyamagnīnāṃ nācāryavākyaṃ niyantumarhi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4562: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatyantarābhiprāyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4572: ' saṃnihitāśca puruṣātmādiśabdāste ca na yāvatsvārthamabhidadhati tāvatsarvanāmabhyāṃ nārthatuṣo 'bhidhīyata iti kutastadarthasyāparokṣatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4573: puruṣātmaśabdau ca sarvanāmanirapekṣau svarasato jīve vā paramātmani vā vartete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4574: naca tayoṣcakṣuṣi pratyakṣadarśanamiti nirapekṣapuruṣapadapratyāyitārthānurodhena ya eṣa iti dṛśṭata iti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4576: viduṣaḥ śāstrata upalabdireva dṛḍhatayā pratyakṣavaduparyate praśaṃsārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4577: api ca tadeva caramaṃ prathamānuguṇatayā nīyate yannetuṃ śakyam, alpaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:4580: tathā sati kiṃ nāma nāmṛtaṃ syāditi vyarthamamṛtapadam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4586: nanu sarvagatasyeśvarasya kasmādviśiṣeṇa cakṣureva sthānamupadiśyata iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4588: śrutiḥ-'tadyadyapyasminsārpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4599: sa eva puṇyaphalāni vāmāni nayati lokamiti vāmanīḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4602: taduktaṃ śrutyā-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti //13 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4610: tatkathamatyalpaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ paramātmanaḥ paramamahata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4613: sthānānyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakarāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvagatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4615: viśeṣatastu brahmaṇastāni tānyupāsanāsthānānīti tairasya yukto vyapadeśaḥ //14 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4619: evaṃ khalūpākhyāyate-upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacaryamuvāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:4624_1: śraddadhānāyāsmai dṛḍhabhaktaye sametya brahmavidyāsūcire-'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4628: kintu kaṃ ca khaṃ ca brahmetyetanna vijānāmi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4629: nahi viṣayendriyasaṃparkajaṃ sukhamanityaṃ lokasiddhaṃ khaṃ ca bhūtākāśamacetanaṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4630: athainamagnayaḥ pratyūcuḥ-'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4631: evaṃ saṃbhūyoktvā pratyekaṃ ca svaviṣayāṃ vidyāmūcuḥ-'pṛthivyagnirannamādityaḥ' ityādanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4633: eṣā somya te 'smidvidyā pratyekamuktā svaviṣayā vidyā,
GSP33vacbhamu:4634: ātmavidyā cāsmābhiḥ saṃbhūya pūrvamuktā prāṇo brahma kaṃ khaṃ brahmeti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4638: evaṃ vyavasthite 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kam' ityetadvyācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4645: laukikasya mukhasya sādhanapāracantryaṃ kṣayiṣṇutā cāmayastena saha vartata iti sāmayaṃ sukham /
GSP33vacbhamu:4649: sukhaśabdasamānādhikaraṇo hi khaṃśabdo bhūtākāśamarthaṃ parityajya brahmaṇi guṇogena vartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4650: tādṛśā ca khena sukhaṃ viśiṣyamāṇaṃ sāmayādvyāvṛttaṃ nirāmayaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4655: evaṃ khaṃpadasyāpi brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoḥ kaṅkhaṃpadayoste brahmaśirasī,
GSP33vacbhamu:4660: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi' ityācāryavākye 'pa tadevānuvartanīyamiti tu kuta ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4661: ācāryastu te gatiṃ vakteti ca gatimātrābhidhānamiti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:4662: yadyapyete bhinnavaktṛṇī vākye tathāpi pūrveṇa vaktnā ekavākyatāṃ gamite,
GSP33vacbhamu:4671: brahmavida iva te somya mukhaṃ prasannaṃ bhāti,
GSP33vacbhamu:4673: upakosalastu hrīṇo bhītaśca ko nu māmanuśiṣyāt bhagavan proṣite tvayītyāpātato 'pajñāya nirbadhyamāno yathāvadagnīnāmanuśāsanamavocat /
GSP33vacbhamu:4674: tadupakṣutya cācāryaḥ suciraṃ kliṣṭa upakosale samupajātadaryārdrahṛdayaḥ pratyuvāca,
GSP33vacbhamu:4675: somya kila tubhyamagnayo na brahma sākalyenāvocan,
GSP33vacbhamu:4677: tadanubhavamāhātmyāt 'yathā puṣpakarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvida pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:4681: yaduktamagnibhiḥ prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti tatparipūraṇāya 'eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:4682: etaduktaṃ bhavati-ācāryeṇa ye sukhaṃ brahmākṣisthānaṃ saṃyadvāmaṃ vāmanībhāmanītyevaṅguṇakaṃ prāṇasahitamupāsate te sarve 'pahatapāpmāno 'nyatkarma kurvantu mā vākārṣuḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4687: yeṣu māseṣūttarāṃ diśameti savitā te ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇaṃ taddevatāṃ pratipadyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:4694: sa tādṛśaḥ puruṣa etānsatyalokasthaṃ kāryaṃ brahma gamayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:4695: sa eṣa devapatho devairarcirādibhirnetṛbhirupalakṣita iti devapathaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4696: sa eva ca brahmaṇā gantavyenopalakṣita iti brahmapathaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4697: etena pathā pratipadyamānāḥ satyalokasthaṃ brahma imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ kiṃbhūtamāvartaṃ janmajarāmaraṇapaunaḥ punyamāvṛttistatkartāvarto mānavo lokastaṃ nāvartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:4698: tathāca smṛtiḥ-'brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare /
GSP33vacbhamu:4708: vijñānātmano hi na pradeśe upāsanānyatra dṛṣṭacarī,
GSP33vacbhamu:4718: pravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ cetanasya śarīriṇaḥ svaśarīrendriyādau vā śarīreṇa vā vāsyādau dṛṣṭaṃ nāśarīrasya brahmaṇo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4722: pradhānasya vā pṛthivyādyabhimānavatyā devatāyā vāṇimādyaiśvaryayogino yogino vā jīvātmano vāntaryāmitā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4725: anātmatvācca 'eṣa ta ātmā' iti śruteranupapatterna pradhānasyāntaryāmitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4730: tathāpi tasya pratiniyataniyamanāt 'yaḥ sarvaṃllokānantaro yamayati yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyantaro yamayati' iti śrutivirodhādanupapatteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4731: yogī tu yadyapi lokabhūtaviśatayā sarvāṃllokānsarvāṇi ca bhūtāni niyantumarhati tatra tatrānekavidhadehendriyādinirmāṇena 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati' ityādiśrutibhyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4732: tathāpi 'jagadvyāpāravarjaṃ prakaraṇāt' iti vakṣyamāṇena nyāyena vikāraviṣaye vidyāsiddhānāṃ vyāpārabhāvātso 'pi nāntaryāmī /
GSP33vacbhamu:4733: tasmātpāriśeṣyājjīva eva cetano dehendriyādimān dṛṣṭṛtvādisaṃpannaḥ svayamadṛśyādiḥ svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4736: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' iti cābhede 'pi kathañcidbhedopacārāt 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni' itivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:4737: 'yamātmā na veda' iti ca svātmani vṛttivirodhābhiprāyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4738: 'yasyātmā śarīram' ityādi ca sarvaṃ 'sve mahimni' itivadyojanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4739: yadi punarātmano 'pi niyantūranyo niyantā bhavet veditā vā tatastasyāpyanya ityanavasthā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4741: tadupārjitau hi dharmājharmau niyacchata ityanayā dvārā jīvo niyacchati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4747: ' śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣu tāvadatrabhavataḥ sarvajñasya sa4vaśakteḥ parameśvarasya jagadyonitvamavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4749: tathāca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tadavidyāśaktipariṇāmastasya śarīrendriyasthāne vartata iti yathāyathaṃ pṛthivyādidevatādikāryakaraṇaistāneva pṛthivyādidevatādīñchaknoti niyantum /
GSP33vacbhamu:4752: kintu yo jīvo niyantā lokasiddhaḥ sa paramātmaivopādhyavacchedakalpitabhedastathā vyākhyāyata ityasakṛdāveditaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:4754: tathāca 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' ityādyā api śrutaya upapannārthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4761: 'yaḥ sarvāṃllokān' 'yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni' ityatra ya ityekavacanamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4763: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' ityādau cābhede 'pi bhedopacārakleśo na bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4799: tathā vivartā api vartamānasarūpā eva na virūpāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4801: na jātu rajjvāṃ kuñjara iti viparyasyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4804: atyantavairūpyāt. tasmātpradhānameva jaḍaṃ jaḍasya jagato yoniriti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:4809: ato yaḥ pradhānātparaḥ paramātmā sa sarvavit /
GSP33vacbhamu:4815: tatkhalu jaḍamanirvācyamanirvācyasya jaḍasya prapañcasyopādānaṃ yujyate, sārūpyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:4826: iha tvavidyāśaktereva jagadyonitvasaṃbhave na dvārādvāribhāvo yayukta iti pradhānamevātra vākye jagadyonirucyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4827: atha yoniśabdo nimittakāraṇaparastathāpi brahmaiva nimittaṃ na tu jīvātmeti vinigamanāyāṃ na heturastīti saṃśayena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4829: yaḥ sarvajña iti śrutyā sarvajñasya sa ucyate //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:4836: yattu sārūpyābāvānna cidātmanaḥ pariṇāmaḥ prapañca iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4841: na khalu bāhyasārūpyanibandhana eva sarvo vibhrama iti niyamanimittamasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4850: na kevalaṃ liṅgādapi tu 'parā vidyā' iti samākhyānādapyetadeva pratipattavyamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:4855: avacchinno hi jīvātmā bogyebhyo viṣayebyo vyatirikta iti tajjñānena na sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:4865: ṛtuyajanenopādhinā ṛtvikśabdaḥ pravṛtta iti yajñopādhaya ṛtvijaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4895: saṃnidheśca prakaraṇaṃ balīya iti jāyamānaparityāgena viśvayonereva prakaraṇino rūpābhidhānamiti cet na,
GSP33vacbhamu:4897: na caitāvatā mūrdhādiśrutayaḥ prakaraṇavirodhātsvārthatyāgena sarvātmatāmātraparā iti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:4899: siddhe ca prakaraṇināsaṃbandhe jāyamānamadhyapātitvaṃ jāyamānagrahaṇe kāraṇamupanyastaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4900: tasmāddhiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān prāṇātmanā sarvabhūtāntaraḥ kāryo nirdiśyata iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:4908: ātmetyukte jīvātmani pratyayo mā bhūdata uktaṃ kiṃ brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:4909: te ca mīmāṃsamānā niścayamanadhigacchantaḥ kaikeyarājaṃ vaiśvanaravidyāvidamupaseduḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:4915: prāṇo vāyuḥ pṛthagvartmātmā pṛthak vartma yasya vāyoḥ sa pṛthagvartmā sa evātmā svabhāve yasya sa pṛthagvartmātmā /
GSP33vacbhamu:4916: saṃdeho dehasya madhyabhāgaḥ sa ākāśo bahulaḥ sarvagatatvāt /
