GSP33vacbhamu:5948: sa ca manuṣyāṇāmiha janmanīva devadīnāṃ prāci bhave vidhivadhīta āmnāya iha janmani smaryamāṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5949: ata eva svayaṃ pratibhāto vedaḥ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5958: mantrādipadasamanvayātpratīyamānor'thaḥ pramāṇāntarāvirodhe satyupeyaḥ na tu virodhe /
GSP33vacbhamu:5961: tathāca vigrahādyabhāvācchabdopahitārthor'thopahito vā śabdo devatetyacetanatvānna tasyāḥ kkacidapyadhikāra iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:5974: mā bhūdyāgādīnāmapi svargādisādhanatvamadṛṣṭamiti manuṣyaśararasya mātāpitṛsaṃyogajatvaniyamādapi pitroḥ saṃyoge kutaḥ saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:5975: saṃbhave vānagnito 'pi dhūmaḥ syāditi bādhadarśanamiti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:5976: hanta kiṃ śarīratvena hetunā devādiśarīramapi mātāpitṛsaṃyogajaṃ siṣādhayiṣasi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5981: bhūtavaśināṃ hi devādīnāṃ nānākāyacikīrṣāvaśādbhūtakriyotpattau bhūtānāṃ parasparasaṃyogena nānākāyamasutpādāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:5987: na cāsmadādivatteṣāṃ śarīritvena vyavahitāviprakṛṣṭādidarśanāsaṃbhavo 'numīyata iti vācyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:5990: tena saṃnihitānāmapi na kratudeśe darśanaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:5993: vaiśvadevaśāstrasya hi nividi 'kati devāḥ' ityupakramya nividaivottaraṃ dattaṃ śākalyāya yājñavalkyena- #
GSP33vacbhamu:5994: trayaśca trī ca śatā trayaśca trī ca sahasreti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:5996: etaduktaṃ bhavati-vaiśvadevasya nividi kati devāḥ śasyamānāḥ prasaṃkhyātā iti śākalyena pṛṣṭe yājñavalkyasyottaraṃ-'trayaśca trī ca śatā' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:5997: yāvatsaṃkhyākā vaiśvadevanividi saṃkhyātā devāsta etāvanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:5998: punaśca śākalyena 'katame te' iti saṃkhyeyeṣu pṛṣṭeṣu yājñavalkyasyottaram- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6000: aṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityā indraśca prajāpatiśceti trayastriṃśaddevāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6001: tatrāgniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca dyauśca candramāśca nakṣatrāṇi ceti vasavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6002: ete hi prāṇināṃ karmaphalāśrayeṇa kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpeṇa pariṇamanto jagadidaṃ sarvaṃ vāsayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6004: katame rudrā iti daśeme puruṣe prāṇāḥ buddhikarmendriyāṇi daśa,
GSP33vacbhamu:6008: te hi prāyaṇakāla utkrāmantaḥ puruṣaṃ rodayantīti rudrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6009: katama ādityā iti dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsarasyāvayavāḥ punaḥ punaḥ paruvartamānāḥ prāṇabhṛtāmāyūṃṣu ca karmaphalopabhogaṃ cādāpayantītyādityāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6016: yajñasādhanaṃ ca yajñarūpaṃ ca paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6017: eta eva trayastriṃśaddevāḥ ṣaṇṇāmagniṣṭathivīvāṭvantarikṣādityadivāṃ mahimāno na tato bhidyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:6019: te tu ṣaḍagniṃ pṛthivīṃ caikūkṛtyāntarikṣaṃ vāyuṃ caikīkṛtya divaṃ cādityaṃ caikīkṛtya trayo lokāstraya eva devā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6020: eta eva ca trayo 'nnaprāṇayorantarbhavanto 'nnaprāṇau dvau devau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6025: yadasminsati sarvamidamadhyardhaṃ vṛddhiṃ prāpnoti tenādhyardha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6028: sarvadevātmatvena bṛhattvādbrahma tadeva tyadityācakṣate parokṣābhidhāyakena śabdena /
GSP33vacbhamu:6035: na khalu bahuṣu śrāddheṣveko brāhmaṇo yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6038: yathaikaṃ brāhmaṇamuddiśya yugapannamaskāraḥ kriyate bahubhistathā svasthānasthitāmekāṃ devatāmuddiśya bahubhiryajamānairnānādeśāvasthitairyugapaddhavistyajyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6044: gotvādivatpūrvāvamarśābhāvādupādherapyekasyāpratīteḥ pācakādivadākāśaṣādiśabdavadvyaktivacanā eva vasvādiśabdāḥ tasyāśca nityatvāttayā saha saṃbandho nityo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:6045: vigrahādiyoge tu sāvayavatvena vasvādīnāmanityatvāttataḥ pūrvaṃ vasvādiśabdo na svārthena saṃbaddha āsīn,
GSP33vacbhamu:6047: tataścotpanne vasvādau vasvādiśabdasaṃbandhaḥ prādurbhavandevadattādiśabdasaṃbandhavatpuruṣabuddhiprabhava iti tatpūrvako vākyārthapratyayo 'pi puruṣabuddhyadhīnaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6048: puruṣabuddhiśca mānāntarādhīnajanmeti mānāntarāpekṣayā prāmāṇyaṃ vedasya vyāhanyeteti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6052: vasutvādijātivācakācchabdāttajjātīyāṃ vyaktiṃ cikīrṣitāṃ buddhivāsikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6054: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi na śabda upādānakāmaṃ vasvādīnāṃ brahmopādānatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:6065: etaduktaṃ bhavati-svayaṃbhuvo vedakartṛtve 'pi na kālidāsādivatsvatantratvamapi tu pūrvasṛṣṭyanusāreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6075: tatra na tāvadvasvādīnāṃ vakārādayo varṇā vācakāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6078: api caite pratyekaṃ vā vākyārthamabhidadhīran militā vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6083: teṣāmekavaktṛprayujyamānānaṃ rūpato vyaktito vā pratikṣaṇamapavargiṇāṃ mithaḥ sāhityasaṃbhavābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6085: naca svarūpasāhityābhāve 'pi varṇānāmāgneyādīnāmiva saṃskāradvārakamasti sāhityamiti sāṃprataṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6102: nahi yaiva bahnerdahanaśaktiḥ saiva tasya prakāśanaśaktiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6103: nāpi dahanaśakteḥ prakāśanaśaktiḥ.apica vyutkrameṇoccaritebhyo varṇebhyaḥ saivāsti smṛtibījaṃ vāsanetyarthapratyayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6115: na sphoṭa iti tu na mṛṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6120: na cāyamasīti bādhake ekapadavākyānubhavaḥ śakyo mithyetivaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6125: tathā sati dhavasvadirapalāśā iti na jātu syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6130_1: sa sphoṭa iti taṃ ca dhvanayaḥ pratyekaṃ vyañjayanto 'pi na drāgitveva viśadayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6132_1: carame cetasi cakāsti viśadaṃ padavākyatattvamiti prāganutpannāyāstadanantaramarthadhiya
GSP33vacbhamu:6141: arthadhiyastvapratyakṣāyā mānāntarajanmano vyakta evopajano na vā syānna punarasphuṭa iti na samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6142: tasmānnityaḥ sphoṭa eva vācako na varṇā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6144: varṇā eva tu na śabda iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:6159: tatra kkacidvyabhicāradarśanena tadutprekṣāyāmucyate vṛddheḥ svataḥprāmāṇ.vādibhiḥ-'utprekṣeta hi yo mohādajñātamapi bādhanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6163: na cedaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ gatvādijātiviṣayaṃ na gādivyaktiviṣayaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6164: tāsāṃ pratinaraṃ bhedopalambhādata eva śabdabedopalambhādvāktṛbheda unnīyate 'somaśarmādhīte na viṣṇuśarmā' iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6166: yathā kālakṣīṃ ca svastimatīṃ cekṣamāṇasya vyaktibhedaprathāyāṃ satyāmeva tadanugatamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ prathate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6167: tathā kiṃ gakārādiṣu bhedena prathamāneṣveva gatvamekaṃ tadanugataṃ cakāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6168_1: mahadiva dīrghamiva vāmanamiva tathāgavyaktirājānata ekāpi vyañjakabhedāttadharmānupātinīva
GSP33vacbhamu:6169: tatra havyaktibhedamaṅgīkṛtyāpi yo gatvasyaikasya paropadhānabhedakalpanāprayāsaḥ sa varaṃ gavyaktāvevāstu kimantargaḍunā gatvenābhyupetena /
GSP33vacbhamu:6173: tathā sati daśa gakarānudacārayaccaitra iti hi pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6175: na caiṣa jātyabhiprāyo 'bhyāso yathā śatakṛtvastittirīnupāyuṅkta devadatta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6176: atra hi sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi gakārādivyaktau lokasyoccāraṇābhyāsapratyayasya vinirvṛttiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6189: mā bhūvan ghrāṇarasanaśrotrāṇāṃ gandharasaśabdagocarāṇāṃ tadvantaḥ pṛthivyudakākāśā gocarāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6190: evaṃ ca mā nāma bhūdvāyugocaraṃ śrotram,
GSP33vacbhamu:6193_0: naca śabdasya pratyabijñānāvadhṛtaikatvasya svarūpata udāttādayo dharmāḥ parasparavirodhino
GSP33vacbhamu:6195: na tu bhāviko nānādharmasaṃsarga iti sthite 'bhyupetya parihāramāha bhāṣyakāraḥ- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6203: na cāyamanirdhāritaviśeṣavarṇatvasāmānyamātrapratyayo na tu varṇātiriktadabhivyañjakadhvanipratyaya iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6208_0: śabdavñjakaḥ śrāvaṇo 'bhyupeyaḥ ubhayathāpi cākṣu vyañjaneṣu ca tattaddhvanibhedopadhānenānunāsikatvādayo
GSP33vacbhamu:6208_1: 'vagamyamānāstaddharmā eva śabde pratīyante na tu svataḥ śabdasya dharmāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6209: tathā ca yeṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmāḥ parasparaviruddhā bhāsante bhavatu teṣāṃ dhvanīnāmanityatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6211: yeṣu tu varṇeṣu pratyabhijñānaṃ na teṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmā iti nānityāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6216: yadyeṣa parasyāgraho dharmiṇyagṛhyamāṇe taddharmā na śakyā grahītumiti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6219: tadanena prabandhena kṣaṇikatvena varṇānāmaśakyasaṃgatigrahatayā yadavācakatvamāpāditaṃ varṇānāṃ tadapākṛtam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6235: evaṃ ca kalpitā evāsya bhāgā varṇā iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:6238: hantāsyāṃ nānā varṇāḥ prathanta iti nānātvāvabhāsa ekaikatvaṃ kasmānna bādhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6240: no khalu senāvanabuddhī gajapadātituragādīnāṃ campakāśokakiṃśukādīnāṃ ca bhedamapabādhamāne udīyete,
GSP33vacbhamu:6249: na caikasmṛtisamārohiṇāṃ kramākramaviparītakramaprayuktānāmabhedo varṇānāmiti yathākathañcitprayuktebhya etebhyor'thapratyayaprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6250: uktaṃ hi-'yāvanto yādṛśā ye ca padārthapratipādane /
GSP33vacbhamu:6253: nanu paṅktibuddhāvekasyāmakramāyāmapi vāstavī śālādīnāmasti paṅgiriti tathaiva prathā yuktā,
GSP33vacbhamu:6254: naca tatheha varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ cāsti vāstavaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6259: tathāhi-jārārājeti padayoḥ prathayantyoḥ smṛtidhiyostattve 'pi varṇānāṃ kramabhedātpadabhedaḥ sphuṭataraṃ cakāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6268: santvanityā eva varṇāstathāpi gatvādyavacchedenaiva saṃgatigraho 'vanādiśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatītyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6273: nanu prācyāmeva mīmāṃsāyāṃ vedasya nityatvaṃ siddhaṃ tatkiṃ punaḥ sādhyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6274: svatantrasya karturasmaraṇādeva hi sthite vedasya nityatva iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:6287: niranvayasya tu jagataḥ pravilaye 'tyantāsataścāpūrvasyotpāde 'bhidhānābhidheyāvatyantamucchinnāviti kimāśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6290: antaḥkaraṇādyupādhikalpitā hi te tadvicchede na sthātumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6293: brahmaṇaśca sṛṣṭyādāvantaḥkaraṇāni tadavacchinnāścha jīvāḥ prādurbhavanto napūrvakarmāvidyāvāsanāvanto bhavitumarhanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6299_0: yadyapi mahāpralayasamaye nāntaḥkaraṇādayaḥ samudācaradvṛttayaḥ santi tathāpi svakāraṇe
GSP33vacbhamu:6299_1: 'nirvācyāyāmavidyāyāṃ līnāḥ sūkṣmeṇa śaktirūpeṇa karmavikṣepakāvidyāvāsanābhiḥ mahāvatiṣṭhanta eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:6303: te cāvadhaiṃ prāpya parameśvarecchāpracoditā yathā kūrmadehe nilīnānyaṅgāni tato niḥsaranti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6304: yathā vā varṣāpāye prāptamṛdbhāvāni maṇḍūkaśarīrāṇi tadvāsanāvāsitatayā ghanaghanāghanāsārāvasekasuhitāni punarmaṇḍūkadehabhāvamanubhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6308: naca sargapralayapravāhasyānāditāmantareṇaitadupapadyata iti sargapralayābyupagaṃme 'pi saṃsārānāditā na virudhyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6314: tathāpi mahāpralayāntarite kutaḥ smaraṇaṃ vedānāmityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6317: tathāpi karmavikṣepasaṃskārasahitalayalakṣaṇā vidyāvaśeṣatāsāmyena svāpapralayāvasthayārabheda iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6321: prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣayośca vāsanocchedakāraṇayorabhāvena satyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ smaraṇopapatteḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhavedavyahārānucchedo yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6323: prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣau ca tatra saṃskāramātrocchedahetū sta iti kutaḥ suṣuptavatpūrvaprabodhavyavahāravaduttaprabodhavyavahāra iti codayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6333: tatra kaiva kathā parameśvarānugraheṇa dharmajñānavairāgyaiśvaryātiśayasaṃpannānāṃ hiraṇyagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mahādhiyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:6334: yathāvā ā ca manuṣyebhya ā ca kṛmibhyo jñānādīnāmanubhūyate nikarṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6335: evamā manuṣyebhya eva ā ca bhagavato hiraṇyagarbhajjñānādīnāṃ prakarṣe 'pi saṃbhāvte /
GSP33vacbhamu:6357: tathā sati vastusāmarthyaniyamābhāvātsarvaṃ sarvasmādbhavediti pipāsurapi dahanamāhṛtya pipāsāmupaśamayet,
GSP33vacbhamu:6360: evaṃ ya eva vedā asminkalpe ta eva kalpāntare,
GSP33vacbhamu:6361: ta eva caiṣāmarthā ta eva ca varṇāśramāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6374: kiṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyā svaviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ kiṃvā kāsucideva keṣāñcit /
GSP33vacbhamu:6379: asau vā ādityo devamadhvityatra hi manuṣyā ādityaṃ madhvadhyāsenopāsīran# /
GSP33vacbhamu:6380: upāsyopāsakabhāvo hi bhedādhiṣṭhāno na svātmanyādityasya devatāyāḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6385: ayamarthaḥ-'asau vā ādityo devamadhu' iti devānāṃ modahetutvānmadhviva madhu /
GSP33vacbhamu:6391_0: yathā hi bhramarāḥ puṣpebhya āhṛtya makarandaṃ svasthānamānayantyevamṛṅmantrabhramarāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:6393_1: āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ yajurvedamantrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6395_1: āhṛtyau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ sāmamantrastotrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6397: athāsyādityamadhuna udīcibhiratikṛṣṇābhī raśmināḍībhirathavedavihitebhyaḥ karmakusumebhya āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhavamāpannamatharvāṅgirasamantrabhramarāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6399: aśvamedhe vācaḥ stome ca pāriplavaṃ śaṃsanti iti śravaṇāditihāsapurāṇamantrāṇāmapyasti prayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6401: athāsya yā ādityamadhuna ūrdhvā raśmināḍyo gopyāstābhirupāsanabhramarāḥ praṇavakusumādāhṛtyādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6403: tā etā ādityavyapāśrayāḥ pañca rohitādayo raśmināḍya ṛgādisaṃbaddhāḥ krameṇopadiśyeti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6404: etadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvopalabhya yathāsvaṃ samastaijha karaṇairyaśastejahandriyasākalyavīryānnādyānyamṛtaṃ tadupalabhyāditye tṛpyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6405: tena khalvamṛtena devānāṃ vasvādīnāṃ modanaṃ vidadhadādityo madhu /
GSP33vacbhamu:6410: ākāśasya hi sarvagatatvaṃ rūpādihīnatve ca brahmaṇā sārūpyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6411: tasya caitasyākāśasya brahmaṇaścatvāraḥ pādā agnyādayaḥ 'agniḥ pādaḥ' ityādinā darśitāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6412: yathā hi goḥ pādā na gavā viyujyatanta,
GSP33vacbhamu:6414: tadevamākāśasya catuṣpado brahmadṛṣṭiṃ vidhāya svarūpeṇa vāyuṃ saṃvargaguṇakamupāsyaṃ vidhātuṃ mahīkaroti-vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6419: yadyucyeta nāviśeṣaṇa sarveṣāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyāsvadhikāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6433: indro vṛtrāṇi jighrate' iti vigrahavattvaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādā abhivadanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6434: tathā havirbhojanaṃ devatāyā darśayanti 'addhīndra piba caprasthitasya' ityādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6435: yatheśanam-'indro diva indra īśe pṛthivyā indro apāmindra itparvatānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:6436: indro vṛdhāmindra inmedhirāṇāmindraḥ kṣeme yoge havya indraḥ' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6438: tathā varivasitāraṃ prati devatāyāḥ prasādaṃ prasannāyāśca phaladānāṃ darśayati-'āhutibhireva devān hutādaḥ prīṇāti tasmai prītā iṣamūrjaṃ ca yacchanti' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6442: laukikā api devatāvigrahādipañcakaṃ smaranti coparacaranti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:6448: tathāsyāḥ prasādaṃ ca prasannāyāśca phaladānamāhuḥ-prasanno 'sya paśupatiḥ putro 'sya jātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6463: vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāpadyamānā arthavādā vidhiviṣayaprāśastyalakṣaṇāparā na svārthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6464: 'yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ' iti hi śābdanyāyavidaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6473: na caikaṃ vākyamubhayaparaṃ bhavatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6476_1: kathamupayujyantāṃ teṣa teṣu karmasvityapekṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭe prakāre saṃbhavati nādṛṣṭakalpanocitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6479: autsargikī cārthaparatā padānamityapekṣitaprayogasamavetārthasmaraṇatātparyāṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ nānadhigate vigrahādāvapi tātparyaṃ yujyata iti na tebhyo 'pi tatsiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6498: nahi śvitrinirṇejanaparaṃ śveto dhāvatīti vākyamitaḥ sārameyagamanaṃ gamayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6503: nahyudakāharaṇārthinā ghaṭadarśanāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣurghaṭapaṭau vā paṭaṃ vā kevalaṃ nopalabhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6506: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-loke viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanāya padāni prayuktāni tadantareṇa na svārthamātrasmāraṇe paryavasyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6507: nahi svārthasmāraṇamātrāya loke padānāṃ prayogo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6509: na caitānyasmāritasvārthāni sākṣādvākyārthaṃ pratyāyayitumīśate iti svārthasmāraṇaṃ vākyārthamitathe 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ kalpitaḥ padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:6510: naca yadarthaṃ yattattena vinā paryavasyatīti na svārthamātrabhidhāne paryavasānaṃ padānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:6519_0: yatra tu vākyasyaikasya vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhastatra lokānusārato bhūtārthavyutpattau
GSP33vacbhamu:6520: yathā 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa evainaṃ bhūtiṃ gamayati vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta' ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:6521: iha hi yadi na svādhyāyādhyāyanavidhiḥ svādhyāyaśabdavācyaṃ vedarāśiṃ puruṣārthatāmaneṣyattato bhūtārthamātraparyavasitā nārthavādā vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāgamiṣyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6522: tasmāt svādhyāyavidhivaśātkaimarthyākāṅkṣāyāṃ vṛttāntadigocarāḥ santastatpratyāyanadvāreṇa vidheyaprāśastyaṃ lakṣayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6526: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārthasaṃbaddhabheva tīraṃ lakṣayati na tu samudratīraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6530: ata eva yatra pramāṇāntaraviruddhārtā arthavādā dṛśyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:6535: tasmādyatra sor'thorthavādānāṃ pramāṇāntaraviruddhastatra guṇavādena prāśastyalakṣaṇeti lakṣitalakṣaṇā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6536: yatra tu pramāṇāntarasaṃvādastatra pramāṇāntarādivārthavādādapi sor'thaḥ prasidhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:6539: pramātā hyavyutpannaḥ prathamaṃ yathā pratyakṣādibhyor'thamavagacchati na tathāmnāyataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6549: yathaikasminvākye padānāṃ padārthā dvārato vākyārthaśca tātparyato viṣayaḥ evaṃ vākyadvayaikavākyatāyāmapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:6554: yathā viṣaṃ bhakṣayeti vākyaṃ mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti vākyāntarārthaparaṃ sat /
GSP33vacbhamu:6555: yatra tu tātparyaṃ tatra mānāntaravirodhe pauruṣeyapramāṇameva bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6560: tatra dvārato 'pi viṣayaḥ pratīyamāno na śakyastyaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6563: tathā satyanadhigataṃ vigrahādi pratipādayam vākyaṃ bhidyeteti cet addhā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6568: naca yasya yatra na tātparyaṃ tasya tatrāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6570: sati viśiṣṭaparaṃ vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇeṣvapramāṇamiti viśiṣṭaparamapi na syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:6574: tasmādviśiṣṭapratyayaparebhyo 'pi viśeṣaṇāni pratīyamānāni tasyaiva vākyasya viṣayatvenānicchatāpyabhyupeyāni yathā,
GSP33vacbhamu:6575: tadyānyaparebhyo 'pyarthavādavākyebhyo devatāvigrahādayaḥ pratīyamānā asati pramāṇāntaravirodhe na yuktāstyaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6584: sa tu padārthāntaraviśiṣṭaḥ padārtha ekaḥ kkacid dvārabhūtaḥ kkacid dvārītyetāvān viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6585: nanvevaṃ sati odanaṃ bhuktvā grāmaṃ gacchatītyatrāpi vākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6590: bhuktveti hi samānakartṛkatā pūrvakālatā ca pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6592: tasmādyāvati padābhyāṃ viśiṣṭārthapratyayaparyavasānāt pañcaṣaṭpadavati vākye ekasminnānātvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6596: tasmādvidhivākyādarthavādavākyamanyaditi vākyayoreva svasvavākyārthapratyayāvasitavyāpārayoḥ paścātkutaścidapekṣāyāṃ parasparānvaya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:6599: devatāmuddiśya haviravamṛśya ca tadviṣayasvatvatyāga iti yāgaśarīram /
GSP33vacbhamu:6601: naca rūparahitā cetasi śakyata ālekhitumiti yāgavidhinaiva tadrūpāpekṣimā yādṛśamanyaparebhyo 'pi mantrārthavādebhyastadrūpamavagataṃ tadabhyupeyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6604: yathā hi 'vrātyo vrātyastomena yajate' iti vrātyasvarūpāpekṣāyāṃ yasya pitā pitāmaho vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti vidhināpekṣitaṃ sadarthavādato 'vagamyamānaṃ vidhipramāṇakam,
GSP33vacbhamu:6607: devatāyāḥ samāropeṇāpi ca rūpajñānamupapadyata iti samāropitameva rūpaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādairucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6610: tasya tu rūpasyāsati bādhake 'nubhāvarūḍhaṃ tathābhāvaṃ parityajyānyathātvamananubhūyamānamasāṃprataṃ kalpiyatum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6619: api tu itihāsapurāṇalokasmaraṇebhyo mantrārthavādamūlebhyo vā pratyakṣādamūlebhyo vetyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6623: tadevaṃ mantrārthavādādisiddhe devatāvigrahādau gurvādipūjāvaddevatāpūjātmako yāmo devatāprasādādidvāreṇa saphalo 'vakalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6625: na caivaṃ yajñakarmaṇo devatāṃ prati guṇabhāvāddevatātaḥ phalotpāde yāgabhāvanāyāḥ śrutaṃ phalavattvaṃ yāgasya ca tāṃ prati tatphalāṃśaṃ vā prati śrutaṃ karaṇatvaṃ hātavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6629: tasmātkarmaṇo 'pūrvāvāntaravyāpārasya vā devatāprasādāvāntaravyāpārasya vā phalavattvāt pradhānatvamubhayasminnapi pakṣe samānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6630: natu devatāyā vigrahādimatyāḥ prādhānyamiti na dharmamīmāṃsāyāḥ sūtram-'api vā śabdapūrvatvādyajñakarma pradhānaṃ guṇatve devatāśrutiḥ' iti virudhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6639: nirmṛṣṭanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅge śāśvatika ānande kasya nāma cetanasyārthitā nāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:6642: dvividhaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ nijaṃ cāgantukaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:6650: naca tathā brahmavidyāyāmalaukikamasti sādhanaṃ yacchūdrasya na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6659: nahi 'svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ' iti kañcit kratuṃ prakṛtya paṭhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6663: nahi yathā juhvādi avyabhicaritakratusaṃbaddhamevaṃ svādhyāya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6672: na cādhyayanaṃ vā svādhyāyo vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā prāgvidheḥ puruṣecchādhīnapravṛttiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6677: tathā cādhyayanavidheraniyāmakatvācchūdrasyādhyayanena vā pustakādipāṭhena vā sāmarthyamastīti so 'pi brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:6680: 'aha hāretvā śūdra' iti śūdraṃ saṃbodhya tasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6683: tasmādyathānadhīyānasyeṣṭau niṣādasthapateradhikāro vacanasāmarthyādevaṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śūdrasyādhikāro bhaviṣyatīti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6690: suvarṇaṃ bhāryamitivadārthavādikaṃ vā phalaṃ kalpayitvā viniyogabhaṅgena svādhyāyenādhīyītetyevamarthaḥ kalpatāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6692: na dṛṣṭadvāreṇa paramparayāpyanyato 'pekṣitapratilambhe ca yathāśrutiviniyogopapattau ca saṃbhavantyāṃ śrutiviniyogabhaṅgenādhyayanādevāśrutādṛṣṭaphalakalpanocitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6696: natu suvarṇadhāraṇādau dṛṣṭadvāreṇa kiñcit paramparayāpyastyapekṣitaṃ puruṣasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:6698_1: iti sthāpitaṃ tadā yasyādhyayanaṃ tasyaiva karmabrahmāvabodho 'bhyudayaniḥśreyasaprayojano nānyasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:6700_1: śūdrāṇāṃ na phalāya kalpata iti śāstrīyasāmarthyābhāvānna śūdro brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyata iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:6716: sa cānyataḥ siddhamarthamavadyotayati na tu prāpayatītyadhvaramīmāṃsakāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6717: asmākaṃ tu anyaparādapi vākyādasati bādhake pramāṇāntareṇārtho 'vagamyamāno vidhinā cāpekṣitaḥ svīkriyata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:6721: vidhyuddeśagatatve tvayaṃ nyāyo 'podyate vacanabalanniṣādasthapativanna tveṣa vidhyuddeśagata ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6723: apica kimarthavādabalādvidyāmātre 'dhikāraḥ śūdrasya kalpate saṃvargavidyāyāṃ vā na tāvadvidyāmātra ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6726: astu tarhi saṃvargavidyāyāmeva śūdrasyādhikāra ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6732: evaṃ kilātropākhyāyate-jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇo bahudāyī śraddhādeyo bahupākyaḥ priyātithirbabhūva /
GSP33vacbhamu:6733: sa ca teṣu teṣu grāmanagaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vividhānāmannapānānāṃ pūrṇānatithibhya āvasathān karayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6735: athāsya rājño dānaśauṇḍasya guṇagārimasotaṣitāḥ santo devarṣayo haṃsarūpamāsthāya tadanugrahāya tasya nidāghasamaye doṣā harmyatalasthasyopari mālāmābadhyājagmuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6736: teṣāmagresaraṃ haṃsaṃ saṃbodhya pṛṣṭhataḥ patannekatamo haṃsaḥ sādbhutamabhyuvāda /
GSP33vacbhamu:6737: bho bho bhallākṣa jānaśruterasya pautrāyaṇasya dyuniśaṃ dyuloka āyataṃ jyotistinmā prasāṅkṣīrmaitattvā dhākṣīditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:6743: yasmādayaṃ varākastasmātkamenaṃ kiṃbhūtametaṃ santaṃ prāṇimātraṃ jānaśrutimāttha /
GSP33vacbhamu:6745_0: tasya hi bhagavataḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtasya raikkasya brahmavido dharme trailokyodaravartiprāṇabhṛnmātradharmo
GSP33vacbhamu:6746_1: jānaśrutiḥ kitava ivākṣaparājitaḥ paunaḥpunyena niḥśvasannudvelaṃ kathaṃ kathamapi
GSP33vacbhamu:6747: tato niśāvasānapiśunamanibhṛtavandāruvṛndaprārabdhastutisahasrasaṃvalitaṃ maṅgalatūryanirdhoṣamākarṇya talpatalastha eva rājā ekapade yantānaramāhūyādideśa,
GSP33vacbhamu:6749: raikkāhvayaṃ brahmavidamekaratiṃ sayugvānamativivikteṣu teṣu teṣu vepinanaganikuñjanadīpulinādipradeśeṣvanviṣya prayatnato 'smabhyamācakṣveti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6750: sa ca tatra tatrānviṣyan kkacidativivekte dese śakaṭasyādhastāt pāmānaṃ kaṇḍūyamānaṃ brāhmaṇāyanamadrākṣīt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6751: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā raikko 'yaṃ bhaviteti pratibhāvānupaviśya savinayamaprākṣīt,
GSP33vacbhamu:6754: tasya ca raikkabhāvānumatiṃ ca taistairiṅgitairgārhasthyecchāṃ dhanāyāṃ connīya yantā rājñe nivedayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6755: rājā tu taṃ niśamya gavāṃ ṣaṭśatāni niṣkaṃ ca hāraṃ cāśvatarīrathaṃ cādāya satvaraṃ raikkaṃ praticakrame /
GSP33vacbhamu:6757: hai raikka, gavāṃ ṣaṭśatānīmāni niṣkaśca hāra ścāyamaśvatarīrathaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6760: tamevamuktavantaṃ prati sāṭopaṃ ca saspṛhaṃ covāca raikkaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6764: hāreṇa yuktā itvā gantrī ratho hāretvā sa gobhiḥ saha tavaivāstu,
GSP33vacbhamu:6765: kimetanmātreṇa mama dhanenākalpavartino gārhasthyasya nirvāhānupayogineti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6766: āharetveti tu pāṭhonarthakatayā ca gobhiḥ sahetyatra pratisaṃbandhyanupādānena cācāryairdūṣitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6767: tadasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ śakyaḥ śūdraśabdena jānaśrutī rājanyo 'pyavayavavyutpattyā vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:6768: sa hi raikkaḥ parokṣajñatāṃ cikhyāpayiṣurātmano jānaśruteḥ śūdreti śucaṃ sūcayāmāsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6769: kathaṃ punaḥ śūdraśabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6777: tasmāttadādravaṇāditi tacchabdena śugvā jānaśrutirvā raikko vā parāmṛśyata ityuktam //34 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6781: itaśca na jātiśūdro jānaśrutiḥ yatkāraṇaṃ#prakaraṇanirūpeṇa kriyamāṇe kṣatriyatvamasya jānaśruteravagamyate caijñarathena liṅgāditi vyācakṣāṇaḥ prakaraṇaṃ nirūpayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:6783: caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā niścitakṣātriyatvena samānāyāṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ samabhivyāhārālliṅgātsaṃdigdhakṣatriyabāvo jānaśrutiḥ kṣatriyo niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6784: 'atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyamabhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe' iti prasiddhayājakatvena kāpeyenābhiprayāriṇo yogaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6792: etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayanniti#chandogānāṃ dvirātre śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6794: eṣa cābhipratāri citrarathādanyaḥ sanneva kāpeyānāṃ rājyo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6795: yadi caitrarathiḥ syāt samānānvayānāṃ hi prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6800: kṣattṛpreṣaṇe cārthasaṃbhave ca tādṛśasya vadānyapraṣṭhasyaiśvaryaṃ prāyeṇa kṣatriyasya dṛṣṭaṃ yudhiṣṭhirādivaditi //35 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6804: na kevalamupanītādhyayanavidhiparāmarśena na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ kintu teṣu teṣu vidyopadeśeṣūpanayanasaṃskāraparāmarśāt śūdrasya tadabhāvābhidhānādbrahmavidyāyāmanadhikāra iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6809: tacca dvijātīnāmiti dvijātaya eva niṣiddhopanayanā adhikriyante na śūdra iti //36 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6813: satyakāmo ha vai jābālaḥ pramītapitṛkaḥ svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāṃ prapaccha,
GSP33vacbhamu:6822: sa hovāc, nāvijñātagotra upanīyata iti kiṅgotro 'sīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6823: athovāca satyakāmo nāhaṃ veda svaṃ gotraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:6828: tenāsminna śūdratvasaṃbhāvanāstīti tvāṃ dvijātijanmānamupaneṣya ityupanetamanuśāsituṃ ca jābālaṃ gautamaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6840: prāṇavajraśrutihalādvākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca bhaṅktvā vāyuḥ pañcavṛttirādhyātmiko bāhyaścātra pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6844: vāyureva hi vāhyo dhūmajyotiḥsalilasaṃvalitaḥ parjanyabhāvena pariṇato vidyutstanayitnuvṛṣṭyaśanibhāvena vivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6845: yadyapi ca sarvaṃ jagaditi savāyukaṃ pratīyate tathāpi sarvaśabda āpekṣiko 'pi na svābhidheyaṃ jahāti kintu saṃkucadvṛttirbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6849: amṛtaśabdo 'pi maraṇābhāvavacano na sārvakālikaṃ tadabhāvaṃ brūte,
GSP33vacbhamu:6857: brahmaṇonahi bibhdetajjagatkṛtnnaṃ svavyāpāre niyamena pravartate na tu maryādāmativartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6866: yatkhalu pṛṣṭaṃ tadeva pradhānaṃ prativaktavyamiti tasya prakaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6870: 'apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati' iti śrutyā hyapamṛtyorvijaya ukto natu paramamṛtyuvijaya ityāpe..kitvaṃ (?)
GSP33vacbhamu:6872: na kevalamapaśrutyā tadāpekṣikamapi tu paramātmānamabhidhāya 'ato 'nyadārtam' iti vāṭvāderārtatvābhidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6885: ādityaścārcirādyapekṣayā paraṃ jyotirbhavatīti tadupasaṃpadya tasya samīpe bhūtvā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:6887: brahmajyotiḥpakṣe tu brahma bhūtvā kā parā svarūpaniṣpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6889: sā hi brahmabhūyātprācīnā na tu parācīnā /
GSP33vacbhamu:6891: tasmāttisṛbhiḥ śrutibhiḥ prakaraṇabādhanātteja evātra jyotiriti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6902: natu śrutyanurodhamātreṇa prakaraṇādapakraṣṭavyā iti hi lokasthitiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6903: anyathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisādhānopasaṃhāre ca tadantaḥ pātino 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ' ityādayo vidhiśrutyanurodhena pṛthagvidhayaḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:6904_0: tatkimidānīṃ 'tisra eva sāhnasyopasadaḥ kāryā dvādaśāhīnasya' iti prakaraṇānurodhātsāmudāyaprasiddhibalalabdhamahargāṇābhidhānaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:6905: sa hi kṛtsnavidhānānna kutaścidapi hīyate kratorityahīnaḥ śakyo vaktum /

GSP33vacbhamu:6911_0: tenānapakṛṣṭenaiva dvādaśāhīnasyetivākyena sāhnasya tisra usapadaḥ kāryā iti vidhiṃ

GSP33vacbhamu:6912: tasmādahīnaśrutyā prakaraṇabādhe 'pi na dvādaśāhīnasyeti vākyasya prakaraṇādapakarṣa /
GSP33vacbhamu:6915: iha tvapakṛṣṭasyārcirādimārgopadeśe phalasyopāyamārgapratipādake 'tiviśade 'eṣa saṃprasādaḥ' iti vākyasyāviśadaikadeśamātrapratipādakasya niṣprayojanatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:6916: naca dvadaśāhīnasyetivadyathoktātmadhyānasādhanānuṣṭhānaṃ stotumeṣa saṃprasāda iti vacamarcirādimārgamanuvadatīti yuktam,
GSP33vacbhamu:6923: iha tu svārthasaṃsargatātparye noktadoṣaprasaṅga iti paurvāparyālocanayā prakaraṇānurodhādrūḍhimapi pūrvakālatāmapi parityajya prakaraṇānuguṇyena jyotiḥ paraṃ brahma pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6927: naca kramamuktyabhiprāyaṃ svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vacanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6929: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasmāt prāṇā utkrāmanti atraiva samavanīyante' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:6931: arcirādimārgasya hi kāryabrahmalokaprāpakatvaṃ na tu brahmabhūyahetubhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6934: tasmānna jyotirādityamupasaṃpadya saṃprasādasya jīvasya svena rūpeṇa pāramārthikena brahmaṇābhiniṣpattirāñjasīti śruteratrāpi kleśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6935: apica paraṃ jyotiḥ sa uttamapuruṣa itihaivopariṣṭādviśeṣaṇāttejaso vyāvartya puruṣaviṣayatvenāvasthāpanājjyotiḥpadasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:6936: parameva brahma jyotiḥ na tu teja iti siddham //40 //
GSP33vacbhamu:6942: nāmarūpe antarā brahmeti ca nākāśasya nāmarūpayornirvahiturantarālatvamāha,
GSP33vacbhamu:6952: bhūtākāśaṃ ca vikāratvena nāmarūpāntaḥpāti sat kathamātmānamudvahet /
GSP33vacbhamu:6953: nahi suśikṣito 'pi vijñānī svena skandhenātmānaṃ voḍhumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6954: naca nāmarūpaśrutiraviśeṣataḥ pravṛttā bhūtākāśavarjaṃ nāmarūpāntare saṃkocayituṃ sati saṃbhave yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6955_0: naca nirvāhakatvaṃ niraṅkuśamavagataṃ brahmaliṅgaṃ kathañcitkleśena paratantre netumucitam
GSP33vacbhamu:6955_1: 'anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi' iti ca sraṣṭṛtvamatisphuṭaṃ brahmaliṅgamatra pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6956: brahmarūpatayā ca jīvasya vyākartṛtve brahmaṇa eva vyākartṛtvamuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6958: tathā ca te nāmarūpe yadantaretyayamarthāntaravyapadeśa upapanno bhavatyākāśasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:6967: tameva ca 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu' ityādiśrutisaṃdarbha ādimadhyāvasāneṣvāmṛśatīti tadanuvādaparo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:6970: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kaścidatra nityaśuddhabuddhamuktatvabhāvaḥ pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6971: yattu suṣuptyutkrāntyoḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta iti bhedaṃ manyase,
GSP33vacbhamu:6973: tena suṣuptyutkrāntyavasthāyāṃ viśeṣaviṣayābhāvātsaṃpiṇḍitaprajñeva prājñenātmanā svabhāvenā pariṣvakto na kiñcidvedetyabhede 'pi bhedavadupacāreṇa yojanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6975: patyādayaśca śabdāḥ saṃsāriṇyeva kāryakaraṇasaṃghātātmakasya jagato jīvakarmārjitatayā tadbhogyatayā ca yojanīyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6976: tasmātsaṃsāryevānūdyate na tu paramātmā pratipadyata iti prāptam /

GSP33vacbhamu:6985: naca prājñasya paramātmano jīvādbhedena saṃkīrtanaṃ sati saṃbhave rāhoḥ śira itivadaupacārikaṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:6986: naca prājñaśabdaḥ prajñāprakarṣaśālini nirūḍhavṛttiḥ kathañcidajñaviṣayo vyākhyātumucitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:6989: tasmātsuṣuptyutkrāntyorbhedena jīvātprājñasya paramātmano vyapadeśāt 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ' ityādinā jīvātmānaṃ lokasiddhamanūdya tasya paramātmabhāvo 'nanadhigataḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:6994: evaṃ ca mahattvaṃ cājatvaṃ ca sarvagatasya nityasyātmanaḥ saṃbhavānnāpekṣikaṃ kalpayiṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7011: kiñca sa evaṃbhūto hyadyantarjyotiḥ puruṣo vijñānamayo na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānutkṛṣṭo bhavatītyevamādyāḥ śrutayo 'saṃsāriṇaṃ paramātmānameva pratipādayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7012: tasmājjīvātmānaṃ mānāntarasiddhamanūdya tasya brahmabhāvapratipādanaparo 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ' ityādivākyasaṃdarbha iti siddham //43 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7022: brahmajījñāsāṃ pratijñāya brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamuktam-'janmādyasya yataḥ' iti /

GSP33vacbhamu:7029: naca 'mahataḥ paramavyaktam' ityādīnāṃ pradhāne samanvaye 'pi vyabhāciraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7032: naca tatsadbhāvamātreṇa 'janmādyasya yataḥ' iti brahmalakṣaṇasya kiñciddhīyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:7083: ghrāṇajihvāvākcakṣuḥ śrotramanohastatvaco hi indriyāṇi śrutyāṣṭau grahā uktāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7091: grahatvenendriyaiḥ sāmye 'pi manasaḥ svagatena viśeṣeṇārthebhyaḥ paratvamāha #

GSP33vacbhamu:7105: nanvetasminpakṣe hiraṇyagarbhabuddherātmatvānna rathita ātmano bhokturatropādānamiti na rathamātraṃ pariśiṣyate 'pi tu rathavānapītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7107: yathā hi samāropitaṃ pratibimbaṃ bimbānna vastuto bhidyate tathā na paramātmano vijñānātmā vastuto bhidyata iti paramātmaiva rathavānihopāttastena rathamātraṃ parisiṣṭamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7108: atha rathādirūpakakalpanāyāḥ śarīrādiṣu kiṃ prayojanamityata āha #

GSP33vacbhamu:7135: brahmaṇastviyamavidyā śaktirmāyādiśabdavācyā na śakyā tattvenānyatvena vā nirvaktum /

GSP33vacbhamu:7146: tadvināśe vā samastasaṃsārocchedaḥ tanmūlavidyāśakteḥ samucchedādityata āha- #

GSP33vacbhamu:7162: na cāvidyopādhibhedādhīno jīvabhedo jīvabhedādhīnaścāvidyopādhibheda iti parasparāśrayādubhayāsiddhiriti sāṃpratam /

GSP33vacbhamu:7169: tena yathāhivibhramo rajjūpādāna evaṃ prapañcavibhrama īśvaropādānaḥ,

GSP33vacbhamu:7206: natu ṣāṭkauśikasya sthūlasyaṣa etaddhi dṛṣṭabībhatsatayā sukaraṃ vairāgyaviṣayatvena śodhayitumityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7210: viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamavagamayituṃ paraṃ paramatra pratipādyatvena prastutaṃ na tu vairāgyāya śodhanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7219: sāṃkhyaiḥ khalu pradhānādvivekena puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasāya jñātuṃ vā vibhūtyai vā pradhānaṃ jñeyatvenopakṣipyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7220: na ceha jānīyāditi copāsīteti vā vidhivibhaktiśrutirasti,

GSP33vacbhamu:7231: mṛtyuḥ kila na ciketase kupitena pitrā prahitāya tuṣṭastrīnvarān pradadau /
GSP33vacbhamu:7232: naciketāstu pathamena vareṇa pituḥ saumanasyaṃ vavre,
GSP33vacbhamu:7236: nanu tatra varapradāne pradhānagocare staḥ praśnapartivacane /
GSP33vacbhamu:7239: 'hantaḥ ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam' ityanena vyavahitaṃ jīvaviṣayaṃ 'yathā tu maraṇaṃ prāpyātmā bhavati gautama' ityādiprativacanamiti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7241: kiṃ vānyo jīvasya 'yeyaṃ prete' manuṣya iti praśāntaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7246: varapradānānantarbhāve praśnasya tadvat pradhānākhyānamapyanantarbhūtaṃ varapradāne 'stu 'mahataḥ paramavyakta'mityākṣepaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7252: vāstavaśca jīvaparamātmanorabhedastatra tatra śrutyupanyāsena bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7254_0: 'yeyaṃ prete' iti hi naciketasaḥ praśnamupaśrutya tattatkāmaviṣayamalobhaṃ cāsya
GSP33vacbhamu:7254_1: pratītya mṛtyuḥ 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye' ityādinā naciketasaṃ praśasya

GSP33vacbhamu:7269: puruṣārthakriyākṣamaṃ sattasya bhāvaḥ sattā tanmātraṃ mahattattvamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7270: yā yā puruṣārthakriyā śabdādyupabhogalakṣaṇā ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātilakṣaṇā ca sā sarvā mahati buddhau samāpyata iti mahattattvaṃ sattāmātramucyata iti //7 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7274: ajāśabdo yadyapi chāgāyāṃ rūḍhastathāpyadhyātmavidyādhikārānna tatra kartitumarhati /

GSP33vacbhamu:7278: tathāhi-yādṛśaṃ pradhānaṃ sāṃkhyaiḥ smaryate tādṛśamevāsminnanyūnānatiriktaṃ pratīyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:7291: 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nyaḥ' iti tvātmabhedaśravaṇāt sāṃkhyasmṛterevātra mantravarṇe pratyabhijñānaṃ na tvavyākṛtaprakriyāyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7296: avayavāḥ pradhānasmaikasya sattvarajastamāṃsi teṣāṃ dharmā lohitatvādayastairiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7313: viṣayā hi śabdādayaḥ prakṛtivikārastraiguṇyena sukhaduḥkhamohātmāna indriyamano 'haṅkārapraṇālikayā buddhisattvamupasaṃkrāmanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7314: tena tadbuddhisattvaṃ pradhānavikāraḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ śabdādirūpeṇa pariṇamate /

GSP33vacbhamu:7327_0: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-na tāvat 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogamajo
GSP33vacbhamu:7328: sa cānūdito bhedaḥ 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā' ityādiśrutibhirātmaikatvapratipādanaparābhirvirodhātkalpaniko 'vatiṣṭhate /

GSP33vacbhamu:7380: evaṃ cātmani pcamanujānāmākāśasya ca pratiṣṭhānamiti nistātparyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7384: tatrāpi kiṃ pañca prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣagatā vivakṣyante uta tadatiriktā anya eva vā kecit /

GSP33vacbhamu:7393: pañcaviṃśatitattvāni smaryanta iti tānyevānena mantreṇocyanta iti nāśabdaṃ pradhānādi /

GSP33vacbhamu:7415: yadyapi pṛthivyādayo goghaṭādīnāṃ prakṛtistathāpi na te pṛthivyādibhyastattvāntaramiti na prakṛtiḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:7468: 'diksaṃkhye saṃjñāyām' iti saṃjñāyāṃ samāsasmaraṇāt pañcajanaśabdastāvadayaṃ kkacinnirūḍhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7472: tadyadi rūḍhau mukhyor'thaḥ prāpyate tataḥ sa eva grahītavyo 'tha tvasau na vākye saṃbandhārhaḥ pūrvāparavākyavirodhī vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7474: yathā 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta' iti śyenaśabda śakuniviśeṣe nirūḍhavṛttistadaparityāgenaiva nipatyādānasādṛśyenārthavādikena kratuviśeṣe vartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:7476: yathā saptarṣiśabdo vasiṣṭha ekasmin saptasu ca vartate /

GSP33vacbhamu:7482: prāṇādīnāṃ ca vākyaśeṣe śravaṇāttatparityāge śrutahānyaśrutakalpanāprasaṅgātprāṇādaya eva pañcajanāḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:7518: prāsaṅgikaṃ tu tatra sṛṣṭiviṣayāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparamavirodhapratipādanaṃ na tu lakṣaṇārthaḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:7535: vedāntāstu kartrādipratipādanena karmavidhiparatayopacaritārthā avivakṣitārthā vā japopayogina iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7538: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-'sargakramavivāde 'pi na sa sṛṣṭari vidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7547: tadasya devadattasya sarvatraitāsmin kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ devadattāccakrādi saṃbhūtaṃ tasmāccakrādeḥ kumbhādīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7549: nahyastyasaṃbhavaḥ sarvatrāsmin kāryajāte kramavatyapi devadattasya sākṣātkarturanusyūtatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7550: tathehāpi yadyapyākāśādikrameṇaiva sṛṣṭistathāpyākāśānakālānilādau tatra tatra sākṣāt parameśvarasya kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ parameśvarādākāśaḥ saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7551: śakyaṃ ca vaktuṃ parameśvarādanalaḥ saṃbhūta ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7552: yadi tvākāśādvāyurvāyosteja ityuktvā tejaso vāyurvāyorākāśa iti brūyādbhavedvirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7556: eṣā hi svavyāpāramabhidhānakrameṇa kurvatī nābhidheyānāṃ kramaṃ niruṇāddhi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7557: te tu yathākramāsthitā evākrameṇocyante-yathā kramavanti jñānāni jānātīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7562: naca sṛṣṭivigānaṃ sraṣṭari tadadhīnanirūpaṇe vigānamāvahatīti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7563: nahyeṣa sraṣṭṛtvamātreṇocyate 'pi tu 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma' ityādinā rūpeṇocyate sraṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7568: tena 'phalavatsaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgam' iti sṛṣṭivijñānaṃ sraṣṭṛbrahmavijñānāṅgaṃ tadanuguṇaṃ sadbrahmajñānāvatāropāyatayā vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7569: tathāca śrutiḥ-'annena somya śuṅgenāpo mūlamanviccha' ityādikā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7573: api tu 'guṇe tvanyāyakalpanā' iti tadanuguṇatayā vyākhyeyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7574: yacca kāraṇe vigānam'asadvā idamatra asīt' iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:7575: tadapi 'tadapyeṣa śloko bhavati' iti pūrvaprakṛtaṃ sadbrahmaṇākṛṣya 'asadevedamatra āsīt' ityucyamānaṃ tvasato 'bhidhāne 'saṃbaddhaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7578: 'taddhaika āhurasadevedamatra āsīt' iti tu nirākāryatayopanyastamiti na kāraṇe vivāda iti sūtre caśabdastvarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7580: ākāśādiṣu sṛjyamāneṣu kramavigāne 'pi na sraṣṭari vigānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7582: yathaikasyāṃ śrutau vyapadiṣṭaḥ parameśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā tathaiva śrutyantareṣūkteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7585: aparaḥ kalpo yathā vyapadiṣṭaḥ krama ākāśādiṣu,
GSP33vacbhamu:7587: tasyaiva kramasyānapabādhanena 'tattejo 'sṛjata' ityādikāyā api sṛṣṭerukterna sṛṣṭāvapi vigānam //14 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7596: vyakriyata iti ca karmakartari karmaṇi vā rūpaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7598: nahi lūyate kedāraḥ svayameveti vā lūyate kedāra iti vā lavitāraṃ devadattādiṃ pratikṣipati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7605: upasaṃhāre ca 'sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda' iti niratiśayaphalaśravaṇādbrahmavedanādanyatra tadasaṃbhavāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7606: ādityacandrādigatapuruṣakartṛtvasya ca 'yasya vaitatkarma' iti cāsyāsatyavacchede sarvanāmnā pratyakṣasiddhasya jagataḥ paramārśena,
GSP33vacbhamu:7608: ucyate-brahma te bravaṇīti bālākinā gārgyeṇa brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñāya tattadādityādigatābrahmapuruṣābhidhānena na tāvadbrahmoktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7609: yasya cājātaśatroḥ 'yo vai bālāke eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā yasya vaitatkarma' iti vākyaṃ na tena brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7613: kārye tu kriyata iti vyutpattyā vartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7616: vākyaśeṣe ca 'athāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' iti śravaṇātparispandalakṣaṇasya ca karmaṇo yatropapattiḥ sa eva veditavyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7620: upakramānurodhena copasaṃhāre sarvaśabdaḥ sarvān pāpmana iti ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmiti cāpekṣikavṛttirvahūn pāpmano bahūnāṃ bhūtānāmityevaṃparo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7622: yadi tu dṛptabālākimabrahmaṇi brahmābhidhāyinamapodyājātaśatrorvacanaṃ brahmaviṣayamevānyathā tu taduktādviśeṣaṃ vivakṣorabrahmābhidhānamasaṃbaddhaṃ syāditi manyate,

GSP33vacbhamu:7625_2: yaṣṭighātotthānāt prāṇādivyatiriktaṃ jīvaṃ bhoktāraṃ svāminaṃ pratibodhayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7626: parastādapi 'tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prajñātmaitairātmabhirbhuṅkte evamevaita ātmāna enamātmānaṃ bhuñjanti' iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7627: yathā śreṣṭhī pradhānaḥ puruṣaḥ svairbhṛtyaiḥ karaṇabhūtairviṣayān bhuṅkte,
GSP33vacbhamu:7628: yathā vā svā bhṛtyāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjanti /

GSP33vacbhamu:7657: sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svarājyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda' iti ca sati saṃbhave sarvaśruterasaṃkocānniratiśayena phalenopasaṃhārāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7659: ādityādipuruṣakartṛtvasya ca svātantryalakṣaṇasya mukhyasya brahmaṇyeva saṃbhavādanyeṣāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ tatpāratantryāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7660_1: na kañcana paśyatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' ityāderuttasya ca brahmaṇyevopapatterbrahmaviṣayatvaṃ niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7661: atha kasmānna bhavato hiraṇyagarbhagocare eva praśnottare,
GSP33vacbhamu:7662: tathā ca naitābhyāṃ brahmaviṣayatvasiddhirityetannirācikīrṣuḥ paṭhati-etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā yathā yathāyatanaṃ pratiṣṭhanta iti /

GSP33vacbhamu:7694: nanu yadīdamā jagatparāmṛṣṭaṃ tatastadantarbhūtāḥ puruṣā apīti ya eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāmiti punaruktamityata āha- #

GSP33vacbhamu:7708_2: sadbrahmaiva syāttacca nityamiti nopādhijanitaṃ nāpi tadrihitaṃ svarūpaṃ brahmasvabhāvasyāprahāṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7711: yadā tu layalakṣaṇāvidyopabṛṃhito vikṣepasaṃskāraḥ samudācarati tadā viśeṣavijñānotpādātsvapnajāgarāvasthātaḥ paramātmano rūpādbhraṃśarūpamāgamanamiti /

GSP33vacbhamu:7734: yannu ma iyaṃ bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthvī vittena pūrṇā syātkimahaṃ tanāmṛtā syāmuta neti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7736: yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syādamṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti vittena /
GSP33vacbhamu:7737: evaṃ vittenāmṛtatvāśā bhavedyadi vittasādhyāni karmāṇyamṛtatve upayujyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:7739: jñānasādhyatvādamṛtatvasya karmaṇāṃ ca jñānavirodhināṃ tatsahabhāvitvānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7740: sā hovāca maitreyī yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tenaṃ kuryāṃ yadeva bhagavān veda tadeva me brūhi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7742_1: patijāyādiṣu vairāgyamutpādayituṃ yājñavalkyo 'na vā are patyuḥ kāmāya' ityādivākyasaṃdarbhamuvāca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7743: ātmaipādhikaṃ hi priyatvameṣāṃ na tu sākṣāt priyāṇyetāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:7744: tasmādetebhyaḥ patijāyādibhyo viramya yatra sākṣātprema sa eva #
GSP33vacbhamu:7745: ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ# /
GSP33vacbhamu:7747: vā are darśanena śravaṇādisādhanenedaṃ jagatsarvaṃ viditaṃ bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7748: yato nāmarūpātmakasya jagatastattvaṃ pāramārthikaṃ rūpamātmaiva bhujaṅgasyeva samāropitasya tattvaṃ rajjuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7749: tasmādātmani vidite sarvamidaṃ jagattattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7750: rajjvāmiva viditāyāṃ samāropitasya bhujaṅgasya tattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7751: yatastasmādātmaiva draṣṭavyo na tu tadatiriktaṃ jagat svarūpeṇa draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7753: yato 'brahma taṃ parādāt' brāhmaṇajātirbrahmaṇo 'hamityevamabhimāna iti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:7757: ātmaiva jagatastattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ kiñcittaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:7759: yat khalu yadgrahaṃ vinā na śakyate grahītuṃ tattato na vyatiricyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:7779: yathā sāmudramevāmbhaḥ pṛthivītejaḥ saṃparkāt kāṭhinyamupagataṃ saindhavaṃ khilyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7780: sa hi svākāre samudre kṣipto 'mbha eva bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7781: evaṃ cidambhodhau līnaṃ jagacchideva bhavati na tu tato 'tiricyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7794: etebhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya sāmyenotthāya /
GSP33vacbhamu:7795: kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya hyavacchedādduḥ khitvaśokitvādayastadavacchinne cidātmani tadviparīte 'pi pratīyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:7798_2: tānyeva bhūtāni naśyantyani tadupādhiścidātmanaḥ khilyabhāvo vinaśyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7800: na pretya saṃjñāstīti saṃjñāmātraniṣedhādātmā nāstīti manyamānā sā maitreyī hovāca,
GSP33vacbhamu:7801: atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanmohitavān na pretya saṃjñāstīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7804: ānandajñānaikarasabrahmādvayānubhave tu tat kena kaṃ paśyet,
GSP33vacbhamu:7812: dvaitanindayā cādvaitaguṇakīrtanādbrahmaiva maitreyībrahmaṇe pratipādyaṃ na jīvātmeti nāsti pūrvapakṣa ityanārabhyamevedamadhikaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7815: nāpijñānakartṛtvamakartuḥ sākṣācca mahato bhūtasya vijñānātmabhāvena samuttānābhidhānaṃ vijñānātmana eva draṣṭavyatvamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:7816: anyathā brahmaṇo draṣṭavyatvapare 'smin brāhmaṇo tasya vijñānātmatvena samutthānābhidhānamanupayuktaṃ syāttasya tu draṣṭavyamupayujyata ityupakramamātraṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7821: tadevaṃ paurvāparyālocanayā maitreyībrāhmaṇasya brahmadarśanaparatve sthite bhoktrā jīvātmanopakramamācāryadeśīyamatena tāvatsamādhatte sūtrakāraḥ- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7823: yathā hi vahnervikārā vyuccaranto visphuliṅgā na vahneratyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:7827: tathā jīvātmano 'pi brahmavikāra na brahmaṇo 'tyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:7833: tatra tadvijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāsiddhaye vijñānātmaparamātmanorabhedamupādāya paramātmani darśayitavye vijñānātmanopakrama ityāśmaradhya ācāryo mene //20 //
GSP33vacbhamu:7837: jīvo hi paramātmano 'tyantaṃ bhinna eva san dehendriyamanobuddhyupadhānasaṃparkātsarvadā kaluṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7840: yathāhuḥ pāñcarātrikāḥ-'āmukterbheda eva syājjīvasya ca parasya ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7846: saṃprati svābhāvikameva jīvasya nāmarūpaprapañcāśrayatvalakṣaṇaṃ kāluṣyaṃ pārthivānāmaṇūnāmiva śyāmatvaṃ kevalaṃ pākeneva /
GSP33vacbhamu:7857: ākāśa iva ghaṭamaṇikādikalpitāvacchedo ghaṭākāśo maṇikākāśo na tu paramākāśādanyastadvikāro vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7862: atha vikāraḥ paramātmano jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavatyākāśādivadityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7864: nahi yathā tejaḥprabhṛtīnāmātmavikāratvaṃ śrūyate evaṃ jīvasyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7868: tathāca kathañcidbhedo 'pīti tamāsthāya kāryakāraṇabhāva iti matatrayamuktvā kāśakṛtsnīyamataṃ sādhutvena nirdhārayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7874: rājaputrasyeva va mlecchakule vardhamānasyātmani samāropito mlecchabhāvo rājaputro 'sīti āptopadeśena /
GSP33vacbhamu:7875: na tu mṛdvikāraḥ śarāvādiḥ śataśo 'pi mṛnmṛditi cintyamānastajjanmanā mṛdbhāvasākṣātkāreṇa śakyo nivartayituṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7880: api ca jīvasyātmavikāratve tasya jñānadhyānādisādhanānuṣṭhānāt svaprakṛtāvapyaye sati nāmṛtatvasyāśāstītyapuruṣārthatvamamṛtatvaprāpiśrutivirodhaśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:7883: nanu yadi jīvo na vikāraḥ kintu brahmaiva kathaṃ tarhi tasminnāmarūpāśrayatvaśrutiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7892: aikāntike hyādvaite ātmano 'nyakarmakaraṇe 'kena kaṃ paśyet' iti ātmanaśca karmatvaṃ 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt' iti śakyaṃ niṣeddhum /
GSP33vacbhamu:7894: na kevalaṃ kāśakṛtsnīyadarśanāśrayaṇena bhūtapūrvagatyā vijñātṛtvamapi tu śrutipaurvāparyaparyālocanayāpyevamevetyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7896: kasmāt punaḥ kāśakṛtsnasya matamāsthīyate netareṣāmācāryāṇāmityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7898: kāśakṛtsnīyasya matasya śrutiprabandhopanyāsena punaḥ śrutimattvaṃ smṛtimattvaṃ copasaṃhāropakramamāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7906: apica yadi jīvaparamātmanorbhedābhedāvāsthīyeyātāṃ tatastayormitho virodhātsamuccayābhāvādekasya balīyastve nātmani nirapavādaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:7909: tataḥ saṃśaye sati na suniścitārthamātmani jñānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7910: suniścitārthaṃ ca jñānaṃ mokṣopāyaḥ śrūyate-'vedāntavijñānasuniścitārthāḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7915: kathaṃ tarhi vyapadeśabuddhibhedau kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti kathañca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya bhagavataḥ saṃsāritā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7924: na tāvadbhedadābhedāvekātra bhāvikau bhavitumarhata iti viprapañcitaṃ prathame pāde /
GSP33vacbhamu:7925: dvaitadarśananindayā caikāntikādvaitapratipādanaparāḥ paurvāparyālocanayā sarve vedāntaḥ pratīyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:7926: tatra yathā bimbādavadatāttāttvike pratibimbānāmabhede 'pi nīlamaṇikṛpāṇakācādyupadhānabhedātkālpaniko jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedau vartayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:7927: idaṃ bimbamavadātamimāni ca pratibimbāni nīlotpalāśaśayāmalāni vṛttadīrghādibhedabhāñji bahūnīti,
GSP33vacbhamu:7928_1: jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedāvayaṃ ca paramātmā śuddhavijñānānandasvabhāva ime
GSP33vacbhamu:7929: avidyopadhānaṃ ca yadyapi vidyāsvabhāve paramātmani na sākṣādasti tathāpi tatpratibimbakalpajīvadvāreṇa parasminnucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:7935: kathaṃ cātmānaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ vividhavedanābhājaṃ kuryādityādyanuyogo niravakāśaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7942: hanta jīvaḥ sphuṭa iti brahmāpi tathā syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:7943: tathā ca 'nihitaṃ guhāyām' iti nopapadyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:7945: yathāhi bimbasya maṇikṛpāṇādayo guhā evaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi pratijīvaṃ bhinnā avidyā guhā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:7946: yathā pratibimbeṣu bhāsamāneṣu bimbaṃ tadabhinnamapi guhyamevaṃ jīveṣu bhāsamāneṣu tadabhinnamapi brahma guhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7951: brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanā bhagaśo vā pariṇāmābhyupagame tasya kāryatvādanityatvācca tadaśrito mokṣo 'pi tathā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7954: evaṃ ye nadīsamudranidarśanenāmukterbhedaṃ muktasya cābhedaṃ jīvasyāsthiṣata teṣāmapi nyāyenāsaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7958: kiṃ pāthaḥ paramāṇava utaiṣāṃ saṃsthānabheda āhosvittadārabdho 'vayavī /
GSP33vacbhamu:7959: tatra saṃsthānabhedasya vāvayavino vā samudraniveśe vināśāt kasya samudreṇaikatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:7960: nadīpāthaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ tu samudrapāthaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrvavasthitebhyo bheda eva nābhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7962: ye tu kāśakṛtsnīyameva matamāsthāya jīvaṃ paramātmanoṃ'śamācakhyusteṣāṃ kathaṃ 'niṣphalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntam' iti na śrutivirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7963: niṣphalamiti sāvayavatvaṃ vyāsedhi na tu sāṃśatvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:7964: aṃśaśca jīvaḥ paramātmano nabhasa iva karṇanemimaṇḍalāvacchinnaṃ nabhaḥ śabdaśravaṇayogyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7965: vāyoriva ca śarīrāvacchinnaḥ pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇa iti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:7969: hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7971: hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ vā tatsaṃyogo vetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:7977: nabhodharmatve hi tadanavayavaṃ sarvatrābhinnamiti tatsaṃyogaḥ sarvatra pratheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:7981: vyāpyaivāsti kevalaṃ pratisaṃbandhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā na sarvatra nirūpyata iti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:7983: tatsaṃyuktaṃ tu nabhaḥ śravaṇayogyaṃ sarvatrāstīti sarvatra śravaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:7984: naca bhedābhedayoranyatareṇāṃśaḥ śakyo nirvaktum na cobhābhyāṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:7986: tasmādanirvacanīyānādyavidyāparikalpita evāṃśo nabhaso na bhāvika iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7989: na jātu rajjvāmajñāyamāna urago bhayakampādikāryāya paryāpta iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:7996: api ca bhāvikāṃśavādināṃ mate bhāvikāṃśasya jñānenocchettumaśakyatvānna jñānadhyānasādhano mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:7998: evaṃ jīvo brahmaṇoṃ'śa iti kāśakṛtsnīyaṃ matamiti siddham //22 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8003: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi samanvaye darśite samāptaṃ samanvayalakṣaṇamiti kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthamidamārabhyata iti śaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ saṃgatiṃ darśayannavaśeṣamāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8005: atra ca lakṣaṇasya saṃgatimuktvā lakṣaṇenāsyādhikaraṇasya saṃgatiruktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8006: etaduktaṃ bhavati-satyaṃ jagatkāraṇe brahmaṇi vedāntānāmuktaḥ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8007: tatra kāraṇabhāvasyobhayathā darśanājjagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ nimittatvenaiva,
GSP33vacbhamu:8009: tatra yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastata upādānakāraṇānusāraṇe sāṃkhyasmṛtisiddhaṃ pradhānamabhyupeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8013: yadi tūttaraḥ pakṣastato nātivyāptirnāpyavyāptiriti sādhu lakṣaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8019: āgamasya kāraṇamātre paryavasānādanumānasya tadviśeṣaniyamamāgamo na pratikṣipatyapi tvanumanyata evetyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8021: brahmopādānatvasya prasaktasya pratiṣedhe 'nyatrāprasaṅgātsāṃkhyasmṛtiprasiddhamānumānikaṃ pradhānaṃ śiṣyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8025: yathā somaśarmaṇaikena jñātena sarve kaṭhā jñātā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8036: ' tadihāpi pratijñādṛṣṭāntau mukhyārthāveva yuktau na tu 'yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ' itivadguṇakalpanayā netavyau,
GSP33vacbhamu:8039: nimittakāraṇaṃ tu kāryādatyantabhinnamiti na tajjñāne kāryajñānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8043: nahi tadānīṃ brahmaṇi jñāte sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8045: yata iti ca pañcamī na kāraṇamātre smaryate api tu prakṛtau,
GSP33vacbhamu:8051: etayā khalu svātantryalakṣaṇena kartṛtvena nimittatvaṃ darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8079: kathaṃ ca tadbrahmaṇo rūpaṃ yadi tasya brahmopādānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8089: hanta tarhi yādṛśamīśvaramāgamo gamayati tādṛśo 'bhyupagatavyaḥ sa ca nimittakāraṇaṃ copādānakāraṇaṃ ceśvaramavagamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8091: iyaṃ copādānapariṇāmādibhāṣā na vikārābhiprāyeṇāpi tu tathā sarpasyopādānaṃ rajjurevaṃ brahma jagadupādānaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8092: na khalu nityasya niṣphalasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanaikadeśena vā pariṇāmaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8098: tasmādadvaitopakramādupasaṃhārācca sarva eva vedāntā aikāntikādvaitaparāḥ santaḥ sākṣādeva kkacidadvaitamāhuḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8106: mā bhūtpradhānaṃ jagadupādānaṃ tathāpi na brahmopādānatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8108: teṣāmapi hi kiñcidupodbalakamasti vaidikaṃ liṅgamityāśaṅkāmapanetumāha sūtrakāraḥ- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8111: 'pratijñālakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyamāṇe padasamanvayaḥ vaidikaḥ sa ca tatraiva nānyatretyatra sādhitam //28 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8112: ' iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmacchārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8121: vṛttavartiṣyamāṇayoḥ samanvayavirodhaparihāralakṣaṇayoḥ saṃgatipradarśanāya sukhagrahaṇasya caitanyoḥ saṃkṣepatastātparyārthamāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8128: tadevākhyā yasyāḥ sā smṛtistantrākhyā paramarṣiṇā kapilenādividuṣā praṇītā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8130: na khalvamūṣāṃ smṛtīnāṃ manvādismṛtivadanyo 'vakāśaḥ śakyo vaditumṛte mokṣasādhanaprakāśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8135: prasādhitaṃ khalu dharmamīmāṃsāyāṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam' ityatra,
GSP33vacbhamu:8136: yathā śrutiviruddhānāṃ smṛtīnāṃ durbalatayānapekṣaṇīyatvaṃ tasmānna durbalānurodhena balīyasīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ yuktamupavarṇanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:8137: api tu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvāḥ śrutayo durbalāḥ smṛtīrbādhanta eveti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8153: tāsāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ brahmopādānatvapratipādanaparāṇāṃ tatra tatra darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8154: tasmādavigānācchraita evārtha āvastheyo na tu smārto vigānāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:8155: tatkimidānīṃ parasparavigānātsarvā eva smṛtayo 'vaheyā ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8165: kintu viniścatavedaprāmāṇyānāṃ teṣāṃ tadanuṣṭhānavatāṃ prāci bhave 'smiñjanmani siddhiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8169: apramāṇena ca na vedārtho 'tiśaṅkituṃ yuktaḥ pramāṇasiddhatvāttasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:8170: tadevaṃ vedavirodhe siddhavacanamapramāṇamuktvā siddhānāmapi parasparavirodhe tadvacanādanāścāsa iti pūrvoktaṃ smārayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8178: na tāvatsiddhānāṃ parasparaviruddhāni vacāṃsi pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8183: tasmācchutisāmānyamātreṇa bhramaḥ sāṃkhyapraṇetā kapilaḥ śrauta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8196: bhavatu vedaviruddhaṃ kāpilaṃ vacastathāpi dvayorapi puruṣabuddhiprabhavatayā ko vinigamanāyāṃ heturyato vedavirodhi kāpilaṃ vaco nādaraṇīyamityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8198: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-satyaṃ śāstrayonirīśvarastathāpyasya na śāstrakriyāyāmasti svātantryaṃ kapilādīnāmiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:8199: sa hi bhagavān yādṛśaṃ pūrvasmin sarge cakāra śāstraṃ tadanusāreṇāsminnapi sarge praṇītavān /
GSP33vacbhamu:8200: evaṃ pūrvatarānusāreṇa pūrvasmin pūrvatāmanusāreṇa ca pūrvatara ityanādirayaṃ śāstreśvarayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8201: tatreśvarasya na śāstrārthajñānapūrvā śāstrakriyā yenāsya kapilādivatsvātantryaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8204: śāstraṃ ca svatobodhakatayā puruṣasvātantryābhāvena nirastamastadoṣāśaṅkaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ sākṣādeva svārthe pramāṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8207_1: siddhapramāṇabhāvayānepakṣayaiva śrutyā svārtho viniścāyita iti śīghratarapravṛttayā
GSP33vacbhamu:8210: ahaṅkāraprakṛtikatvena tanmātrāṇyapyaprasiddhāni smartuṃ na śakyanta ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8216: sāṃkhyasmṛtermahadādiṣviva pradhāne 'pi prāmāṇyaṃ neti niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8217: sāṃkhyasmṛterbādhe 'pi taduktayuktīnāṃ kathaṃ bādha cārṣajñānamatra mūlamupapadyata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8218: tasmānna kāpilasmṛteḥ pradhānopādānatvaṃ jagata iti siddham //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8222: nānena yogaśāstrasya hairaṇyagarbhapātañjalādeḥ sarvathā prāmāṇyaṃ nirākriyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8228: tacca kiñcinnimittīkṛtya vyutpādyamiti pradhānaṃ savikāraṃ nimittīkṛtaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8235: ata eva yogaśāstraṃ vyutpādayitāha sma bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ-'guṇānāṃ paramaṃ rūpaṃ na dṛṣṭipathamṛcchati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8250: yogaśāstrāttu pradhānādisattā vijñāpayiṣyate bahulaṃ hi yogaśāstrāṇāṃ vedena saha saṃvādo dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8258: yathāhuḥ-'prasaraṃ na labhante hi yāvatkkacana markaṭāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8261: seyaṃ labdhaprasarā pradhānādau yogāpramāṇatāpiśācī sarvatraiva durvārā bhavedityasyāḥ prasaraṃ niṣedhatā pradhānādyabhyupeyamiti nāśabdaṃ pradhānamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8276: tā api kasmānna nirākriyanta ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8278: tāsu khalu bahulaṃ vedārthavisaṃvādinīṣu śiṣṭānādṛtāsu kaiścideva tu puruṣāpasadaiḥ paśuprāyairmlecchādibiḥ parigṛhītāsu vedamūlatvāśaṅkaiva nāstīti na nirākṛtāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8279: tadviparītāstu sāṃkhyayogasmṛtaya iti tāḥ pradhānādiparatayā vyudasyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8286: sāṃkhyā samyagbuddhirvaidikī tayā vartanta iti sāṃkhyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8290: anye 'pi yamaniyamādayo bāhyā āntarāśca dhāraṇādayo yogopāyā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8310_0: sāvakāśā vahvayo 'pi śrutayo 'navakāśaikaśrutivirodhe tadanuguṇatayā yathā nīyante
GSP33vacbhamu:8311: api ca brahmasākṣātkāro virodhitayānādimavidyāṃ nivartayan dṛṣṭenaiva rūpeṇa mokṣasādhanamiṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8312: tatra brahmasākṣātkārasya mokṣasādhanatayā pradhānasyānumānaṃ dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇādṛṣṭaviṣayaṃ viṣayato 'ntaraṅgaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8316: api ca śrutyāpi brahmaṇi tarka ādṛta ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8318: so 'yaṃ brahmaṇo jagadupādānatvākṣepaḥ punastarkeṇa prastūyate-'prakṛtyā ca śrutyāpi vikārāṇāmavasthitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8319: jagadbrahmasarūpaṃ ca neti no tasya vikriyā //
GSP33vacbhamu:8322: ' tathāhi-eka eva strīkāyaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatayā patyuśca sapartnānāṃ ca caitrasya ca straiṇasya tāmavindato 'paryāyaṃ sukhaduḥkhaviṣādānādhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:8324: tasmātsukhaduḥkhamohātmatayā ca svarganarakādyuccāvacaprapañcatayā ca jagadaśuddhamacetanaṃ ca,
GSP33vacbhamu:8327: tasmātpradhānasyāśuddhasyācetanasya vikāro jaganna tu brahmaṇa iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8348: śabdārthāt khalu cetanaprakṛtitvāccaitanyaṃ pṛthivyādīnāmavagamyamānamupodvalitaṃ mānāntareṇa sākṣācchūyamāṇamapyacaitanyamanyathayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8360: naitāḥ śrutayaḥ sākṣānmṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāhuḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8362: tenaitacchutibalena na mṛdādīnāṃ vāgādīnāṃ ca caitanyamāśaṅkanīyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8367_0: bhoktṛṇāmupakāryatvādbhūtendriyāṇāṃ copakāratvāt sāmye ca tadanupapatteḥ sarvajanaprasiddheśca
GSP33vacbhamu:8367_1: 'vijñānaṃ cābhavat' iti śruteśca viśeṣaścetanācetanalakṣaṇaḥ prāguktaḥ sa nopapadyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8373: api ca bhūyasyaḥ śrutayaḥ 'agnirvāg bhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśadvāyuḥ prāṇo bhūtvā nāsike prāviśadādityaścakṣurbhūtvākṣiṇī prāviśat' ityādaya indriyaviśeṣagatā devatā darśayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8376: api ca prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe prāṇānāmasmadādiśarīrāṇāmiva kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitānāṃ vyavahāraṃ darśayan prāṇānāṃ kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhānena caitanyaṃ draḍhayatītyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8379: yadyapi prathame 'dhyāye māktatvena varṇitaṃ tathāpi mukhyatayāpi kathañcinnetuṃ śakyamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8396: yathā hi kāryatvāviśeṣa'pi 'ārogyakāmaḥ pathyamaśrīyāt' 'svarakāmaḥ sikatāṃ bhakṣayet' ityādīnāṃ mānāntarāpekṣatā,
GSP33vacbhamu:8406: tarko hi pramāṇaviṣayavivecakatayā taditikartavyatābhūtastadāśrayo 'sati pramāṇe 'nugrāhyasyāśrayasyābhāvācchuṣkatayā nādriyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8413: mato hi bhāvyamāno bhāvanāyā viṣayatayānubhūto bhavatīti mananamanubhavāṅgam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8418: api ca cetanakāraṇavādibhiḥ kāraṇasālakṣaṇye 'pi kāryasya kathañciccaitanyāvirbhāvānāvirbhāvābhyāṃ vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ cābhavaditi jagatkāraṇe yojayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8421: cetanasya jagatkāraṇasya suṣuptādyavyavasthāsviva sato 'pi caitanyasthānāvirbhāvatayā śakyameva kathañcidavijñānātmatvaṃ yojayitumityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8436: tathā cedaṃ jagatkāryaṃ sattve 'pi cidātmanaḥ kāraṇasya prāgutpatternāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:8447: api tu kāraṇarūpeṇa śakyaṃ sattvena nirvaktumiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8448: evaṃ ca kāraṇasattaiva kāryasya sattā na tato 'nyeti kathaṃ tadutpatteḥ prāk sati kāraṇe bhavatyasat /
GSP33vacbhamu:8449: svarūpeṇa tūtpatteḥ prāgutpannasya dhvastasya vā sadasattvābhyāmanirvācyasya na sato 'sato votpattiriti nirviṣayaḥ satkāryavādapratiṣedha ityarthaḥ //7 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8455_0: yathā hi yūṣādiṣu hiṅgisaindhavādīnāmavibhāgalakṣaṇo layaḥ svagatarasādibhiryūṣaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:8455_1: rūṣayatyevaṃ brahmaṇi viśuddhyādidharmiṇi jagalliyamānamavibhāgaṃ gacchadbrahma svadharmeṇa rūṣayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8456: na cānyathā layo lokasidda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8459: nahi samudrasya phenormibudbudādipariṇāmo vā rajjvāṃ sarpadhārādivibhrame vā niyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8471: tatra ca taddharmārūṣaṇe santi sahasraṃ dṛṣṭāntāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8472: tava tu kāraṇe kāryasya laye kāryadharmarūṣaṇe na dṛṣṭāntalavo 'pyastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8476: yathā rajatasyāropitasya pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ śukti4na ca śuktī rajatameva midamapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8477: api ca sthityutpattipralayakāleṣu triṣvapi kāryasya kāraṇādabhedamabhidadhatī śrutiranatiśaṅkanīyā sarvaireva vedavādibhiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8478: tatra sthityutpattyoryaḥ parihāraḥ sa pralaye 'pi samānaḥ kāryasyāvidyāsamāropitatvaṃ nāma,
GSP33vacbhamu:8493: tattvajñānena ca saśaktino mithyājñānasya samūlaghātaṃ nihatatvāditi //9 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8498_1: nāsmatpakṣa iti yadyapyupariṣṭātpratipādayiṣyāmastathāpi guḍajihvikayā samānatvāpādanamidānīmiti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8504: kevalāgamagamyer'the svatantratarkāviṣaye na sāṃkhyādivat sādharmyadharmyamātreṇa tarkaḥ pravartanīyo yena pradhānādisiddhirbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8518: api ca yena tarkeṇa tarkāṇāmapratiṣṭhāmāha sa eva tarkaḥ pratiṣṭhito 'bhyupeyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8524: sati caiṣa pūrvapakṣaviṣaye tarke pratiṣṭhārahite pravartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8535: bhūtārthagocarasya hi samyagjñānasya vyavasthitavastugocaratayā vyavasthānaṃ loke dṛṣṭaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8537: vaidikaṃ cedaṃ cetanajagadupādānaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ vedotthatarketikartavyatākaṃ vedajanitaṃ vyavasthitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8538: vedānapekṣeṇa tu tarkeṇa jagatkāraṇabhedamavasthāpayatāṃ tārkikāṇāmanyonyaṃ vipratipattestattvanirdhāraṇakāraṇābhāvācca na tatastattvavyavastheti na tataḥ samyagjñānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8551: nahi tadeva tadānīmevāsti nāsti ceti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8552: kiṃ cedaṃ maṇimantrauṣadhamindrajālaṃ kāryeṇa śikṣitaṃ yadidamajātāniruddhātiśayamavyavadhānamavidūrasthānaṃ ca tasyaiva tadavasthendriyasya puṃsaḥ kadācitpratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ ca,
GSP33vacbhamu:8557: athāpi syāt kāryāntarāṇi piṇḍakapālaśarkarācūrṇakaṇaprabhṛtāni kumbhaṃ vyavadadhate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8560: tasya kāryajātasya kāraṇātmanaḥ sadātanatvena sarvadā vyavadhānena kumbhasyātyantānupalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8571: tasmādyatredamalpatāramyaṃ viśrāmyati yato na kṣodīyaḥ saṃbhavati tajjagato mūlakāraṇaṃ paramāṇuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8576: tena vaiśeṣikādyabhimatasya tarkasya śuṣkatvenāvyavasthiceḥ sūtramidaṃ sāṃkhyadūṣaṇamatidiśati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8577: yatra kathañcidvedānusāriṇī manvādibhiḥ śiṣṭaiḥ parigṛhītasya sāṃkhyata4kasyaiṣā gatistatra paramāṇvādivādasyātyantavedabāhyasya manvādyupekṣitasya ca kaiva katheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8580: sṛṣṭyādayo hi vyutpādyāste na kiñcitsadasadvā pūrvapakṣanyāyotprekṣitamapyudāhṛtya vyutpādyanta iti kenacidaṃśenetyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8590: pravṛttā hi śrutiranapekṣatayā svataḥpramāṇatvena na pramāṇāntaramapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8609: yadikāraṇāt paramārthabhūtādananyatvamākāśādeḥ prapañcasya kāryasya kutastarhi na vaiśeṣikādyuktadoprapañcāvatāra ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8614: kintvabhedaṃ vyāsedhadbhirvaiśeṣikādibhirasmāsu sāhāyakamevācaritaṃ bhavati. bhedaniṣedhahetuṃ vyācaṣṭe-ārambhaṇaśabdastāvaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:8615: evaṃ hi brahmavijñānena sarvaṃ jagattattvato jñāyeta yadi brahmaiva tattvaṃ jagato bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8616: yathā rajjvāṃ jñātāyāṃ bhujaṅgatattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8622: mṛdi jñātāyāṃ kathaṃ mṛmnayaṃ ghaṭādi jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8625: na cānyasminvijñāte 'nyadvijñātaṃ bhavatītyata āha śrutiḥ-'vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8629: yathā puruṣasya caitanyamiti rāhoḥ śira iti vikalpamātram /
GSP33vacbhamu:8634: tena mṛdi jñātāyāṃ yeṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva tattvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8639: ye hi dṛṣṭanaṣṭasvarūpā na te vastusanto yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikodakādayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8644: kintu sarvadā sarvatra sarvathāstyeva, na nāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8647: nahi rūpaṃ kadācit kkacit kathañcidvā gandho bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8650: tattarhi vikārajātaṃ daṇḍāyamānaṃ sadātanamiti na vikāraḥ kasyacit /
GSP33vacbhamu:8661: athāsyāsattvaṃ nāma kiñcinna jāyate kintu sa eva na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8662: yathāhuḥ-'na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8664: kiṃ tatsvabhāvo bhāva uta bhāvasvabhāvaḥ sa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8665: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvānāṃ tatsvabhāvatayā tucchatayā jagacchūnyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8668: kalpanāmātranimittatve 'pi niṣedhasya bhāvanityatāpattistadavasthaiva tasmādbhinnamasti kāraṇādvikārajātaṃ na vastu sat /
GSP33vacbhamu:8670: tadanena pramāṇena siddhamanṛtatvaṃ vikārajātasya kāraṇasya nirvācyatayā sattvaṃ 'mṛttiketyeva satyam' ityādinā prabandhena dṛṣṭāntatayānuvadati śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8671: 'yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ' iti cākṣapādasūtraṃ pramāṇasiddho dṛṣṭānta ityetatparaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8677: anekābhiḥ śaktibhiryāḥ pravṛttayo nānākāryasṛṣṭayastadyuktaṃ brahmaikaṃ nānā ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8680: yadi punarekatvameva vastusadbhavet tato nānātvābhāvādvaidikaḥ karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ samasta evocchidyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8682: evaṃ cānekātmakatve brahmaṇo mṛdādidṛṣṭāntā anurūpā bhaviṣyantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8686: mṛdātmanaikatvaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvamiti vadataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ parasparaṃ kimabhedo 'bhimataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8689: tatrābheda aikāntike mṛdātmaneti ca ghaṭaśarāvādyātmaneti collekhadvayaṃ niyamaśca nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8696: nahi dharmiṇoḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃkare taddharmāvekatvanānātve na saṃkīryete iti saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8698: evaṃ ghaṭaśarāvādyātmanā nānātvaṃ yāvadbhavati tāvanmṛdātmanā nānātvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8708: aṃśo hi saḥ, tasya karmasāhitena jñānena brahmabhāva ādhīyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8711: yaduktaṃ nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti, tatrāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8713: yāvadabādhaṃ hi sarvo 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ svapnadaśāyāmiva tadupadarśitapadārthajātavyavahāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8714: sa ca yathā jāgradanasthāyāṃ bādhakānnivartate evaṃ tattvamasyādivākyaparibhāvanābhyāsaparipākabhuvā śārīrasya brahmātmabhāvasākṣātkāreṇa bādhakena nivartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8716: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttat kena kaṃ paśyet' ityādinā mithyājñānādhīno vyavahāraḥ kriyākārakādilakṣaṇaḥ samyagjñānenāpanīyata itri na brūte,
GSP33vacbhamu:8724: api tu na bhujaṅgo rajjuriyamitivat sadātanaṃ tamabhivadati /
GSP33vacbhamu:8728: nahi jātu kāṣṭhasya daṇḍakamaṇḍalukuṇḍalaśālinaḥ kuṇḍalitvajñānaṃ daṇḍavattāṃ kamaṇḍalumattāṃ bādhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:8737: ekatvaikāntābhyupagame tu teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhedaviṣayāṇāṃ bādhitatvādaprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:8741: na kevalaṃ vidhiniṣedhākṣepeṇāsya mokṣaśāstrasyākṣepaḥ svarūpeṇāsyāpi bhedāpekṣatvādityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8750: nahi pratyakṣādibhirarthaṃ paricchidya pravartamāno vyavahāre visaṃbādyate sāṃsārikaḥ kaścit /
GSP33vacbhamu:8763: 'kathaṃ cānṛtena mokṣaśāstreṇa' iti yaduktaṃ tadanubhāṣya dūṣayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8770: yatkhalu satyaṃ na tadutpadyata iti kutastasyāsatyādutpādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8772: sāṃvyavahārikaṃ tu satyatvaṃ vṛttirūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasyeva śravaṇādīnāmapyabhinnam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8773: tasmādabhyupetya vṛttisvarūpasya brahmasākṣātkārasya paramārthasatyatāṃ vyabhicārodbhāvanamiti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8774: yadyapi sāṃvvahārikasya satyādeva bhayātsatyaṃ maraṇamutpadyate tathāpi bhayaheturahistajjñānaṃ vāsatyaṃ tato bhayaṃ satyaṃ jāyata ityasatyātsatyasyotpattiruktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8775: yadyapi cāhijñānamapi svarūpeṇa sattathāpi na tajjñānatvena bhayaheturapi tvanirvācyāhirūṣitatvena /
GSP33vacbhamu:8779: yataḥ samāropitadhūmabhāvāyā dhūmamahiṣyā vahnijñānaṃ satyaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8780: nahi cakṣuṣo rūpajñānaṃ satyamupajāyata iti rasādijñānenāpi tataḥ satyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8781: yato niyamo hi sa tādṛśaḥ satyānāṃ yataḥ kutaścit kiñcideva jāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8785: na cobhayatra dīrghasamāropaṃ prati kaścidasti bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8789: yathā sāṃsāriko jāgradbhujaṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyate tataśca na daṃśavedanāmāpnoti,
GSP33vacbhamu:8790: pipāsuḥ salilamālokya pātuṃ pravartate tatastadāsādya pāyaṃpāyamāpyāyitaḥ sukhamanubhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:8798: laukiko hi suptotthito 'vagamyaṃ bādhitaṃ manyate na tadavagatiṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8799: tena yadyapi parikṣakā anirvācyarūṣitāmavagatimanirvācyāṃ niścinvanti tathāpi laukikābhiprāyeṇaitaduktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8802_2: svapne pratibuddho mānuṣīmātmanastanuṃ paśyati tadobhayadehānugatamātmānaṃ pratisaṃdadhāno
GSP33vacbhamu:8812: nahi saṃketayitāraḥ saṃketayantīdṛśena rekhābhedenāyaṃ varṇaḥ pratyetavyo 'pi tvīdṛśo rekhābhedo 'kāra īdṛśaśca kakāra iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8815: nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayo laukikaśca vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti, tatrāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8827: antyā cediyamavagatirniṣprayojanā tarhi tathā ca prekṣāvadbhirupādīyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:8831: nahīyamutpannā satī paścādavidyāṃ nivartayati yena nāntyā syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:8850: anekatvajñānasya ca pratiyogigrahāpekṣayā durbalatvena bādhyatvaṃ vadan prakṛtamupasaṃharati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8861: sākṣātkūṭasthanityatvapratipādikāstu santi sahasraśaḥ śrutaya iti na pariṇāmadharmatā brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8862: atha kūṭasthasyāpi pariṇāmaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8866: yathaikabāṇāśraye gatinivṛtti evamekasminbrahmaṇi pariṇāmaśca tadabhāvaśca kauṭasthyaṃ bhaviṣyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8871: naca dharmiṇo vyatiricyate dharmo yena tadupajanāpāye 'pi dharmī kīṭasthaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8873: vāṇādayastu pariṇāminaḥ sthityā gatyā ca pariṇāmanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8874: api ca svādhyāyādhyayanavidhyāpāditārthavattvasya vedarāśerekenāpi varṇenānarthakena na bhavitavyaṃ kiṃ punariyatā jagato brahmayonitvapratipādakena vākyasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:8875: tatra phalavadbrahmadarśanasamāmnānasaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ jagadyonitvaṃ samāmnāyamānaṃ tadarthaṃ sattadupāyatayāvatiṣṭhate nārthāntarārthamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8878: tadananyatvamityasya sūtrasya pratijñāvirodhaṃ śrutivirodhaṃ ca codayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8883: nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te eva bījaṃ tasya vyākaraṇaṃ kāryaprapañcastadapekṣatvādaiśvaryasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:8884: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na tāttvikamaiśvaryaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ kintvavidyopādhikamiti tadāśrayaṃ pratijñāsūtraṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8891: kāraṇasya bhāvaḥ sattā copalambhaśca tasmin kāryasyopalabdherbhāvācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:8895: tathā ca prabhārūpānuviruddhabodhyena cākṣuṣeṇa na vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8914: paṭa iti pratyakṣabuddhyā tantava evātānavitānāvasthā ālambyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:8918: arthakriyāyāṃ ca pratyekamasamarthā apyanārabhyaivārthāntaraṃ kiñcinmilitāḥ kurvanto dṛśyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:8921: naca samavāyādbhinnayorapi bhedānavasāyaḥ anavasāya iti sāṃpratama,
GSP33vacbhamu:8923: bhede hi siddhe samavāyaḥ samavāyācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8927: anayā ca diśā mūlakāraṇaṃ brahmaiva paramārthasat,
GSP33vacbhamu:8937: nahi tailaṃ sikatātmanā sikatāyāmasti yathā ghaṭo 'sti mṛdi mṛdātmanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:8940: tena yathā sikatāyāstailaṃ na jāyata evamātmano 'pi jaganna jāyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:8945: yathā hi ghaṭaḥ sarvadā sarvatra ghaṭa eva nā jātvasau kkacitpaṭo bhavatyevaṃ sadapi sarvatra sarvadā sadeva na tu kkacitkadācidasadbhavitumarhatītyupapāditamadhastāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:8951: tataścābhinnasattānanyatvādete api mitho na bhidyete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8957: abhedagrahasya ca nirapekṣatayā tadanupapatterekaikāśrayatvācca bhedasyaikābhāve tadanupapatterabhedagrahopādānaiva bhedakalpaneti sarvabhavadātam //16 //
GSP33vacbhamu:8967: atiśayo hi dharmo nāsatyatiśayavati kārye bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:8968: nanu na kāryasyātiśayo niyamaheturapi tu kāraṇasya śaktibhedaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:8969: sa cāsatyapi kārye kāraṇasya sattvātsannevetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:8977: anabhyupagamyamāne ca#samavāyasya samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbandhe vicchedaprasaṅgo 'vayavāvayavidravyaguṇādīnāṃ mithaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:8982: sattvaṃ tu svabhāvata eva saditi na sattvāntarayogamapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8983: tathā samavāyaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ saṃbaddhuṃ na saṃbandhāntarayogamapekṣate,
GSP33vacbhamu:8987: naca saṃyogasya kāryatvāt kāryasya ca samavāyikāraṇādhīnajanmatvāt asamavāye ca tadanupapatteḥ samavāyakalpanā saṃyoga iti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:8990: saṃbandhyadhīnanirūpaṇaḥ samavāyo yathā saṃbandhidvayabhede na bhidyate tannāśe ca na naśyatyapi tu nitya eka evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:8993: tathā sati yathaikasmānnimittakāraṇādeva jāyata evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi nimittakāraṇādeva janiṣyata iti samānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9002: atha samastāvayavavyāsaṅgyapi katipayāvayavasthāno grahīṣyata ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9005: bahutvasaṃkhyā hi svarūpeṇaiva vyāsajya saṃkhyeyeṣu vartate ityekamasaṃkhyeyāgrahaṇe 'pi na gṛhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9009: tena yathā sūtramavayavaiḥ kusumāni vyāpnuvanna samastakusumagrahaṇamapekṣate katipayakusumasthānasyāpi tasyopalabdheḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9016: yadyapi gotvasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā anirvācyā na paramārthasantastathā ca kkāsya pratyekaparisamāptiriti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9021: yadyucyeta ghaṭaśabdastadavayaveṣu vyāpārāviṣṭatayā pūrvāparībhāvamāpanneṣu ghaṭopajanābhimukheṣu tādarthyanimittādupacārātprayujyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9022: teṣāṃ ca siddhatvena kartṛtvamastītyupapadyate ghaṭo bhavatīti prayoga ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9024: utpādanā hi siddhānāṃ kapālakulālādīnāṃ vyāpāro notpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9029: tatra kapāsakulālādīnāṃ siddhānāmutpādanādhiṣṭhānānāṃ notpattyadhiṣṭhānatvamastīti pāriśeṣyādghaṭa eva sādhya utpatteradhiṣṭhānameṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9031: evañca ghaṭo bhavatītila ghaṭavyāpārasya dhātūpāttatvāttatrāsya kartṛtvamupapadyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9032: taṇḍulānāmiva satāṃ viklittau viklidyanti taṇḍulā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9042: api ca prāgutpatterasattvaṃ kāryasteti kāryābhāvasya bhāvena maryādākaraṇanupapannamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9045: atyantābhāvasya bandhyāsutasya mā bhūnmaryādanupākhyo hi saḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9046: ghaṭaprāgabhāvasya tu bhaviṣyatā ghaṭenopākhyeyasyāsti maryādetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9048: uktametadadhastādyathā na jātu ghaṭaḥ paṭo bhavatyevamasadapi sanna bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9052: prāk prasiddhamapi kāryaṃ kadācitkāraṇena yojayituṃ vyāpāror'thavānmavedityata āha-tadananyatvācceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9058: evaṃ vastutaḥ kāryatattvaṃ na kāraṇādbhidyate kāraṇasvarūpameva hi tat,
GSP33vacbhamu:9059: anirvācyaṃ tu kāryarūpaṃ bhinnamivābhinnamiva cāvabhāsata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9077: iti ca sūtre nigadavyākhyātena bhāṣyeṇa vyākhyāte //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9083: yadyapi śārīrātparamātmano bhedamāhuḥ śrutayastathāpyabhedamapi darśayanti śrutayo bahvayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9099: satyamayaṃ paramātmana sarvajñatvādyathā jīvān vastuta ātmano 'bhinnān paśyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9100: paśyatyevaṃ na bhāvata eṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāsaṅgostyavidyāvaśāttveṣāṃ tadvadabhimāna iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9101: tathā ca teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhādivedanāyāmapyahamudāsīna iti na teṣāṃ bandhanāgāraniveśe 'pyastikṣatiḥ kācinmameti na hitākaraṇādidoṣāpattiriti rāddhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9115: brahma khalvekamadvitīyatayā parānapekṣaṃ krameṇotpadyamānasya jagato vivadhavicitrarūpasyopādānamupeyate tadanupapannam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9124: ekaikaṃ mṛdādi kārakaṃ teṣāṃ tu sāmagryaṃ sādhanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9128: idaṃ tāvadbhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām-kiṃ tāttvikamasya rūpamapekṣyemucyate utānādināmarūpabījasahitaṃ kālpanikaṃ sārvajñyaṃ sarvaśaktitvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9129: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe kiṃ nāma tato 'dvitīyādasahāyādupajāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9131: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasya kāryaṃ karaṇaṃ ca vidyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9134: te 'pi hi bāhyacetanādikāraṇānapekṣā eva kālaparivaśena svata eva pariṇāmāntaramāsādayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9138: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ ti maheśvaram' iti kāryakrameṇa utparipāko 'pi kramavānunneyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9143: yadi tu cetanatve satīti viśeṣamānna kṣīrādibhirvyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9152: nanu na brahmaṇastattvataḥ pariṇāmo yena kārtsnyabhāgavikalpenākṣipyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9153: avidyākalpitena tu nāmarūpalakṣaṇena rūpabhedena vyākṛtāvyākṛtātmanā tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyena pariṇāmādivyavahārāspadatvaṃ brahma pratipadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9155: nahi candramasi taimirikasya dvitvakalpanā candramaso dvitvamāvahati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9161: śrutestu śabdāmūlatvāt#'ātmani caivaṃ' 'vicitrāśca hi' iti sūtrābhyāṃ vivartadṛḍhīkaraṇenaikāntikādvayalakṣaṇaḥ śrutyarthaḥ pariśodhyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9175: svapnadṛgātmā hi manasaiva svarūpānupamardena rathādīn sṛjati //28 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9183: yadyapi samudāyaḥ sāvayavastathāpi pratyekaṃ sattvādayo niravayavāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9184: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sattvamātraṃ pariṇamate na rajastamasī iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9194: nahyasti saṃbhavaḥ sa eva tadānīṃ tatra vartate na vartate ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9195: tathā coparyadhaḥpārśvasthāḥ ṣaḍapi paramāṇavaḥ samānadeśā iti prathimānupapatteraṇumātraḥ piṇḍaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9201: paramārthatastu bhāvikaṃ pariṇāmaṃ vā karyakāraṇabhāvaṃ vecchatāmeṣa durvāro doṣo na punarasmākaṃ māyāvādināmityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9210: kulālādibhyastāvadbāhyakaraṇāpekṣebhyo devādīnāṃ bāhyanapekṣāṇāmāntarakaraṇāpekṣasṛṣṭhīnāṃ pramāṇena dṛṣṭo yathā viśeṣo nāpahnotuṃ śakyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9212: evaṃ sarvaśakteḥ parasyā devatāyā āntarakaraṇānapekṣāyā jagatsarjanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na sāmānyato dṛṣṭamātreṇāpahnavamarhatīti //31 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9219: prekṣāvataśca pravṛttiḥ svaparahitāhitaprāptiparihāraprayojanā satī nāprayojanālpāyāsāpi saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9227: tasmāt prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā tadabhāve 'nupapannā brahmopādānatāṃ jagataḥ pratikṣipatīti prāptam //32 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9231: bhavedetadevaṃ yadi prekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9236: anyathā 'na kurvīta vṛthā ceṣṭām' iti dharmasūtrakṛtāṃ pratiṣedho nirviṣayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9239: api cādṛṣṭahetukotpattikī śvāsapraśvāsalakṣaṇā prekṣāvatāṃ kriyā prayojanānusaṃdhānamantareṇa dṛṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9244_1: līlāmātrātsatyapyanuniṣpādini prayojane naiva taduddeśena pravṛttirevaṃ brahmaṇo
GSP33vacbhamu:9245: dṛṣṭaṃ ca yadalpabalavīryabuddhināmaśakyamatiduṣkaraṃ vā tadanyeṣāmanalpabalavīryabuddhīnāṃ suśakamīṣatkaraṃ vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9248: na cāyaṃ na pītaḥ saṃkṣipya culukena helayeva kalaśayoninā mahāmuninā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9249: na cādyāpi na dṛśyante līlāmātravinirmitāni mahāprāsādapramadavanāni śrīmannṛganarendrāṇāmanyeṣāṃ manasāpi duṣkarāṇi nareśvarāṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9250: tasmādupapannaṃ yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvādvā līlayā vā jagatsarjanaṃ bhagavato maheśvarasyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9251: api ca neyaṃ pāramārthikī sṛṣṭiryenānuyujyeta prayojanam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9253: avidyā ca svabhāvata eva kāryonmukhī na prayojanamapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9256: sā ca caitanyacchuritā jagadutpādaheturutu cetano jagadyonirākhyāyata ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9258: api ca na brahma jagatkāraṇamapi tattayā vivakṣantyāgamā api tu jagati brahmātmabhāvam /
