GSP33vacbhamu:9259: tathā ca sṛṣṭeravivakṣāyāṃ tadāśrayo doṣo nirviṣaya evetyāśayenāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9266: nahi sabhyaḥ sabhāyāṃ niyukto yuktavādinaṃ yuktavādyasīti cāyuktavādinamayuktavādyasīti bruvāṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:9267: sabhāpatirvā yuktavādinamanugṛhṇannayuktavādinaṃ ca nigṛhṇannanukto dviṣṭo vā bhavatyapi tu madhyastha iti vītarāgadveṣa iti cākhyāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9268: tadvadīśvaraḥ puṇyakarmāṇamanugṛhṇannapuṇyakarmāṇaṃ ca nigṛhṇanmadhyastha eva nāmadhyasthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9272: ata eva na nairghṛṇyamapi saṃharataḥ samastān prāṇabhṛtaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9277_0: na ca 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate eṣa evāsādhu karma
GSP33vacbhamu:9277_1: kārayati taṃ yamadho niniṣate' iti śruterīśvara eṣa dveṣapakṣapātābhyāṃ sādhvasādhunī
GSP33vacbhamu:9277_2: karmaṇī kārayitvā svargaṃ narakaṃ vā lokaṃ nayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9280: yasmāt karma kārayitveśvaraḥ prāṇinaḥ sukhaduḥkhinaḥ sṛjati iti śruteravagamyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9282: naca vaiṣamyamātramatra brūmo na tvīśvarakāraṇatvaṃ vyāsedhāma iti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9284: tasmādīśvarasya savāsanakleśāparāmarśamabhivadantīnāṃ bhūyasīnāṃ śrutīnāmanugrahāyonninīṣate 'dho ninīṣata ityetadapi tajjātīyapūrvakarmābhyāsavaśātprāṇina ityevaṃ neyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9290: tathā ca māyākārasyevāṅgasākalyavaikalyabedena vicitrān prāṇino darśayato na vaiṣamyadoṣaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9292: evamasyāpi bhagavato vividhavicitraprapañcamanirvācyaṃ viśvaṃ darśayataḥ saṃharataśca svabhāvādvā līlayā vā na kaściddoṣaḥ //34 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9301: akṛte karmaṇi puṇye pāpe vā tatphalaṃ bhoktāramadhyāgacchet,
GSP33vacbhamu:9309: sa ca rāgādibiḥ sahitaḥ svakāryairna śarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhabhogāyatanamantareṇa saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9312: naca pūrvaśarīramantareṇa mohādiriti pūrvapūrvaśarīrāpekṣo mohādirevaṃ pūrvapūrvamohādyapekṣaṃ pūrvapūrvaśarīramityanāditaivātra bhagavatī cittamanākulayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9315_0: rāgādveṣamohā rāgādayasta eva hi puruṣaṃ sāsāraduḥkhamanubhāvya kleśayantīti kleśāsteṣāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:9315_1: vāsanāḥ karmaparvṛttyanuguṇāstābhirākṣiptāni pravarttitāni karmāṇi tadapekṣā layalakṣaṇā avidyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9320_0: tadevamanāditve siddhe 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' iti prāk sṛṣṭeravibhāgāvadhāramaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:9326: dṛśyate sarvasya cetanādhiṣṭhitasyaiva loke pravṛttiriti lokānusāro darśitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9333: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhagavatpādaśārīrikabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9335: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyāyogakāraṇadādismṛtibhiḥ sāṃkhyādiprayuktatarkaiśca vedāntasamanvayavirodhaparihārākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ#
GSP33vacbhamu:9340: iha hi pāde khatantrā vedanirapekṣāḥ pradhānādisiddhiviṣayāḥ sāṃkhyādiyuktayo nirākariṣyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:9342: nahīdaṃ śāstramucchṛṅkhalatarkaśāstravatpravṛttamapi tu vedāntavākyāni brahmaparāṇīti pūrvapakṣottarapakṣābhyāṃ viniścetum /
GSP33vacbhamu:9349: na caitadeva cetanopādānamacetanopādānaṃ ceti samuccetuṃ śakyaṃ, virodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9350: na ca vyavasthite vastuni vikalpo yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9351: na cāgamabādhitaviṣayatayānumānameva nodīyata iti sāṃpratam. sarvajñapraṇītatayā sāṃkhyādyāgamasya vedāgamatulyatvāt tadbhāṣitasyānumānasya pratikṛtisiṃhatulyatayābādhyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9352: tasmāttadvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvayo vedāntānāṃ sidhyatīti na tatastattvajñānaṃ seddhumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9353: naca tattvajñānādṛte mokṣa iti svatantrāṇāmapyanumānānāmābhāsīkaraṇamiha śāstresaṃgatameveti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9354: yadyevaṃ tataḥ parakīyānumānanirāsa eva kasmātprathamaṃ na kṛta ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9362: naca parapakṣadūṣaṇamantareṇa tattvanirṇayaḥ śakyaḥ kartumiti tatvanirṇayāya vītarāgeṇāpi parapakṣo dūṣyate na tu parapakṣatayeti na vītarāgakathātvavyāhatirityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9366: yāni hi yena rūpeṇā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyātsamanvīyante tāni tatkaraṇāni dṛṣṭāni,
GSP33vacbhamu:9367: yathā dhaṭādayo rucakādayaścā sthaulyādā ca saukṣmyānmṛtsuvarṇānvitāstatkaraṇāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9368: tathā cedaṃ bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ ca bhāvajātaṃ suḥkhaduḥkhamohātmanānvitamupalabhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9372: yā ca mehātmatā tattama iti traiguṇyakāraṇasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9380: caitrasya tu straiṇasya tāmavindato moho viṣādaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9385: tacca triguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ pradhīyate kriyate 'nena jagaditi,
GSP33vacbhamu:9387: tacca mṛtsuvarṇavadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣasya bhogāpavargalakṣaṇamarthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvata eva pravartate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9388: na tu kenacitpravartyate. tathā hyāhuḥ--- 'puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam' iti. /
GSP33vacbhamu:9394: yadi tāvadacetanaṃ pradhānamanadhiṣṭhitatvena mṛtsuvarṇādau dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi vyāpterupalabdherviruddhatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9396: tasmāt kṛtakatvamiva nityatvasādhanayā prayuktaṃ sādhyaviruddhena vyāptaṃ viruddham,
GSP33vacbhamu:9397: evaṃ samanvayādi cetanānadhiṣṭhitatve sādhya iti racanānupapatteriti darśitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9406: sa ca svabhāvapratibandhaḥ śaṅkitasamāropitopādhinirāse sati niścīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9408: tau cānvayavyatirekau na tathopādānācaitanye yathopādānācaitanye yathā cetanaprayuktatve 'tiparisphuṭau /
GSP33vacbhamu:9410: evamapi cetanaprayuktatvaṃ nābhyupeyeta yadi pramāṇāntaravirodho bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:9415: āntarāḥ khalvamī suḥkhaduḥkhamohaviṣādā bāhyebhyaścandanādibhyo 'tivicchinnapratyayapravedanīyebhyo vyatiriktā adhyakṣamīkṣyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:9416: yadi punareta eva suḥkhaduḥkhādisvabhāvā bhaveyustataḥsvarūpatvādhemante 'pi candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9420: evaṃ kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasya sukha iti manuṣyādīnāmapi prāṇabhṛtāṃ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9422: tasmādasukhādisvabhāvā api candanakuṅkumādayo jātikālāvasthādyapekṣayā sukhaduḥkhādihetavo na tu svayaṃ sukhādisvabhāvā iti ramaṇīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9423: tasmātsukhādirūpasamanvayo bhāvānāmasiddha iti nānena tadrūpaṃ kāraṇamavyaktamunnīyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9432: saṃsargapūrvakatve hi saṃsargasyaikasminnadvaye 'saṃbhavānnānātvaikārthasamavetasya nānākaraṇāni saṃsṛṣṭāni kalpanīyāni,
GSP33vacbhamu:9438: atha na yojanādimitatvaṃ parimāṇamiyattāṃ nabhaso brūmaḥ kintvavyāpitām,
GSP33vacbhamu:9444: nahi yathā taiḥ kāryajātamāviṣṭamevaṃ tāni parasparaṃ viśanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9449: evaṃ citiśaktirapi guṇairasaṃsṛṣṭeti sāpi parimitetyanaikāntikatvaṃ parimitatvasya hetoriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9453: na kevalaṃ racanābhedā na cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa bhavantyapi tu sāmyāvasthāyāḥ pracyutirvaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9454: tathā ca yadudbhūtaṃ balīyastadaṅgyabhibhūtaṃ ca tadanuguṇatayā sthitamaṅgam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9455: evaṃ hi guṇapradhānabhāve satyasya mahadādau kārye kā pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9457: na hi cetanādhiṣṭhānamantareṇa mṛtpiṇḍe pradhāne 'ṅgabhāvena cakradaṇḍasalilasūtirādayo 'vatiṣṭhante /
GSP33vacbhamu:9458: tasmātpravṛtterapi cetanādhiṣṭhānasiddhiriti 'śaktitaḥ pravṛtteśca' ityayamapi hetuḥ sāṃkhyīyo viruddha evetyuktaṃ vakroktyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9461: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-- tvayā kilaupaniṣadenāsmadhetūn dūṣayitvā kevalasya cetanasyaivānyanirapekṣasya jagadupādānatvaṃ nimittatvaṃ ca samarthanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9464: aupaniṣadastu cetanahetukāṃ tāvadeṣa sāṃkhyaḥ pravṛttimabhyupagacchatu paścāt svapakṣamata eva samādhāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9470: acetanāśrayaiva sarvā pravṛttirdṛśyate na tu cetanāśrayā kācidapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9476: na tāvaccetanaḥ pravṛtyāśrayatayā tatprayojakatayā vā pratyakṣamīkṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9479: sadbhāvamātraṃ tu tatra cetanasya gamyate rathādivailakṣaṇyājjīvaddehasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:9481: mā bhūdākāśa utpattimatāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇamasti hi sarvatreti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9482: tadanena dehātirikte satyapi cetane tasya na pravṛttiṃ prati nimittabhāvo 'stītyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9483: yataścāsya na pravṛttihetubhāvo 'sti ata eva pratyakṣe dehe sati pravṛttidarśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamiti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9484: tathā ca na cidātmanimittā pravṛttiriti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:9485: tasmānna racanāyāḥ pravṛttervā cidātmakāraṇatvasiddhirjagata iti aupaniṣadaḥ pariharati-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9487: na tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamasiddhaḥ śārīro vā paramātmā vāsmābhiridānīṃ sādhanīyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9489: tatra mṛtaśarīre vā rathādau vānadhiṣṭhite cetanena pravṛtteradarśanāt tadviparyaye ca pravṛttidarśanādanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ cetanahetukatvaṃ pravṛtterniścīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9495: dehaḥ svayaṃ cetanaḥ karacaraṇādimān svavyāpāreṇa pravartayatīti yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9496: na tu tadatiriktaḥ kūṭasthanityaścetano vyāpārarahito jñānaikasvabhāvaḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt pravartako yukta iti codayati-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9502: sāṃkhyānāṃ hi svadeśasthā rūpādaya indriyaṃ vikurvate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9503: tena tadindrayamarthaṃ prāptamarthākāreṇa pariṇamata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9506: yeṣāmacetanaṃ cetanaṃ cāsti teṣāmetadyujyate vaktuṃ cetanādhiṣṭhitamacetanaṃ pravartata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9509: teṣāṃ pravartyābhāve kaṃ prati pravartakatvaṃ cetanasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9512: kāraṇabhūtayā layalakṣaṇayāvidyayā prāksargopacitena ca vikṣepasaṃskāreṇa yat pratyupasthāpitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ tadeva māyā,
GSP33vacbhamu:9514: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- neyaṃ sṛṣṭirvastusatī yenādvaitino vastusato dvitīyasyābhāvādanuyujyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9515: kālpanikyāṃ tu sṛṣṭāvasti kālpanikaṃ dvitīyaṃ sahāyaṃ māyāmayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9523: yathā payombunoścetanānadhiṣṭhitayoḥ svata eva pravṛttirevaṃ pradhānasyāpīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9530: na ca sapakṣeṇa vyabhicāra iti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9535: iha tu sarvasya cetanāpekṣā pravṛttiḥ pratipādyata iti kuto na virodha ityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9537: sthūladarśilokābhiprāyānurodhena taduktaṃ na tu paramārthata ityarthaḥ //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9540: yadyapi sāṃkhyānāmapi vicitrakarmavāsanāvāsitaṃ pradhānaṃ sāmyāvasthāyāmapi tathāpi na karmavāsanāḥ sargasyeśate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9541: kintu pradhānameva svakārye pravartamānamadharmapratibaddhaṃ sanna sukhamayīṃ sṛṣṭiṃ kartumutsahata iti dharmeṇādharmapratibandho 'panīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9544: yathāhuḥ-- 'nimittamaprayojakaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ varaṇabhedastu tataḥ kṣetrikavat' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9545: tataśca pratibandakāpanayasādhane dharmādharmavāsane api saṃnihite ityāgantorapekṣaṇīyasyābhāvāt sadaiva sāmyena pariṇameta vaiṣamyeṇa vā,
GSP33vacbhamu:9547: īśvarasya tu mahāmāyasya cetanasya līlayā vā yadṛcchayā vā svabhāvavaicitryādvā karmaparipākāpekṣasya pravṛttinivṛttī upapadyete eveti //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9550: dhenūpayuktaṃ hi tṛṇapallavādi yathā svabhāvata eva cetanānapekṣaṃ kṣīrabhāvena pariṇamate na tu tatra dhenūcaitanyamapekṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9552: evaṃ pradhānamapi svabhāvata eva pariṇaṃsyate kṛtamatra cetaneneti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9553: dhenūpayuktasya tṛṇādeḥ kṣīrabhāve kiṃ nimittāntaramātraṃ niṣidhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9557: buddhipūrvakārī tu tatrāpīśvara eva sarvajñaḥ saṃbhavatīti śaṅkānirākaraṇasyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9568: na kevalaṃ tāttviko bhogo 'nādheyātiśayasya kūṭasthanityasya puruṣasya na saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9570: yena hi prayojanena pradhānaṃ pravartitaṃ tadanena kartavyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9575: citeḥ sadā viśuddhatvānnaitasyāṃ jātu karmānubhavavāsanāḥ santi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9577: tathā ca pradhānapravṛtteḥ prāk citirmuktaiveti nāpavargārthamapi tatpravṛttiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9585: bhogasya ca sakṛcchabdādyupalabghimātrādeva samāptatvānna tadarthaṃ punaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartetetyayatnasādhyo mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9588: atha puruṣārthāya pravṛttaṃ kimarthaṃ sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiṃ karoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9590: hantāyāṃ sakṛcchabdādyupabhogena kṛtaprayojanasya pradhānasya nivṛttimātrādeva sidhyatīti kṛtaṃ sattvānyatākhyātipratīkṣaṇena /
GSP33vacbhamu:9592: tasmādubhayārthamapi na pradhānasya pravṛttirupapadyata iti siddhor'thābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9601: sā ca sarjanīyamantareṇānarthikā syāditi yatpradhānena śabdādi sṛjyate tadeva dṛkśakterdṛśyaṃ bhavatīti tadubhayārthavatvāya sarjanamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9604: yathā hi pradhānasya sargaśaktirekaṃ puruṣaṃ prati caritārthāpi puruṣāntaraṃ prati pravartate 'nucchedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9605: evaṃ dṛkśaktirapi taṃ puruṣaṃ pratyarthavattvāyānucchedātsarvadā pravartetetyanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9606: sakṛddṛśyadarśanena vā caritārthatve na bhūyaḥ pravarteteti sarveṣāmekapade nirmokṣaḥ prasajyeteti sahasā saṃsāraḥ samucchidyeteti //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9611: puruṣa eva dṛkśaktisampannaḥ paṅguriva pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ pradhānamandhamiva pravartayiṣyatīti śaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9624: yathāhuḥ-- 'nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9633: yatsāmyāvasthayā suciraṃ paryaṇamatkathaṃ tadevāsati vilakṣaṇapratyayopanipāte vaiṣamyamupaiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9634: anapekṣasya svato vāpi vaiṣamye na kadācitsāmyaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ //8 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9638: aṅgitvānupapattilakṣaṇo doṣastāvanna bhavadbhiḥ śakyaḥ parihartumiti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9660: tathā ca tapyena karmaṇā tāpakasamavetakriyāphalaśālinā tāpakādanyeva bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9662: anyatve tu tapyasya tāpakāccaitrasamavetagamanakriyāphalabhājo gamyasyeva nagarasya tapyatvopapatti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9666: nahi svabhāvādbhāvo viyojituṃ śakya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9667: jaladheśca vīcitaraṅgaphenādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ santa āvirbhāvatirobhāvadharmāṇo na tu tairjaladhiḥ kadācidapi mucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9675: tadevamaupaniṣadaṃ matamasamañjasamuktvā sāṃkhyaḥ svapakṣe tapyatāpakayorbhede mokṣamupapādayati-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9689: tathāpi yathā jayaḥ parājayo vā yogheṣu vartamānaḥ prādhānyātsvāminyapadiśyate ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9701: tāpo hi sāṃvyavahārika eva na pāramārthika atyasakṛdāveditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9703: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvanyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātāmi#tyasmadabhyupagama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9704: sāṃkhyo 'pi hi bhedāśrayaṃ tapyatāpakabhāvaṃ bruvāṇo na puruṣasya tapikarmatāmākhyātumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:9708: darśitaviṣayattvāttu buddhisatve tapye tadavibhāgāpatyā puruṣo 'pyanutapyata iva na tu tapyate 'pariṇāmitvādityuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9715: sahādarśanena nimittena vartata iti sanimittaḥ saṃyogastadapekṣatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9721: tasya ca buddhisatvasya tāmasaviparyāsādātmanaḥ puruṣādbhedamapaśyataḥ puruṣastapyata ityabhimānaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9723: tasya tu buddhisatvasya sāttvikyā vivekakhyātyā tāmasīyamavivekakhyātirnivartanīyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9725: tathā vicchinnāpi chinnabadarīva punastamasodbhūtena sattvamabhibhūya vivekakhyātimapodya śataśikharāvidyāvirbhāvyeteti bateyamapavargakathā tapasvino dattajalāñjaliḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:9731: atha tasmin pratibimbe malinādarśopadhānānmalinatā padaṃ labhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9732: tathā cātmano malinaṃ mukhaṃ paśyan devadattastapyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9733: yadā tūpādhyapanayādbimbameva kalpanāvaśāt pratibimbaṃ taccāvadātamiti tattvamavagacchati tadāsya tāpaḥ praśāmyati naca malinaṃ me mukhamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9734: evamavidyopadhānakalpitāvacchedo jīvaḥ paramātmapratibimbakalpaḥ kalpitaireva śabdādibhiḥ saṃparkāttapyate natu tattvataḥ paramātmano 'sti tāpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9736: na cāsya punaḥ saṃsārabhayamasti taddhetoravāstavatvena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9741: yathaiva pradhānakāraṇavādo brahmakāraṇavādavirodhyevaṃ paramāṇukāraṇavādo 'pyataḥ so 'pi nirākartavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9742: 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ' ityasya prapañca ārabhyate-- tatra vaiśeṣikā brahmakāraṇatvaṃ dūṣayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9753: tasya tu sāvayavatve 'bhyupagamyamāne 'nantāvayavatvena sumerurājasarṣapayoḥ samānaparimāṇatvaprasaṅga ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9755: tato 'sau paramāṇvantareṇa saṃyujyadvyaṇukamārabhate. bahavastu paramāṇavaḥ saṃyuktā na sahasā sthūlamārabhante,
GSP33vacbhamu:9758: yadi hi ghaṭopagṛhītāḥ paramāṇavo ghaṭamārabheran na ghaṭe pravibhajyamāne kapālaśarkarādyupalabhyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:9761: tathā sati mudgaraprahārāt ghaṭavināśe na kiñcidupalabhyeta,
GSP33vacbhamu:9764: tasmānna bahūnāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ dravyaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇatvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9769: tadapi hi dvyaṇukameva bhavenna tu mahat /
GSP33vacbhamu:9778: tathā ca puruṣopabhogātiśayābhāvādadṛṣṭanimittatvācca viśvanirmāṇasya bhogārtatvāttatkāraṇena ca dvyaṇukena tanniṣpatteḥ kṛtaṃ dvyaṇukāśrayeṇa dvyaṇukāntareṇetyārambhavaiyarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9779: ārambhārthavattvāya bahubhireva dvyaṇukaistryaṇukaṃ caturaṇukaṃ vā dravyaṃ mahaddīrghamārabdhavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9782: tryaṇukādibhirārabdhaṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ kāraṇabahutvādvā kāraṇamahatvādvā kāraṇapracayabhedādvā mahadbhavatīti prakriyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9783: tadetayaiva prakriyayā kāraṇasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyameva gumāntaramārabhanta iti dūṣaṇamadūṣaṇīkriyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9786: yathā mahad dravyaṃ tryaṇukādi hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9789: yathā vā tadeva tryaṇukādi dīrdhaṃ hṛsvād dvyaṇukājjāyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9793: yathā dvyaṇukamaṇu hṛsvaparimāṇaṃ parimaṇḍalāt paramāṇoraparimaṇḍalaṃ jāyata evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jaganniṣpadyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9801: yadāhi dve dve dvyaṇuke#iti paṭhitavye pramādādekaṃ dvepadaṃ na paṭhitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9803: itarathā hi dvyaṇukameva tadapi syānna tu mahadityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9808: tadevaṃ yojanīyam-- dvyaṇukādhikaraṇe ye dvitve te yadā caturaṇukamārabhete saṃkhyeyānāṃ caturṇāṃ dvyaṇukānāmārambhakatvāttattadgate dvitvasaṃkhye api ārambhike ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9809: evaṃ vyavasthitāyāṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyāyāṃ taddūṣaṇasya vyabhicāra uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9812: nāṇu jāyate no hṛsvaṃ jāyate iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:9817: kāraṇagatā guṇā na kārye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhanta ityetāvataiveṣṭasiddhau na tadhetvanusāreṇa khedanīyaṃ mana ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9818: api ca satparimāṇāntaramākrāmati notpatteśca prāk parimāṇāntaraṃ saditi kathamākrāmet /
GSP33vacbhamu:9840: paramāṇūnāmādyasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇābhyupagame 'nabhyupagame vā na karmātastadabhāvastasya dvyaṇukādikrameṇa sargasyābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9844: athavā saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthamubhayathāpi na karmātaḥ sargahetoḥ saṃyogasyābhāvāt pralayahetorvibhāgasyābhāvāttadabhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9859: gurutvadravatve ca paramāṇugate sadātane iti karmasātatyaprasaṅgaḥ. dvitīyaṃ vyākhyānamāśaṅkāpūrvamāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9869: yadyapi paramāṇukṣetrajñayoḥ saṃyogaḥ paramāṇukarmajastathāpi tatpravāhasya sātatyamiti bhāvaḥ. sarvātmanā cedupacayābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9870: ekadeśena hi saṃyoge yāvaṇvorekadeśau nirantarau tābhyāmanye ekadeśāḥ saṃyogenāvyāptā iti prathamopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9871: sarvātmanā tu nairantarye paramāṇāvekasmin paramāṇvāntarāṇyapi saṃmāntīti na prathamā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9877: nahyasti saṃbhavo niravayava ekastadaiva tenaiva saṃyuktaścāsaṃyuktaśceti,
GSP33vacbhamu:9887: nanvabhighātanodanādayaḥ pralayārambhasamaye kasmādvibhāgārambhakakarmahetavo na saṃbhavantyata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9894: yadyapi śarīrādipralayārambhe 'sti duḥkhabhogastathāpyasau pṛthivyādipralaye nāstītyabhipretyedamuditamiti mantavyam //12 //
GSP33vacbhamu:9899: na tāvat svatantraḥ samavāyo 'tyantaṃ bhinnaḥ samavāyibhyāṃ samavāyinau ghaṭayitumarhatyatiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9902: athāsau saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandhe na saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate saṃbandhisaṃbandhanaparamārthatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9904: na ca tasmin sati samabanghināvasaṃbanghinau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9905: tasmāt svabhāvādeva samavāyaḥ samavāyinorna saṃbandhāntareṇeti nānavastheti codayati-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:9912: naca tasmin sati saṃyogināvasaṃyoginau bhavata iti tulyacarcaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:9918: yadyasamavāye 'syāguṇatvaṃ bhavati kāmaṃ bhavatu na naḥ kācitkṣatiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9922: tacca vināpi samavāyaṃ svarūpataḥ saṃyogasyopapadyata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:9923: naca kāryatvātsamavāyyasamavāyikāraṇāpekṣitayā saṃyogaḥ samavāyīti yuktamca ajasaṃyogasyātathātvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9924: api ca samavāyasyāpi saṃbandhyadhīnasadbhāvasya saṃbandhinaścaikasya dvayorvā vināśitvena vināśitvātkāryatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9925: nahyasti saṃbhavo guṇo vā guṇaguṇinau vāvayavo vāvayavāvayavinau vā na sto 'pyasti ca tayoḥ saṃbandha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9927: tathā ca yathaiṣa nimittakāraṇamātrādhīnotpāda evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi /
GSP33vacbhamu:9928: atha samavāyo 'pi samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇe apekṣate tathāpi saivānavastheti /
GSP33vacbhamu:9934: tasmātsaṃyogaḥ saṃyoginoḥ samavāyena saṃbaddha iti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9943: yat kila bhūtabhautikānāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ tadrūpādimān paramāṇurnitya iti bhavadbhirabhyupeyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:9947: tadanena prasaṅgena jagatkāraṇaprasiddhaye pravṛttaṃ sādhanaṃ rūpādimannityaparamāṇusiddheḥ pracyāvya brahmagocaratāṃ nīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9964: vyapadeśasya ca pratītipūrvakasya tadabhāve nirmūlasyāpi darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:9968: yadi satāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ paridṛśyamānasthūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇāgrahaṇamavidyā tayā nityatvam,
GSP33vacbhamu:9971: athādravyatve satīti viśeṣyeta#tathā sati na dvyaṇuke vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:9978: api cādravyatve sati sattvādityata eveṣṭārthasiddheravidyeti vyartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:9988: yadi hi saṃyogasacivāni bahūni dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabheranniti prakriyā sidhyet sidhyet dravyadvayameva(?)
GSP33vacbhamu:9992: na tāvat tantvādhārastadvyatiriktaḥ paṭo nāmāsti yaḥ saṃyogasacivaistantubhirārabhyetetyuktamadhastāt. ṣaṭpadārthasya dūṣayannagre vakṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:9996: tathāhi-- mṛdvā suvarṇaṃ vā sarveṣu ghaṭarucakādiṣvanugataṃ sāmānyamanubhūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:9997: na caite ghaṭarucakādayo mṛtsuvarṇābhyāṃ vyatiricyanta ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:9999: tasmānmṛtsuvarṇe eva tena tenīkāreṇa pariṇamamāne ghaṭa iti ca rucaka iti ca kapālaśarkarākaṇamiti ca śakalakaṇikācūrṇamiti ca vyākhyāyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:10001: na tu ghaṭādayo vā kapālādiṣu kapālādayo vā ghaṭādiṣu ca rucakādayo vā śakalādiṣu śakalādayo vā rucakādiṣu pratyabhijñāyante yatra kāryakāraṇabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:10002: na ca vinaśyantameva ghaṭakṣaṇaṃ pratītya kapālakṣaṇo 'nupādāna evotpadyate tatkimupādānapratyabhijñāneneti vaktavyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:10006: evaṃ vyavasthite yathā suvarṇadravyaṃ kāṭhinyāvasthāmapahāya dravāvasthayā parigaṇitaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10007: na ca tatrāvayavavibhāgaḥ sannapi dravatve kāraṇaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10010: api tu yadā yadā nirūpyante tadā tadā tadākāratayaiva prathante na tu prathāyāmeṣāmasti svātantryaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10011: tasmānnātiricyante dravyādapi tu dravyameva sāmānyarūpaṃ tathā tathā prathata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10020: yatra hi dvāvākāriṇau vibhinnābhyāmākārābhyāmavagamyate tau saṃbaddhāsaṃbaddhau vā vaiyadhikaraṇyena pratibhāsete,
GSP33vacbhamu:10021: yatheha kuṇḍe dadhi yathā vā gauraśva iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10030: yadi tu saṃyoginoḥ kāryayoḥ saṃbandhibhyāmanyadeśatve yutasiddhistato 'nyāyutasiddhiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10032: tathā cākāśaparamāṇvoḥ paramāṇvośca saṃyuktayoryutasiddhiḥ siddhā bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10045: evaṃ lakṣaṇe 'pi hi samavāye guṇaguṇinorabhyupagamyamāne saṃbaddhe iti pratyayaḥ syānna tādātmyapratyayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10047: sa cedāsthito 'pi na pratyayamimamupapādayet kṛtaṃ tatkalpanayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10050: tadgocaratve hi paṭe śukla ityevamākaraḥ syānna tu paṭaḥ śukla iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10053: nahyagnirmāṇavaka ityupacaritāgnibhāvo māṇavakaḥ pratyakṣeṇa dahanātmanā prathate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10055: guṇādisadbhāve tadbhede ca pratyakṣānubhavādanyasya pramāṇasyābhāvāttasya ca bhrāntatve sarvābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10067: saṃbandhidvayādhīnasadbhāvo hi saṃbandho nāsatyekasminnapi saṃbandhini bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10068: naca samavāyo nityaḥ svatantra iti coktamadhastāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10070: evaṃ hi sati samavāyasya nityatvābhyupagamāt kāraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10071: utpattau ca samavāyasya saiva kāryasyāstu kiṃ samavāyena /
GSP33vacbhamu:10076: kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyate itīdaṃ duruktaṃ syāt# /
GSP33vacbhamu:10090: saṃyogajo 'pi hi saṃyogo bhavadbhirabhyupeyate na kriyāja evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10094: api ca saṃbandhirūpātirikte saṃbandhe siddhe tadavāntarabhedāya lakṣaṇabhedo 'nuśrīyeta sa eva tu saṃbandhyatirikto 'siddhaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10095: uktaṃ hi parastādatiriktaḥ saṃbandhibhyāṃ saṃbandho 'saṃbaddho na saṃbandhinau ghaṭayitumiṣṭe /
GSP33vacbhamu:10099: tasmāt kāryasya kāraṇādanatirekān kiṃ kena saṃbaddhaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10100: saṃyogasya ca saṃyogibhyāmanatirekāt kastayoḥ saṃyoga ityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10111: parāpekṣayā tu pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10132: saṃśleṣaḥ saṃgraho yata ekasaṃbandhyākarṣe saṃbandhyantarākarṣo bhavati tasyānupapattiriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10136: nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpanīyaḥ samavāya iti cet# /
GSP33vacbhamu:10155: kiṃ sūkṣmatvāt paramāṇavo na vinaśyantyatha niravayavatayā tatra pūrvasmin kalpe idamuktam-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10164: api tu saṃyuktā eva santaḥ paraṃ prathanena nudyamānā adhikadeśavyāpakā bhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10165: evamagnisaṃyogena suvarṇadravyāvayavāḥ saṃyuktā eva santo dravībhāvamāpadyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:10169: evamantareṇāpyavayavasaṃyogavināśaṃ paramāṇavo vinaṅkṣyantyanye cotpatsyanta iti sarvamavadātam //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10175: te hi paramāṇvākāśādikkālātmamanasāṃ ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcinnityatvamabhyupetya śeṣāṇāṃ niranvayavināśamupayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10177: tena tadupanyāso vaināśikatvasāmyena sarvavaināśikān smārayatīti tadanantaraṃ vaināśikamatanirākaraṇamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10187: atha tvatrabhavatāṃ sarvajñānāṃ tattvapratipattibhedo na saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10193: ye tu prakṛṣṭamatayastebhyaḥ sākṣādeva śūnyatātattvaṃ pratipādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10209: rūpyante ebhiriti rūpyanta iti ca vyutpatyā saviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi rūpaskandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10210: yadyapi rūpyamāṇāḥ pṛthivyādayo bāhyāstathāpi kāyasthatvādvā indriyasaṃbandhādvā bhavantyādhyātmikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10212: vedanāskandho yā priyāpriyānubhayaviṣayasparśe suḥkhaduḥkhatadrahitaviśeṣāvasthā cittasya jāyate sa vedanāskandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10214: yathā ḍitthaḥ kuṇḍalī gauro brāhmaṇo gacchatītyevañjātīyakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10222: rūpavijñānādiskandhahetuke ca samudāya ādhyātmike 'bhipreyamāṇe tadaprāptistasya samudāyasyāyuktatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10226: cetano hi kulālādiḥ sarvaṃ mṛddaṇḍādyupasaṃhṛtya samudāyātmakaṃ ghaṭamāracayan dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10227: nahyasati mṛddaṇḍādivyāpārīṇi viduṣi kulāle svayamacetanā mṛddaṇḍādayo vyāpṛtya jātu ghaṭamāracayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10228: na cāsati kuvinde tantuvemādayaḥ paṭaṃ vayante /
GSP33vacbhamu:10230_2: cetanānadhiṣṭhitebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyo vyāvartamānā cetanādhiṣṭhitatva avāvatiṣṭhata iti
GSP33vacbhamu:10233: taddhīndriyādiviṣayasparśe satyabhijvalat tatkāraṇacakraṃ yathāyathā kāryāya paryāptaṃ tathātathā prakāśayadacetanāni kāraṇānyadhiṣṭhāya kāryamabhinirvartayatīti, tatrāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10246: yadyucyeta asamavahitānyeva kāraṇāni kāryaṃ kariṣyanti parasparānapekṣāṇi,
GSP33vacbhamu:10252: yat khalvekaṃ yadi sthiramāsthīyeta tato nāmāntareṇātmaiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:10261: tena vyāpāravatā vyāpārātpūrvaṃ vyāpārasamaye ca bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10269: ayamarthaḥ-- saṃkṣepato hi pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇamuktaṃ buddhena 'idaṃ pratyayaphalam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10272: atha punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataśca pratyayopanibandhataśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10274: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ-- yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuro 'ṅkurātpatraṃ patrātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnālo nālādgarbho garbhācchūkaḥ śūkātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10279: tatra bījasya naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamaṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10280: . aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahaṃ bījena nirvartita iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10281: evaṃ yāvatpuṣpasya naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ phalaṃ nirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10283: tasmādasatyapi caitanye bījādīnāmasatyapi cānyasminnadhiṣṭhātari kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamo dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10291: tatra ca pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karoti yato 'ṅkuraḥ kaṭhino bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10297: tadeteṣāmavikalānāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāye bīje rohityaṅkuro jāyate nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10298: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ bījasya saṃgrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10301: tathādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ bhavati hetūpanibandhataḥ pratyayopanibandhataśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10302: tatrāsya hetūpanibandho yadidamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇādaya udapatsyanta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10304: saṃskārāṇāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayamavidyayā nirvartitā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10305: evaṃ yāvajjātyā api naivaṃ bhavatyahaṃ jarāmaraṇādyabhinirvartayāmīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10306: jarāmaraṇādīnāmapi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirnirvartitā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10307: atha ca satsvavidyādiṣu svayamacetaneṣu cetanāntarānadhiṣṭhiteṣvapi saṃskārādīnāmutpattiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10317: yastu nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati pañcavijñānakāryasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10319: yadā hyādhyātmikāḥ pṛthivyādidhātavo bhavantyavikalāstadā sarveṣāṃ samavāyādbhavati kāyasyotpattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10320: tatra pṛthivyādidhātūnāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ kāyasya kāṭhinyādi nirvartayāma iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10321: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati jñānamahamebhiḥ pratyayairabhinirvartita iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10371: janmādihetukā avidyādayo 'vidyādihetukāśca janmādayo ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamānāḥ santīti tadetairavidyādibhi #
GSP33vacbhamu:10376: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-- yat khalu hetūpanibandhaṃ kāryaṃ tadanyānapekṣaṃ hetumātrādhīnotpādatvādutpadyatāṃ nāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:10385: na caikasmādeva kāraṇātkāryasiddheḥ kimanyaiḥ kāraṇairiti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10387: na caiko 'pitatkāraṇasamarthaṃ ityanya udāsata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10388: nahi te prekṣāvanto yenaisamālocayeyurasmāsu samartha eko 'pi kārye iti kṛtaṃ naḥ saṃnidhineti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10390: tāṃśca sarvananapekṣān pratītya kāryamapi na netpattumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10391: naca svamahimnā sarve kāryamutpādayanto 'pi nānākāryāṇāmīsate tatraiva teṣāṃ sāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10397_0: hantānena krameṇa tataḥ pūrve tataḥ pūrve sarva evānapekṣāstattatsvakāryopajanana
GSP33vacbhamu:10397_2: bījakṣaṇo janayitavyaḥ so 'napekṣa eva bījakṣaṇaḥ svakāryopajanane evaṃ sarva eva
GSP33vacbhamu:10397_3: tadantarānantapavartino bījakṣaṇa anapekṣā iti kusūlanihitabīja eva syāt kṛtī kṛṣīvalaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:10398: yena hi bījakṣaṇena svakṣaṇaparamparayāṅkuro janayitavyastasyānapekṣāsau kṣaṇaparamparā kusūla evāṅkuraṃ kariṣyatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10399: tasmātparasparāpekṣā evāntyā vā madhyā vā pūrve vā kṣaṇāḥ kāryopajanana iti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10416: .tacca sthirapakṣe 'pi satyapi ca bhoktaryaghiṣṭhātāraṃ cetanamantareṇa na saṃbhavati kimaṅga,
GSP33vacbhamu:10419: sa tu bhoktāpi nāstīti dūrotsāritatvaṃ darśayati-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10421: api ca bahava upakāryopakārakabhāvena sthitāḥ kāryaṃ janayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10429: yadā hi pratyayopanibandhaḥ pratītyasamutpādo bhavettadā cetano 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣetāpi,
GSP33vacbhamu:10432: hetuḥ svabhāvata eva kāryasaṃghātaṃ kariṣyati kevala iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10433: astu tāvadyathā kevalādhetoḥ kāryaṃ nopajāyata iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:10438: asthirā api hi bhāvāḥ sadā saṃhatā evodayante vyante ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10440: tathā ca kṛtamatra saṃhantrā cetaneneti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10445: sa khalu saṃghātasaṃtativarti dharmādharmāhvayaḥ saṃskārasaṃtāno yathāyathaṃ sukhaduḥkhe janayannāgantukaṃ kañcanānāsādya svata eva janayet,āsādya vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10450: tasmādanenāgatantukānapekṣasya saṃdhātasaṃtānasyaiva sadṛśajanane visadṛśajanane vā svabhāva āstheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10454: aprāptabhogo hi bhogamāptukāmastatsādhane pravartata iti pratyātmasiddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:10455: seyaṃ pravṛttirbhogādanyasmin sthire bhoktari bhogatatsādhanasamayavyāpini kalpyate nāsthire /
GSP33vacbhamu:10457: nahi bhogo bhogāya kalpate nāpyanyo bhogāyānyasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:10479: kāraṇasya hi kāryotpādāt prākkālasattār'thavatī na kāryakālā,
GSP33vacbhamu:10480: tadā kāryasya siddhatvena tatsidydharthāyāḥ sattāyā anupayogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10483: bhūtvā vyāpṛtya bhāvāḥ prayeṇa hi kāryaṃ kurvanto loke dṛśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:10488: yathāhuḥ-- 'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate 'iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10489: bhavatyevaṃ vyāpāravattā tathāpi kṣaṇikasya na kāraṇatvamityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10492: yadi ca na kāryasamaye kāraṇaṃ sat kathaṃ teṣāṃ tadātmanānubhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10493: naca kāraṇasādṛśyaṃ kāryasya na tu tādātmyamiti vācyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10497: sarvathā vailakṣaṇye tu hetuphalabhāvastantughaṭādāvapi prāptaṃ ityatiprasaṅga ityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10503: api ca cotpādanirodhayorvikalpatraye 'pi vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga ityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10517: evaṃ sukhādīnāmapi caittānāṃ cittābhinnahetujānāṃ catvāryotānyeva kāraṇāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:10518: seyaṃ pratijñā caturvidhān hetūn pratītya cittacaittā utpadyanta ityabhāvakāraṇatva uparudhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10532: hetuphalabhāvena hi vyavasthitāḥ saṃtānina evodayavyayadharmāṇaḥ saṃtānāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10535: sa kiṃ phalaṃ kiñcidārabhate na vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10541: tadasatve tajjanakamapyasajjanakatvenāsadityanena krameṇāsantaḥ sarva eva saṃtānina iti tatsaṃtāno nitarāmasanniti kasya pratisaṃkhyayā nirodha- /
GSP33vacbhamu:10546: kathañcitsārūpye vā visabhāge 'pyantataḥ sattayā tadastīti na saṃtānocchedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10550: atra tāvadutpannamātrāpravṛttasya bhāvasya na pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10554: yato niranvayo vināśo na saṃbhavatyato nirūpākhyo 'pi na saṃbhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10562: tasya ca sarvatra pratyabhijñāyamānatvānna vināśa ityavasthāvato 'vināśānnāvasthānāṃ niranvayo vināśa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10567: yenāsya na niranvayo nāśaḥ syādityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10569: atrāpi tattoyaṃ tejasā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalamambudatvāya nīyata ityanumeyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10571: śakyaṃ tatra vaktum'udambindau ca sindhau ca toyabhāvona bhidyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10584: tathāhi-- jātimattvena sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyebhyo vibhaktasya śabdasyāsparśatve sati bāhyaikendriyagrāhyatvena gandhādivadguṇatvamanumitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10590: tasmādguṇo bhūtvā gandhādivadasādhāraṇendriyagrāhyo yadravyamanumāpayati tadākāśaṃ pañcamaṃ bhūtaṃ vastviti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10600_1: smṛtirupapatsyata iti manyamāno na parituṣyati taṃ prati pratyabhijñāsamājñātapratyakṣavirodhamāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10614: na tu tattvataḥ pūrvāparau kṣaṇau tayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ vā gṛhṇāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10619: nānāpadārthasaṃbhinnavākyārthābhāsastāvadayaṃ vikalpaḥ prathate tatraite nānāpadārthā na prathanta iti bruvāṇaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ bādheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10623: tathāsati pratyākāraṃ jñānānāṃ samāptesteṣāṃ ca parasparavārtājñānābhāvānnānetyeva na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10626: yadyucyeta astytasmin vikalpe tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti padadvayaprayogo na tviha tattedantāspadau padārthau tayośca sādṛśyamiti vivakṣitam,
GSP33vacbhamu:10631: na caitatsarvamasati vikalpānāṃ bāhyālambanatve 'sati ca lokaprasiddhapadārthakatve bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10632: jñānākāratve hi vikalpapratibhāsināṃ nityatvānityatvādīnāmekārthaviṣayatvābhāvāt jñānānāṃ ca dharmiṇāṃ bhedānna virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10634: na cālaukikārthenānityaśabdenātmani vibhutvaṃ vivakṣitvānityaśabdaṃ prayuñjāno laukikārthaṃ nityaśabdamātmani prayuñjānena vipratipadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10635: tasmādanena svapakṣaṃ pratitiṣṭhāpayiṣatā parapakṣasādhanaṃ ca nirācikīrṣatā vikalpānāṃ lokasiddhapadārthakatā bāhyalambanatā ca vaktavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10636: yadyucyeta dvividho hi vikalpānāṃ viṣayo grāhyaścādhyavaseyaśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10638: tathāca pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahalakṣaṇā vipratipattiḥ prasiddhapadārthakatvaṃ copapadyata ityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10649: nahi jātu sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10651: api ca tathāsati yukta iti pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10654: yadi gṛhyamāṇe tadā kiṃ vikalpenāho tatsamayajenāvikalpakena /
GSP33vacbhamu:10659: na ca tatsamayabhāvinā nirvikalpakena gṛhyamāṇe bāhye vikalpenāgṛhīte tatra vikalpaḥ svākāramāropayitumarhati. /
GSP33vacbhamu:10660: na hi rajatajñānāpratibhāsini purovartini vastuni rajatajñānena śakyaṃ rajatamāropayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10661: agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye svākāra ityeva syānna bāhya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10663: api cāyaṃ vikalpaḥ svasaṃvedanaṃ santaṃ vikalpaṃ kiṃ vastusantaṃ svākāraṃ gṛhītvā paścādbāhyamāropayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10665: na tāvat kṣaṇikatayā kramavirahiṇo jñānasya kramavartinī grahaṇāropaṇe kalpete /
GSP33vacbhamu:10669: bāhyaṃ cāropyamāṇamaviśadaṃ sattato 'nyadeva syānna tu svākāraḥ samāropitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10673: hanta tarhi trailokyata evānena na bhedo gṛhīta iti yatra kvacana pravartetāviśeṣāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10676: api ca sādṛśyanibandhanaḥ saṃvyavahārastenedaṃ sadṛśamityevamākārabuddhinibandhano bhavenna tu tadevedamityākārabuddhinibandhana ityāha-- na #
GSP33vacbhamu:10678: nanu jvālādiṣu sādṛśyādasatyāmapi sādṛśyabuddhau tadbhāvāvagamananibandhanaḥ saṃvyahāro dṛśyate yathā tatheheti bhaviṣyatīti pūrvāparitoṣeṇāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10680: tathāhi -- vividhajanasaṃkīrṇagopureṇa puraṃ niviśamānaṃ narāntarebhya ātmanirdhāraṇāyāsādhāraṇaṃ cihnaṃ vidadhatamupahasanti pāśupataṃ pṛthagjanā iti //25 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10698: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-- kūṭastho hi kāryajananasvabhāvo vā syādatatsvabhāvo vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10699: sa cetkāryajananasvabhāvastato yāvadanena kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ tāvatsahasaiva kuryāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10702: yadyucye samartho 'pi kramavatsahakārisacivaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇi karotīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10709: bhede tūpakārasya tasmin sati kāryasya bhāvādasati cābhāvātsatyapi kūṭasthe kāryānutpādādanvayavyatirekābhyāmupakāra eva kāryakārī na bhāva iti nārthakriyākārī bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10710: taduktam- varṣātapābhyāṃ kiṃ vyomnaścarmaṇyasti tayoḥ phalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10725: viśeṣaṇayoge vā so 'pi bhāvaḥ syānna nirūpākhya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10728: api ca yadyenānanvitaṃ na tattasya vikāraḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10737: sthiro 'pi bhāvaḥ kramavatsahakārisamavadhānāt krameṇa kāryāṇi karoti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10739: sa cāsya sahakāribhirādhīyamānā upakāro na bhinno nāpyabhinnaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10745: tathā ca śrutiḥ- mṛttiketyeva satyam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10746: apica ye 'pi sarvato vilakṣaṇāni svalakṣaṇāni vastusantyāsthiṣata,
GSP33vacbhamu:10749: nahi bījādbījāntarasya vā kramelakasya vātyantavailakṣaṇye kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10755: prapañcastu brahmatatvasamīkṣānyāyakaṇikayoḥ kṛta iti neha pratamyate vistarabhayāt //26. //
GSP33vacbhamu:10765: atha pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitiriti hi catusṛṣu vidhāsu tatvaparisamāptirāsāmānyatamābhāve 'pi tattvasyāvyavasthānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10766: tasmādanena vijñānaskandhamātraṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā catasro vidhā eṣitavyāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10768: nahyasti saṃbhavo vijñānamātraṃ catasro vidhāścetyata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10771: tathāpi buddhyārūḍhena buddhiparikalpitenānyastha evaiṣa pramāṇaprameyaphalavyavahāraḥ pramātṛvyavahāraścetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10776: tathāhi- svarūpaṃ vijñānasyāsatyākārayuktaṃ prameyaṃ prameyaprakāśanaṃ pramāṇaphalaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10778: bāhyavādinorapi vaibhāṣikasautrāntikayoḥ kālpanika eva pramāṇaphalavyavahāro 'bhimata ityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:10783: nahi khadiragocare paraśau palāśe dvaidhībhāvo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10787: na ca jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇamanaṃśamaṃśābhyāṃ vastusabhdyāṃ yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10801: sa hi vijñānālambanatvābhimato bāhyor'thaḥ paramāṇustāvanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10807: kimayaṃ pratibhāsasya jñānasya dharma uta pratibhāsanakāler'thasya dharmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10813: tathā hi-- rūpaparimāṇava eva nirantaramutpannā ekavijñānopārohiṇaḥ sthaulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10820: pratibhāsadaśāpannānāṃ tu teṣāṃ bhaviṣyati bahutvādivatsāṃvṛtaṃ sthaulyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10824: sāṃvṛtaṃ grahaṇaṃ nānyatra ca vastugraho bhramaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:10828_0: gandharasasparśaparamāṇvantaritā hi te rūpaparamāṇavo na nirantarāḥ tasmādārātsāntareṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:10828_1: vṛkṣeṣvekadhanavanapratyayavadeṣa sthūlapratyayaḥ paramāṇuṣu sāntareṣu bhrānta eveti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10829: tasmāt kalpanāpoḍhatve 'pi bhrāntatvāddhaṭādipratyayasya pītaśaṅkhādijñānavanna pratyakṣatā paramāṇugocaratvābhyupagame /
GSP33vacbhamu:10839: apratibhāsamānasadbhāve ca pramāṇābhāvānna bāhyālambanāḥ pratyayā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10841: nahi yathendriyamarthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ janayatyevaṃ vijñānamaparaṃ vijñānaṃ janayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10845: nahyasti saṃbhavo 'pratyutpanno dharmī dharmāścāsya pratyutpannā iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10847: taccānākāraṃ sadājānato bhedābhāvāt kathamarthabhedaṃ vyavasthāpayediti tadbhedavyavasthāpanāyākārabhedo 'syaiṣitavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10855: yadyena saha niyatasahopalambhanaṃ tattato na bhidyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:10858: niṣedhyo hi bhedaḥ sahopalambhāniyamena vyāpto yathā bhinnāvaśvinau nāvaśyaṃ sahopavabhyete kadācidabhrāpidhāne 'nyatarasyaikasyopalabdheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10859: so 'yamiha bhedavyāpakāniyamavirūddho niyama upalabhyamānastadvyāpyaṃ bhedaṃ nivartayatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10864: yo yaḥ pratyayaḥ sa sarvo bāhyānāvambanaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10866: tathā caiṣa vivādādhyāsitaḥ pratyaya iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10867: bāhyānālambanatā hi pratyayatvamātrānubandhinī vṛkṣateva śiṃśapātvamātrānubandhinīti tanmātrānubandhini nirālambanatve sādhye bhavati pratyayatvaṃ svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10871: sa hi mene ye yasmin satyapi kādācitkāste sarve tadatiriktahetusāpekṣāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:10873: tathā ca vivādādhyāsitāḥ satyapyālayavijñānasaṃtāne ṣaḍapi pravṛttipratyayā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10877: tasyāśca svakāryopajanaṃ pratyābhimukhyaṃ paripākastasya ca pratyayaḥ svasaṃtānavartī pūrvakṣaṇaḥ saṃtānāntarāpekṣānabhyupagamāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:10882: nanvevamekasyaiva nīlajñānopajanasāmarthyaṃ tatprabodhasāmarthyaṃ ceti kṣaṇāntarasyaitanna syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10883: satve vā kathaṃ kṣaṇabhedātsāmarthyabheda ityālayasaṃtānavartinaḥ sarve samarthā iti samarthahetusadbhāve kāryakṣepānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10884: svasaṃtānamātrādhīnatve niṣedhyasya kādācitkatvasya viruddhaṃ sadātanatvaṃ tasyopalabdhyā kādācitkatvaṃ nivartamānaṃ hetvantarāpekṣatve vyavatiṣṭhata iti pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10885: naca jñānasaṃtānāntaranibandhanatvaṃ sarveṣāmiṣyate pravṛttivijñānānāṃ vijñānavādibhirapi tu kasyacideva vicchinnagamanavacanapratibhāsasya pravṛttivijñānasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:10886: api ca sattvāntarasaṃtānanimittatve tasyāpi sadā saṃnidhānānna kādācitkatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:10887: na hi sattvāntarasaṃtānasya deśataḥ kālato vā viprakarṣasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10889: tasmādasati bāhyer'the pratyayavaicitryānupapatterastyānumāniko bāhyārtha iti sautrāntikāḥ pratipedire,
GSP33vacbhamu:10893: tathāhi-- bāhyanimittakatve 'pi kathaṃ kadācit nīlasaṃvedanaṃ kadācit pītasaṃvedanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10895: atha pītasaṃnidhāne 'pi kimiti nīlajñānaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10900: evaṃ tarhi kṣaṇānāmapi svakāraṇabhedanibandhaḥ śaktibhedo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:10901: saṃtānino hi kṣaṇāḥ kāryabhedahetavaste ca pratikāryaṃ bhidyante ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:10902: na ca saṃtāno nāma kaścideka utpādakaḥ kṣaṇānāṃ yadabhedāt kṣaṇā na bhidyeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:10905: anyathaika eva kṣaṇe nīlajñānajananasāmarthyaṃ iti na bhūyo nīlajñānāni jāyeran. tatsamarthasyātītatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:10911: hanta tarhi nīlasaṃtānānāmapi mitho bhinnānāṃ naikamasti nīlākārādhānasāmarthyamiti saṃnidhāne 'pi nīlasaṃtānāntarasya na nīlajñānamupajāyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:10912: tasmātsaṃtānāntarāṇāmiva kṣaṇāntarāṇāmapi svakāraṇabhedādhīnopajanānāṃ keṣāñcideva sāmarthyabhedaḥ keṣāñcinneti vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10913: tathā caikālayajñānasaṃtānapatiteṣu kasyacideva jñānakṣaṇasya sa tādṛśaḥ sāmarthyātiśayo vāsanāparanāmā svapratyayāsāditaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10914: yato nīlākāraṃ pravṛttivijñānaṃ jāyate na pītākāram /
GSP33vacbhamu:10915: kasyacittu sa tādṛśo yataḥ pītākāraṃ jñānaṃ na nīlākāramiti vāsanāvaicitryādeva svapratyayāsāditājjñānavaicitryasiddherna tadatiriktārthasadbhāve kiñcanāsti pramāṇamiti paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10930: nahi sphuṭatare sarvajanīna upalambhe sati tadabhāvaḥ śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10935: upalabdhigrāhiṇā hi sākṣiṇopalabdhirgṛhyamāṇā bāhyaviṣayatvenaiva gṛhyate nopalabdhimātramityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10944: idamatrākūtam-- ghaṭapaṭādayo hi sthūlā bhāsante na tu paramasūkṣmāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10945_2: nānātvaṃ prasajyamānaṃ jñānākāratve 'pi na śakyaṃ śakreṇāpi vārayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:10953: na ca tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī samastajñānākārasaṃkalanātmaka ekaḥ sthūlavikalpo vijṛmbhata iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10955: yathāha dharmakīrtiḥ- 'tasmānnārthe na ca jñāne sthūlābhāsastadātmanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10965: yaśca sahopalambhaniyama uktaḥ śo 'pi vkalpaṃ na sahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:10966: yadi jñānārthayoḥ sāhityenopalambhastato viruddho heturnābhedaṃ sādhayitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:10970: api ca kimekatvenopalambha āho eka upālambho jñānārthayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10974: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayo 'rupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityavagantavyam# /
GSP33vacbhamu:10975: yathā hi sarvaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ prabhārūpānuviddhaṃ buddhibodhyaṃ niyamena manujairupalabhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:10979: api ca yatraikavijñānagocarau ghaṭapaṭau tatrārthabhedaṃ vijñānabhedaṃ cādyavasyanti pratipattāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:10984: api ca svarūpamātraparyavasitaṃ jñānaṃ jñānāntaravārtānabhijñamiti yayorbhedaste dve na gṛhīte iti bhedo 'pi tadgato na gṛhīta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:10986: evaṃ svamasādhāraṇamanyato vyāvṛtaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya tadapi yadvyāvartate yataśca vyāvartate tadanekajñānasādhyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:10997: evaṃ mokṣapratijñā ca yo mucyate yataśca mucyate yena mucyate tadanekajñānasādhyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:10998: evaṃ vipratipannaṃ pratipādayituṃ pratijñeti yatpratipādayati yena pratipādayati yaśca tadanekajñānasādhyetyasatyekasminnanekārthajñānapratisaṃghātari nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11001: api ca bhedāśrayaḥ karmaphalabhāvo nābhinne jñāne bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11002: no khalu chidā chidyate kintu dāru /
GSP33vacbhamu:11004: tadihāpi na jñānaṃ svāṃśena jñeyamātmani vṛttivirodhādapi tu tadatiriktor'thaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11011: ayamarthaḥ-- svarūpādatiriktamarthaṃ cedvijñānaṃ gṛhṇāti tatastadapratyakṣaṃ sannarthaṃ pratyakṣayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11016: taccet jñānāntareṇa pratīyeta tadapratītaṃ nārthaviṣayaṃ jñānamaparokṣayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11017: evaṃ tattadityanavasthā tasmādanavasthāyā bibhyatā varaṃ svātmani vṛttirāsthitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11025: apitu tasminnindriyārthasaṃnikarṣādantaḥ karaṇavikārabheda utpannamātra eva prabhāturarthaścopalambhaśca pratyakṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11032: tasmādyathā chettā chidayā chedyaṃ vṛkṣādi vyāpnoti,
GSP33vacbhamu:11036: yathā vā paktā pākyaṃ pākena vyāpnoti nanu pākaṃ pākāntareṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:11037: nāpi pāka eva paktā kintu svata eva devadettādiḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11038: evaṃ pramātā prameyaṃ nīlādi pramayā vyāpnoti na tu pramāṃ pramāntareṇa,
GSP33vacbhamu:11040: kintu svata eva pramāyāḥ pramātā vyāpakaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11041: na ca pramātari kūṭasthanityacaitanye pramāpekṣāsaṃbhavo yataḥ pramātuḥ pramāyāḥ pramātrantarāpekṣāyāmanavasthā bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11042: tasmāt suṣṭhūktaṃ 'vijñānagrahaṇamātra eva vijñānasākṣiṇaḥ pramātuḥ kūṭasthanityacaitanyasya grahaṇakāṅkṣānutpādāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11048: grāhyatvaṃ ca jñānasya na grāhakakriyājanitaphalaśālitayā yathā bāhyārthasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:11049: phale phalāntarānupapatteḥ. yathāhuḥ-- 'na saṃvidaryate phalatvāt' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11051: grāhyo 'pyarthaḥ pramātāraṃ prati satyāṃ saṃvidi prakaṭaḥ saṃvidapi prakaṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11053: syādetatṣa yatprakāśate tadanyena prakāśyate yathā jñānārthau tathā ca sākṣiti nāsti pratyayasākṣiṇorvaiṣamyamityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11055: tathāhi-- asya sākṣiṇaḥ sadāsaṃdigdhāviparītasya nityasākṣātkāratānāgantukaprakāśatve ghaṭate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11056: tathāhi-- pramātā saṃdihāno 'pyasaṃdigdho viparyasyannapyaviparītaḥ parokṣamarthamutprekṣamāṇo 'pyaparokṣaḥ smarannapyanubhavikaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:11061: ca pradīpavadvijñānamavabhāsakāntaranirapekṣaṃ svayameva prathata iti bruvatāpramāṇagamyaṃ vijñānamanavagantṛkamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11067: na phalasya kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ vāstīti pradīpavatkartrantarameṣitavyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11071: nanu sākṣisthāne 'stvasmadabhimatameva vijñānaṃ tathā ca nāmnyeva vipratipattirnārthā iti śaṅkate-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11076: bhavanti hi vijñānasyotpādādayo dharmā abhyupetāstathā cāsya phalatayā nāvagantṛtvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11085: jāgratpratyayasya tu bādhyatve svapnapratyayasyāsau na bādhako bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11087: tathā ca na svapnapratyayo mithyeti sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt svapnavaditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:11088: tasmādbādhābādhābhyāṃ vaidharmyānna svapnapratyayadṛṣṭāntena jāgratpratyayasya śakyaṃ nirālambanatvamadhyavasātum /
GSP33vacbhamu:11098: sāpi ca nidrādoṣādviparītāvartamānamapi pitrādi vartamānatayā bhāsayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11101: api ca svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe jāgratpratyayānāṃ yathārthatvamanubhavasiddhaṃ nānumānenānyathayituṃ śakyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:11119: yadi sākāraṃ vijñānaṃ saṃbhavati bāhyaścārthaḥ sthūlasūkṣmavikalpenāsaṃbhavī hantaivamarthajñāne sattena tāvadvicāraṃ na sahete /
GSP33vacbhamu:11132: - śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nādaraḥ kriyate# /
GSP33vacbhamu:11134: taiḥ khalu satsaditi gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtamaviparītaṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11136: sadasatośca vicārāsahatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatā sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddhaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11138: yadyucyeta tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pramāṇānāmanena vicāreṇa vyudasyate na sāṃvyavahārikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11141: pramāṇāni hi svagocare pravartamānāni tattvamidamityeva pravartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:11143: na punaḥ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ naḥ prāmāṇyaṃ na tu tāttvikamityeva pravartante /
GSP33vacbhamu:11145: yathā śuktikeyaṃ na rajataṃ marīcayo na toyamekaścandro na candradvayamityādi,
GSP33vacbhamu:11146: tadvadihāpi samastapramāṇagocaraviparītatattvāntaravyavasthāpanenātāttvikatvameṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakena darśanīyaṃ na tvavyavasthāpitatattvāntareṇa pramāṇāni śakyāni bādhitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:11147: vicārāsahatvaṃ vastūnāṃ tattvaṃ vyavasthāpayadbādhakamatāttvikatvaṃ pramāṇānāṃ darśayatīti cet,
GSP33vacbhamu:11149: kiṃ tadvastu paramārthataḥ sadādīnāmanyatamat kevalaṃ vicāraṃ na sahate,
GSP33vacbhamu:11151: tatra paramārthataḥ sadādīnīmanyatamadvicāraṃ na sahata iti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:11154: atha nistattvaṃ cet kathamanyatamattattvamavyavasthāpya śakyamevaṃ vaktum /
GSP33vacbhamu:11157: so 'pi ca vicāraṃ na sahata ityuktaṃ bhavadbhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11159: āropaśca tattvādhiṣṭhāno dṛṣṭo yathā śuktikādiṣu rajatādeḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11160: na cet kiñcidasti tattvaṃ kasya kasminnāropaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11162: tacca tattvaṃ vyavasthāpyātāttvikatvena sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pramāṇānāṃ bādhakenopapadyata iti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ //31 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11171: evaṃ kṣaṇikatvamabhyupetya 'utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā'iti nityatāmupaitītyādi bahūnnetavyamiti //32 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11187: pudgalāstikāyāḥ ṣoḍhā- pṛthivyādīni catvāri bhūtāni sthāraṃ jaṅgamaṃ cti dharmāstikāyaḥ pravṛttyanumeyo 'dharmāstikāyāḥ sthityanumeyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11194: tatra mithyā pravṛttirāsravaḥ. samyakpravṛttī tu saṃvaranirjarau /
GSP33vacbhamu:11196: indriyadvārā hi pauruṣaṃ jyotirviṣayān spṛśadrūpādijñānarūpeṇa pariṇamata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11202: sā hyāsravasrotaso dvāraṃ saṃvṛṇotāti saṃvara ucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11204: sa hi niḥśeṣaṃ puṇyāpuṇyaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogena jarayatīti nirjaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11212: āhartadarśanābhyāsānna mokṣa iti jñānaṃ darśanāvaraṇīyaṃ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:11213: bahuṣu vipratiṣiddheṣu tīrthakarairupadarśiteṣu mokṣamārgeṣu viśeṣānavadhāraṇaṃ mohanīyaṃ karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:11226: anye tūrdhvagamanaśīlo hi jīvo dharmādharmāstikāyena baddhastaddhimokṣādyadūrdhvaṃ gacchetyeva sa mokṣa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11242: yadi punarayamanekāntadyotakaḥ syācchabdo na bhavet syādastītivākye syātpadamanarthakaṃ syāt tadidamuktam-- 'arthayogitvāt'iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11243: anaikāntadyotakatve tu syādasti kathañcidastīti syātpadātkathañcidartho 'stītyanenānuktaḥ pratīyata iti nānarthakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11246: 'kiṃvṛtte pratyaye khalvayaṃ cinnipātavidhinā sarvathaikāntatyāgāt saptasvekānteṣu yo bhaṅgastatra yo nayastadapekṣaḥ san heyopādeyabhedāya syādvādaḥ kalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11247_0: tathāhi-- yadi vastvastyevetyevaikāntatastat sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanāstyeveti
GSP33vacbhamu:11247_1: na tadīpsājihāsābhyāṃ kvacit kadācit kathañcit kaścit pravarteta nivarteta vā prāptāprāpaṇīyatvāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:11249: anaikāntapakṣe tu kvacit kadācit kasyacit kathañcit sattve hānopādāne prekṣāvatāṃ kalpete iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11256: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- satyaṃ yadasti vastutastatsarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanā nirvacanīyena rūpaṇāstyeva na nāsti,
GSP33vacbhamu:11264: laukikānāmabādhena tu tadvyavasthāyāṃ dehātmābhimānasyāpyabādhena tāttvikatve sati lokāyatamatāpātena nāstikatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11265: paṇḍitarūpāṇāṃ tu dehātmābhimānasya vicārato bādhanaṃ prapañcasyāpyanaikāntasya tulyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11266: api ca sadasattvayoḥ parasparaviruddhatvena samuccayābhāve vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11268_0: tasmāt sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānavat saptatvapañcatvanirdhāraṇasya phalasya nirdhārayituśca
GSP33vacbhamu:11268_1: pramātustatkaraṇasya pramāṇasya ca tatprameyasya ca saptatvapañcatvasya sadasattvasaṃśaye
GSP33vacbhamu:11277: ye hi paricchinnāste sarve 'nityā yathā ghaṭādayastathā cātmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11282: manuṣyakāyaparimāṇo hi jīvo na hastikāyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vyāptumarhatyalpatvādityātmanaḥ kṛtsnaśarīrāvyāpitvādakārtsnyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:11284: tathā ca hastiśīraraṃ parityajya yadā puttikāśarīro bhavati tadā na tatra kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyetetyakārsnyamātmanaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11289: yathā hi pradīpo ghaṭamahāharmyodaravartī saṃkocavikāśavānevaṃ jīvo 'pi puttikāhastidehayorityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11305: kiṃ cātmano nityatvābhyupagame āgacchatāmapagacchatāṃ cāvayavānāmiyattānirūpeṇena cātmajñānābhāvānnāpavarga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11309: kiṃ caite jīvāvayavāḥ pratyekaṃ vā cetayeran samūho vā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11310: teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ caitanye bahūnāṃ cetanānāmekābhiprāyatvaniyamābhāvāt kadācidviruddhadikkriyatvena śarīramunmathyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:11311: samūhacaitanye tu hastiśarīrasya puttikāśarīratve dvitrāvayavaśeṣo jīvo na cetayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:11315: pūrvasūtraprasañjitāyāṃ jīvānityatāyāṃ bauddhavatsaṃtānanityatāmāśaṅkyedaṃ sūtram-- 'na ca paryāyādapyavirodho vikārādibhyaḥ' /
GSP33vacbhamu:11316: na ca paryāyāt parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi saṃtānābhyupagamenātmano nityatvādavirodho bandhamokṣayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11324: evaṃ hi mokṣāvasthābhāvi jīvaparimāṇaṃ nityaṃ bhavet,
GSP33vacbhamu:11345: sa ca nānākleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ pradhānapuruṣābhyāmanyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11357: paśava ātmānasteṣāṃ pāśo bandhanaṃ taddhimokṣo duḥkhāntaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11358: eṣa teṣāmabhisaṃdhiḥ-- cetanasya khalvadhiṣṭhātuḥ kumbhakārādeḥ kumbhādikārye nimittakāraṇatvavirodhāditi prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11370: tena śrutasiddyarthamadṛṣṭāni dṛṣṭaviparītasvabhāvāni subahūnyapi kalpamānāni na lohagandhitāmāvahanti pramāṇavattvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11371: yastu tatra kathañciddṛṣṭānusāraḥ kriyate sa suhṛdbhāvamātreṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:11372: āgamānapekṣitamanumānaṃ tu dṛṣṭasādharmyeṇa pravartamānaṃ dṛṣṭavivaryaye tuṣādapi bibhetitarāmiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11379: ayamarthaḥ-- yadīśvaraḥ karuṇāparādhīno vītarāgastataḥ praṇinaḥ kapūye karmaṇi na pravartayet,
GSP33vacbhamu:11382: na hīśvarādhīnā janāḥ svātantryeṇa kapūyaṃ karma kartumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11383: tadanadhiṣṭhitaṃ vā kapūyaṃ karma phalaṃ prasotumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11384: tasmātsvatantro 'pīsvaraḥ karmabhiḥ pravartyata iti dṛṣṭaviparītaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11389: pūrvakarmaṇeśvaraḥ saṃpratitane karmaṇi pravrartyate teneśvareṇa saṃpratitanaṃ karma svakārye pravartyeta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11395: tathehāpi dvāvapi pravartyāviti kaḥ kaṃ pravartayedityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11398: asmākaṃ tu nāyaṃ samaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11400: na ca kāruṇyaṃ doṣa ityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11402: kāruṇye hi satyasya duḥkhaṃ bhavati tena tatprahāṇāya pravartata iti kāruṇikā api svārthaprayuktā eva pravartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11403: nanu svārthaprayukta eva pravartatāmevamapi ko doṣa ityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11411: aprāptipūrvikā hi prāptiḥ saṃyogo na sarvagatānāṃ saṃbhavatyaprāpterabhāvānniravayavatvācca /
GSP33vacbhamu:11414: tasmādavyāpyavṛttitāyāḥ saṃyogasya vyāpikāyā nivṛttestadvyāpyasya saṃyogasya vinivṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11430: āgamo hi pravṛttiṃ prati na dṛṣṭāntamapekṣata ityadṛṣṭapūrve tadviruddhe ca pravartituṃ samarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11436: asmākaṃ tvīśvarāgamayoranāditvādīśvarayonitve 'pyāgamasya na virodha iti bhāvaḥ //38 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11444: anudbhūtarūpamityarthaḥ. rūpādihīnakaraṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ hi puruṣasya svabhogādāveva dṛṣṭaṃ nānyatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:11446: tasmādrūpādihīnaṃ karaṇaṃ vyāpārayata īsvarasya bhogādiprasaktiḥ tathā cānīśvaratvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11454: api ca sarvatrānumānaṃ pramāṇayataḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarāṇāmapi saṃkhyābedavattvamantavattvaṃ ca dravyatvāt saṃkhyānyatve sati prameyatvādvānumātavyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:11456: asmākaṃ tvāgamagamyer'the tadbādhitaviṣayatayā nānumānaṃ prabhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11458: svarūpaparimāṇamapi#yasya yādṛśamaṇu mahat paramamahaddīrghaṃ hrasvaṃ ceti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11460: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpaḥ# /
GSP33vacbhamu:11462: yasya tvanta eva nāsti tasya tadagrahaṇaṃ nāsarvajñatāmāvahati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11479: yadyapyanekaśilpaparyavadātaḥ paraśuṃ kṛtvā tena palāśaṃ chinatti,
GSP33vacbhamu:11480: yadyapi ca prayatnenendriyārthātmamanaḥ saṃnikarṣalakṣaṇaṃ jñānakaraṇamupādāyātmārthaṃ vijānāti,
GSP33vacbhamu:11481: tathāpi saṃkarṣaṇo 'karaṇaḥ kathaṃ pradyumnākhyaṃ manaḥ karaṇaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:11501: na tāvadete parasparaṃ bhinnā īśvarāḥ parasparavyāhatecchā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11504: saṃbhūya ceśanāyāṃ pariśuddho na kaściddīśvaraḥ syāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:11513: guṇibhyaḥ khalvātmabhyo jñānādīn guṇān bhedenoktvā punarabhedaṃ brūte-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11515: ādigrahaṇena pradyumnāniruddhayormano 'haṅkāralakṣaṇatayātmano bhedamabhidhāyātmana evaita iti tadviruddhābhedābhidhānamaparaṃ saṃgṛhītam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11517: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11519: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥpādaḥ#
GSP33vacbhamu:11533: iha hi pūrvapakṣe śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhaḥ pratipādyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:11536: tasyābhisaṃdhiḥ-yadyapi taittirīyake viyadutpattiśrutirasti tathāpi tasyāḥ pramāṇāntaravirodhādbahuśrutivirodhācca gauṇatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11542: athāsti tataḥ śrutivirodha iti tatparihārāya prayatnāntaramāstheyamityarthaḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11546: taittirīye hi sargaprakaraṇe kevalasyākāśasyaiva prathamaḥ sargaḥ śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11547: chāndogye ca kevalasya tejasaḥ prathamaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11549: śrutasiddhyarthaṃ khalvaśrutaṃ kalpyate na tu tadvidhātāya,
GSP33vacbhamu:11556: na khalviha sarge kṣīrāddadhi jāyate sargāntare ti dadhnaḥ kṣīramiti bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11557: tasmātsargaśrutayaḥ parasparavirodhinyo nāsminnarthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhantīti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11564: samavāṭyasamavāyinimittakāraṇebhyo hi kāryasyotpattirniyatā tadabhāve na bhavitumarhati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāve /
GSP33vacbhamu:11566: apica ya utpadyante teṣāṃ prāgutpatteranubhavārthakriye nopalabhyte utpannasya ca dṛśyete,
GSP33vacbhamu:11605_0: api cāvyatiriktadeśakālamākāśaṃ brahmaṇā ca brahmakāryaiśca tadabhinnasvabhāvairataḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:11605_1: kṣīrakumbhaprakṣiptakatipayapayobinduvadbrahmaṇi tatkārye ca vijñāte nabho viditaṃ bhavatītyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11610: brahmavivartātmatayājagatastadvikārasya vastuto brahmaṇābhede brahmaṇi jñāte jñānamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:11612: tasmādākāśamapi tadvivartatayā tadvikāraḥ sattajjñānena jñātaṃ bhavati nānyathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:11613: avikāratve tu tatastattvāntaraṃ na brahmaṇi vidite viditaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:11615: nahi kṣīrasya pūrṇakumbhe kṣīre gṛhyamāṇe satsvapi pāthobinduṣu pāthastattvaṃ prati jñātatvamasti vijñāne /
GSP33vacbhamu:11616: tasmānna te kṣīre vidite viditā iti pratijñādṛṣṭāntapracayānuparodhāya viyata utpattirakāmenābhyupeyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11628: nanvasahāyaṃ tejaḥ prathamamavagamyamānaṃ sasahāyatvena virudhyata ityuktamata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11644: nacāsminnartha ekasya vākyasya vyāpāro 'pi tu bhinnānāṃ vākyānāmityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11650: na caiṣa sṛṣṭiparo 'pi tu śamapara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11661: apica bhrāntimūlaṃ caitadvacanam 'ekamevādvitīyam' iti toye kṣīrabuddhivat /
GSP33vacbhamu:11670: nahi māṇavake siṃhatvamupacarya na siṃhādanyo 'sti manāgapi māṇavaka iti vadanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11671: tasmādbrahmatvamaikāntikaṃ jagato vivakṣitaṃ śrutyā na tvaupacārikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11672: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya ūvati natvaspatvamapi prāgevaupacārikamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:11675: niḥśeṣavacanaḥ svarasataḥ sarvaśabdo nāsati śrutyantaravirodhe ekadeśavaviṣayo yujyata ityarthaḥ //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:11677: ākāśasyotpattau pramāṇāntaravirodhamuktamanubhāṣya tasya pramāṇāntarasya pramāṇāntaravirodhenāpramāṇabhūtasya na gauṇatvāpādanasāmarthyamata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11685: śūnyavādaśca nirākṛtaḥ svayameva śrutyopanyasya 'kathamasataḥ sajjāyeta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11689: etaduktaṃ bhavati-sopādānaṃ cetkāryaṃ tata ātmaivopānatvena śruterupādānāntarakalpanānupapatteriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11702: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:11707: pramāpramāṇaprameyāṇāṃ vartamānātītānāgatatve 'pi pramātuḥ sadā vartamānatvenānubhavādapracyutasvabhāvasya nāgantukaṃ sattvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:11713: nanu jīvataḥ pramāturmā bhūdanyathābhāvo mṛtasya tu bhaviṣyatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:11717: yasya tu na tadasyātmano na tasya tatkalpanaṃ yuktam,
