GSP33vacbhamu:12756: evaṃ devatā adhiṣṭhātryo 'pi na bhoktryastāsāṃ tāvnamātrasya śrutatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12758: naca narādiśarīrocitaṃ duḥkhabahulamupabhogaṃ sukhamapyo devatā arhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12770: indriyāṇyevāsya jyeṣṭhasya ca prāṇasya vṛttayo bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12778: naca bhedena vyapadeśo bhedasādhanam 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' ityādirmanaso 'pīndriyebhyo 'sti bhedena vyapadeśa ityanindriyatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12779: smṛtivaśāttu tasyendriyatve indriyāmāmapi prāṇādbhedena vyapadiṣṭānāmapyasti prāṇasvabhāvatve 'hanta asyaiva rūpamasāma' iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12780: tasmādupapatteḥ śruteśca prāṇasyaiva vṛttasya ekādaśendriyāṇi na tattvāntarāṇīti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12790: tatrāpi paurvāparyālocanāyāṃ bheda eva pratīyata ityuktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33vacbhamu:12791: tasmādbahuśrutivirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca prāṇarūpatābhidhānamindriyāṇāṃ prāṇāyattatayā bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12794: naca prāṇe bhedavyapadeśabāhulyaṃ tathā netuṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12796: tathā jyeṣṭhe prāṇaśabdasya mukhyatvādindriyeṣu tatastattvāntareṣu lākṣaṇikaḥ prāṇaśabda iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12799: anye tu bhedaśabdādhyayāhārabhiyā bhedaśruteśceti paunaruktyabhiyā ca tacchabdasya cānantaroktaparamārthakatvādanyathā varṇayāñcakruḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12800: kimekādaśaiva vāgādaya indriyāṇyāho prāṇo 'pīti viśaye indrasyātmano liṅgamindriyaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:12805: indraliṅgatā tu vyutpattimātranimittaṃ yathā gacchatīti gauriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12809: tasmādrūḍhervāgādaya evendriyāṇi na prāṇa iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:12817_0: satprakriyāyāṃ 'tatteja aikṣata' ityādinā saṃdarbheṇa tejo 'bannānāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ vidhāyopadiśyate-'seyaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:12817_1: devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi
GSP33vacbhamu:12818_0: asyārthaḥ-pūrvoktaṃ bahubhavanamīkṣaṇaprayojanamadyāpi sarvathā na niṣpannamiti punarīkṣāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:12818_1: kṛtavatī bahubhavanameva prayojanamuddiśya kathaṃ hantedānīmahamimā yathoktāsteja
GSP33vacbhamu:12818_2: ādyāstisro devatāḥ pūrvasṛṣṭāvubhūtena saṃprati smaraṇasaṃnidhāpitena jīvena prāṇādharaṇakartrātmanānupraviśya
GSP33vacbhamu:12818_3: buddhyādibhūtamātrāyāmadarśa iva mukhabimbaṃ toya iva candramaso bimbaṃ chāyāmātratayānupraviśya
GSP33vacbhamu:12818_4: nāma ca rūpaṃ ca te vyākaravāṇi vispaṣṭaṃ karavāṇīdamasya nāmedaṃ ca rūpamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12819: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ tejo 'bannātmanā tryātmikāṃ tryātmikāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ karavāṇīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12821: yadi jīvakartṛkaṃ tataḥ 'ākāśo ha vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā' ityādiśrutivirodhādanadhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12824: tatra ḍitthaḍavitthādināmakaraṇe ca ghaṭapaṭādirūpakaraṇe ca jīvakartṛtvadarśanādihāpi trivṛtkaraṇe nāmarūpakaraṇe cāsti saṃbhāvanā jīvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:12825: tathāca yogyatvādanena jīveneti vyākaravāṇīti pradhānakriyayā saṃbadhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:12834: yadi punarasya sākṣātkartṛbhāvo bhavedanena jīvenetyanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12836: prayojakakartustatsākṣātkartā karaṇaṃ bhavati pradhānakriyoddeśena prayojakena prayojyakarturvyāpanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12837: tasmādatra jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ nāmarūpavyākaraṇe 'nyatra tu parameśvarasyeti virodhādanadhyavasāya iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:12838: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-parameśvarasyaivehāpi nāmarūpavyākartṛtvamupadiśyate na tu jīvasya,
GSP33vacbhamu:12840: nanvanyatra ḍitthajavitthādināmaka4maṇi ghaṭaśarāvādirūpakarmaṇi ca kartṛtvadarśanādihāpi yogyatā saṃbhāvyata iti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12847_0: anupraviśya vyākaravāṇīti samānakartṛtve ktvaḥ smaraṇāt praveśanakarturjīvasyaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:12847_1: vyākartṛtvamupadiśyate 'nyathā tu parameśvarasya vyākartṛtve jīvasya praveṣṭṛtve
GSP33vacbhamu:12855: tathāhi-yo 'nnasyāṇiṣṭho bhāgastanmanastejasastu yo 'ṇiṣṭho bāgaḥ sa vāgityatra hi kāṇādānāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ cāsti vipratipattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12863: vāṅmanasa iti vaktavye māṃsādyabhidhānaṃ siddhena saha sādhyasyopanyāso dṛṣṭāntalābhāya /
GSP33vacbhamu:12864: yathā māṃsādi bhaumādyevaṃ vāṅmanase api taijasabhaume ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12869: tasmādasati bādhake śrutirāñjasī nānyathā kathañcinnetumuciteti kañciddoṣamityuktaṃ taṃ doṣaṃ darśayannāha pūrvapakṣī- #
GSP33vacbhamu:12875: tribṛtkaraṇāviśeṣe 'pi yasya ca yatra bhūyastvaṃ tena tasya vyapadeśa ityarthaḥ //22 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12876: iti śrīmadvācaspatimiśraviracite śrīmadbhagavatpādaśārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12885: smṛtinyāyaśrutivirodhaparihāreṇa hi anadhyavasāyalakṣaṇamaprāmāṇyaṃ parihṛtaṃ tathāca niścalīkṛte tārtīyo vicāro bhavatyanyathā tu nirbījatayā na sidhyediti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12896: naca śrūyate tasmānna bhūtapariṣvakto raṃhasyapi tu karaṇamātrapariṣvaktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12903_1: kartrādikārakabhāvite cāntarikṣaṃ krameṇotkrāmya dyulokaṃ praviśantyau sūkṣmabhūte
GSP33vacbhamu:12907: yathāgnihotrādhikaraṇamāhavanīya evaṃ śraddhaśabdavācyāgnihotrāhutipariṇāmāvasthārūpāḥ sūkṣmā yā āpaḥ śraddhābhāvitāstadadhikaraṇaṃ dyulokaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12909: tena hīddho 'sau dyuloko dīpyate 'taḥ samindhanātsamit tasyādityasya raśmayo dhūmā indhanādivādityādraśmīnāṃ samutthānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12915: parjanyo vāva gautamāgniḥ parjanyo nāma vṛṣṭyupakaraṇābhimānī devatāviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12925: tasmindevā yajamānaprāṇā agnirūpāḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ juhvati tasya somasyāhutervarṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12926: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhākhyā āpo dyulokamāhutitvena praviśya candrākāreṇa pariṇatāḥ satyo dvitīye paryāye parjanyāgnau hutā vṛṣṭitvena pariṇamanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12927: 'pṛthivī vāva gautamāgniḥ' tasya pṛthivyākhyasyāgnaiḥ saṃvatsara eva samit /
GSP33vacbhamu:12928: saṃvatsareṇa kālena hi samiddhā bhūmirvrīhyādiniṣpattaye kalpate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12930: rātrirarciḥ pṛthivyā śyāmāyā anurūpā śyāmatayā rātriragnerivānurupamarciḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12931: diśoṅgārāḥ prage rātrirūpārciḥśamane upaśāntānāṃ prasannānāṃ diśāṃ darśanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12933: tasminnagnau śraddhāsomapariṇāmakrameṇāgatā apo vṛṣṭirūpeṇa pariṇatā devā juhvati tasyā āhuterannaṃ vrīhiyavādi bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12935: vācā khalvayaṃ tālvādyaṣṭasthānasthitayā varṇapadavākyābhivyaktikrameṇārthajātaṃ prakāśayan samidhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12941: tā evāpaḥ śraddhādipariṇāmakrameṇāgatāḥ vrīhyādirūpeḥ pariṇatā satyaḥ puruṣe 'gnau hutāstāsāṃ pariṇāmo retaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12942: yoṣā vāva gautamāgniḥ tasyā upastha eva samit /
GSP33vacbhamu:12943: tena hi sā putrādyutpādanāya samidhyate yadupamantrayate sa dhūmaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:12944: strīsaṃbhavādupamantraṇasya lomāni vā dhūmaḥ yonirarciḥ lohitatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:12948: tasminnetasminnagnau devā reto juhvati tasyā āhutergarbhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12949: evaṃ śraddhāsomavarṣānnaretohavakrameṇa yoṣāgniṃ prāpyāpo garbhākhyā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12951: yataḥ pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti tasmādadbhiḥ pariveṣṭito jīvo rahatīti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12952: etaduktaṃ bhavati-śraddhāśabdavācyā āpa ityagre vakṣyati tāsāṃ trivṛtkatatayā tejo 'nnāvinābhāvenābgrahaṇena tejonnayorapi saṃgraha ityetadapi vakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12953: yadyapyetāvatāpi bhūtaveṣṭitasya jīvasya raṃhaṇaṃ nāvagamyate tejobannānāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvamātraśravaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:12954_1: somo rāṭ' iti śrutyā saha 'śraddhāṃ juhvati tasyā āhuteḥ somo rājā saṃbhavati' ityasyāḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:12955: tathāhi-yā evāpo hutā dvitīyasyāmāhutau somabhāvaṃ gatāstābhireṣa pariṣvakto jīva iṣṭādikārī candrabhūyaṃ gataścandralokaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:12956: nanu svatantrā āpaḥ śraddhādikrameṇa somabhāvamāpnuvantu tābhirapariṣvakta eva tu jīvaḥ sendriyamātro gatvā somabhāvamanubhavatu /
GSP33vacbhamu:12960: evaṃ hi śrutisāmānyaṃ kalpeta yadi yena rūpeṇa yena ca krameṇāpāṃ somabhāvastenaiva jīvasyāpi somabhāvo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12963_0: ato dadhipayaḥprabhṛtayo dravabhūyastvādāpo hutāḥ sūkṣmībhūtā iṣṭādikāriṇamāśritā
GSP33vacbhamu:12963_1: nondhanena vidhinā dehe hūyamāne hutāḥ satya āhutimapya iṣṭādikāriṇaṃ pariveṣṭya
GSP33vacbhamu:12966: ayamarthaḥ-evaṃ hi sūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhet yadyasya sthūlaṃ śarīraṃ raṃhato na bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:12975: tasya ca dehendriyāderupādheḥ pradeśikatvānna tatra san dehāntaraṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:12976: tasmātsūkṣmadehapariṣvakto raṃhatikarmopasthāpitaḥ pratipattavyaḥ prāptavyo yo dehastadviṣayāyā bhāvanāyā utpādanāyā dīrghībhāvamātraṃ jalūkayopamīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:12982: ālayavijñānasaṃtāna ātmā tasya vṛttiḥ ṣaṭ pravṛttivijñānāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:12990: te hi śarīrātmavādino bhasmībhāvamātmana āhurna kasyacidgamanamiti //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:12999: yastu gandhasvedapākaprāṇāvakāśadānadarśanāddehasya pāñcabhautikatvaṃ paśyaṃstejobannātmakatvena tryātmakatve na parituṣyati,
GSP33vacbhamu:13003: ato na sa deho bhūtāntarāṇi pratyākhyāya kevalābhiradbhirārabdhuṃ śakyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13010: prāṇānāṃ jīvaddehe sāśrayatvamavagataṃ gacchati jīvaddehe tadanuvidhāyinaḥ prāṇā api gacchantīti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13012: sa caiṣāmanuvidheyaḥ sūkṣmo deho bhūtendriyamaya iti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13017: śrāvite 'pi spaṣṭe jīvasya prāṇaiḥ saha gamane 'gnyādigatiśaṅkā śrutivirodhotthāpanārthā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13024: pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvaprakāre pṛṣṭe prathamāyāmāhutau anapāṃ śraddhāyā hetavyatābhidhānasaṃbhavaddhamanupapannaṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:13025: nahi yathā paśvādibhyo hṛdayādayo 'vayavā avadāya niṣkṛṣya hūyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:13026: evaṃ śraddhā buddhiprasādalakṣaṇā niṣkraṣṭuṃ vā hotuṃ vā śakyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13035: teṣāṃ yaḥ samāhāraḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ sā ṣaṭpraśnī,
GSP33vacbhamu:13041: kriyāsamabhihāreṇāpyāyanāpakṣayau yathā somasya tathā bhakṣayanti somamayāṃllokānityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13044_2: bhoktṛṇāmeva satāṃ devopājīvitāmātreṇa bhākto gamayitavyo na tu carvaṇanigaraṇābhyāṃ mukhya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13048: yathā hi balīvardādayo bhuñjanā api svaphalaṃ svāmino halādivahanenopakurvāṇā bhogyāḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13049: evaṃ paramatattvamavidvāṃsa iṣṭādikāriṇa iha dadhipayaḥpuroṭāśādināmuṣmiṃśca loke paricārakatayā devānāmupabhogyā iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13053: yo hi pañcāgnividyāṃ na vedaṃ taṃ devā bhakṣayantīti nindyate pañcāgnividyāṃ stotuṃ tasyā eva prakṛtatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13068: ca yatkiñceha karma kutaṃ tasyāntaṃ prāpyeti śravaṇāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13076: tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā ityācārameva yoninimittamupadiśati na tu karma /
GSP33vacbhamu:13077_0: stāṃ vā karmaśīle dve apyaviśeṣeṇānuśayastathāpi yadyapyayamiṣṭāpūrtakārī svayaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:13078: smaryate hyanyasya sukṛtaduṣkṛtābhyāmanyasya tatsaṃbandhinastatphalabhāgitā-'patatyardhaśarīreṇa yasya bhāryā surāṃ pibet' ityādi /
GSP33vacbhamu:13080: tasmādyāvatsaṃpātamityupakramānurodhāt 'yat kiñceha karoti' iti ca śrutyantarānusārādramaṇīyacaraṇatvaṃ saṃbandhyantaragatamiṣṭāpūrtakāriṇi bhāktaṃ gamayitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13081: tathāca niranuśayānāmeva bhuktabhogānāmavaroha iti prāpta ucyate-yena karmakalāpena phalamupabhojitaṃ tasminnatīte 'pi sānuśayā eva candramaṇḍalādavarohanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13090: nahi 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt' iti yāvajjīvamahāravihārādisamaye 'pi homaṃ vidhatte nāpi madhyāhnādāvapi tu sāyaṃprātaḥkālāpekṣayā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13098: nahi yāvantaḥ saṃpātā yāvatāṃ vā puṃsāṃ saṃpātāste sarve tatreṣṭādikāriṇā bhogena kṣayaṃ nīyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:13103: api ceṣṭāpūrtakārīha janmani kevalaṃ na tanmātramakārṣīdapi tu godohanenāpaḥ praṇayan paśuphalamapyapūrvaṃ samacaiṣīt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13104: evamaharniśaṃ ca vāṅmanaḥ śarīraceṣṭābhiḥ puṇyāpuṇyamihāmutropabhogyaṃ saṃcitavato na martyalokādibhogyaṃ candraloke bhagyaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13105: naca svaphalavirodhino 'nuśayasya ṛte prayāścittādātmajñānādvādattaphalasya dhvaṃsaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13108: anye tu sakalakarmakṣaye parāvṛttiśaṅkā nirbījeti manyamānā anyathādhikaraṇaṃ varṇayāñcakrurityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13111: tatredamiha vicāryate-kiṃ dattaphalānāmiṣṭāpūrtakarmaṇāmavaśeṣādihāvartante uta tānyupabhogena nirāvaśeṣaṃ kṣapayitvānupabhuktakarmaśādihāvartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13112: tatreṣṭādīnāṃ bhogena samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvānniranuśayā evānupabhuktakarmavaśādāvartanta iti prāpta ucyate-sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13114: yathā bhāṇḍasthe madhuni sarpiṣi vā kṣālite 'pi bhāṇḍalepakaṃ taccheṣaṃ madhu vā sarpirvā na kṣālayituṃ śakyamiti dṛṣṭamevaṃ tadanusārādetadapi pratipattavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13116_0: yathā sevako hāstikāśvīyapadātivrātaparivṛto mahārājaṃ sevamānaḥ kālavaśācchatrapādukāvaśeṣo
GSP33vacbhamu:13116_1: na sevitumarhatīti dṛṣṭaṃ tanmūlā ca laukikī smṛtiriti dṛṣṭasmṛtibhyāṃ sānuśayā evāvartanta iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13129: iha janmani hi paryāyeṇa sukhaduḥkhe bhujyamāne dṛśyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:13134: na cābhivyaktaṃ ca karma phalaṃ na datta iti ca saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13136_2: phalopabhogena prakṣayānnāsti teṣāṃ karmāśya iti na te saṃsareyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13144: anena niranuśayā evāvarohantīti pūrvapakṣabījaṃ nigūḍhamuddhāṭya nirasyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13152: 'ācārahīnaṃ na punaranti vedāḥ' iti hi smṛtyā vedapadena vedārthamupalakṣayantyā vedārthānuṣṭhānaśeṣatvamācārasyoktaṃ na tu svatantra ācāraḥ phalasya sādhanaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13166: 'ye vai ke cāsmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchanti' iti kauṣītakināṃ samāmnānāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13168: tathāhi-dyusomavṛṣṭyannaretaḥpariṇāmakrameṇa tā evāpo yoṣidagnau hutāḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantītyaviśeṣeṇa śrutam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13173: 'jāyasva mriyasveti tṛtīyaṃ sthānam' iti ca sthānatvamātreṇāvagamātpathitvenāpratīteścandralokādavatīrṇānāmapi ca tatsthānatvasaṃbhavādasaṃpūreṇa prativacanopapatteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13174: ananyamārgatayā ca tadbhogavirahiṇāmapi grāmaṃ gacchan vṛkṣamūlānyupasarpatītivatsaṃyamanādiṣu yamavaśyatāyai candralokagamanopapatteḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13176_1: na mārgatvaṃ tathāpi vettha yathāsau mārgo na saṃpūryate ityasya prativacanāvasare
GSP33vacbhamu:13177: yadi punastenaiva mārgeṇāgatya janmamaraṇaprabandhavat sthānamadhyāsīta naitattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13178: nahīṣṭādikāriṇaścandramaṇḍalādavaruhya ramaṇīyaṃ ninditāṃ vā yoniṃ pratipadyamānāstṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:13183: tato 'vagacchāmaḥ saṃyamanaṃ sapta ca yātanābhūmīryamavaśatayā pratipadyamānā aniṣṭādikāriṇo na candramaṇḍalādavarohantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13184: tasmāt 'ye vai ke ca' itīṣṭādikāriviṣayaṃ na sarvaviṣayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13214: yadyapi yathetamākāśamākāśādvāyumityato na tādātmyaṃ sphuṭamavagamyate tathāpi vāyurbhūtvetyādeḥ sphuṭataraṃ tādātmyāvagamādyathetamākāśamityetadapi tādātmya evāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13216: manuṣyaśarīrasya nandikeśvarasya devadeharūpapariṇāmasmaraṇāddevadehasya ca nahuṣasya tiryaktvasmaraṇāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13218: gauṇyāṃ ca vṛttau lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ prayukto guṇe lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13221: samāno bhāvo rūpaṃ yeṣāṃ te sabhāvāsteṣāṃ bhāvaḥ sābhāvyaṃ sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyamiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:13228: yadi tu devājagaśarīre samasamaye syātāṃ na devaśarīramajagaraśarīraṃ śilpiśatenāpi kriyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13229: nahi dadhipayasī samasamaye parasparātmanī śakye saṃpādayituṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13233: nanvākāśabhāvena saṃyogamātraṃ lakṣyatāṃ kiṃ sādṛśyenetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13238: 'durniṣprapataram' iti duḥkhena niḥsaraṇaṃ brūte na tu vilambeneti manyate pūrvapakṣī /
GSP33vacbhamu:13239: vinā sthūlaśarīraṃ na sūkṣmaśarīre duḥkhabhāgīti durniṣprapataraṃ vilambaṃ lakṣayatīti rāddhāntaḥ //23 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13243: ākāśasārūpyaṃ vāyudhūmādisaṃparko 'nuśayināmukta ihedānīṃ vrīhiyavā oṣādhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyanta iti śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13244: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimanuśayināṃ bhogādhiṣṭhānaṃ vrīhiyavādayaḥ sthāvarā bhavanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:13246: tatra manuṣyo jāyate devo jāyata ityādau prayoge janeḥ śarīraparigrahe prasiddhatvādatrāpi vrīhyādiśarīraparigraha eva janirmukhyārtha iti vrīhyādiśarīrā evānuśayina iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13247: naca ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivat karmaviśeṣāsaṃkīrtanāmāttadabhāve vrīhyādīnāṃ śarīrabhāvābhāvātkṣetrajñānantarādhiṣṭhitānāmeva yatsaṃparkamātramiti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13251: sāmānyaśāstrasya hiṃsāmānyadvāreṇa viśeṣopasarpaṇaṃ vilambeneti sākṣādviśeṣaspṛśaḥ śāstracchīghratarapravṛttāddurbalatvāditi sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13252: nahi balavadityeva durbalaṃ bādhate kintu sati virodhe /
GSP33vacbhamu:13255: 'agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhet ' iti hi kratuprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ kratvarthatāmasya gamayati na tvapanayati niṣedhāpāditāmasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutām /
GSP33vacbhamu:13256: tenāstu niṣedhādasya puruṣaṃ pratyanarthahetutā vidheścha kratvarthatā ko virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13258: na kratostatra vaiguṇyaṃ yathā coditasiddhitaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13259_1: yadi ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā itivadvrīhyādiṣvanuśayavatāṃ kamaviśeṣaḥ kīrtyeta na caitadasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13262: naca tadgataiyaiḥ paśuhiṃsāyā 'na hiṃsyāt' iti niṣedātkratvarthāyā api duḥkhaphalavatsaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13264: tathāhi-na hiṃsyāditi niṣedhasya niṣedhyādhīnanirūpaṇatayā yadarthaṃ niṣedhyaṃ tadartha eva niṣedho vijñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13265: na caitat 'nānṛtaṃ vadet' 'na tau paśau karoti' itivatkasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātaṃ yenānṛtatavadanavadasya niṣedhasya kratvarthate niṣedho 'pi kratvarthaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13266: paśau niṣiddhayorājyabhāgayoḥ kratvarthatvena niṣedhasyāpi kratvarthatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13270: kevalaṃ tasya rāgataḥ prāptatvāttadanuvādena nañarthaṃ vidhirupasaṃkrāmati,
GSP33vacbhamu:13271: tena puruṣārtho niṣedhya iti tadadhīnanirūpaṇo niṣedho 'pi puruṣārtho bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13272: tathā cāyamarthaḥ saṃpadyate-yatpuruṣārthaṃ hananaṃ tanna kuryāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:13273: kratvarthasyāpi na niṣedhe hiṃsāyāḥ kratūpakārakatvamapi kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13274: naca dṛṣṭe puruṣokārakatve pratyarthini sati tatkalpanāspadam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13275: naca svātantryapāratantrye sati saṃyogapṛthaktve svādiratādivadekatra saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13276: tasmātpuruṣārthapratiṣedho na kratvarthamapyāskandatīti śuddhasukhaphalatvameveṣṭādīnāṃ na sthāvaśarīropabhogyaduḥkhaphalatvamapīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13282: vrīhyādibhāvamāpannāḥ khalvanuśayinaḥ puruṣairupabhuktā retaḥ sigbhāvamanubhavantī śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13284_0: vrīhyādidehatve hi vrīhyādiṣu lūneṣvavahantinā phalīkṛteṣu ca vrīhyādidehavināśādanuśayinaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:13284_1: pravaseyuriti kathamanuśayināṃ retaḥsigbhāvaḥ saṃsargamātre tu saṃsargiṣu vrīhyādiṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:13284_2: naṣṭeṣvapi na saṃsargiṇo 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuriti retaḥsigbhāva upapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13291: sadyo jāto hi bālo na retaḥ sigbhavatyapi tu cirajātaḥ prauḍhayauvanaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:13294: tatkimidānīṃ sarvatraivānuśayināṃ saṃsargamātraṃ tathāca ramaṇīyacaraṇā ityādiṣu tathābhāva āpadyeteti netyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13297: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīkamīmāṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:13298: iti tṛtīyādhyāyasya gatyāgaticintayā vairāgyanirūpaṇākhyaḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ #
GSP33vacbhamu:13303: idānīṃ tu tasyaiva jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvasiddhyartha prapañcayate- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13304: kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:13305: yadyapi brahmaṇo 'nyasyānirvācyatayā jāgratsvapnāvasthāgatayorubhayorapi sargayormāyamayatvaṃ tathāpi yathā jāgratsṛṣṭirbrahmātmabhāvasākṣātkārātprāganuvartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13307: evaṃ kiṃ svapnasṛṣṭirāhosvit pratidinameva nivartata iti vimarśārthaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:13314: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-iha hi sarvāṇyeva mithyājñānānyudāharaṇaṃ teṣāṃ satyatvaṃ pratijñāyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13318: atathātvasya tvapratīyamānasya tathābhāvaprameyavirodhena kalpanāspadatvāt bādhakapratyayādatathātvamiti cet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13325: yathāhi kṣīraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kālāntare dadhi bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:13328: yadyasya tīvrātapaklāntisahitaṃ cakṣuḥ sa tasya rajatarūpatāṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13331: evamutpalamapi nīlalohitaṃ divā saurībhirbhābhirabhivyaktaṃ nīlatayā gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13333: evamasatyāṃ nidrāyāṃ sato 'pi rathādīnna gṛhṇāti nidrāṇastu gṛhṇātīti sāmagrībhedādvā kālabhedādvā virodhābhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13342: imamarthaṃ śrutirapi darśayati-'atha rathān rathayogān pathaḥ sṛjate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13343: naca 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na canthāno bhavanti' iti virodhādupacaritārthāṃ sṛjata iti śrutirvyākhyeyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13344: sṛjata iti hi śruterbahuśrutisaṃvādātpramāṇāntarasaṃvādācca balīyastvena tadanuguṇatayā na tatra rathā ityasyā bhāktatvena vyākhyānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13345: jāgradavasthādarśanayogyā na santi na tu rathā na santīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13352: tadyathā svapne śuklāmbaradharaḥ śuklamālyānulepano brāhmaṇāyanaḥ priyavrataṃ pratyāha-priyavrata,
GSP33vacbhamu:13354: sa ca jāgrattathātmano mānamanubhūya svapnapratyayaṃ satyamabhimanyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13362: na tāvat kṣīrasyeva dadhi rajatasya pariṇāmaḥ śuktiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13363: nahi jātvīśvaragṛhe cirasthitānyapi rajatabhājanāni śuktibhāvamanubhavanti dṛśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:13364: na cetarasya rajatānubhavasamaye 'nyo 'nākulendriyo na tasya śuktibhāvamanubhavati pratyeti ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:13367: pāramārthike hāsya toyabhāve tatsādhyāmudānyopaśamalakṣaṇārthakriyāṃ kuryānmarīcisādhyāmapi rūpaprakāśalakṣaṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:13370: tadarthakriyākāritvavyāptaṃ toyatvaṃ mātrayāpi tāmakurvattoyameva na syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13371: apica toyapratyayasamīcīnatvāyāsya dvaividhyamabhyupeyate taccābhyupagame 'pi na seddhumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13372: tathāhi-asamarthavidhāpāti toyametaditi manvāno na tṛṣṇayāpi marīcitoyamabhidhāvet yathā marīcīnanubhavan /
GSP33vacbhamu:13374: kimaparāddhaṃ marīciṣu toyaviparyāsena sarvajanīnena yattamatilaṅghya viparyāsāntaraṃ kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13376: tatrāpi rajatajñānaṃ pūrvamutpannaṃ bādhyamuttaraṃ tu bādhakaṃ śuktijñānaṃ prāptipūrvakatvātpratiṣedhasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:13377: rajatajñānātprākprāpakābhāvena śukteraprāptāyāḥ pratiṣedhasaṃbhavātpūrvajñānaprāptaṃ tu rajataṃ śuktijñānamapabadhitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13381: naca vartamānarajatāvabhāsi jñānaṃ bhaviṣyattāmasyāgocarayanna bhaviṣyatā svasamayavartinīṃ śuktiṃ gocarayatā pratyayena bādhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:13383: mā nāmāsya jñāsītpratyakṣaṃ bhaviṣyattāṃ tatpṛṣṭhabhāvi tvanumānamupakārabhāvahetumivāsati vināśapratyayopanipāte sthemānamākalayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13385: tathāca rajatagocaraṃ pratyakṣaṃ vastutaḥ sthirameva rajataṃ gocarayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13393: yadi cirasthāyitvaṃ yogyatā na sā pratyakṣagocaraḥ śakteratīndriyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13398: tasmādatyantābhyāsavaśena pratyakṣānantaraṃ śīgratarotpannavinaśyadavasthānumānasahitapratyakṣābhiprāyemeva cirasthāyīti gṛhyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13404: yattu satyaṃ svapnadarśanamuktaṃ tatrāpyākhyātrā brāhmaṇāyanenākhyāte saṃvādābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13406: tādṛśasyaiva bahulaṃ visaṃvādadarśadarśitaśca visaṃvādo bhāṣyakṛtā kātsnryenānabhivyaktiṃ vivṛṇvatā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13409: rajanīsamaye 'pi hi bhāratādvarṣāntare ketumālādau vāsaro bhavatīti bhārate varṣa ityuktam //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13419: prājñavyāpāratvena pāramārthikatvānumānaṃ pratyakṣeṇa bādhakapratyayena virudhyamānaṃ nātmānaṃ labhata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13431: iha hi nāḍīpuritatparamātmāno jīvasya suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ sthānatvena śrūyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:13435: yadā nāḍyo vā purītadvā suṣuptasthānaṃ tadā viparītagrahaṇanivṛttāvapi na jīvasya paramātmabhāva iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13436: avidyānivṛttāvapi jīvasya paramātmabhāvāya kāraṇāntaramapekṣitavyaṃ tacca karmaiva na tu tattajñānaṃ viparītajñānanivṛttimātreṇa tasyopayogāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13440: ata tu paramātmaiva nāḍīpurītasmṛtidvārā suṣuptisthānaṃ tato viparītajñānanivṛtterasti mātrayā paramātmabhāva upayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13441: tayā hi tāvadeṣa jīvastadavasthāno bhavati kevalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13442: tattvajñānābhāvena samūlakāṣamavidyāyā akāṣājjāgratsvapnalakṣaṇaṃ jīvasya vyutthānaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13445: nāḍīpurītatparamātmasu sthāneṣu suṣuptasya jīvasya nilayaṃ prati vikalpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13446: yathā bahuṣu prāsādeṣveko narendraḥ kadācitkkacinnilīyate kadācitkkacidevameko jīvaḥ kadācinnāḍīṣu kadācitpurītati kadācidbrahmaṇīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13447: yathā nirapekṣā vrīhiyavāḥ kratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśaprakṛtitayā śrutā ekārthā vikalpyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:13448: evaṃ saptamīśrutyā vāyatanaśrutyā vekanilayanārthāḥ parasparānapekṣā nāḍyadayo 'pi vikalpamarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13449: yatrāpi nāḍībhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śeta iti nāḍība3hmaṇorādhārayoḥ samuccayaśravaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13450: prāṇaśabdaṃ ca brahma 'athāsmin prāṇe brahmaṇi sa jīva ekadhā bhavati' nnirapekṣayoravedhāratvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13453: evaṃ tābhireva saṃcaramāṇasya kadācidbrahmaivādhāra iti siddhamādhāratve nāḍīpurītatparamātmanāmanapekṣatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13455: prāpte 'bhidhīyate-jīvaḥ samuccayenaivaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpena /
GSP33vacbhamu:13458: vikalpa āśritastatra gatiranyā na vidyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13459: prakṛtakratusādhanībhūtapuroḍāśadravyaprakṛtitayā hi parasparānapekṣau vrīhiyavau vihitauśakrutaścaitau pratyekaṃ puroḍāśamabhinirvartayitum /
GSP33vacbhamu:13460: tatra yadi miśrābhyāṃ puroḍāśo 'bhinirvartyeta parasparānapekṣavrīhiyavavidhātṛṇī ubhe api śāstre bādhyeyātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:13462: sa hi yathā vihitānyaṅgānyabhisamīkṣya pravartamāno naitānyanyathayitaṃ śakroti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13464: na cāṅgānurodhena pradhānābhyāso 'gosave ubhe kuryāt' itivadyuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13466: na cāṅgabhūtaindravāyavādigrahānurodhena yathā pradhānasya somayāgasyāvṛttirevamatrāpīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13469: 'somamabhiplāvayati' iti ca vākyāntarānulocanayā rasadvāreṇa yāgasādhanībhūtasyendravāyvādyuddeśena prādeśamātreṣūrdhvapātreṣu grahaṇāni pṛthakprakalpanāni saṃskārā vidhīyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:13474: naca yāvanmātramekamūrdhvapātraṃ vyāpnoti tāvanmātraṃ gṛhītvā pariśaṣṭaṃ tyajyeteti yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13476: evaṃ taddṛṣṭārthaṃ bhavedyadi tatsarvaṃ yāga upayujyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:13478_0: tasmātsakalasya somarasasya yāgaśeṣatvena saṃskārārhatvādekaikena ca grahamena sakalasya
GSP33vacbhamu:13479: ata eva samuccayadarśanaṃ 'daśautānadhvaryuḥ prātaḥ savane grahan gṛhṇāti' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13483: teṣāṃ ca samuccaye sati yāvadyaduddeśena gṛhītaṃ tāvattasyai devatāyai tyaktavyamityarthādyāgasyāvṛttyā bhavativyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13484: yadi punaḥ pṛthakkṛtānyapyekīkṛtya kāñcana devatāmuddiśya tyajeran,
GSP33vacbhamu:13499: nanu yadi brahmaiva nilayanasthānaṃ tāvanmātramucyatāṃ kṛtaṃ nāḍyupanyāsenetyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13505: pittenābhivyāptakaraṇo na bāhyānviṣayānvedeti taddvārā sukhaduḥkhābhāvena tatkāraṇapāṣmāsparśena nāḍīstutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13506: yadā tu tejo brahma tadā sugamam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13511: tathāhi-nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhīnāṃ karaṇānāmāśrayo jīvastu brāhmāvyatirekātsvamahipratiṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13513: vikalpa tu vyatirekaṃ brahmaṇa ādhāratvamucyate jīvaṃ prati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13514: tathāca suṣuptāvasthāyāmupādhīnāmasamudācārājjīvasya brahmātmatvameva brahmādhāratvaṃ na tu nāḍīpurītādhāratvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13515: tadupādhikaraṇamātrādhāratayā tu suṣuptadaśārambhāya jīvasya nāḍīpurītadādhāratvamityatulyārthatayā na vikalpa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13517: autsagikaṃ brahmasvarūpatvaṃ jīvasyāsati jāgratsvapnadaśārūpe 'pavāde suṣuptavasthāyāṃ nānyathayituṃ śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13518: apica ye 'pi sthānavikalpamāsthiṣacata tairapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamalakṣaṇā suṣuptyavasthāṅgīkartavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13519: na ceyamātmatādātmyaṃ vinā nāḍyādiṣu paramātmavyatirikteṣu sthāneṣūpapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13520: tatra hi sthito 'yaṃ jīva ātmavyatirekābhimānī sannavaśyaṃ viśeṣajñānavān bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13521: tathāhi śrutiḥ-'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānye 'nyatpaśyet' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13523: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūtatkena kaṃ paśyedvijānīyāt' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13533: aupādhike tu paricchede yatropādhisaṃnihitastanmātraṃ na jānīyānna tu sarvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13538: naca suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ jīvasya svarūpeṇa nāḍyādisthānatvapratipādena kiñcitprayojanaṃ brahmabhūyapratipādena tvasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13539: tasmānna samapradhānabhāvena samuccayo nāpi vikalpa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13548: sa vānyo veti īśvaro veti saṃbhavamātreṇopanyāsaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13551: yadvi dvyahādinirvartanīyamekasya puṃsaścoditaṃ karma tasya pūrvedyuranuṣṭhitasyāsti smṛtiriti vakyavye 'nuḥ pratyabhijñānasūcanārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13556: jīvaḥ pratinyāyaṃ saṃprasāde suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ buddhāntāyādravati āgacchati pratiyoni /
GSP33vacbhamu:13557: yohi vyāghrayoniḥ suṣupto buddhāntamāgacchan sa vyāghra eva bhavati na jātyantaram /
GSP33vacbhamu:13559: na iha vyāghro vā siṃho veti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13561: yo hi jīvaḥ suptaḥ sa śarīrāntaraṃ uttiṣṭhati śarīrāntaragatastu suptajīvasaṃbandhini śarīra uttiṣṭhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:13564: apica na jīvo nāma kaścitparasmādanya iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:13568: evamanādyanirvacanīyāvidyopadhānabhedopādhikalpito jīvo na vastutaḥ paramātmano bhidyate tadupādyudbhavābhibhavābhyāṃ codbhūta ivābhibhūta iva pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13569: tataśca suṣuptādāvapi abhibhūta iva jāgradavasthādiṣudbhūta iva /
GSP33vacbhamu:13570: tasya cāvidyātadvāsanopādheranāditayā kāryakāraṇabhāvena pravahataḥ suvivecatayā tadupahito jīvaḥ suviveca iti //9 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13577: tadyathā kaścitsuptotthitaḥ prāha sukhamahamasvāpsaṃ laghūni me gātrāṇi prasannaṃ me mana iti,
GSP33vacbhamu:13578: kaścitpunarduḥkhasamasvāpsaṃ gurūṇi me gātrāṇi bhramatyanavasthitaṃ me mana iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13582: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-yadyapi viśeṣavijñānopaśamena mohasuṣuptayoḥ sāmyaṃ tathāpi naikyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13584: bāhyendriyavyāpārabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ tu bhede tayoḥ suṣuptamohayorapi prayojanabhedātkāraṇabhedāllakṣaṇabhedācca bhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13587: yadyapi satyapi mohe na maraṇaṃ tathāpyasati mohe na maraṇamiti maraṇārtho mohaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13589: tasmāt suṣuptamohāvasthayorbrahmaṇā saṃpattāvapi suṣupte yādṛśī saṃpattirna tādṛśī moha ityardhasaṃpattiruktā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13598_1: tathāpi prapañcaliṅgānāṃ bahvīnāṃ śrutīnāṃ darśanādbhavati punarvicikitsā atastannivāraṇāyārambhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13605: tasmādubhayaliṅgakaśāstraprāmāṇyādubhayarūpatā brahmaṇaḥ pāramārthikīti prāpta ucyate-na sthānata upādhito 'pi parasya brahmaṇa ubhayacihnatvasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13607: pāramārthikatve hyupādhijanitasya rūpasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13641: kiṃ sāllakṣaṇaṃ ca prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ ca brahma kiṃ sallakṣaṇameva brahmeti prakāśalakṣaṇameveti tatra pūrvapakṣaṃ gṛhṇāti- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13649: yathā sarvagandhatvādayo 'pi tu prakāśarūpameva saditi nobhayarūpatvaṃ brahmaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13652: bhede na sthānato 'pīti nirākṛtamiti nādhikaraṇāntaraṃ prayojayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13655: sarveṣāṃ ca sādhāraṇe pravilayārthatve sati 'arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt' iti vinigamanakāraṇavacanamanavakāśaṃ syāt# /
GSP33vacbhamu:13656: evaṃ hi tasyāvakāśaḥ syādyāda kāścidupāsanāparatayā rūpamācakṣīran kāścinnīrūpabrahmapratipādanaparā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13657: sarvāsāṃ tu pravilayārthatvena nīrūpabrahmapratipādanārthatve ukto vinigamanaheturna syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13663: vāstavasya vā prapañcasya pravilayaḥ sarpiṣa ivāgnisaṃyogāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13665: na tāvadvāstavaḥ sarvasādhāraṇaḥ pṛthivyādiprapañcaḥ puruṣamātreṇa śakyaḥ samucchettum /
GSP33vacbhamu:13666: apica prahlādaśukādibhiḥ puruṣadhaureyaiḥ samūlamunmūlitaḥ prapañca iti śūnyaṃ jagadbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:13669: samāropitarūpastu prapañco brahmatattvajñāpanaparaireva vākyairbrahmatattvamavabodhayadbhiḥ śakyaḥ samucchettumiti kṛtamatra vidhinā /
GSP33vacbhamu:13670: nahi vidhiśatenāpi vinā tattvāvabodhanaṃ pravartasvātmajñāna iti vā kuru prapañcapravilayaṃ veti pravartitaḥ śaknoti prapañcapravilayaṃ kartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:13671: na cāsyātmajñānavidhiṃ vinā vedāntārthabrahmatattvāvabodho na bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13672: maulikasya svādhyāyādhyayanavirodhereva vivakṣitārthatayā sakalasya vedarāśeḥ phalavadarthāvabodhanaparatāmāpādayato vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13676: tasmāt 'jartilayavāgvā juhuyāt' itivadvidhisarūpā ete 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavya' ityādayo na tu vidhaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13678: draṣṭavyādiśabdā api tattvābhimudhīkaraṇapradhānā na tattvāvabodhavidhipradhānā iti# /
GSP33vacbhamu:13679: apica brahmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcamuktaṃ na tatra niyojyaḥ kaścitsaṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13696: kiñcānyanniyoganiṣṭhatayaiva ca paryavasyatyāmnāye yadabhyupagataṃ#bhavadbhiḥ śāstraparyālocanayāniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ jīvasyeti tadetacchāstrāvirodhādapramāṇakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13697: athaitacchāstramaniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ ca jīvasya pratipādayati jīvaṃ ca niyuktaṃ tato dvyarthaṃ ca viruddhārtha ca syādityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13700: nahi tadvākyaṃ tasya niyojyatāmāhāpi tu laukikapramāṇasiddhāṃ niyojyatāmāśritya darśapūrṇamāsau vidhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:13701: idaṃ tu niyojyatāmapanayati ca niyuṅkte ceti durghaṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13704: paurvāparyālocanayā vedāntānāṃ tattvaniṣṭhatā śrutā na śrutā niyoganiṣṭhatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13705: apica niyoganiṣṭhatve vākyasya darśapaurṇāmāsakarmaṇa ivāpūrvāvāntaravyāpārādātmajñānakarmaṇo 'pyapūrvāvāntaravyāpārādeva svargādiphalavanmokṣasyānandarūpaphalasya siddhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13713: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato vravīti ca bhūyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13715: dve eva brahmaṇo rūpe brahmaṇaḥ paramārthato 'rūpasyādhyāropite dve eva rūpe tābhyāṃ hi tadrūpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13719: atra pṛthivyaptejāṃsi trīṇi bhūtāni brahmaṇo rūpaṃ mūrtaṃ mūrcchitāvayavamitaretarānupraviṣṭāvayavaṃ kaṭhinamiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:13725: tasyaitasya brahmarūpasya tejo 'bannasya caturviśeṣaṇasyaiṣa rasaḥ sāro ya eṣa savitā sapati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13730: tasyaitasyāmūrtasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa gatasmin savitṛmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13731: karaṇātmako hiraṇyagarbhaprāṇāhvayastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ sāro nityaparokṣatā ca sāmyamityadhidaivatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13732_1: mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yaccakṣuḥ sato hyoṣa rasa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13733_1: yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇekṣan puruṣastyasya hyeṣa rasaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13734: liṅgasya hi karaṇātmakasya hiraṇyagarbhasya dakṣiṇamakṣyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śruteradhigatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13735: tadevaṃ brahmaṇa aupādhikayormūrtāmūrtayorādhyātmikādhidaivikayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vibhāgo vyākhyātaḥ sattyacchabdavācyayoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13736: athedānīṃ tasya karaṇātmanaḥ puruṣasya liṅgasya rūpaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13738: tadevaṃ niravaśeṣaṃ savāsanaṃ satyarūpamuktvā yattatsatyasya satyamuktaṃ brahma tatsvarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13739: yataḥ satyasya rūpaṃ niḥśeṣamuktamato 'vaśiṣṭaṃ satyasya yatsatyaṃ tasyānantaraṃ taduktihetukaṃ svarūpaṃ vakyavyamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13744: atraivamarthenetinā yatsaṃnihitaṃ parāmṛṣṭaṃ tanniṣidhyate nañā saṃnihitaṃ ca mūrtāmūrtaṃ savāsanaṃ rūpadvayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13746: tatredaṃ vicāryate-kiṃ rūpadvayaṃ savāsanaṃ brahma ca sarvameva ca pratiṣidhyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:13747: uta brahmaivātha savāsanaṃ rūpadvayaṃ brahma tu pariśiṣyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13748: yadyapi teṣu teṣu vedāntapradeśeṣu brahmasvarūpaṃ pratipāditaṃ tadasadbhāvajñānaṃ ca ninditam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13749: 'astītyevopalabdhavyaḥ' iti cāsya sattvamavadhāritaṃ tathāpi sadbodharūpaṃ tadbrahma savāsanamūrtāmūrtarūpasādhāraṇatayā ca sāmānyaṃ tasya caite viśeṣā mūrtāmūrtādayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13753: ata eva nahyetasmāditi netyanyatparamastīti niṣedhāt paraṃ nāstīti sarvaniṣedhameva tattvamāha śrutiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13759: yathāhuḥ-'yena yasyābhisaṃbandho dūrasthasyāpi tena saḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13763: katarasyāstu niṣedha iti viśaye prapañcapratiṣedhe samastapratyakṣādivyākopaprasaṅgāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13764: brahmapratiṣedho tvavyākopādbrahmaiva pratiṣedhena saṃbadhyate yogyatvānna prapañcastadvaiparītyāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:13768: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-upādhayo hyamī pṛthivyādayo 'vidyākalpitā na tu śoṇakarkādaya iva viśeṣā aśvatvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:13777: apariśiṣyamāṇe cānyasminya itaraḥ pratiṣeddhumārabhyate tasya pratiṣedbhumaśakyatvāttasyaiva paramārthatvāpatteḥ pratiṣādhānupapattiḥ# /
GSP33vacbhamu:13784: tathāca yastasya śabdaḥ prāpakaḥ sa tatpara iti sa brahmaṇi pramāṇamiti kathamasya niṣedho 'pi pramāṇavān /
GSP33vacbhamu:13785: naca paryudāsādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena vikalpaḥ vastuni siddhasvabhāve tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13792: upakramaparāmarśopasaṃhāraparyālocanayā hi vedāntānāṃ sarveṣāmeva brahmaparatvamupapāditaṃ prathame 'dhyāye /
GSP33vacbhamu:13793: na cāsatyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ dūratasthena pratiṣedhenaiṣāṃ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13794: yacca vāṅmanasātītatayā brahmaṇastatpratiṣedhasya na pramāṇāntaravirodha iti tatrāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13799: idānīṃ tu niṣprayojanamityuktaṃ 'prakṣālanāddhi paṅkasya' iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13800: tasmādvedāntavācā manasi saṃnidhānādbrahmaṇo vāṅmanasātītatvaṃ nāñjasamapi tu pratipādanaprakriyopakrama eṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13801: yathā gavādayo viṣayāḥ sākṣācchṛṅgagrāhikayā pratipādyante pratiyante ca naivaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:13803: nanu prakṛtapratiṣedhe brahmaṇo 'pi kasmānna pratiṣejha ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13805: pradhānaṃ prakṛtaṃ prapañcasya pradhānaṃ na brahma tasya ṣaṣṭhyantatayā prapañcāvacchekatvenāpradhānatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13806: tato 'nyadbravītīti neti netīti pratiṣedhādanyadbhūyo bravītīti tannirvacanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13807: nahyetasmādityasya yadā nahyetasmāditi neti netyādiṣṭādbrahmaṇo 'nyatparamastīti vyākhyānaṃ tadā prapañcapratiṣedhādanyadbrahmaiva bravītīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13808: yadā tu nahyetasmāditi sarvanāmnā pratiṣedho brahmaṇa ādeśaḥ parāmṛśyate tadāpi prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ na pratipattavyamapi tu tena pratiṣedhena bhāvarūpaṃ brahmopalakṣyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13812: atha brahmaṇo nāmadheyaṃ nāma satyasya satyamiti tadvyācaṣṭe śrutiḥ-'prāṇā vai satyam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13814: tat khalu satyamitarāpekṣayā tasyāpi paraṃ satyaṃ brahma /
GSP33vacbhamu:13815: tadevaṃ yataḥ pratiṣedhasya parastadbravīti tasmānna prapañcapratiṣedhamātraṃ brahmāpi tu bhāvarūpamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13816: tadevaṃ pūrvasmin vyākhyāne nirvacanaṃ bravītīti vyākhyātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13829: kuṇḍalādirūpeṇa tu bheda ityuktaṃ tena viṣayabhedādbhedābhedayoravirodha ityekaviṣayatvena vā sarvadopalabdheravirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13830: viruddhamiti hi naḥ kka saṃpratyayo na yatpramāṇenopalabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:13831: āgamataśca pramāṇādekagocarāvapi bhedābhedau pratīyamānau na virodhamāvahataḥ savitṛprakāśayoriva pratyakṣātpramāṇādbhedābhedāviti //27 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13842: ahitvakuṇḍalatve bhinne iti vaktavyaṃ na tu vastunastābhyāṃ bhedābhedau /
GSP33vacbhamu:13845: atha vastuno na bhidyete ahitvakuṇḍalatve tathā sati ko bhedābhedayorviṣayabhedastayorvastuno 'nanyatvenābhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13846: na caikaviṣayatve 'pi sadānubhūyamānatvādbhedābhedayoravirodha svarūpaviruddhayorapyavirodhe kka nāma virodho vyavatiṣṭheta /
GSP33vacbhamu:13849: prapañcitaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra iti neha prapañcitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13854: yathāha śrutiḥ-'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:13867: tadyathā prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā avayavā iva kalāḥ sa prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13868: etadupāsanāyāṃ prakāśavān mukhyo bhavatīti prakāśavān pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13869: athāparāḥ pṛthivyantarikṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra iti catasraḥ kalā eṣa dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantatavānnāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:13871: athāgniḥ sūryaścandramā vidyuditi catasraḥ kalāḥ sa jyotiṣmānnāma pādastṛtīyastadupāsanājjyotiṣmān bhavatīti jyotiṣmān pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13872: atha ghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgiti catasraḥ kalāścaturthaḥ pāda āyatanavānnāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:13873: ete ghrāṇādayo hi gandhādiviṣayā mana āyatanamāśritya bhogasādhanaṃ bhavantītyāyatanavānnāma pādaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13885: yathā hi tantavaḥ paṭaṃ vidhārayanti tadupādānatvādevaṃ brahmāpi jagadvidhārayati tadupapādakatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:13894: manaso brahmapratīkasya samāropitabrahmabhāvasya vāgghrāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotramiti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13895: mano hi vaktavyaghrātavyadraṣṭavyaśrotavyān gocarān vāgādibhiḥ saṃcaratīti saṃcaraṇasādhāraṇatayā manasaḥ pādastadidamadhyātman /
GSP33vacbhamu:13896: ākāśasya brahmapratīkasyāgnirvāyurādityo diśa iti catvāraḥ pādāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13897: te hi vyāpino nabhasa udara iva goḥ pādā vilagnā upalakṣyanta iti pādastadidamadhidaivatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:13898: tadanena pādavaditi vaidikaṃ nidarśanaṃ vyākhyāya laukikaṃ cedaṃ nidarśanamityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13907: yathā saudhajālamārganiveśinyaḥ savitṛbhāso jālamārgopādhibedādbhinnā bhāsante tadvigame tu gabhastimaṇḍalenaikībhavantyatastena saṃbadhyanta evamihāpīti //34 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13910: ekībhāvaḥ kasmādiha saṃbandhaḥ kathañcidvyākhyāyate na mukhya evetyetatsūtreṇa pariharati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13913: svabhāvaścedanena saṃbandhatvena spṛṣṭastataḥ svābhāvikastādātmyānnātiricyata iti tarkapāda upapāditamityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13914: tathā bhedo 'pi trividho vānyādṛśaḥ svābhāvika ityarthaḥ //35 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13922: brahmādvaitasiddhāvapi na sarvagatatvaṃ sarvavyāpitā sarvasya brahmaṇā svarūpeṇa rūpavattvaṃ sidhyatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13923: anena setvādinirākaraṇena#parahetunirākaraṇenānyapratiṣedhasamāśrayaṇena ca svasādhanopanyāsena ca sarvagatatvamapyātmanaḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:13924: advaita siddhe sarvo 'yamanirvacanīyaḥ prapañcāvabhāso brahmādhiṣṭhāna iti sarvasya brahmasaṃbandhādbrahma sarvagatamiti siddham //37 //
GSP33vacbhamu:13929: nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ kuta īśvaratvaṃ kutaśca phalahetutvamapītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13942: atha karmaṇa eva phalaṃ kasmānna bhavatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:13947: upāttamapi phalaṃ bhoktumayogyatvādvā karmāntarapratibandhādvā na bhujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:13950: nahi svarga ātmānaṃ labhatāmityadhikāriṇaḥ kāmayante kintu bhogyo 'smākaṃ #
GSP33vacbhamu:13952: tena yādṛśamebhiḥ kāmyate tādṛśasya phalatvamiti bhogyameva satphalamiti /

GSP33vacbhamu:14577: saṃkalpe tu karmāntare vidhīyamāne nāyaṃ doṣa ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:14581: yathā hi śvādimaryādasyānnasyāttumaśakyatvādannadṛṣṭiścodyate evamihāpyapāṃ paridhānāsaṃbhavāddṛṣṭireva codyata ityannadṛṣṭividhisāhacaryādgamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14582: aśabdatvaṃ ca yadyapi dṛṣṭyabhyavahārayostulyaṃ tathāpi dṛṣṭiḥ śābdadṛśyanāntarīyakatayā sākṣācchabdena kriyamāṇopalabhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14584: kiñca chāndogyānāṃ vājasaneyināṃ cācamane prāyeṇācāmantīti vartamānāpadeśaḥ evaṃ yatrāpi vidhivibhaktistatrāpi jartilayavāgvavā vā juhuyāditivadvidhitvamavivakṣitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14593: tasmātsamidho yajatītyādivadabhyāsādupāsanābheda iti prāpta ucyate-aikakarmyamekatvena pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14595: tatra bhūyāṃso guṇā yasya karmaṇo vidhīyante tatra tasya pradhānasya vidhiritaratra tu tadanuvādena katipayaguṇavidhiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14596: yathā yatra chatracāmarapatākāhāstikāścīyaśaktikayāṣṭīkadhānuṣkakārpāṇikaprāsikapadātipracayastatrāsti rājeti gamyate na tu katipayagajavājipadātibhāji tadamātye, tathehāpi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14604: yadyekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ tattvena pratyabhijñānādupāsanasya tatra vihitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃkaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14607: satyasya ca pradhānasya prakṛtatvādadhidaivamityasya viśeṣaṇatayopasarjanatvenāprastutvātprastutasya ca satyasyābhedātpūrvavadguṇasaṃkaraḥ //20 //
GSP33vacbhamu:14611: satyaṃ yatra svarūpamātrasaṃbandho dharmāṇāṃ śrūyate tatraivaṃ svarūpasya pratyabhijñāyamānatvāttanmātrasaṃbandhitvācca dharmāṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:14612: yatra tu saviśeṣaṇaṃ pradhānamavagamyate tatra saviśeṣaṇasyaiva tasya dharmābhisaṃbandho na nirviśeṣaṇasya nāṭyanyaviśeṣaṇasahitasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:14615: yathā cācāryasya gacchato 'nugamanaṃ vihitaṃ na tiṣṭhato bhavati,
GSP33vacbhamu:14625: brahma bhūtānāṃ prathamaṃ tu jajñe tenārhati brahmaṇā spardhituṃ kaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14626: ' brahma jyeṣṭhaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni brahmajyeṣṭhā jajñe āsa /
GSP33vacbhamu:14627: yadyapi tāsu tāsu śāṇḍilyādividyāsvāyatanabhedaparigraheṇādhyatmikāyatanatvaṃ saṃbhṛtyādīnāṃ guṇānāmādhidaikatvamityāyatanabhedaḥ pratibhāti,
GSP33vacbhamu:14628_1: ca vidyāsvāyatanāśravaṇādantato brahmāśrayatayā sāmyena pratyabhijñāsaṃbhavāt saṃbṛtyādīnāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14628_2: guṇānāṃ śāṇḍilyādividyāsu ṣoḍaśakalādividyāsu copasaṃhāra iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14629_0: rāddhāntastu-mithaḥ samānaguṇaśravaṇaṃ pratyabhijñāya yadvidyā apūrvānapi tatrāśrutānguṇānupasaṃhārayati
GSP33vacbhamu:14630: yā tu kācidādhidaivikī vibhūtiḥ śāṇḍilyādividyāyaṃ śrūyate tasmāstatprakaraṇādhīnatvāttāvanmātraṃ grahīṣyate naitāvanmātreṇa saṃbhṛtyādīnanukraṣṭumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14636: tasmātsaṃbhṛtiśca dyuvyāptiśca tadidaṃ saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptyapi cātaḥ pratyabhijñānābhāvānna śāṇḍilyādividyāsūpasaṃhriyata iti siddham //23 //
GSP33vacbhamu:14643: yajñasya svarūpaṃ yajamānastasya ca cetanatvādviduṣa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14645: evaṃ prāpta ucyate yādṛśaṃ tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca puruṣayajñasaṃpādanaṃ tadāyuṣaśca tredhā vyavasthitasya savanatrayasaṃpādanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14653: ātmanastu cetanasya yajamānatvaṃ ca vidvattvaṃ copapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14654_0: tathā cāyamarthaḥ-evaṃ viduṣaḥ puruṣasya yaḥ saṃbandhī yajñaḥ tasya saṃbandhitayā
GSP33vacbhamu:14654_1: yajamāna ātmā tathā cātmano yajamānatvaṃ ca vidvatsaṃbandhitā ca yajñasya mukhye
GSP33vacbhamu:14654_2: syātāmitarachātmaśabdasya svarūpavācitve viduṣo yajñasyeti ca yajamāno yajñasvarūpamiti ca gauṇe syātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:14656: tasmātpuruṣayajñatā taittirīye nāstīti tayā tāvanna sāmyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14657: naca patnīyajamānavedavidyādisaṃpādanaṃ taittirīyāṇāmivi tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ vā vidyate savanasaṃpattirapyeṣāṃ vilakṣaṇaiva /
GSP33vacbhamu:14659: apica tasyaivaṃ viduṣa ityanuvādaśrutau satyāmanekārthavidhāne vākyabhedadoṣaprasaktirityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14660: api ceyaṃ paiṅgināṃ tāṇḍināṃ ca puruṣayajñavidyāphalāntarayuktā svatantrā pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14669: ātharvaṇikādyupaniṣadārambhe te te mantrāstāni tāni ca pravargyādīti karmāṇi samamnātīni /
GSP33vacbhamu:14674: saphalā hi sarvā vidyā āmnātāstatsannidhau mantrāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14675: karmāṇi ca samāmnātāni 'phalavatsannidhāphalaṃ tadaṅgam' iti nyāyādvidyāṅgābhāvena vijñāyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:14679: nahi yathā darśapūrṇamāsāvārabhya samidādayaḥ samāmrātāstathā kāñcidvidyāmārabhya mantrā vā karmāṇi vā samāmrātāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:14681: naca śrutasvāṅgaparipūrṇā vidyā etānākāṅkṣitumarhati yena prakaraṇāpaditasāmānyasaṃbandhānāṃ saṃnidhirviśeṣasaṃbandhāyā bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14685_0: mantrāṇāṃ tu svādhyāyavidhyāpāditapuruṣārthabhāvanāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca pravargyādīnāṃ svavidhyāpāditapuruṣārthabhāvānāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14686: tatrāpi ca vidyānāṃ phalavattvāttādarthyamaphalānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca /
GSP33vacbhamu:14691: idaṃ khalu nivṛttākāṅkṣāyā vidyāyāḥ saṃnidhāne śrutamanākāṅkṣāyā sākāṅkṣasyāpi saṃbaddhumasāmarthyāttasyā apyākāhkṣāmutthāpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14693: asamarthasya copakārakatvānupapatteḥ prakaraṇinaṃ prati upakārasāmarthyamātmanaḥ kalpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14694: naca satyapi sāmarthye tatra śrutyā aviniyuktaṃ sadaṅgatāmupagantumarhatītyanayā paramparayā saṃnidhiḥ śrutimarthāpattyā kalpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14697: prayogasamavetārthaprakāśanena hi mantrāṇāmupayogo varṇitaḥ 'aviśiṣṭastu vākyārthaḥ' ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:14699: yadyapi ca pravargyo na kiñcidārabhya śrūyate tathāpi vākyasaṃyogena kratusaṃyogena kratusaṃbandhaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14702: yadyapi jyotiṣṭomavikṛtāvapi santyupasadastathāpi tatrānumānikyo jyotiṣṭome tu pratyakṣavihitāstena śīghrapravṛttitayā jyotiṣṭomāṅgataiva vākyenāvagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14703: apica prakṛtau vihitasya pravargyasya codakenopasadvattadvikṛtāvapi prāptiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14704: prakṛtau vā adviruktatvāditi nyāyājjyotiṣṭome eva vidhānamupasadā saha yuktaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14711: yathā 'agnaye tvā juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmi' iti mantre agnaye nirvapāmiti pade karmasamavetārthaprakāśake /
GSP33vacbhamu:14712_0: śiṣṭānāṃ tu padānāṃ tadekavākyatayā yathākathañcidvyākhyānamevamihāpi hṛdayapadasyopāsanāyāṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14712_1: samavetārthatvāttadanusāreṇa tadekavākyatāpannāpi padāntarāṇi gauṇyā lakṣaṇayā ca
GSP33vacbhamu:14713: naca mantraviniyogo nopāsaneṣu dṛṣṭo yenātyantādṛṣṭaṃ kalpyata ityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:14715: yadyapi vākyena balīyasā saṃnidhirdurbalo bādhyate tathāpi virodhe sati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14717: vākyena viniyuktasyāpi jyotiṣṭome pravargyasya saṃnidhinā vidyāyāmapi viniyogasaṃbhavāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14718: yathā 'brahmavarcasakāmo bṛhaspatisavena yajeta' iti brahmavarcasaphalo 'pi bṛhaspatisavo vājapeyāṅgatvena codyate-vājapeyeneṣṭvā bṛhaspatisavena yajeteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14719: atra hi ktvaḥ samānakartṛkatvamavagamyate dhātusaṃbandhe pratyayavidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14720: dhātvarthāntarasaṃbandhaśca kathaṃ ca samānaḥ kartā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14725: naca guṇapradhānabhāvamantareṇaikaprayogatā saṃbandhaśca tatrāpi vājapeyasya prakaraṇe samāmnānādvājapeyaḥ pradhānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14728: nahyetadvacanaṃ kasyaciddarśapūrṇamāsamya somasya vā prakaraṇe samāmnātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14729: tathāca dvayoḥ sādhikāratayā agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ prati vinigamanābhāvenādhiṣṭhānamātravivakṣayā lākṣaṇikaṃ samānakartṛkatvamityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14732: tathā sati dvayorapi pṛthagadhikāratayā pratītaṃ samapradhānatvamatyaktaṃ bhaveditarathā tu guṇapradhānabhāvena tattyāgo bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:14740: ābhicārike tu karmaṇi sarveṣāmarthasamavāya iti kimekapadasamavetārthatā kariṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14742_1: saṃnidhinācālayitumaśakyatvādevaṃ 'deva savitaḥ prasuva yajñam' ityāderapi yajñaprasavaliṅgasya
GSP33vacbhamu:14742_2: yajñaṅgatve siddhe jaghanyo vidyāsaṃnidhiḥ kiṃ kariṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14748: tatra tu śrutiliṅgayoḥ samavāye samānaviṣayatvalakṣaṇe virodhe kiṃ balīya iti cintā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14749: atrodāharaṇam-astyaindrī ṛk 'kadācanastarīrasi nendra' ityādikā śrutirviniyokī 'aindrayā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14751: śruteśca gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāto gārhapatyasya śeṣitvaṃ aindriyeti catṛtīyāśruteraindyā ṛcaḥ śeṣatvamavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14752: yadyapi gārhapatyamiti dvitīyāśruterāgneyīmṛcaṃ prati gārhapatyasya śeṣitvenopapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14753: yadyapi caindrayeti ca tṛtīyāśruteraindrayā indraṃ prati śeṣatvanopapatteravirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14754: padāntarasaṃbandhe tu vākyasyaiva liṅgena virodho na tu śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14757: dvitīyātṛtīyāśrutī hi kārakavibhaktitayā kriyāṃ prati prakṛtyarthasya karmakaraṇabhāvamavagamayata iti viniyojike /
GSP33vacbhamu:14758: kriyāṃ prati hi karmaṇaḥ śeṣitvaṃ karaṇasya ca śeṣatvamiti hi viniyogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14759: padāntarānapekṣe ca kriyāṃ prati śeṣaśeṣitve śrutimātrātpratiyete iti śraute /
GSP33vacbhamu:14763_0: tasmādvākyalabhyaṃ viśiṣamapekṣya śrautaḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāvo liṅgena virudhyata iti śrutiliṅgavirodhe
GSP33vacbhamu:14763_1: kiṃ liṅgānuguṇena gārhatvamiti dvitīyāśrutiḥ saptamyarthe vyākhyāyatāṃ gārhapatyasamīpe
GSP33vacbhamu:14765: prabhavati hi svocitāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ gārhapatya itīndra indarteraiśvaryavacanatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14767: no khalu yatrāsamarthaṃ tacchutisahasreṇāpi tatra viniyoktuṃ śakyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14770: taccāsyā ṛcaḥ pramāṇāntarataḥ śabdataśca indre pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14773: tasmāddārudahanasyeva dahanasya saliladahane viniyogo gārhapatye viniyoga aindrayāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14776: tasmādaindrayendra eva gārhapatyasamīpa upasthātavya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-'liṅgajñānaṃ purodhāya na śrutervinayoktṛtā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14778: yadi hi sāmarthyamavagamya śruterviniyogamavadhārayetpramātā tataḥ śruterviniyogaṃ prati liṅgajñānāpekṣatvāddurbalatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:14781: avagate tu tato viniyoge nāsamarthasya sa iti tannirvāhāya sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14784: viniyoge tu siddhe tadanyathānupapattyā paścātpratīyata iti śrutiviniyogātparācīnā sāmarthyapratītistadanurodhenāvasthāpanīyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14785: liṅgaṃ tu na svato viniyojakamapi tu viniyokīṃ kalpyitvā śrutim /
GSP33vacbhamu:14786: tathāhi-na svarasato liṅgādanenendra upasthātavya iti pratīyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:14787_0: kintvīdṛgindra iti tasya tu prakaraṇāmnānasāmartyāt sāmānyataḥ prakaraṇāpatitaidamarthyasya
GSP33vacbhamu:14789: nahi trayo 'tra brahmaṇāḥ kaṭhakauṇḍinyāviti vākyaṃ pramāṇāntaropasthāpitena māṭhareṇopapādayanti,
GSP33vacbhamu:14797_1: śrutyā gārhapatye viniyogaḥ siddha iti nivṛttākāṅkṣaṃ prakaramamiti kasyānupapattyā
GSP33vacbhamu:14800: pramite tu pramātṛṇāṃ pramautsukyaṃ vihanyate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14801: tasmātpratītaśrautaviniyogopapattyai mantrasya sāmarthye tadanuguṇatvena nīyamānaṃ prathamāṃ vṛttimajahajjaghanyayāpi neyamiti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:14802: liṅgavākyayoriha virodho yathā-'syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suśeṣaṃ kalpyāmi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14803: tasminsīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamānaḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14804: kimayaṃ kṛtsna eva mantraḥ sadanakaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca prayoktavya uta kalpyāmyanta upastaraṇe tasmintsīdetyevamādistu puroḍāśāsādana iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14805: yadi vākyaṃ balīyaḥ kṛtsnau mantra ubhayatra,
GSP33vacbhamu:14806: suśevaṃ kalpyāmītyetadapekṣo hi tasminsīdetyādiḥ pūrveṇaikavākyatāmupaiti yatkalpayāmi tasmintsīdeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14807: atha liṅgaṃ balīyastataḥ kalpyāmyantaḥ sadanakaraṇe tatprakāśane hi tatsamartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:14810: liṅgādvākyaṃ balīya ityubhayatra kṛtsnasya viniyoga iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14811: iha hi yattatpadasamabhivyāhāreṇa vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvādekavākyatāyāṃ siddhāyāṃ tadanurodhena paścāttadabhidhānasāmārthyaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14812: yathā devasyatvetimantre 'gnye nirvapāmīti padayoḥ samavetārthatvena tadekavākyatayā padāntarāṇāṃ tatparatvena tatra sāmarthyakalpanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14813: tadevaṃ pratītaikavākyatānirvāhāya tadanuguṇatayā sāmarthyaṃ kḷptaṃ sanna tadvyāpādayitumarhati,
GSP33vacbhamu:14814: api tu viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ mantraḥ prayoktavya iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14815_1: tu avadhṛtasāmarthyānāṃ padānāṃ praśliṣṭapāṭhitānāṃ sāmarthyavaśena prayojanaikatvenekavākyatvāvadhāraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14816: yavanti padāni pradhānamekamarthamavagamayituṃ samarthāni vibhāge sākāṅkṣāṇi tānyekaṃ vākyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14819: tayośca sadanakaraṇaṃ kalpayāmyanto mantraḥ samarthaḥ prakāśayituṃ puroḍāśāsādanaṃ ca tasminsīdetyādiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14820: tataśca yāvadekavākyatāvaśena sāmarthyamanumīyate tāvatpratītaṃ sāmarthyamekaikasya bhāgasyaikaikasminnarthe viniyojikāṃ śrutiṃ kalpayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14821_0: tathāca śrutyaivaikaikasya bhāgasyaikatra viniyoge sati prakaraṇapāṭhopapattau na
GSP33vacbhamu:14821_1: vākyakalpitaṃ liṅgaṃ viniyojikāṃ śrutimaparāṃ kalpayitumarhatītyekavākyatābuddhirutpannāpyābhāsībhavati liṅgena bādhanāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14822: yatra tu virodhakaṃ liṅgaṃ nāsti tatra samavetārthaikadvitripadaikavākyatā padāntarāṇāmapi sāmarthyaṃ kalpayatīti bhavati vākyasya viniyojakatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14826: atra ca padānāṃ parasparāpekṣāvaśātkasmiṃścidviśiṣṭa ekasminnarthe paryavasitānāṃ vākyatvaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14827: labdhavākyabhāvanāṃ ca punaḥ kāryāntarāpekṣāvaśena vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhaḥ prakaraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14828: kartavyāyāḥ khalu phalabhāvanāyā labdhadhātvarthakaraṇāyā itikartavyatākāṅkṣāyā vacanaṃ prakaraṇamācakṣate vṛddhāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14831: tadetasmin svapadagaṇena kiyatyapyarthe paryavasite karaṇopakāralakṣaṇakāryāntarāpekṣāyāṃ 'samidho yajati' ityādivākyāntarasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14832: samidādibhāvanā hi svavidhyupahitāḥ puruṣe hitaṃ bhāvyapekṣamāṇā viśvajitryāyena vānuṣaṅgato vārthavādato vā phalāntarāpratilambhena darśapūrṇamāsabhāvanāṃ nirvārayitumīśate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14833: tasmāttadakāṅkṣāyāmupanipatitānyetāni vākyāni svakāryāpekṣāṇi tadapekṣitakaraṇopakāralakṣaṇaṃ kāryamasādya nirvaṇvanti ca nirvārayanti ca pradhānam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14837: taśca na mitha ekavākyatāṃ gantumarhantīti liṅgena paurṇamāsīyāgādindrāgnīśabda utkraṣṭavyaḥ amāvāsyāyāṃ ca samavetārtatvātprayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14838: athedānīṃ saṃdihyate-kiṃ yadindrāgnipadaikavākyatayā pratīyate 'avivṛdhethāṃ maho jyāyo 'kātām' iti tannotākraṣṭavyamutendrāgniśabdābhyāṃ sahotkraṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14839: tatra yadi prakaraṇaṃ balīyastato 'panītadevatāko 'pi śeṣaḥ prayoktavyo 'tha vākyaṃ tato tatra devatāśabdastatraiva prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14844: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-bhavedetadevaṃ yadi viniyojyasvarūpasāmarthyamanapekṣya prakaramaṃ viniyojayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:14845: api tu viniyogāya tadapekṣaye 'nyathā pūṣādyanumantraṇamantrasya dvadaśopasattāyāśca notkarṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14846: tadrūpālocanāyāṃ ca tadyadeva śīghraṃ pratīyate tattadvalavadviprakṛṣṭaṃ tu durbalam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14847: tatra yadi tadrūpaṃ śrutyā liṅgena vākyena vānyatra viniyuktaṃ tataḥ prakaramaṃ bhaṅktvotkṛṣyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:14849: atha svasya śīghrapravṛttaṃ śrutyādi nāsti tataḥ prakaramaṃ viniyojakam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14855_0: yāvaditaratra vākyena sāmarthyaṃ tāvaditaratra sāmarthyena śrutistāvadiha śrutyā
GSP33vacbhamu:14855_1: viniyogastāvatā ca vicchinnāyāmākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrutyanumāne vihate prakaraṇenāntarā kalpitaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14863: gāmānaya prasādaṃ paśyeti gāmityasya kriyāmātrāpekṣiṇaḥ paśyetyanenāpi saṃbandhasaṃbhavādvinigamanābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14867: ayameti putro rājñaḥ puruṣo 'pasāryatāmityatra rājña ityasya putrapuruṣapadasaṃnidhānāviśeṣānmā bhūdavinigamanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14869_0: atra putraśabdasya saṃbandhivacanatayā samutthitākāṅkṣasyāntike yadupanipatitaṃ saṃbandhyantarākāṅkṣaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14869_1: padaṃ tasya tenaivākāṅkṣāparipūrteḥ puruṣapadena puruṣarūpamātrābhidhāyinā svatantreṇaiva
GSP33vacbhamu:14872: tathā cākāṅkṣitamapi na yāvatsaṃnidhāpyate tāvanna saṃbadhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14873_0: tathā saṃnihitamapi yāvannākāṅkṣyate na tāvatsaṃbadhyata iti dvayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ prati
GSP33vacbhamu:14874: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-rājasūyake kathaṃbhāvāpekṣā hi pavitrādārabhya kṣatrasya dhṛtiṃ yāvadanuvartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14876: anirjñātaphalaṃ karma tasya prakaraṇāṅgatā ' iti nyāyādrājasūyāṅgatā śaunaḥśopopākhyānādīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:14877: abhiṣecanīyasya tu svavākyopāttapadārthanirākāṅkṣasya saṃnidhipāṭhenākāṅkṣotthāpanīyā yāvattāvatsiddhākāṅkṣeṇa rājasūyenaikavākyatā kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14878_0: yāvaccābhiṣecanīyaikavākyatayā liṅgaṃ kalpyate tāvatkḷptaliṅgaṃ viniyokrīṃ śrutiṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14878_1: kalpyati yāvadvākyakalpitena liṅgena śrutiritaratra kalpte tāvatkḷptayā śrutyā viniyoge
GSP33vacbhamu:14881: tasmātprakaraṇavirodhe kramasya bādha eva naca vikalpo durbalatvāditi siddham //
GSP33vacbhamu:14882: kramasamākhyayorvirodhodāharaṇam-pauroḍāśika iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sānnāṭyakrame ca śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya karmaṇa iti śundhanārtho mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14883: tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ samākhyānasya balīyastvātpuroḍāśapātrāṇāṃ śundhena viniyoktavyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14886: samākhyānāṃ balīya iti pauroḍāśikaśabdena hi puroḍāśasaṃbandhīnītyucyante tānyadhikṛtya pravṛttaṃ kāṇḍaṃ pauroḍāśikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14887_0: tataśca yāvatkrameṇa prakaraṇādyanumānaparamparayā saṃbandhaḥ pratipādanīyaḥ yāvatsamākhyayā
GSP33vacbhamu:14887_1: śrutyaiva sākṣādeva sa pratipādita iti arthaviprakarṣeṇa kramātsamākhyaiva balīyasīti
GSP33vacbhamu:14887_2: puroḍāśapātraśundhena mantraḥ prayoktavyaḥ na sānnāṭyapātraśundhana iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14889: tathāhi-samākhyā na tāvatsaṃbandhasya vācikā kintu pauroḍāśaviśiṣṭaṃ kāṇḍamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:14890: tadviśiṣṭatvānyathānupapattyā tava saṃbandhaḥ kāṇḍasyānumīyate na tu sākṣānmantrabedasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:14892: na cāsau saṃbandho 'pi śrutyaiva śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14897_1: viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ sānnāṭyakramaḥ sānnāṭyaṃ prati prakaraṇādyanumānadvāreṇa viniyogaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:14899: tathāhi-samākhyā saṃbandhanibandhanā sati tatsidhyarthaṃ saṃnidhimupakalpayati yāvattādvaidikena pratyakṣadṛṣṭena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14900: yāvacca kḷptena saṃnidhānenākāṅkṣā kalpyate tāvaditaratra kḷptayākāṅkṣayaikavākyatā tāvaditaratraikavākyatayā kḷptayopakārasāmarthyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14902_0: yāvadatra liṅgena viniyojikā śrutistāvaditaratra kḷptayā śrutyā viniyoga iti tāvataiva
GSP33vacbhamu:14902_1: prakaraṇapāṭhopapatteḥ sarvaṃ samākhyānakalpitaṃ vicchinnamūlatvāttūyamānaśasyamiva nirbījaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14907: tatrāpi ca 'bādhikaiva śrutirnityaṃ samākhyā bādhyate sadā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14910: tadvayaṃ vistarādbibhyato 'pi prathamatantrānabhijñānukampayā nidhrā vistare patitāḥ sma ityuparamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14911: tasmādyathānujñāpanānujñayoḥ prajñātakramayorupahūta upahūyasvetyevaṃ mantravāmnātau deśasāmānyāttathaivāṅgatayā prāpnutaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14912: upahūta iti liṅgato 'nujñāmantro nānujñāpane upahūyasveti ca liṅgato 'nujñāpano ca mantro nānujñāyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:14913: tadiha liṅgena kramaṃ bādhitvā viparītaṃ śeṣatvamāpādyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:14914: yāvaddhi sthānena prakaraṇamutpādyaikavākyatvaṃ kalpyate tāvalliṅgena śrutiṃ kalpayitvā sādhito viniyoga iti akalpitaliṅgaśruteḥ kramasya bādhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14915: tadvidihāpi viniyoge pratyekāntaritena liṅgena caturantaritasya vidyākramasya bādha iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14916: yadyapi prathamatantra evāyamartha upapāditastathāpi virodhe tadupapādanamiha tvavirodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14919: athaiva pratītivirodho naca vastuvirodhaḥ sa vidyāyāṃ viniyoge 'pi tulyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14925: upapādite tu śrutyādibiḥ prakaraṇapāṭhe kṣīṇatvādarthāpatteḥ kramo na svocitāṃ pramāmutpādayitumarhati pramityābhāvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14926_1: saṃyogapṛthaktvena viniyuktamapi viniyojayantī na śakyā śrutyantareṇa niroddhuṃ svapramāmiti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14930: tulyabalatayā bṛhaspatisamasya tulyatāśaṅkāpākaraṇadvāreṇa samuccayo na tu pṛthaguktitayā parasparāpekṣatvāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:14936: yatra hānopāyane śrūyete tatrāvivādaḥ saṃnipāte yatrāpyupāyanamātraśravaṇaṃ tatrāpi nāntarīyakatayā hānamākṣiptamityasti saṃnipātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14937: yatra tu hānamātraṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ śrutaṃ na śrūyate upāyanaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14948: nanu yathopāyanaṃ śrutaṃ hānamupasthāpayatyevaṃ hānamapi upāyanamityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:14950: grahaṇaṃ hi na svāmino 'pagamamantareṇa bhavatīti grahaṇādapagamasiddhiravaśyaṃbhāvinī /
GSP33vacbhamu:14951: apagamastvasatyapyanyena grahaṇe dṛṣṭo yathā prāyaścittenāpagatirenasa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14955: ayamasyārthaḥ-karmāntare vihitaṃ hi na karmāntara upasaṃhriyate pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:14956: yatpunarna vidhīyate kintu stutyarthaṃ siddhatayā saṃkīrtyate tadasati bādhake devatādhikaraṇanyāyena śabdataḥ pratīyamānaṃ parityaktumaśakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:14957: tathāca vidhūtayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayornirguṇāyāṃ vidyāyāmaśvaromādivatkiṃ bhavatvityākāṅkṣāyāṃ na tāvatprāyaścitteneva tadvilayasaṃbhavastathā satyaśvaromarāhudṛṣṭāntānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14961: tasmādarthavādasyāpekṣāyāṃ śabdasaṃnidhikṛto 'pi viśeṣa upāyanaṃ buddhau saṃnidhāpayituṃ śakrotyapekṣāṃ pūrayitumiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14969: yadyapyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyasya phalaṃ prayacchataḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:14970: yathā putrasya śrāddhakarma pitustṛptiṃ yathā ca piturvaiśvānarīyeṣṭiḥ putrasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:14972: tathāpyanyadīye api sukṛtaduṣkṛte sākṣādanyasminna saṃbhavata ityāśayena śaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:14979: prayojanaṃ copāsake sauhārdamācaritavyaṃ na svasauhārdamiti chanda evācchanda ācchādanādācchabdo bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:14991: 'api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyāṭyatvādvikalpasya vidhīnāmekadeśaḥ syāt' ityetadeva sūtramarthadvāreṇa paṭhati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:14992: api tu vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ#syātsa cānyāṭya iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:14993: evaṃ kila śrūyate-'eṣa vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryajñe yajñe 'nvāyatta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14997: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ vidhipratiṣedhayorvikalpa uta paryudāso 'nuyājavarjiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:14999: dṛṣṭaṃ hi tādātvikīmasya sundaratāṃ gamayati nāyatau doṣavattāṃ niṣedhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15001: niṣedhaśāstraṃ tu tādātvikaṃ saundaryamabādhamānameva pravṛttyunmukhaṃ naraṃ nivārayadāyatyāmasya duḥkhaphalatvamavagamayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15003: tato gārataḥ pravṛttamapyāyatyāṃ duḥkhato vibhyataṃ puruṣaṃ śaknoti nivārayitumiti balīyayān śāstrīyaḥ pratiṣedho gārataḥ pravṛtteriti na tayā vikalpamarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15008_0: naca vācyaṃ yāvadyajatiṣu yeyajāmahakaraṇaṃ yāvadyajatisāmānyadvāreṇānuyājaṃ yajativiśeṣamupasarpati
GSP33vacbhamu:15008_1: tāvadanuyājagatena niṣedhena tanniṣiddhamiti śīghrapravṛtteḥ sāmānyaśāstradviśeṣaniṣedho balavāniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15009: yato bhavatvevaṃvidhiṣu brāhmaṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15010: tatra takradhaprāptyai tadvidhimapekṣate pravartitumiha tu prāptapūrvakatvāpratiṣedhasya yeyajāmahasya cānyato 'prāptestanniṣedhena niṣedhaprāptyai tadvidhirapekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15011: naca sāpekṣatayā niṣedhādvidhireva balīyānityatulyaśiṣṭatayā na vikalpaḥ kintu niṣedhasyaiva bādhanamiti sāṃprataṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:15025: tenādoṣaduṣṭo 'pi vikalpa āsthīyate pakṣe 'pi prāmāṇyānmā bhūtpramatagītateti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15027: evaṃ hi tadā nañaḥ saṃbandho 'nanuyājeṣu yajatiṣvanuyājavartiteṣu yeyajāmahaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15036: yathā hi sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoramūrtayoḥ kalpanaṃ nāñjasaṃ sūrtyanuvidhāyitvātkampasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:15038: tasmādyatra vidhūnanamātraṃ śrutaṃ tatra kampanena varaṃ svakāryarambhāccālanamātrameva lakṣyatāṃ na tu tato 'pagatyānyatra saṃcāraḥ kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15039: tasmātsvakāryārambhāccālanaṃ vidhūnanamiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-yatra tāvadupāyanaśrutistatrāvaśyaṃ tyāgo vidhūnanaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15040: kkacidapi codvidhūnanaṃ tyāge vartate tathā satyanyatrāpi tatraiva vartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15041: evaṃ hi na varteta yadi vidhūnanamiha mukhyaṃ labhyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:15061: taditi hi sarvanāma tasmādarthe sannihitaparāmarśakaṃ tasya hetubhāvamāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:15067: nahi tatra jīvanniti vā jīvata iti vā śrutam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15069: evañca na paryaṅkavidyātastatprakṣaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15070: rāddhāntastu vidyāsāmarthyavidhūtakalmaṣasya jñānavata uttareṇa pathā gacchato brahmaprāptirna cāprakṣīṇakalmaṣasyottaramārgagamanaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15074: vidyaiva tādṛśī kalmaṣaṃ kṣapayati kṣapitakalmaṣaṃ cottaramārgaṃ prāpayatīti kathamardhapathe kalmaṣayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15083: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūyeti hi svatantrasya puruṣasya vyāpāraṃ brūte,
GSP33vacbhamu:15090: nanu yathā paretasyottareṇa pathā brahmaprāptirbhavatīti vidyāphalamevaṃ tasyaivārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtahānirapi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkāpadāni tebhya uttaramidaṃ sūtram /
GSP33vacbhamu:15095: sukṛtaduṣkṛtaprakṣayastu satyapi naraśarīre saṃbhavatīti samarthasya hetoryamaniyamādisahitāyā vidyāyāḥ karyakṣayāyogādyukto jīvata eva sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣaya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:15102: evaṃ kāraṇānantaraṃ kāryotpāde sati nimittanaimittakayostadbhāvasyopapattistāṇḍiśāṭhyāyaniśrutyośca saṃgatiritarathā svātantryābhāvenāsaṃgatiruktā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15104: ye tu parasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte kathaṃ paratra saṃkrāmata iti śaṅkottaratayā sūtraṃ vyācakhyuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15112_0: tatrāpi kevalā hāniḥ śrūyate tatrāpi upāyanamupasthāpayatyevaṃ tatsannidhāveva devayānaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:15112_1: panthāḥ śruta iti yatrāpi sukṛtaduṣkṛtahāniḥ kevalā śrutā tatrāpi devayānaṃ panthānamupasthāpayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15115: tasmāddhānimātre devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃbadhyata iti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15116: evaṃ prāptam ucyate-vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūyanirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaitīti hi viduṣo vidhūtapuṇyapāpasya vidyayā kṣemaprāptimāha /
GSP33vacbhamu:15119: nahi jātu rajjau sarpabhramanivṛttaye samutpannaṃ rajjutattavajñānaṃ deśaviśeṣamapekṣate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15123: yadi paramārabdhakāryakarmakṣapaṇāya śarīrapātāvadhyapekṣeti na devayānenāstīhārtha iti śrutidṛṣṭavirodhānnāpekṣitavya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15124: asti tu paryaṅkavidyāyāṃ tasmārtha ityuktaṃ dvitīyena sūtreṇeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15125: ye tu yadi puṇyamapi nivartate kimarthā tarhi gatarityāśaṅkya sūtramavatārayanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15127: yadi punaḥ puṇyamanuvarteta brahmalokagatasyāpīha puṇyaphalopabhogāyavṛttiḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15129: tasmādduṣkṛtasyeva sukṛtasyāpi prakṣaya iti taiḥ punaranāśaṅkanīyamevāśaṅkitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15130: vidyākṣiptāyāṃ hi gatau keyamāśaṅkā yadi kṣīṇasukṛtaḥ kimarthamayaṃ yātīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15138: yadi tu tannādriyate tato darśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādidharmāḥ saṃkīryeran /
GSP33vacbhamu:15139: naca teṣāṃ vikṛtiṣu sauryādiṣu dvādaśāhādiṣu codakataḥ prāptiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15143: na caivaṃ sati śrutyādoya'pi viniyojakāsteṣāmapi hi prakaraṇena sāmānyasaṃbandhe sati viniyojakatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15144: yatrāpi vināprakaraṇaṃ śrutyādibhyo viniyogo 'vagamyate tatrāpi tannirvāhāya prakaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kalpanīyatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15146: tasmādyāsvevopāsanāsu devayānaḥ pitṛyāṇo vā panthā āmnātastāsveva na tūpāsanāntareṣu tadanāmnānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:15147: naca 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' iti sāmānyavacanātsarvavidyāsu tatpathaprāptiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15150: apicaivaṃ satyekasyāṃ vidyāyāṃ mārgopadeśaḥ sarvāsu vidyāsvityekatraiva mārgopadeśaḥ kartavyo na vidyāntare /
GSP33vacbhamu:15153_0: evaṃ prāpte ucyate-'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' iti na śraddhātapomātrasya
GSP33vacbhamu:15153_1: pathiprāptimāhāpi tu vidyayā tadārohāntītyatra nāvidvāṃsastapasvina iti kevalasya
GSP33vacbhamu:15154: tathānyatrāpi pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'bhidhīyate-'ya evametādvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15161: etaduktaṃ bhavati-bhavetprakaraṇaṃ niyāmakaṃ yadyaniyamapratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ śrautaṃ smārtaṃ vā na syādasti tu tattasya ca prakaraṇādbalīyastvam /

GSP33vacbhamu:15561: patnīsaṃyājāntatvāccāhnāṃ patnīḥ saṃyājya mānasāya prasarpantīti ca mānasasya patnīsaṃyājasya parastācchuteḥ /

GSP33vacbhamu:15601: apica pūrvāparayorbhāgayorvidyāprādhānyadarśanāttanmadhyapātino 'pi tatsāmānyādvidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate na karmāṅgatvamityāha sūtreṇa- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15604: asti rājasūyaḥ 'rājā svārājyakāmo rājasūyena yajeta' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15607: yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutiṃ hutvābhighārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ yadi rājanya aindramiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15608: tatra saṃdihyate-kiṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ prāptānāṃ nimittārthena śravaṇamuta brāhmaṇādīnāmayaṃ yāgo vidhīyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15609: tatra yadi prajāpālanakaṇṭakoddharaṇādi karma rājyaṃ tasya kartā rājeti rājaśabdasyārthastato rājā rājasūyena yajeteti rājyasya kartū rājasūye 'dhikāraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15610: tasmātsaṃbhavantyaviśiṣeṇa brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyā rājyasya kartāra iti siddhaṃ sarva evaite rājasūye prāptā iti 'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta' ityevamādayo nimittārthāḥ śrutayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15611_0: atha tu rājñaḥ karma rājyamiti rājakartṛyogāttatkarma rājyaṃ tataḥ ko rājetyapekṣāyāmāryeṣu

GSP33vacbhamu:15673: sa ca śarīrādhīnatayā dṛśyamānaḥ śarīradharma evaṃ prāṇaḥ śvāsapraśvāsādirūpaḥ śarīradharma eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:15674: icchāprayatnādayaśca yadyapyāntarāḥ tathāpi śarīrātiriktasya tadāśrayānupalabdheḥ sati śarīre bhāvāt antaḥ śarīrāśrayā eva,
GSP33vacbhamu:15676: śarīrātirikta ātmani pramāṇābhāvāccharīre ca saṃbhavāccharīre ca saṃbhavāccharīramevecchādimadātmeti prāpta ucyate- //53 //

GSP33vacbhamu:15830: nanu yathā pratyayābhidheyāyā apūrvabhāvanāyā ājānato bhedabhāve 'pi dhātvarthena nirūpyamāṇatvāttasya ca yāgāderbhedātprakṛtyarthayāgādidhātvarthānubandhabhedādbhedaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15832: evaṃ vidyānāmapi rūpato vedyasyeśvarasyābhede 'pi tattatsatyasaṃkalpatvādiguṇopadhānabhedādvidyābheda iti nāstyabhedāśaṅkā /
GSP33vacbhamu:15834: iha brahmaṇaḥ siddharūpatvājguṇānāmapi satyasaṃkalpatvādīnāṃ tadāśrayāṇāṃ siddhatayā sarvatrābhedo vidyāsu /
GSP33vacbhamu:15835_1: siṃhāsyo vṛṣaskandhaḥ evopadiśyamānaścakorekṣaṇatvādyapajahāti na khalu pratyupadeśaṃ vastu bhidyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:15859: agnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādiṣu pṛthagadhikārāṇāmapi succayo dṛṣṭo niyamavāṃsteṣāṃ nityatvādupāsanāstu kāmyatayā na nityāstasmānnāsāṃ samuccayaniyamaḥ /
