GSP33vacbhamu:15867: yāsūpāsanāsu vinopāsyasākṣātkāraṇamadṛṣṭenaiva kāmyasādhanaṃ tāsāṃ kāmyadarśapaurṇamāsādivatpuruṣecchāvaśena vikalpasamuccayāviti sāmpratam //60 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15872: iha tu satyapi puruṣārthatve kasmānnaikaprayogavacanagrahaṇaṃ bhavatīti pūrvoktamarthamākṣipan pratyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15873: yadyapi hi kāmyā etā upāsanāstathāpi na svatantrā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15874: tathā sati hi kratvarthānāśritatayā kratuprayogādbahirapyamūṣāṃ prayogaḥ prasajyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15877: evaṃ cāśrayatantratvādāśritānāṃ prayogavacanenāśrayāṇāṃ samuccayaniyamenāśritānāmapi samuccayaniyamo yukta itarathā tadāśritatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15878: sa ca prayogavacana upāsanāḥ samuccitanvaṃstattatphalakāmanānāmavaśyaṃbhāvamākṣipati tadabhāve tāsāṃ samuccayaniyamābhāvāditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15883: nahi kāmā vidhīyate yena samuccīyerannapi tūddiśyante /
GSP33vacbhamu:15887: nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāt satyapi tadāśrayāṇāṃ nityatve idameva cāśrayatantratvamāśritānāṃ yadāśraye satyeva vṛttirnāsatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15888: na tu tatra vṛttireva nāvṛttiriti tadidamuktam-āśrayatantrāṇyapi hīti //61 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15896: vedāntarohitapraṇavodgīthaikatvapratyayasāmarthyāddhotṛkarmaṇaḥ śaṃsanādudrātā pratisamādadhāti kiṃ tadityata āha durudrīthamapi vedāntarodite caudrātre karmaṇi utpannaṃ kṣatam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15907: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15914: samprati tu kimaupaniṣadātmatattvajñānamapavargasādhanatayā puruṣārthamāho kratuprayogāpekṣitakartṛpratipādakatayā kratvarthamiti mīmāṃsāmahe /
GSP33vacbhamu:15915_0: yadā ca kratvarthaṃ tadā yāvanmātraṃ kratuprayogavidhināpekṣitaṃ kartṛtvamāmuṣmikaphalopabhoktṛtvaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:15915_1: ca na caitadanityatve ghaṭate kṛtavipraṇāśākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgādato nityatvamapi,
GSP33vacbhamu:15919_0: yadyapi jīvānuvādena tasya brahmatvapratipādanaparatvamupaniṣadāmiti mahatā prabandhena
GSP33vacbhamu:15919_1: tatra tatra pratipāditaṃ tathāpyatra keṣāñcitpūrvapakṣaśahkābījānāṃ nirākaraṇe tadeva
GSP33vacbhamu:15921_0: yadyapi ca kartṛmātraṃ nāvyabhicāritakratusaṃbandhaṃ kartṛmātrasya laukikeṣvapi karmasu
GSP33vacbhamu:15921_2: vākyenaiva kratvarthamāpadyate tathāpi yādṛśa ātmā kartāmuṣmikasvargādiphalabhogabhāgī
GSP33vacbhamu:15921_3: dehādyatirikte vedāntaiḥ pratipādyate na tādṛśasyāsti laukikeṣu karmasūpayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:15923_0: āmuṣmikaphalānāṃ tu vaidikānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tamantareṇāsaṃbhavāttatsaṃbandha evāyamaupaniṣadaḥ
GSP33vacbhamu:15925: priyādisūcitasya ca saṃsāriṇa evātmano draṣṭavyatvena pratijñāpanādapahatapāpmatvādi tu tadviśeṣaṇaṃ tasyaiva stutyartham /
GSP33vacbhamu:15931: na tvetatprakṛtodgīthavidyāviṣayaṃ yadeva vidyayeti sarvanāmavadhāraṇābhyāṃ vyāpteradhigamat /
GSP33vacbhamu:15932: yathā ya eva dhūmavāndeśaḥ sa vahvimāniti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15933: samanvārambhavacanaṃ ca phalārambhe vidyākarmaṇoḥ sāhityaṃ darśayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:15934: tacca yadyapyāpneyādiyagaṣaṭkavatsamapradhānatvenāpi bhavati tathāpyuktayā yuktyā vidyāyāḥ karma pratyaṅgabhāvenaiva netavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:15935: vedārthajñānavataḥ karmavidhānādupaniṣado 'pi vedārtha iti tajjñānamapi karmāṅgamiti //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15953: yadi śarīrādyatiriktaḥ kartā bhoktātmetyetanmatra upaniṣadaḥ paryavasitāḥ syustataḥ syādevaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:15957: tathā caupaniṣadātmajñānasya kratvanuṣṭhānavirodhinaḥ kratusaṃbandha eva nāsti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15960: ata eva priyādisūcitena saṃsāriṇātmanopakramasya tasyaivātmano 'dhikopadidikṣāyāṃ paramātmanātyantābheda upadiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:15961: yathā samāropitasya bhujagasya rajjurūpādatyantābhedaḥ pratipādyate yo 'yaṃ sarpaḥ sā rajjuriti /
GSP33vacbhamu:15970: yatha sarve brāhmaṇā bhojyantāmiti nimintritāpekṣayā teṣāmeva prakṛtatvāt //10 //
GSP33vacbhamu:15983_1: tanmātravata evādhikāraḥ karmasu nopaniṣadadhyanavataḥ tadadhyayanasya karmasvanupayogāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:15984: adhyayanamātravata eveti mātragrahaṇenārthajñānaṃ vā vyavacchinnamiti manvāno bhrāntaścodayati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:15997: apica vidyāphalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ darśayantī śrutiḥ kālāntarabhāviphalakarmāṅgatvaṃ vidyāyā nirākarotītyāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16016: nindati hi pratyakṣā śrutirāśramāntaraṃ 'vīrahā vā eṣa devānām' ityādikā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16017: pratyakṣaśrutivirodhe ca smṛtyācārayoraprāmāṇyamuktaṃ 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasati hyanumānam' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16026: na kevalamanyaparatayā parāmarśasyāśramāntaraṃ na labhyate api tvāśramāntaranindādvāreṇāpavādādapītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16034: nahi tapa eva dvitīya ityatrāśramāntarābhidhāyī kaścidasti śabda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16035: nanvetameva pravrājina iti vacanādāśramāntaraṃ setsyatītyata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16048: tatra skandhaśabdo yadyāśramaparo na syāditi tu samūhavacanastato dharmāṇāṃ yajñādīnāṃ prātisvikotpattīnāṃ kimapekṣya tritvamaṅkhyā suvyavasthāpyeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:16050: tatra yajñādiliṅgo gṛhāśrama eko dharmaskandho brahmacārīti dvitīyastapa iti ca,
GSP33vacbhamu:16053: tasmādanyaparādapi parāmarthādaśramāntarāṇi pratīyamānāni devatādhikaraṇanyāyena na śakyante 'pākartum /
GSP33vacbhamu:16054: naca pratyakṣaśrutivirodho vīrahā vetyādeḥ pratipannagārhasthyaṃ pramādādajñānādvāgnimudvāsayituṃ pravṛttaṃ pratyupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16055_0: evañca avirodhe siddhavatparāmarśādaśramāntarāṇāṃ śāstrāntarasiddhiṃ vā kalpayiṣyāmo
GSP33vacbhamu:16055_1: yathopavītavidhipare vākye 'upavyayate devalakṣmameva tatkurute' ityatra nivītaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16055_2: manuṣyāṇāṃ prācīnāvītaṃ pitṛṇāmiti śāstrāntarasiddhayornivītaprācīnāvītayoḥ parāmarśa iti //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16062: aparāmarśe ca stuterasaṃbhavena kiṃparatayā ekavākyatāstvitī tāṃ bhaṅktvā dhāraṇavadvaramapūrvatvādvidhirevāstu /
GSP33vacbhamu:16063: yathā 'adhastātsamidhaṃ dhārayannanudravedupari hi devebhyo dhārayati' ityatra satyāmapyadhodhāraṇenaikavākyatāpratītau vidhīyata evoparidhāraṇamapūrvatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16078: yadi tāvadbrahmasaṃstha iti padaṃ pratyastamityāvayavārthaṃ parivrājake 'śvakarṇādipadavadrūḍhaṃ tadāśramaprāptimātreṇaivāmṛtībhāva iti na tadbhāvāyā brahmajñānamapekṣeta /
GSP33vacbhamu:16083: evañca caturṣvāśrameṣu yasyaiva brahmaṇi niṣṭhatvamāśramiṇaḥ sa brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvametīti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16084: tatra tāvadbrahmacārigṛhasthau svaśabdābhihitau tapaḥpadena ca tapaḥpradhānatayā bhikṣuvānaprasthāvupasthāpitau /
GSP33vacbhamu:16087: yadi tāvatkarmayogaḥ karmitā sā bhikṣorapi kāyavāṅmanobhirasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16088: atha ye na brahmārpaṇena karma kurvanti kintu kāmārthitayā te karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16089: tathā sati gṛhasthādayo 'pi brahmārpaṇena karma kurvāṇā na karmiṇaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16090: tasmādbrahmaṇi tātparyaṃ brahmaniṣṭhatā na tu karmatyāgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16092: tapasā ca dvayorāśramayorekīkaraṇena traya iti tritvamupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16093: evañca trayo 'pyāśramā abrahmasaṃsthāḥ santaḥ puṇyalokabhājo bhavanti yaḥ punareteṣu brahmasaṃsthaḥ so 'mṛtatvabhāgiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16095: yathā devadattayajñadattau mandaprajñāvabhūtāṃ saṃprati tayoryajñādattastu śāstrābhyāsātpaṭuprajño vartate iti tathehāpi ya evābrahmasaṃsthāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16097: tathāca brahmasaṃstha iti yaugikaṃ padaṃ prakṛtaviṣayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16098: yathā āgnepyāgnīdhramupatiṣṭhata ityatra viniyuktāpi prakṛtaivāgneyī gṛhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16100: yadi hyatrāgnotyupadiśyeta tato yathā pratītā tathoddiśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16102: iha tu āgnīdhropasthāne sā vidheyatvena viniyujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16108: tathehāpi prakṛtā evāśramā buddhiviparivartinaḥ parāmṛśyante nānuktaḥ parivrāḍeveti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16113: yatsaṃkhyākāśca ye prasiddhāste tatsaṃkhyākā eva kīrtyante iti cocitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16115: aśādhāraṇenaikaikena lakṣaṇenaikeka āśramo vaktumupakrānta iti tathaiva samāpanamucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16117: naca tapo nāma nāsādhāraṇaṃ vānaprasthānāmityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16119: na khalu parākādibhiḥ kāyakleśapradhāno yathā vānaprasthastathā bhikṣuḥ satyapyaṣṭagrāsādiniyame /
GSP33vacbhamu:16120: naca śaucasantoṣaśamādayastapaḥ pakṣe vartante tatra vṛddhānāṃ tapaḥprasiddherasiddheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16121: ata eva vṛddhāstapaso bhedena śaucādīnācakṣate-'śaucasantoṣatapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni niyamāḥ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16125: traya eta iti kiṃ bhikṣurapi parāmṛśyate kintvā bhikṣuvarjaṃ traya eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:16126: na tāvantraya iti bhikṣusaṃgrahe tadvarjanamete traya ityatra vartuṃ śakyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16127: eva iti prakṛtānāṃ sākalyena parāmarśādbhikṣusaṃgrahe ca na tasya puṇyalokatvamabrahmasaṃsthātvābhāvādbhikṣoḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16128: tena tasya brahmasaṃsthasya sadā puṇyalokatvamamṛtatvaṃ ceti virodhaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16138: satyaṃ yaugikaḥ śabdaḥ sati prakṛtasaṃbhave na tadatipattyāprakṛte vartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16139: asati tu saṃbhave mā bhūtpramādapāṭha ityaprakṛte vartayitavyaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16141: eṣa hi brahmasaṃsthatālakṣaṇo dharmo bhikṣorasādhāraṇa āśramāntarāṇi tatsaṃsthānyatatsaṃsthāni ca bhikṣustatsaṃstha ityeva /
GSP33vacbhamu:16142: tatsaṃsthatā hi svābhāvaṃ vyavacchindantī virodhādyastatsaṃstha eva tatrāñjasī nānyatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:16148: sarvasaṅgaparityāgo hi nyāsaḥ sa brahmā kuta ityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16152: tāni vā etānyavarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa evātyarecayaditi# /
GSP33vacbhamu:16154: tathā cedṛśaṃ nyāsalakṣaṇaṃ brahmasaṃsthatvaṃ bhikṣorevāsādhāraṇaṃ netareṣāmāśramiṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:16155: brahmajñānasya śabdajanitasya yaḥ paripākaḥ sākṣātkāro 'pavargasādhanaṃ tadaṅgatayā parivrājyaṃ vihitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16160_1: sa eṣa rasānāṃ rasatama ityādinā padasaṃdarbheṇaikavākyabhāvamupagataḥ stūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16170: tenaikavākyatānupapatteḥ saṃnihitasya tūpāsanāvidheḥ kiṃ viṣayasamarpaṇenopayujyatāmuta stutyeti viśaye viṣayasamarpaṇena yathārthavattvaṃ naivaṃ stutyā bahiraṅgatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16181: sāmānyoktau tadviśeṣāḥ pacedityādayo 'pi gamyanta iti tatra kuryādityākṣiptakartṛkā bhāvanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16184: evaṃ daṇḍī bhaveddaṇḍinā bhavitavyaṃ daṇḍinā bhūyetetyekadhātvarthaviṣayā vidhyupahitā bhāvanā udāhāryāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16186: yathā kulālavyāpārādghaṭo bhavati bījādaṅkuro bhavatīti prayuñjate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16194: yadyapi upaniṣadākhyānāni vidyāsaṃnidhau śrutāni tathāpi 'sarvāṇyākhyānāni pāriplave' iti sarvaśrutyā niḥśeṣārthatayā durbalasya saṃnidherbādhitatvātpariplavārthānyevākhyānāni /
GSP33vacbhamu:16195_0: naca sarvā dāśatayīranubrūyāditi viniyoge 'pi dāśatayīnāṃ prātisvikaviniyogāttatra
GSP33vacbhamu:16195_1: tatra karmaṇi yathā viniyogo na virudhyate tathehāpi satyapi pāriplave viniyege saṃnidhānādvidyāṅgatvamapi
GSP33vacbhamu:16196: dāśatayīṣu prātisvikānāṃ viniyogānāṃ samudāyaviniyogasya ca tulyabalatvādiha tu saṃnidhānāt śruterbalīyastvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16198: kintu pāriplavamācakṣītetyupakramya yānyāmnātāni manurvaivasvato rājetyādīni teṣāmeva tatra viniyogaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16203: yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatra nimintrātāpekṣaḥ sarvaśabdaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16204: tathā copaniṣadākhyānānāṃ vidyāsaṃnidhirapratidvandīṃ vidyaikavākyatāṃ so 'rodīdityādīnāmiva vidhyekavākyatvaṃ gamayatīti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:16205: pratipattisaukaryāccetyupākhyānena hi bālā apyavadhīyante yathā tantropākhyāyikayeti //23 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16211: vidyāyāḥ kratvarthatve sati tathā kratūpakaraṇāya svakāryāya kraturapekṣitaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16213: yadā tu puruṣārthā tadā nānayā kraturapekṣitaḥ svakārye nirapekṣāyā eva tasyāḥ sāmarthyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16222: yathā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣyante āśramakarmāṇi evamutpattāvapi nāpekṣyeranniti śaṅkā syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16232: caturthī sākṣātkāravatī vṛttirūpā nāntarīyakaṃ hi tasyāḥ kaivalyamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16233: tatrādye tāvatpratipatti viditapadatadarthasya viditavākyagatigocaranyāyasya ca puṃsa upapadyete eveti na tatra karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16234: te eva ca cintāmayīṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratipattiṃ prasuvāte iti na tatrāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16235: sā cādaranairantaryadīrghakālasevitā sākṣātkāravatīmādhatta eva pratipattiṃ caturthīmiti na tatrāpyasti karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16236: tannāntarīyakaṃ ca kaivalyamiti na tasyāpi karmāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16237: tadevaṃ pramāṇataśca prameyata utpattau ca kārye ca na jñānasya karmāpekṣeti bījaṃ śaṅkāyām /
GSP33vacbhamu:16238: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-utpattau jñānasya karmāpekṣā vidyate vividiṣotpādadvārā 'vividiṣanti yajñena' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16240: yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti parṇamayatāvidhirapūrvatvānna tvayaṃ vartamānāpadeśaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:16246: sa hi tattvato 'nityāśuciduḥ-khānātmani saṃsāre sati nityaśucimukhātmalakṣaṇena vibhrameṇa malinayati cittasattvamadharmanibandhanatvādvibhramāṇām /
GSP33vacbhamu:16247: ataḥ pāpmanaḥ prakṣaye pratyakṣopapattidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya tāttvikīmanityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhaṃ viniścineti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16250: tato hānopāyaṃ prayeṣate paryeṣamāṇaścātmatattvajñānamasyopāya iti śāstradācāryavacanāccopaśrutya tajjijñāsata iti vividiṣopahāramukhenātmajñānotpattāvasti karmāṇamupayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16251: vividiṣuḥ khalu yukta ekāgratayā śravaṇamanane kartumutsahate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16254: yena bhāvanāyāṃ vā bhāvanākārye vā sākṣātkāre karmaṇāmupayogaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16258: dṛṣṭārtheṣu tu karmasu pratiṣiddhavarjamanadhikāre 'pyasaktasya svārasikī pravṛttirupapadyata eva /
GSP33vacbhamu:16260: ataśca 'bhrāntyā cellaukikaṃ karma vaidikaṃ ca tathāstu te' iti pralāpaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16262: upapāditaṃ caitadasmābhiḥ prathamasūtra ite neha punaḥ pratyāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16263: tasmādvividiṣotpādadvārāśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyotpattāvupayogo na vidyākārya iti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:16270: eṣa kila vicāraviṣayaḥ-sarvāṇi khalu vāgādīnyavajitya prāṇo mukhya uvācaitāni kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, tāni hocuḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16271: yadidaṃ loke 'nnamā ca śvabhya ā ca śakunibhyaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ yadannaṃ tattavānnamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16272: tadanena saṃdarbheṇa prāṇasya sarvamannamityanucintanaṃ vidhāyāha śrutiḥ-'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16274: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimetatsarvānnābhyanujñānaṃ śamādivadetadvidyāṅgatayā vidhīyata uta stutyarthaṃ saṃkīrtyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16275: tatra yadyapi bhavatīti vartamānāpadeśānna vidhiḥ pratīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16276: tathāpi yathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavatīti vartamānāpadeśādapi palāśamayītvavidhipratipattiḥ pañcamalakārāpattyā tathehāpi pravṛttiviśeṣakaratālābhe vidhipratipattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16277: stutau hi arthavādamātraṃ na tathārthavadyathā vidhau /
GSP33vacbhamu:16278: bhakṣyābhakṣyaśāstraṃ ca sāmānyataḥ pravṛttamanena viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16279: gamyāgamyavivekaśāstramiva sāmānyataḥ pravṛttaṃ vāmadevavidyāṅgabhūtasamastantryaparihāraśāstreṇa viśeṣaviṣayeṇeti prāpta ucyate-aśakteḥ kalpanīyatvācchāstrāntaravirodhataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16281: na tāvatkauleyakamaryādamannaṃ manuṣyajātinā yugapatparyāyeṇa vā śakyamattum /
GSP33vacbhamu:16283: na cātra liṅ iva sphuṭatarā vidhipratipattirasti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16286: naca satyāṃ gatau sāmānyataḥ pravṛttasya śāstrasya viṣayasaṃkoco yuktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16289: prāṇātyasya iti cāvadhāraṇaparaṃ prāṇātyaya eva sarvānnatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16290: tatropākhyānācca sphuṭataravidhismṛteśca surāvarjaṃ vidvāṃsamavidvāṃsaṃ prati vidhānāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16300_0: kāmo ma udakapānamiti svātantryaṃ me udakapāne nadīkūpataḍāgaprāpādiṣu yathākāmaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:16300_1: prāpnomīti nocchiṣṭodakābhāve prāṇātyaya iti tatrocchiṣṭabhakṣaṇadoṣa iti maṭacīhateṣu
GSP33vacbhamu:16317: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-siddhe hi syādvirodho 'yaṃ na tu sādhye kathañcana /
GSP33vacbhamu:16320: na tu sādhyarūpaṃ yathā ṣoḍaśina ekasya grahaṇāgrahaṇe /
GSP33vacbhamu:16324: vidyāṅgatayā ca vidyāyāḥ kādācitkatayānavaśyaṃ bhāve 'pi 'kāmyo vā naimittiko vā vikṛtya niviśate' iti nyāyādanityādhikāreṇa niviśamānamapi na nityamanityayati,
GSP33vacbhamu:16325: tenāpi tasmiddheriti saṃyogapṛthaktvānna nityānityasaṃyogavirodha ekasya kāryasyeti siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:16326: sahākiratvaṃ ca karmaṇāṃ na kārye vidyāyāḥ kiṃ tūtpattau /
GSP33vacbhamu:16329: yathā 'sahaiva daśābhiḥ pūtrairbhāraṃ vahati gardabhī' iti sātsveva daśaputreṣu saiva bhārasya vāhiketi /
GSP33vacbhamu:16335: catasṛṇāmapi ca pratipattīnāṃ brahmaṇi vidhānānupapatterityuktaṃ prathamasūtre /
GSP33vacbhamu:16336: draṣṭavyo nididhyāsitavya iti ca vidhisarūpaṃ ni vidhirityapyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16339: naca svaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sādhyaṃ nityatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16346_0: yathā māsamagnihotraṃ juhvatīti prakaraṇāntarātkarmabheda evamihāpi 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena
GSP33vacbhamu:16346_2: sati karmāntaramiti prāpta ucyate-satyapi prakaraṇāntare tadeva karma,
GSP33vacbhamu:16347: śruteḥ smṛteśca saṃyogabhedaḥ paraṃ yathā 'agnihotraṃ juhuyātsvargakāmaḥ' 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt' iti tadevāgnihotramubhayasaṃyuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16349: kintu ajñātajñāpanasvaraso vidhiḥ prakaraṇaikye sphuṭatarapratyabhijñābalena svarasaṃ jahyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16351: iha tu siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuñjāno na juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16355: kāle hi karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla ityutsargaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16356: iha tu vividiṣāyāṃ vidhiśrutiḥ na yajñādau /
GSP33vacbhamu:16364: yadi vidyāsahakārīṇyāśramakarmāṇi hanta bho vidhurādīnāmanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidyāyām,
GSP33vacbhamu:16374: yadyapi ceha janmani tatheha janmanyāśramakarmotpāditavividiṣa eva vidyāyāmadhikṛto netara ityanāśramiṇāmanadhikāro vidhuraprabhṛtīnāmityata āha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16386: daivātpunaḥ patnyādiviyogātaḥ satyanāśramitve bhavedadhikāro vidyāyāmiti śrutismṛtisaṃdarbheṇa vividiṣanti yajñenetyādinā jyāyastvāvagateḥ śrutiliṅgātsmṛtiliṅgāccvāgamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16405: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmīti naiṣṭhikaṃ prati prāyaścittābhāvasmaraṇānnairṛtagardabhālambhaḥ prāyaścittamupakurvāṇakaṃ prati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16406: tasmācchinnaśirasa iva puṃsaḥ pratikriyābhāva iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16407: sūtrayojanā tu-na cādhikārikamadhikāralakṣaṇe prathamakāṇḍe nirṇītam 'avakīrṇipaśuśca tadvadādhānasyāprāptakālatvāt' ityanena yatprāyaścittaṃ tanna naiṣṭhike bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16413: tasyāmapi ca sākṣātprāyaścittaṃ na kartavyamiti prāyaścittaniṣedho na gamyate,
GSP33vacbhamu:16415: tathā ca smṛtirniṣedhārtheti anumāya tadarthā śrutiranumātavyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16419: sūtrārthastu-upapūrvamapi pātakaṃ naiṣṭhikasyāvakīrṇitvaṃ na mahāpātakamapirevakārārthe ata eke prāyaścittabhāvamicchantīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16421: śāstrasthā yā vā prasiddhiḥ sā grāhyā śāstramūlatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16425: yadi naiṣṭhikādīnāmasti prāyaścittaṃ tatkimetaiḥ kṛtanirṇejanaiḥ saṃvyavahartavyamuta neti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16426: tatra doṣakṛtatvādasaṃvyavahārasya prāyaścittena tannibarhaṇādanibarhaṇe vā tatkaraṇavaiyarthyātsaṃvyavahāryā eveti prāpta ucyati- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16428: niṣiddhakarmānuṣṭhānajanyameno lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhimāpādayati dvaidham lokadvaye 'pyaśuddhirapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇaiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16429: kasyācittu paralokāśuddhimātramapanīyate prāyaścittairenonibarhaṇaṃ kurvāṇairihalokāśuddhistvenasāpāditā na śakyāpanetum /
GSP33vacbhamu:16432: tathā ca 'prāyaścittairapaityeno yadajñānakṛtaṃ bhavet' kāmataḥ kṛtamapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:16433: bālaghrādistu kṛtanirṇejano 'pi vacanādavyavahārya iha loke jāyata iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16439_0: prathame kāṇḍe śeṣalakṣaṇe tathākāma ityatrartviksaṃbandhe karmaṇaḥ siddhe kiṃ kāmo
GSP33vacbhamu:16439_1: yājamāna utārtvijya iti saṃśapyārtvijye 'pi karmaṇi yājamāna eva kāmo guṇaphaleṣviti
GSP33vacbhamu:16439_2: nirṇītamihi tvevañjātīyakāni cāṅgasaṃbaddhāni upāsanāni kiṃ yājamānanyevotārtvijyānīti
GSP33vacbhamu:16440_2: vacane yajamānasya phalavadupāsanaṃ tasya phalaśruteḥ taṃ ha bako dālabhyo vidāñcakāretyāderupāsanasya
GSP33vacbhamu:16446: na cartvikkartṛka upāsane yajamānagāmitā phalasyāsaṃbhavinī tena hi sa parikrīyastadgāmine phalāya ghaṭate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16452: labdhvā bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16453: yatra hi vidhivibhaktiḥ śrūyate sa vidheyaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16454: bālyena tiṣṭhāsedityatra ca sā śrūyate na śrūyate tu maune /
GSP33vacbhamu:16457: tasmādbrāhnaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidyeti pāṇḍityavidhānādeva maunasiddheḥ pāṇḍityameva maunamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16458: athavā bhikṣuvacano 'yaṃ muniśabdastatra darśanāt 'gārhasthyamācāryakulaṃ maunaṃ vānaprastham' ityatra /
GSP33vacbhamu:16460: tasmādbālyamevātra vidhīyate maunaṃ tu prāptaṃ praśaṃsārthamanūdyata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16462: api tu jñānamātraṃ pāṇḍityaṃ jñānātiśayasaṃpattistu maunaṃ tatprasiddheḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16464: tasmādapūrvatvānmaunasya bālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16465: evaṃ ca nirvedanīyatvamapi vidhāna āñjasaṃ syādityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16481: api tu vidyodayāyābhyāse pravṛtto na punarutpannavidyātiśayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16484: ata eva samidādirvidhyantaḥ sa hi vidhiḥ pradhānavidheḥ paścāditi /
GSP33vacbhamu:16491: chāndogye bahulāyāsādhyakarmabahulatvādgārhasthyasya cāśramāntaradharmāṇāṃ ca keṣāñcidahiṃsādīnāṃ samavāyāttenopasaṃhāro na punastena samāpanādityarthaḥ //48 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16493: evaṃ tadāśramadvayopanyāsena kkacitkadāciditarābhāvaśaṅkā mandabuddheḥ syāditi tadapākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram- #
GSP33vacbhamu:16495: vṛttirvānaprasthānāmanekavidhairevaṃ brahmācāriṇo 'pīti vṛttibhedo 'nuṣṭhātāro vā puruṣā bhidyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:16501: evaṃ ca śāstrāntarābādhenāpyupapattau na śāstrāntarabādhanamanyāpyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti //50 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16507: kiṃ śravaṇādibhirihaiva vā janmani vidyā sādhyate utāniyama iha vāmutra veti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16508: yadyapi karmāṇi yajñādinyaniyataphalāni teṣāṃ ca vidyotpadasādhanatvena vidyotpādasyāniyamaḥ pratibhāti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16509: tathāca garbhasthasya vāmadevasyātmapratibodhaśravaṇāt 'anekajanmasaṃsiddhastato yati parāṃ gatim' iti ca smaraṇādāmuṣmikatvamapyavagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16513: naca pramāṇeṣu pravartamānāḥ pramātāra aihikamapi cirabhāvinaṃ pramotpādaṃ kāmayante kintu tādātvikameva prāgeva tu pāralaukikam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16514: nahi kumbhalādidṛkṣuścakṣuṣī samunmīlayati kālāntarīyāya kumbhadarśanāya kintu tādātvikāya /
GSP33vacbhamu:16516: śrutismṛtī ca pāralaukikaṃ vidyotpādaṃ stutyā brātaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16518_0: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-yata evātra vidyotpāde śravaṇādibhiḥ kartavye yajñādīnāṃ sattvāśuddhidvāreṇa
GSP33vacbhamu:16518_1: vā vighnopaśamadvārā vopayogo 'ta eva teṣāṃ yajñādīnāṃ karmāntarapratibandhāpratibandhābhyāmaniyataphalatvena
GSP33vacbhamu:16519: tathāca teṣāṃ yajñādyapekṣāṇāṃ teṣāṃ cāniyataphalatvena śravaṇādīnāmapyaniyataphalatvaṃ yuktamevaṃ śrutismṛtipratibandho na stutimātratvena vyākhyeyo bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16520: puruṣāśca vidyārthinaḥ sādhanasāmarthyānusāreṇa tadanurūpameva kāmayiṣyante tadidamuktam-abhisaṃdherniraṅkaśatvāditi //51 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16525: tathā ca yathā sādhanotkarṣanikarṣābhyāṃ tatphalasya vidyāyā utkarṣāvevaṃ vidyāphalasyāpi mukterutkarṣanikarṣau saṃbhāvyete /
GSP33vacbhamu:16526: naca muktāvaihikāmuṣmikatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣa upapadyate brahmopāsanāparipākalabdhajanmani vidyāyāṃ jīvato mukteravaśyaṃbhāvaniyamātsatyapyārabdhavipākakarmāprakṣaye /
GSP33vacbhamu:16528_1: mukterapi vidyāphalatvādrūpataścotkarṣanikarṣau syātāmiti prāpata ucyate-na muktestatra
GSP33vacbhamu:16530: naca muktirbrahmaṇo nityasvarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇā nityā satī sādhyā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16534: naca cirācirotpādānutpādāvantareṇa vidyāyāmapi rūpato bhedaḥ kaścidupalakṣyate tasyā apyekarūpatvena śruteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16536: na cātra vidyātvaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16538: tasmāttasyā muktyavasthāyā aikarūpyāvadhṛtermuktilakṣaṇasya phalasyāviśeṣo yukta iti //52 //
GSP33vacbhamu:16539: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33vacbhamu:16543: nābhyarthyā iha santaḥ svayaṃ pravṛttā na cetare śakyāḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16545: śaṅke saṃprati nirviśaṅkamadhunā svarājyasaukhyaṃ vahannendraḥ sāndratapaḥsthiteṣu kathamapyudvegamabhyeṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16551_1: codyamānānyadṛṣṭārthānīti yāvadvidhānamanuṣṭheyāni na tu tato 'dhikamāvartanīyāni pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16552: yatra punaḥ sakṛdupadeśa upāsītetyādiṣu tatra sakṛdeva prayogaḥ prayājādivaditi prāpta ucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16555: na caitānyanāvṛttāni satkāradīrghakālanairantaryeṇa sākṣātkāravate tādṛśānubhavāya kalpante /
GSP33vacbhamu:16557: na khalu pittopahṛtendriyasya guḍe tiktatāsākṣātkāro 'ntareṇamādhuryasākṣātkāraṃ sahasreṇāpyupapattibhirnivartitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16558: atadvato narāntaravacāṃsivopapattisahasrāṇi vā parāmṛśato 'pi thūtkṛtya guḍatyāgāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16564: tathāca nityasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo nitya eveti kṛtamatra pratyayāvṛtyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16571: virodhe vā tasya nityatvānnāvidyodīyeta kuta eva tu tena sahānuvarteta /
GSP33vacbhamu:16576: na khalu jyotiṣṭomavākyārthapratyayaḥ śataśo 'pyāvartamānaḥ sākṣātkārapramāṇaṃ svaviṣaye janayati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16584: vākyaṃ cedyuktyapekṣaṃ sākṣātkārāya prabhavatitathā sati kṛtamāvṛtyā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16588: na yuktivākye sākṣātkāraphale pratyakṣasyaiva pramāṇasya tatphalatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16589: te tu parokṣārthāvagāhinī sāmānyamātramabhiniviśate natu viśeṣaṃ sākṣātkuruta iti tadviśeṣasākṣātkārāyāvṛttirupāsyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16590: sā hi satkāradīrghakālanairantaryasevitā satī dṛḍhabhūmirviśeṣa sākṣātkārāya prabhavati kāminībhāvaneva straiṇasya puṃsa iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16594: sa khalvayaṃ sākṣātkāraḥ śāstra yuktiyonirvā syādbhāvanāmātrayonirvā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16595: na tāvatparokṣābhāsavijñānaphale śāstrayuktī sākṣātkāralakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaphalaṃ prasotumarhataḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16602: kaścitkhalu śuddhasatvogarbhastha iva vāmadevaḥ śrutvā ca matvā ca kṣaṇamavadhāya jīvātmano brahmātmatamanubhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:16604: ataścāvṛranarthikā yanniraṃśasya grahaṇamadrahaṇaṃ vā na tu vyaktāvyaktatve sāmānyavaśeṣavatpadmarāgādivadityata āha #
GSP33vacbhamu:16608: ayamabhisandhiḥ---satyaṃ na brahmasākṣātkāraḥ sākṣādāgamayukttiphalamapi tu yuktyāgamārthajñānāhitasaṃskārasacivaṃ citameva brahmaṇi sākṣātkāravartīṃ buddhivṛttiṃ samādhatte /
GSP33vacbhamu:16609: sā ca nānumānitavahmisākṣātkāravatprātibhatvenāpramāṇaṃ tadānīṃ vahnisvalakṣaṇasyaparokṣatvātsadātanaṃ tu brahmasvarūpasyopādhirūṣitasya jīvasyāparokṣatvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16620_1: pratyayapravāhe sākṣātkārāvadhau vyaktitāratamyaṃ prati kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16621: tadevaṃ vākyamātrasyārthe 'pi na drāgityeva pratyaya ityuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16622: tatvamasīti tu vākyamatyantadurgrahapadārthaṃ na padārthajñānapūrvake svārthe jñāne drāgityeva pravartate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16625: syādetat padārthasaṃsargātmā vākyārthaḥ padārthajñānakrameṇa tadadhīnanirūpaṇīyatayā kramavatpratītiryujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16626: brahma tu niraṃśatvenāsasṛṣṭanānātvapadarthakamiti kasyānukramema kramavatī pratītiriti sakṛdeva tadgṛhyeta na vā gṛhyatetyuktamityata āha #
GSP33vacbhamu:16630: tatkiṃmiyameva vākyajanitā pratītirātmani tathāca na sākṣātpratītirātmanyanāgataphalatvādasya ityata āha #
GSP33vacbhamu:16632: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---vākyārthaśravaṇamananottarakālā viśeṣaṇatrayavatī bhāvanā brahma sākṣātkārāya kalpate iti vākyārthapratītiḥ sākṣātkārasya pūrvarūpamiti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16636: duḥkhitvādipratyayaścātmani sarveṣāṃ sarvadotpadyata ityabādhitatvātsamīcina iti balavānna śakyo 'panetumityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16642: uktaṃ cāsya tatra tatropapatyā bādhanamevaṃ duḥkhitvādyabhimāno 'pi tathā /
GSP33vacbhamu:16643: nahi nityaśuddhabuddhasvabhāvasyātmanā upajanāpāyadharmaṇo duḥkhaśokādaya ātmano bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16645: nahi gauraśvasya dharmaḥ saṃbandhasyāpi vyatirekāvyatirekābhyāṃ saṃbandhāsaṃbandhābhyāṃ ca vicārāsahatvāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:16653: kasmādanubhavārtha evāvṛtyabhyupagamo yāvatā draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavya ityādibhistatvamasivākyaviṣayādanyaviṣayaivāvṛttirvidhāsyata ityata āha #
GSP33vacbhamu:16655: . #ātmā vā are draṣṭavya ityādyātmaviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:16656: na ca tattvamasīvākyaviṣayādanyadātmadarśanamāmnātaṃ yenopakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate sa vākyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16657: sadeva somyedamiti copakramya tattvamasītyupasaṃhṛta iti sa eva vākyārthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16661: nanu vidhipradhānatvādvākyasya na bhūtārthapradhānatvaṃ bhūtastvarthastadaṅgatayā pratyāyyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:16664: yathā tāvadbhūtārthaparyavasitā vedāntā na kāryavidhiniṣṭāstathopapāditaṃ 'tattu samanvayāt'
GSP33vacbhamu:16669_0: yadyapi tatvamasūtyādyāḥ śrutayaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ pratipādayanti tathāpi
GSP33vacbhamu:16672: naca yathā samāropitaṃ sarpatvamanūdya rajjutvaṃ purovartino dravyasya.vidhīyata evaṃ prakāśātmano jīvabhāvamanūdya paramātmatvaṃ vidhīyata iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16673: yuktaṃ hi purovartini dravye drāghīyasi sāmānyarūpeṇālocite viśeṣarūpeṇāgṛhīte viśeṣāntarasamāropaṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16674: iha tu prakāśātmano nirviśeṣasāmānyasyāparādhīnaprakāśasya nāgṛhītamasti kiñcidrupamiti kasya viśeṣasyāgrahe kiṃ viśeṣāntaraṃ samāropyatām /
GSP33vacbhamu:16675: tasmādbrahmaṇo jīvabhāvāropāsaṃbhavājjīvo jīvo brahma ca hrahmeti tatvamasīti pratīkopadeśa eveti prāptam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16676: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate---śvetaketorātmaiva parameśvaraḥpratipattavyo na tu śvetaketorvyatiriktaḥ parameśvaraḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:16677: bhede hi gauṇatvāpattirna ca mukhyasaṃbhave gauṇatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16678: apica pratīkopadeśe sakṛdvacanaṃ tu pratīyate bhedadarśananindā ca(?) /
GSP33vacbhamu:16683: naca mānāntaravirodha ityādi tu sarvamupāditaṃ prathamādhyāye /
GSP33vacbhamu:16684_1: kasyacidaṃśasyāgrahaṇādvibhrama iva paramārthastu na vibhramo nāma kaścinna ca saṃsāro nāma /
GSP33vacbhamu:16688: anye 'pyāhuḥ---'yadyadvaite toṣo 'sti mukta evāsi sarvadā ' iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16692_0: yathā hi śāstroktaṃ śuddhamukcatasvabhāvaṃ brahmātmatvenaiva jīvenopāsyate 'haṃ brahmāsmi
GSP33vacbhamu:16692_1: tatvamasi śvetaketo ityādiṣu tkasya hetorjīvātmano brahmarūpeṇa tātvikatvādadvitīyamiti śruteśca /
GSP33vacbhamu:16693_0: jīvātmanaścāvidyādarpaṇā yathā brahmapratibimbakāstathā yatra yatra mano brahmādityo

GSP33vacbhamu:16704: naca sarvasya vākyajātasya prapañcasya vilayaḥ prayojanam /
GSP33vacbhamu:16705: tadarthatve hi mana iti pratīkagrahaṇamanarthakaṃ viśvamiti vācyaṃ yathā sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:16715: nanu yathāvacchinnasyāhaṅkarāspadasyānavacchinnabrahmātmatayā bhavatyābhāva evaṃ pratīkānāmapi bhaviṣyatītyata āha--- #

GSP33vacbhamu:17039: ata eva ca sarveṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāmidriyāṇāṃ satyeva savṛttike manasi vṛtteranugatirlayo na svarūpalayaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17040: vācastu pṛthak grahaṇaṃ pūrvasūtre udāharaṇāpekṣaṃ na tu tadeveha vivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17043: yadi svaprakṛtau vikārasya layastato manaḥ prāṇe saṃpadyate ityatra manaḥsvarūpasyaiva prāṇe saṃpattyā bhavitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17044: tathā hi manaḥ iti nopacārato vyākhyānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33vacbhamu:17046: annamayaṃ hi somya mana ityannātmatāmāha manasaḥ śrutirāpomayaḥ prāṇa iti ca prāṇasyābātmatām /
GSP33vacbhamu:17048: tathā ca prāṇo manasaḥ prakṛtiriti manaso vṛttimataḥ prāṇe laya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-- satyam,
GSP33vacbhamu:17051: khayoniprāṇāḍikayā tu mitho vikārayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvābhyupagame saṃkarādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:17052: tasmādyo yasya sākṣādvikārastasya tatra laya ityannasyāpsu layo na tvabvikāre prāṇe 'nnavikārasya manasaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17053: tathā cātrāpi manovṛttervṛttimati prāṇe layo na tu vṛttimato manasa iti siddham //3 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17056: prāṇastejasīti tejaḥśabdasya bhūtaviśeṣavacanatvādvijñānātmani cāprasiddheḥ prāṇasya jīvātmanyupagamānugamāvasthānaśrutīnāṃ ca tejoddhāreṇāpyupapatteḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17060: tasmāttejasyeva prāṇavṛttipravilaya iti prāpte 'bhidhīyate--- sa prakṛtaḥprāṇo 'dhyakṣe vijñānātmanyavatiṣṭhate tattantravṛttirbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:17068: vijñāyate 'neneti vijñānaṃ pañcavṛttiprāṇasahita indriyagrāmastena sahāvatiṣṭhata iti savijñānaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17075: tathāpi sarvaśākhāpratyayatvena vidyānāṃ śrutyantarālocanayā vijñānātmani layo 'vagamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17076: na ca tejasastatrāpi laya iti sāmpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17081: tejaḥsahacaritāni bhūtānyupalakṣyantāṃ tejaḥśabdenādhyakṣe tu kimāyātaṃ tasya tadasāhacaryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17084: yadā hyayaṃ prāṇo 'ntarāle 'dhyakṣaṃ prāpyādhyasaṃparkavaśādeva tejaḥprabhṛtīni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi prāpnoti tadopapadyate prāṇastesīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17104: praśaṃsāśabdo 'pi karmaṇāṃ prayojakatayā prakṛṣṭamāśrayatvaṃ brūte sati nikṛṣṭa āśrayāntare tadupapatterityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:17107: atrābhṛtatvaprāptiśruteḥ paravidyāvantaṃ pratyetaditi manvānasya pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17115: sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ hi sphuṭataraḥ pratipipādayiṣite vastuni pratyayo bhavatīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17116: na tu viduṣaḥ sakāśādviśeṣavanto 'vidvāṃso vidhīyante yena vidyāprakaraṇavyākhyāto bhavedapi tu vidyāṃ pratipādayituṃ lokasiddhānāṃ tadanuguṇatayā teṣāmanuvāda iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17122: ayaṃ vidyopakrama ārambhaḥ prayatna iti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:17123: tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati-- neyaṃ parā vidyā yato nāḍīdvāramāśrayate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17125: na cāsyāmātyantikaḥ kleśapradāho yato na tatrotkrāntirbhavet /
GSP33vacbhamu:17130: siddhāṃ kṛtvā bījabhāvāvaśeṣaṃ paramātmasaṃpattiṃ vidvadaviduṣorutkrāntiḥ samarthitā /
GSP33vacbhamu:17132: kimātmani tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṃ tatvapravilaya eva saṃpattirāhosvidbījabhāvāvaśeṣeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17136: tatrāprakṛtau na vikāratatvapravilayo yathā manasi na vāgādīnām /
GSP33vacbhamu:17137: sarvasya ca janimataḥ prakṛtiḥ parā devateti tattvapralaya evātyantikaḥ syāttejaḥprabhṛtīnāmiti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-- 'yonimanye prapadyante śarīratvāya dehinaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17139: ' ityavidyāvataḥ saṃsāramupadiśati śrutiḥ seyamātyantike tattvalaye nopapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17140: na ca prāyaṇasyaivaiṣa mahimā vidvāsamavidvāṃsaṃ vā pratīti sāṃpratamityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:17149: kasmānna mūrtāntaraiḥ pratibadhyata iti śaṅkāmapākartumidaṃ sūtram-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:17153: tacca sūkṣmaṃ svarūpataḥ parimāṇataśca svarūpameva hi tasya tādṛśamadṛśyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17154: yathā cākṣuṣasya tejaso mahato 'pi adṛṣṭavaśādanudbhūtarūpasparśaṃ hi tat /
GSP33vacbhamu:17155: parimāṇataḥ saukṣmyaṃ yato nopalabhyate yathā trasareṇavo jālasūryamarīcibhyo 'nyatra pramāṇatastathopalabdhiriti vyācaṣṭe-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:17157: ādigrahaṇena cakṣuṣṭo vā mūrdho vā anyebhyo vā śarīradeśebhya iti saṃgṛhītam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17161: yathā hi kācābhrapaṭalaṃ svacchasvabhāvasya na tejasaḥ pratidhātam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17169: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- dṛṣṭaśrutābhyāmūṣmaṇo 'nvayavyatirekābhyāmasti sthūlāddehādatiriktaṃ kiñciccadāmātsūkṣmaṃ śarīramiti //11 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17178: yadi hi prāṇopalakṣitasya sūkṣmaśarīrasya jīvātmanaḥ sthūlaśarīrādutkrāntiṃ pratiṣedhecchrutiḥ tata etadupapadyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17180: na tasmātprāṇa utkrāmantīti hi tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānāvamarśinābhyudayaniḥ śreyasādhikṛto dehi pradhānaṃ parāmṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17181: tathā ca tasmāddehino na prāṇaḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīramutkrāmantyapi tu tatsahitaḥ kṣetrajña evotkrāmatīti gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17182: sa punaratikramya brahmanāḍya saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ hiraṇyagarbhaparyantaṃ saliṅgo jīvaḥ parasminbrahmaṇi līyate tasmātparāmapi devatāṃ viduṣa utkrāntirata eva mārgaśrutayaḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:17188_0: tathā hi -- ārtabhāgapraśnottare hyekasminpakṣe saṃsāriṇa eva jīvātmano 'nutkrāntiṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:17188_1: parigṛhya na tarhyeṣa bhṛtaḥ prāṇānāmanutkrānteriti svayamāśaṅkya prāṇānāṃ pravilayaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:17189: śarīrasya ca te itiśarīrameva tadapādānaṃ gamyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17192: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehi parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:17194: nanu tadā sarvanāmnā pradhānatayā dehī parāmṛṣṭaḥ tatkathamatra dehāvagatirityata āha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:17196: dehadehinordehiparāmarśinā sarvanāmnā deha eva parāmṛṣṭa iti pañcamīpāṭhe vyākhyeyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17199: api ca prāptipūrvaḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāprāpte /
GSP33vacbhamu:17200: aviduṣo hi dehādutkrāmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti viduṣo 'pi tatsāmānyāddehādutkramaṇe prāpte pratiṣedha upapadyate na tu prāṇānāṃ jīvāvadhikaṃ kvacidutkramaṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena tanniṣidhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17201: apicādvaitaparibhāvanābhuvā prasaṃkhyānena nirmṛṣṭanikhilaprapañcāvabhāsajātasya gantavyābhāvādeva nāsti gatirityāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:17203: apadasya hi brahmavido mārge padaiṣiṇo 'pi devā iti yojanā /
GSP33vacbhamu:17212: tāni punaḥ prāṇaśabdoditānīndriyāṇyekādaśa sūkṣmāṇi ca bhūtāni pañca /
GSP33vacbhamu:17222: itarā tu evamevāsya paridṛṣṭuḥ ityādikā vidvatpratipattyapekṣā tāttvikapramāṇāpekṣā /
GSP33vacbhamu:17227: avidyānimittaśca vibhāgo nāvidyāyāṃ vidyayā samūlaghātamapahatāyāṃ sāvaśeṣo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33vacbhamu:17232: tatra kiṃ vidvānavidvāṃścāviśeṣeṇa mūrdhādibhya utkrāmatyāho vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva,
GSP33vacbhamu:17235_0: tasyopasaṃhṛtavāgādikalāpasyocciktamiṣato vijñānātmanā oka āyatanaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasyāgraṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:17235_1: tasya jvalanaṃ yattatprakāśitadvāro viniṣkramadvāro vidvānmūrdhasthānādeva niṣkrāmati
GSP33vacbhamu:17241: hārdavidyāśeṣabhūtā hi mūrdhanyā nāḍī gatyai upadiṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:17242: tadanuśīlanena khalvayaṃ jīvo hārdena sūpāsitena brahmaṇānugṛhītastasyānusmaraṃstadbhāvamāpanno mūrdhanyayaiva śatādhikayā nāḍya niṣkrāmati /
GSP33vacbhamu:17243: hṛdayādudgatā hi brahmanāḍī bhāsvarā tālumūlaṃ bhittvā mūrdhānametya raśmibhirekībhūtā ādityamaṇḍalamanupraviṣṭā tāmanuśīlayatastayaivāntakāle nirgamanaṃ bhavatīti //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17246: rātrāvahani cāviśeṣeṇa raśmyanusārī sannādityamaṇḍalaṃ prāpnotīti siddhāntapakṣapratijñā //18 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17252: amuṣmādādityātpratāyante raśmayanta āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā bhavanti ya ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante #
GSP33vacbhamu:17257: candramasā khalvaṃmayena saṃbadhyamānānāṃ sūrīṇāṃ bhāsāṃ candrikātvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17259: ye tyāhuḥ-- sa yāvatkṣipyenmanastāvadādityaṃ gacchediti nirapekṣaśravaṇādrātrau prete nāsti raśmyapekṣeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17264: ye tu manyante vidvānapi rātriprāyaṇāparādhena nordhvamākramata iti tānpratyāha-- #
GSP33vacbhamu:17266: nityavatphalasaṃbandhena vihitā vidyā na pākṣikaphalā yukteti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17267: ye tu rātrau pretasya viduṣo 'harapekṣāṃ sūryamaṇḍalaprāptirācakṣate tanmatamāśaṅkyāha--- #
GSP33vacbhamu:17280: viduṣo 'pi ca bhīṣmasyottarāyaṇapratīkṣaṇamaviduṣa ācāraṃ grāha- yati 'yadyadācarati śreṣṭhastattadevetaro janaḥ' iti nyāyāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:17286: kāla evātra prādhānyenocyate na tvātivāhikī devatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17288: yoginaḥ prati ca smaryate smārte caite# /
GSP33vacbhamu:17289: smārtīmupāsanāṃ pratyayaṃ smārtaḥ kālabhedaviniyogaḥ pratyāsatteḥ na tu śrautīṃ pratītyarthaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17290: atra yadi smṛtau kālabhedavidhiḥ śrautau cāgnijyotirādividhistatrāgnyādīnāmātivāhikatayā viṣayavyavasthayā virodhābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17291: atha pratyabhijñānaṃ tathāpi yatra kāla ityatrāpi kālābhidhānadvāreṇātivāhikya eva devatā uktā ityavirodha eveti //21 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17292: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17299: gantavyamekaṃ nagaraṃ prati vakreṇādhvanā gatimapekṣya ṛjunādhvanā gatistvarāvatī kalpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17301_0: atha taireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ nopapadyate pathyantarasya nivartanīyasyābhāvāttasmātparānapekṣā
GSP33vacbhamu:17301_1: evaite panthāna ekabrahmalokaprāptyupāyā vrīhiyavāviva vikalperanniti prāpte pratyucyate-
GSP33vacbhamu:17303: saparvā hi panthā nagarādikamekaṃ gantavyaṃ prāpayati nābhāgaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17304: tatra kimete raśmyaharvāyusūryādayo 'dhvanaḥ parvāṇaḥ santo 'dhvanaikena yujyante,
GSP33vacbhamu:17305: āho yathāyathamadhvānamapi bhindantīti saṃdehe 'bhede 'pyadhvano bhāgabhedopapatterna bhāgibhedakalpanocitā,
GSP33vacbhamu:17308: athaitaireva raśmibhirityavadhāraṇaṃ na tāvadarthāntaranivṛttyarthaṃ tatprāpakaireva vākyāntarairvirodhāt,
GSP33vacbhamu:17310: na caikaṃ vākyamaprāptamadhvānaṃ prāpayati tasya cānapekṣatāṃ pratipādayatītyarthadvayāya paryāptaṃ,
GSP33vacbhamu:17314: na khalvekasminneva gantavye pathibhedamapekṣya tvarāvakalpyate kintu gantavyabhedādapi tadupapattiḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17315: yathā kaśmīrebhyo mathurāṃ kṣipraṃ yāti caitra iti tathehāpyanyataḥ kutaścidgantavyādanenopāyena brahmalokaṃ kṣipraṃ prayātīti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17318: ayamarthaḥ-ekatvātprāptavyasya brahmalokasyālpaparvaṇā mārgeṇa tatprāptau saṃbhavantyāṃ bahumārgopadeśo vyarthaḥ prasajyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17320: tasmādbhūyasāṃ parvaṇāmavirodhenālpānāṃ tadanupraveśa eva yukta iti //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17325_0: ' 'sa vāyumāgacchati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā rathacakrasya khaṃ tena sa ūrdhvamākramate'
GSP33vacbhamu:17325_1: iti hi vāyunimittamūrdhvākramaṇaṃ śrutaṃ na tu vāyunimittamādityagamanaṃ 'sa ādityaṃ
GSP33vacbhamu:17330: bhavedetadevaṃ yadyūrdhvaśabdātkaścillokabhedaḥ pratīyeta sa tūparideśamātravācī lokabhedādvināparyavasyaṃllokabhedavācināditye vyavasthāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17332: pāṭhaḥ padārthamātrapradarśanārtho na tu kramāya prabhavati śrutivirodhāditi siddham /
GSP33vacbhamu:17333: vājasaneyināṃ saṃvatsaraloko na paṭhyate chāndogyānāṃ devaloko na paṭhyate tatrobhayānurodhādubhayapāṭhe māsasaṃbandhātsaṃvatsaraḥ pūrvaḥ paścimo devalokaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17334: nahi māso devalokena saṃbadhyate kintu saṃvatsareṇa /
GSP33vacbhamu:17335: tasmāttayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhānmāsārabhyatvācca saṃvatsarasya māsānantarye sthite devalokaḥ saṃvatsarasya parastādbhavati /
GSP33vacbhamu:17336: tatrādityānantaryāya vāyoḥ saṃvatsarādityasya sthāne devalokādvāyumiti paṭhitavyam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17352: na caiṣāṃ tvāvadhikānāmiva niyamavatī saṃvahanasvarūpā svatanantrakriyā buddhipūrvā saṃbhavatyacetanānām /
GSP33vacbhamu:17355: na heturnāguṇe hetau pañcamī dṛśyate kvacit //
GSP33vacbhamu:17356: jāḍyādbaddha ityādiṣu guṇavacaneṣu jāḍyādiṣu hetupañcamī dṛṣṭā /
GSP33vacbhamu:17357: na cārcirādiśabdā guṇavācino yena pañcamyā teṣāṃ vahanaṃ prati hetutvamucyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17359: na cāmānavasya puruṣasya vidyudādiṣu voḍhṛtvadarśanādarcirādīnāmapi voḍhṛtvānnāmānavaḥ puruṣo voḍhā śrūyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17361: tasmādbhogabhūmaya evārcirādayo nātivāhikā iti prāpte pratyucyate -saṃpiṇḍakaraṇānāṃ hi sūkṣmadehavatāṃ gatau /
GSP33vacbhamu:17362: na svātantryaṃ na cāgnyādyā netāro 'cetanāstu te //
GSP33vacbhamu:17363: īdṛśī hi niyamavatī gatiḥ svayaṃ vā prekṣāvato 'prekṣāvato vā prekṣāvatprayuktasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:17364_1: jīvātmāno mattamūrcchicavatsvayaṃ prekṣāvanto yadevaṃ svātantryeṇa gaccheyustadyadyarcirādayo
GSP33vacbhamu:17365: na caitebhyo 'nyasya cetanasya netuḥ kalpanā sati śrutānāṃ caitanyasaṃbhave /
GSP33vacbhamu:17368: tasmādvyavasthita eva parameśvarasya sarvādhyakṣatve yathā yathātvaṃ lokapālādīnāṃ svātantryamevamihāpyarcirādīnāmātivāhikatvameva darśanānusārācchabdārtha iti yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17373: arciṣa iti ca hetau pañcamī nāpādāne /
GSP33vacbhamu:17379: yathā brāhmaṇamānaya bhojayitavya iti tadviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ yadā tatsaṃnidhāvupanipatati padaṃ kaṇṭhādi(?)
GSP33vacbhamu:17384: vidyullokamāgato 'mānavaḥ puruṣo vaidyutastenaiva na tu varuṇādinā svayamuhyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17386: varuṇādayastu tatsāhāyake vartamānā voḍhāro bhavantīti ca vaiṣamyaṃ na voḍhṛtve iti sarvamavadātam //6 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17390: kiṃ paraṃ brahma gamayatyāhosvidaparaṃ kāryaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17393: brahma gamayatītyatra hi napuṃsakaṃ brahmapadaṃ parasminneva brahmaṇi nirūḍhatvādanapekṣatayā mukhyamiti sati saṃbhave na kārye brahmaṇi guṇakalpanayā vyākhyātumucitam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17396: kiñca tatra tatra parameva brahma prakṛtya prajāpatisadmapratipattyādaya ucyamānā nāparabrahmaviṣayā bhavitumarhanti prakaraṇavirodhāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:17397: na ca parasmintsarvagate gatirnopapadyate prāptatvāditi yuktam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17399: yathaikasminnyagrodhapādape mūlādagramagrācca mūlaṃ gacchataḥ śākhāmṛgasyaikenaiva nyagrodhapādapena nirantaraṃ saṃyogavibhāgā bhavanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17400: na caite tadavayavaviṣayī na tu nyagrodhaviṣayā iti sāmprataṃ tathā sati na śākhāmṛgo nyagrodhena yujyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17402: evaṃ dṛśyamānānāmapi tadavayavānāṃ na yogastadavayavayogāttadantena krameṇa tadavayaveṣu paramāṇuṣu vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17403: te cātīndriyā iti kasminnu nāmāyamanubhavapaddhatimadhyāstāṃ saṃyogatapasvī /
GSP33vacbhamu:17407: lokaśabdaścālokane prakāśe vartayitavyo na tu sanniveśavati deśaviśeṣe /
GSP33vacbhamu:17409: yathā vidyākarmavaśādarcirādinā gatasya satyalokamatikramya paraṃ jagatkāraṇaṃ brahma lokamālokaṃ svayaṃ prakāśakamiti yāvat /
GSP33vacbhamu:17410: prāptasya tatraiva liṅgaṃ pralīyate na tu gatimevaṃbhūtāṃ vinā liṅgapravilaya iti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17411: ata eva śrutiḥ- puruṣamāṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti /

GSP33vacbhamu:17518: yathā hi kaphanimitto jvara upāttasya kaphasya viśeṣaṇādibhiḥ prakṣaye kaphāntarotpattinimittadadhyādivarjane praśānto 'pi na punarbhavati /

GSP33vacbhamu:17738: dvādaśāhamṛddhikāmā upeyurityupāyicodanena ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ satramupayantīti ca dvādaśāhasya satratvaṃ bahukartṛkasya gamyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:17766: naca sarvagatasya vastuto vigalitaprāyāvidyasya viduṣaḥ pṛthagjanasyevautpattikāntaḥkaraṇavaśyatā yena tadautpattikamantaḥkaraṇamāgantukāntaḥkaraṇāntarasaṃbandhamasya vārayet /
GSP33vacbhamu:17767: tasmādvidvān sarvasya vaśī sarveśvaraḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ sendriyamanāṃsi śarīrāṇi nirmāya tāni caikapade praviśya tattadindriyamantaḥkaraṇaisteṣu lokeṣu mukto viharatīti sāṃpratam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17768: pradīpavaditi tu nidarśanaṃ pradīpaikyaṃ pradīpavyaktiṣūpacaryate bhinnavartivartinīnāṃ bhinnavyaktīnāṃ bhedāt /
GSP33vacbhamu:17775: salilamiva salilaḥ salilaprātipadikātsarvaprātipadikebhya ityupamānādācāre kvipi kṛte pacādyaci ca kṛte rūpam /

GSP33vacbhamu:17781: aiśvaryaśrutayastu saguṇavidyāvipākāvasthāpekṣā muktyabhisaṃdhānaṃ tu tadavasthāsatteryathāruṇadarśane saṃdhyāyāṃ divasābhidhānam //16 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17786: 'āpnoti svārājyaṃ' 'sarve 'smai devā balimāvahanti' 'sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati' ityādiśrutibhyo viduṣaḥ parabrahmaṇa ivānyānadhīnatvamaiśvaryamavagamyate /

GSP33vacbhamu:17793: na khalu yadadhīnotpādaṃ yasya rūpaṃ tattadrūpādūnaṃ bhavatīti kaścinniyamaḥ /
GSP33vacbhamu:17794: tatsamānāṃ tadadhikānāṃ ca darśanāttathā hyantevāsī gurvadhīnavidhaḥ tatsamastadadhiko vā dṛśyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17796: tadiha niratiśayaiśvaryatvāt parameśvarasya mā nāma bhūvanvidvāṃsastato 'dhikāstatsamāstu bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33vacbhamu:17799: tadete svatantrāḥ santastadvyāpāre jagatsarjane 'pi pravarteranniti prāpte pratyabhidhīyate-nityatvādanapekṣatvāt śrutestatprakramādapi /
GSP33vacbhamu:17801: jagatsargalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ kāraṇaikasvabhāvasyaiva hi bhavatu āho kāryakāraṇasvabhāvasya /
GSP33vacbhamu:17802: tatrobhayasvabhāvasya svotpattau mūlakāraṇāpekṣasya pūrvasiddhaḥ parameśvara eva kāraṇamabhyupetavya iti sa evaiko 'stu jagatkāraṇam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17808: apica samapradhānānāṃ hi na niyamavadaikamatyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti yadaikaḥ sisṛkṣati tadaivetaraḥ saṃjihīrṣatītyaparyāyeṇa sṛṣṭisaṃhārau syātām /
GSP33vacbhamu:17811_1: sa eva teṣāmadhīśa iti tattantrā vidvāṃsa iti parameśvaravyāpārasya sargasaṃhārasya neśate //17 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17814: yataḥ parameśvarādhīnamaiśvaryaṃ tasmāttato nyūnamaṇimādimātraṃ svārājyaṃ na tu jadatsraṣṭṛtvam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17820: tathā pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtānīti vikāravarti rūpaṃ tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divīti nirvikāramāha rūpam //19 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17821: darśayataścāpare śrutismṛtī nirvikārameva rūpaṃ bhagavataste ca paṭhite /
GSP33vacbhamu:17822: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadi brūṣe saguṇe brahmaṇyupāsyamāne yathā tadguṇasya niravagrahatvamapi vastuto 'stīti niravagrahatve viduṣā prāptavyamiti tadanena vyabhicārayate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17823: yathā savikāre brahmaṇyupāsyamāne vastutaḥ sthitamapi nirvikārarūpaṃ na prāpyate tatkasya hetoḥ,
GSP33vacbhamu:17825: tathā tadguṇopāsanayā vastutaḥ sthitamapi niravagrahatvaṃ nāpyate /
GSP33vacbhamu:17827: upāsakasya tadakratutvaṃ ca niravagrahatvasyopāsanavidhyagocaratvādvidhyadhīnatvāccopāsanāsu puruṣasvātantryābhāvātsvātantrye vā prātibhatvaprasaṅgāditi //20 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17835: saha parameśvarasyātiśayena vartata iti viduṣa aiśvaryaṃ sātiśayam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17836: yacca kāryaṃ sātiśayaṃ tacca yathā laukikamaiśvaryam /
GSP33vacbhamu:17838: tathāca kāryatvādantavatprāptamiti tacca na yuktamānantyena tadviduṣāṃ tatra pravṛtteriti //21 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17850: na caitannirvāṇaṃ svarūpāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ yenānityaṃ syādityāha- #
GSP33vacbhamu:17853: so 'yaṃ śāṅkarabhāṣyajātaviṣayo vācaspateḥ sādaraṃ saṃdarbhaḥ paribhāvyatāṃ sumatayaḥ svārtheṣu ko matsaraḥ //1 //
GSP33vacbhamu:17865: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śaṅkarabhagavatpādabhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ caturthasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ# /
